segment.source: What's New in NVDA
segment.target: Novidades do NVDA

segment.source: This release includes improvements in Windows 11, browse mode, and Microsoft Word.
segment.target: This release includes improvements in Windows 11, browse mode, and Microsoft Word.

segment.source: In browse mode, quick navigation keys for headings 7 through 9 have been added.
segment.target: In browse mode, quick navigation keys for headings 7 through 9 have been added.

segment.source: The Elements List and Find dialogs no longer cause application profiles to be deactivated.
segment.target: The Elements List and Find dialogs no longer cause application profiles to be deactivated.

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, notifications like "loading complete" no longer stop say all.
segment.target: In Microsoft Edge, notifications like "loading complete" no longer stop say all.

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, when using the shortcuts to switch to page view or outline view, the new view is now reported.
segment.target: In Microsoft Word, when using the shortcuts to switch to page view or outline view, the new view is now reported.

segment.source: When UIA is enabled, redundant table end markers are no longer brailled when the cursor is in a table cell.
segment.target: When UIA is enabled, redundant table end markers are no longer brailled when the cursor is in a table cell.

segment.source: On Windows 11, NVDA will no longer announce emoji panel items twice while browsing them.
segment.target: On Windows 11, NVDA will no longer announce emoji panel items twice while browsing them.

segment.source: Performance and reliability in the Start Menu on Windows 11 24H2 has been improved.
segment.target: Performance and reliability in the Start Menu on Windows 11 24H2 has been improved.

segment.source: On Windows 11 24H2 and newer, window state will be announced when resizing windows with `Windows+arrow` keys.
segment.target: On Windows 11 24H2 and newer, window state will be announced when resizing windows with `Windows+arrow` keys.

segment.source: Support has also been added for Windows 11 Voice Access.
segment.target: Support has also been added for Windows 11 Voice Access.

segment.source: Options have been added to report the language of the text being read, and report when the language is not supported by the current synthesizer.
segment.target: Options have been added to report the language of the text being read, and report when the language is not supported by the current synthesizer.

segment.source: Support for the NLS eReader Zoomax braille display has been added.
segment.target: Support for the NLS eReader Zoomax braille display has been added.

segment.source: Support for cursor routing with the point and click action on the Humanware Monarch has been added.
segment.target: Support for cursor routing with the point and click action on the Humanware Monarch has been added.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, adding new Biblical Hebrew, Russian 6 dot computer braille and Thai Grade 2 braille tables.
segment.target: LibLouis has been updated, adding new Biblical Hebrew, Russian 6 dot computer braille and Thai Grade 2 braille tables.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated, adding support for Aromanian, Crimean Tatar, Mongolian, and Pashto.
segment.target: eSpeak NG has been updated, adding support for Aromanian, Crimean Tatar, Mongolian, and Pashto.

segment.source: There have also been a number of other fixes and improvements, including to mouse and touch interaction, Windows 11 Notepad, Google Chrome.
segment.target: There have also been a number of other fixes and improvements, including to mouse and touch interaction, Windows 11 Notepad, Google Chrome.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: New Features

segment.source: NVDA can now report the language of the text being read. (#17664, @nvdaes):
segment.target: NVDA can now report the language of the text being read. (#17664, @nvdaes):

segment.source: New options are available to:
segment.target: New options are available to:

segment.source: Report the language of the text being read.
segment.target: Report the language of the text being read.

segment.source: Report if the language of the text being read is not supported.
segment.target: Report if the language of the text being read is not supported.

segment.source: A new unassigned command has been added to report the language of the text at the caret position.
segment.target: A new unassigned command has been added to report the language of the text at the caret position.

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, the new view is now reported when using the shortcuts to switch to page view (`control+alt+p`) or outline view (`control+alt+o`). (#18091, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: In Microsoft Word, the new view is now reported when using the shortcuts to switch to page view (`control+alt+p`) or outline view (`control+alt+o`). (#18091, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: It is now possible to route to any braille cell on the Humanware Monarch multiline braille device, using their point and click action. (#18248)
segment.target: It is now possible to route to any braille cell on the Humanware Monarch multiline braille device, using their point and click action. (#18248)

segment.source: In Windows 11 2024 Update and Server 2025 and later, NVDA will announce foreground window states such as restore, maximize, and snap when changing window position by pressing `windows+arrow` keys. (#17841, #18175, @josephsl)
segment.target: In Windows 11 2024 Update and Server 2025 and later, NVDA will announce foreground window states such as restore, maximize, and snap when changing window position by pressing `windows+arrow` keys. (#17841, #18175, @josephsl)

segment.source: Unassigned commands have been added to open the NVDA settings dialog in the following categories: Vision, Windows OCR, Add-on Store and Advanced. (#18313, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Unassigned commands have been added to open the NVDA settings dialog in the following categories: Vision, Windows OCR, Add-on Store and Advanced. (#18313, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Introduced support for Windows 11 Voice Access, including reporting dictated text and microphone status from everywhere (requires NVDA to be installed). (#16862, #17384, @josephsl)
segment.target: Introduced support for Windows 11 Voice Access, including reporting dictated text and microphone status from everywhere (requires NVDA to be installed). (#16862, #17384, @josephsl)

segment.source: Support for the NLS eReader Zoomax braille display has been added. (#15863, @florin-trutiu)
segment.target: Support for the NLS eReader Zoomax braille display has been added. (#15863, @florin-trutiu)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Changes

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Component updates:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.34.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.34.0). (#18227, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.34.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.34.0). (#18227, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Added new tables for Biblical Hebrew as well as for Russian 6 dot computer braille and Thai Grade 2.
segment.target: Added new tables for Biblical Hebrew as well as for Russian 6 dot computer braille and Thai Grade 2.

segment.source: Substantial updates to Lithuanian braille tables.
segment.target: Substantial updates to Lithuanian braille tables.

segment.source: Small improvements to Hungarian, Dutch, Norwegian and Turkish tables.
segment.target: Small improvements to Hungarian, Dutch, Norwegian and Turkish tables.

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG to [commit `e93d3a9`](https://github.com/espeak-ng/espeak-ng/commit/e93d3a97ee9237f7e170cc8870f44c14de9032a9). (#17896)
segment.target: Updated eSpeak NG to [commit `e93d3a9`](https://github.com/espeak-ng/espeak-ng/commit/e93d3a97ee9237f7e170cc8870f44c14de9032a9). (#17896)

segment.source: Added new languages Aromanian, Crimean Tatar, Mongolian, and Pashto.
segment.target: Added new languages Aromanian, Crimean Tatar, Mongolian, and Pashto.

segment.source: In browse mode, it is now possible to use number keys 1 to 9 (previously 1 to 6), to navigate to the corresponding heading. (#18014, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: In browse mode, it is now possible to use number keys 1 to 9 (previously 1 to 6), to navigate to the corresponding heading. (#18014, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When the Elements List or Find dialog is opened, NVDA won't change the configuration profile, similar to the behavior in other NVDA dialogs. (#18160, @nvdaes)
segment.target: When the Elements List or Find dialog is opened, NVDA won't change the configuration profile, similar to the behavior in other NVDA dialogs. (#18160, @nvdaes)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, NVDA will no longer cancel say all when notifications such as "loading complete" are announced. (#17986, @josephsl)
segment.target: In Microsoft Edge, NVDA will no longer cancel say all when notifications such as "loading complete" are announced. (#17986, @josephsl)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Bug Fixes

segment.source: In WinUI 3 apps including Microsoft Copilot and parts of Windows 11 File Explorer, NVDA will no longer fail to announce controls when using mouse and touch interaction. (#17407, #17771, @josephsl)
segment.target: In WinUI 3 apps including Microsoft Copilot and parts of Windows 11 File Explorer, NVDA will no longer fail to announce controls when using mouse and touch interaction. (#17407, #17771, @josephsl)

segment.source: Fixed some rare cases where NVDA playing sounds could result in unexpected errors. (#17918, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Fixed some rare cases where NVDA playing sounds could result in unexpected errors. (#17918, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, when UIA is enabled, NVDA will no longer braille redundant table end markers when the cursor is in a table cell. (#15828, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: In Microsoft Word, when UIA is enabled, NVDA will no longer braille redundant table end markers when the cursor is in a table cell. (#15828, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: In Geekbench 6.4, NVDA can again read the ribbon and options within. (#17892, @mzanm)
segment.target: In Geekbench 6.4, NVDA can again read the ribbon and options within. (#17892, @mzanm)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read check list items in Microsoft Loop when viewed in Google Chrome / Microsoft Edge. (#18130)
segment.target: NVDA no longer fails to read check list items in Microsoft Loop when viewed in Google Chrome / Microsoft Edge. (#18130)

segment.source: NVDA now respects its line number reporting setting in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio 21. (#18176, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: NVDA now respects its line number reporting setting in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio 21. (#18176, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: In Windows 11 Notepad, NVDA will announce values typed into the "Line number" field of the "Go to line" dialog when "speak typed characters" is set to "only in edit controls". (#18208, @josephsl)
segment.target: In Windows 11 Notepad, NVDA will announce values typed into the "Line number" field of the "Go to line" dialog when "speak typed characters" is set to "only in edit controls". (#18208, @josephsl)

segment.source: In the Start Menu in Windows 11 24H2: (#17951, @jcsteh)
segment.target: In the Start Menu in Windows 11 24H2: (#17951, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes incorrectly switches to browse mode soon after entering the Start Menu.
segment.target: NVDA no longer sometimes incorrectly switches to browse mode soon after entering the Start Menu.

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes when navigating in browse mode.
segment.target: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes when navigating in browse mode.

segment.source: Search suggestions are now reported reliably.
segment.target: Search suggestions are now reported reliably.

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer announce emoji panel items twice while browsing them. (#18236, @josephsl)
segment.target: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer announce emoji panel items twice while browsing them. (#18236, @josephsl)

segment.source: In focus mode in web browsers, it is now possible to review and spell the labels of controls when those labels are specifically provided for accessibility; e.g. via `aria-label` or `aria-labelledby`. (#15159, @jcsteh)
segment.target: In focus mode in web browsers, it is now possible to review and spell the labels of controls when those labels are specifically provided for accessibility; e.g. via `aria-label` or `aria-labelledby`. (#15159, @jcsteh)

segment.source: It is now possible to review and spell the labels of controls in Google Chrome menus and dialogs. (#11285, @jcsteh)
segment.target: It is now possible to review and spell the labels of controls in Google Chrome menus and dialogs. (#11285, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When typing into a cell in Microsoft Excel, the braille display is now correctly updated to show the new content. (#18391)
segment.target: When typing into a cell in Microsoft Excel, the braille display is now correctly updated to show the new content. (#18391)

segment.source: Fixed bug when trying to access the Add-on Store from certain environments such as corporates. (#18354)
segment.target: Fixed bug when trying to access the Add-on Store from certain environments such as corporates. (#18354)

segment.source: When using NVDA Remote Access, speech from User Account Control screens on the remote computer now works reliably. (#18101, @jcsteh)
segment.target: When using NVDA Remote Access, speech from User Account Control screens on the remote computer now works reliably. (#18101, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Changes for Developers

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Component updates:

segment.source: Updated SCons to 4.9.1. (#18069, @dpy013)
segment.target: Updated SCons to 4.9.1. (#18069, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated NSIS to 3.11 (#18027, @dpy013)
segment.target: Updated NSIS to 3.11 (#18027, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated Ruff to 0.11.12. (#17671)
segment.target: Updated Ruff to 0.11.12. (#17671)

segment.source: Updated pre-commit to 4.2.0. (#17671)
segment.target: Updated pre-commit to 4.2.0. (#17671)

segment.source: Updated pyright to 1.1.401. (#17671)
segment.target: Updated pyright to 1.1.401. (#17671)

segment.source: NVDA now uses [uv](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/) as Python package/project manager. (#17935, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: NVDA now uses [uv](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/) as Python package/project manager. (#17935, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Running `scons` from the source repository will automatically suggest a strategy to install uv when it is not yet available.
segment.target: Running `scons` from the source repository will automatically suggest a strategy to install uv when it is not yet available.

segment.source: Added the "externalPythonDependencies" category as an extra debug logging category. When enabled, debug logging messages from external dependencies (such as comtypes) will be delivered to NVDA's log. (#18067, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Added the "externalPythonDependencies" category as an extra debug logging category. When enabled, debug logging messages from external dependencies (such as comtypes) will be delivered to NVDA's log. (#18067, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Several additions to report the language of the text being read. (#17685, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Several additions to report the language of the text being read. (#17685, @nvdaes)

segment.source: The `synthDriver` class of `synthDriverHandler` includes a `languageIsSupported` function to check if the language indicated by the `lang` parameter is supported by the synthesizer.
segment.target: The `synthDriver` class of `synthDriverHandler` includes a `languageIsSupported` function to check if the language indicated by the `lang` parameter is supported by the synthesizer.

segment.source: A `languageHandling` module has been added to report the language within speech sequences.
segment.target: A `languageHandling` module has been added to report the language within speech sequences.

segment.source: `LangChangeCommand` of `speech.commands` includes static methods to determine if NVDA should get the language of the text being read, and switch synthesizer voice.
segment.target: `LangChangeCommand` of `speech.commands` includes static methods to determine if NVDA should get the language of the text being read, and switch synthesizer voice.

segment.source: The `brailleTables` module is now a package.
segment.target: The `brailleTables` module is now a package.

segment.source: The several built-in table definitions are moved to the `__tables` module in that package. (#18194, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: The several built-in table definitions are moved to the `__tables` module in that package. (#18194, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio now uses the Visual Studio app module, as SSMS is based on Visual Studio. (#18176, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio now uses the Visual Studio app module, as SSMS is based on Visual Studio. (#18176, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA will report Windows release revision number (for example: 10.0.26100.0) when `winVersion.getWinVer` is called and log this information at startup. (#18266, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA will report Windows release revision number (for example: 10.0.26100.0) when `winVersion.getWinVer` is called and log this information at startup. (#18266, @josephsl)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: The following symbols in `updateCheck` are deprecated for removal without replacement: `CERT_USAGE_MATCH`, `CERT_CHAIN_PARA`, `UPDATE_FETCH_TIMEOUT_S`. (#18354)
segment.target: The following symbols in `updateCheck` are deprecated for removal without replacement: `CERT_USAGE_MATCH`, `CERT_CHAIN_PARA`, `UPDATE_FETCH_TIMEOUT_S`. (#18354)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir uma falha.

segment.source: Bug fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falha

segment.source: Certain Microsoft Word versions before version 16.0.18226 will no longer crash on opening. (#18280)
segment.target: Certas verses do Microsoft Word anteriores verso 16.0.18226 no travaro mais ao abrir. (#18280)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir uma falha.

segment.source: Bug fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falha

segment.source: Fixed bug where the Add-on Store would not open when using the Korean language for the NVDA interface. (#18250)
segment.target: Corrigido o bug em que a Loja de Complementos no abriria ao usar o idioma coreano para a interface do NVDA. (#18250)

segment.source: This release introduces NVDA Remote Access, allowing you to control a remote computer running NVDA from another device running NVDA.
segment.target: Esta verso apresenta o Acesso Remoto do NVDA, permitindo que voc controle um computador remoto executando o NVDA a partir de outro dispositivo executando o NVDA.

segment.source: There are many improvements to speech, particularly responsiveness with SAPI 4, SAPI 5 and OneCore voices.
segment.target: H muitas melhorias na fala, particularmente na capacidade de resposta com SAPI 4, SAPI 5 e vozes OneCore.

segment.source: Rate boost and automatic language switching is now supported in SAPI 5.
segment.target: O aumento especial de velocidade e a alternncia automtica de idioma agora so suportados em SAPI 5.

segment.source: SAPI 4 voices now support audio ducking, leading silence trimming, and keeping the audio device awake.
segment.target: As vozes SAPI 4 agora suportam udio prioritrio reduo de udio , corte de silncio inicial e manter o dispositivo de udio acordado.

segment.source: The Add-on Store's automatic update system has been improved, allowing you to select channels for automatic updates, and run automatic updates in the background.
segment.target: O sistema de atualizao automtica da Loja de Complementos foi aprimorado, permitindo que voc selecione canais para atualizaes automticas e execute atualizaes automticas em segundo plano.

segment.source: New commands have been added to manually refresh an OCR result, and to toggle periodically refreshing OCR results.
segment.target: Novos comandos foram adicionados para atualizar manualmente um resultado de OCR e para alternar a atualizao peridica dos resultados de OCR.

segment.source: Native selection is now available in Chrome and Edge.
segment.target: A seleo nativa agora est disponvel no Chrome e no Edge.

segment.source: Microsoft Office and LibreOffice support has improved, notably with more shortcuts being announced.
segment.target: O suporte ao Microsoft Office e ao LibreOffice melhorou, principalmente com mais atalhos sendo anunciados.

segment.source: Default input and output braille tables can now be determined based on the NVDA language.
segment.target: As tabelas braille padres de entrada e sada agora podem ser determinadas com base no idioma do NVDA.

segment.source: Native support has been added for the Dot Pad tactile graphics device from Dot Inc as a multiline braille display.
segment.target: Foi adicionado suporte nativo para o dispositivo grfico ttil Dot Pad da Dot Inc como uma linha braille multilinha.

segment.source: There have been other minor fixes for braille displays, particularly around connectivity.
segment.target: Houve outras pequenas correes para linhas braille, principalmente em relao conectividade.

segment.source: LibLouis braille translator, eSpeak-NG and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: O transcritor braille LibLouis, eSpeak-NG e Unicode CLDR foram atualizados.

segment.source: New Coptic, compact Cuneiform, and Portuguese 6 dot Computer Braille tables are available.
segment.target: Novas tabelas braille copta, cuneiforme compacto e portugus informtico de 6 pontos esto disponveis.

segment.source: Important notes
segment.target: Notas importantes

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Esta verso quebra a compatibilidade com complementos existentes.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana seguindo a [poltica de segurana](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md) do NVDA.

segment.source: Prevents showing potentially sensitive information on braille displays when the device is locked.
segment.target: Impede a exibio de informaes potencialmente confidenciais em linhas braille quando o dispositivo est bloqueado.

segment.source: ([GHSA-8f8q-2jc3-6rf4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-8f8q-2jc3-6rf4))
segment.target: ([GHSA-8f8q-2jc3-6rf4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-8f8q-2jc3-6rf4))

segment.source: Prevents the installer from loading unwanted DLLs from its directory.
segment.target: Impede que o instalador carregue DLLs indesejadas de seu diretrio.

segment.source: ([GHSA-qf5h-qw92-rx2f](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-qf5h-qw92-rx2f))
segment.target: ([GHSA-qf5h-qw92-rx2f](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-qf5h-qw92-rx2f))

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Loja de Complementos:

segment.source: Automatic updates (#3208):
segment.target: Atualizaes automticas (#3208):

segment.source: Automatic update channels for add-ons can now be modified.
segment.target: Os canais de atualizao automtica para complementos agora podem ser modificados.

segment.source: Automatic update channels can be selected for installed add-ons via an "Update channel" submenu.
segment.target: Os canais de atualizao automtica podem ser selecionados para complementos instalados por meio de um submenu "Canal de atualizao".

segment.source: The default automatic update channel can be set from the Add-on Store panel in NVDA's settings.
segment.target: O canal padro de atualizao automtica pode ser definido no painel Loja de Complementos nas configuraes do NVDA.

segment.source: Automatic updates can now happen in the background.
segment.target: As atualizaes automticas agora podem acontecer em segundo plano.

segment.source: This can be enabled in the Add-on Store panel in NVDA's settings by changing "Automatic updates" to "Update Automatically".
segment.target: Isso pode ser habilitado no painel Loja de Complementos nas configuraes do NVDA, alterando "Atualizaes automticas" para "Atualizar automaticamente".

segment.source: Automatic updates can now update incompatible add-ons to another, newer, incompatible version.
segment.target: As atualizaes automticas agora podem atualizar complementos incompatveis para outra verso mais recente e incompatvel.

segment.source: This can be enabled in the Add-on Store panel in NVDA's settings.
segment.target: Isso pode ser habilitado no painel Loja de Complementos nas configuraes do NVDA.

segment.source: Added an action to cancel the install of add-ons. (#15578, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Adicionada uma ao para cancelar a instalao de complementos. (#15578, @hwf1324)

segment.source: Added an action to retry the installation if the download/installation of an add-on fails. (#17090, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Adicionada uma ao para tentar novamente a instalao se o download/instalao de um complemento falhar. (#17090, @hwf1324)

segment.source: The add-ons lists can be sorted by columns, including publication date, in ascending and descending order. (#15277, #16681, @nvdaes)
segment.target: As listas de complementos podem ser classificadas por colunas, incluindo data de publicao, em ordem crescente e decrescente. (#15277, #16681, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Speech:
segment.target: Fala:

segment.source: Automatic language switching is now supported when using Microsoft Speech API version 5 (SAPI5) and Microsoft Speech Platform voices. (#17146, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: A alternncia automtica de idioma agora suportada ao usar as vozes Microsoft Speech API verso 5 (SAPI5) e Microsoft Speech Platform. (#17146, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Rate boost is now supported when using Microsoft Speech API version 5 (SAPI5) and Microsoft Speech Platform voices, which supports up to 6X speed. (#17606, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: O aumento especial de velocidade agora suportado ao usar as vozes Microsoft Speech API verso 5 (SAPI5) e Microsoft Speech Platform, que suportam at 6 de velocidade. (#17606, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Web browsers:
segment.target: Navegadores web:

segment.source: NVDA browse mode's native selection mode (`NVDA+shift+f10`) is now supported in Google Chrome, Edge and other applications based on Chromium 134 or newer. (#17838)
segment.target: O modo de seleo nativo do modo de navegao do NVDA (`NVDA+shift+f10`) agora compatvel com o Google Chrome, Edge e outros aplicativos baseados no Chromium 134 ou mais recente. (#17838)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, NVDA will report the highlighted text when a URL containing a text fragment is visited. (#16910, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Em Mozilla Firefox, o NVDA relatar o texto destacado quando um URL contendo um fragmento de texto for visitado. (#16910, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA can now report when a link destination points to the current page. (#141, @LeonarddeR, @nvdaes)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode relatar quando um destino de link aponta para a pgina atual. (#141, @LeonarddeR, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When editing in PowerPoint text boxes, you can now move per sentence with `alt+upArrow`/`alt+downArrow`. (#17015, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Quando editando em caixas de texto do PowerPoint, agora voc pode mover por frase com `alt+setaParaCima`/`alt+setaParaBaixo`. (#17015, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: In Word, the selection update is now reported when using Word commands to extend or reduce the selection (`f8` or `shift+f8`). (#3293, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: No Word, a atualizao da seleo agora informada ao usar comandos do Word para estender ou reduzir a seleo (`f8` ou `shift+f8`). (#3293, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Word 16.0.18226 and higher or when using Word object model, NVDA will now report if a heading is collapsed in both speech and braille. (#17499)
segment.target: No Word 16.0.18226 e verses superiores ou ao usar o modelo de objeto do Word, o NVDA agora informar se um ttulo est recolhido tanto na fala quanto no braille. (#17499)

segment.source: In Word with UIA, when using the native extended table navigation commands (`alt+home`, `alt+end`, `alt+pageUp`, and `alt+pageDown`), the caret movement will now be reported. (#17867, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: No Word com UIA, ao usar os comandos nativos de navegao de tabela estendida (`alt+home`, `alt+end`, `alt+pageUp` e `alt+pageDown`), o movimento do cursor do sistema agora ser relatado. (#17867, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Word, when using the "report focus" command, the document layout will be announced if this information is available and reporting object descriptions is enabled. (#15088, @nvdaes)
segment.target: No Word, ao usar o comando "anunciar foco", o leiaute do documento ser anunciado se essa informao estiver disponvel e o anncio das descries de objetos estiver habilitado. (#15088, @nvdaes)

segment.source: The result of more shortcuts is now reported in Word and Outlook:
segment.target: O resultado de mais atalhos agora relatado no Word e no Outlook:

segment.source: font formatting shortcuts (#10271, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: atalhos de formatao de fonte (#10271, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: collapse or expand heading (#17545, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: recolher ou expandir ttulo (#17545, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: LibreOffice:
segment.target: LibreOffice:

segment.source: When increasing or decreasing the font size in Writer using the corresponding keyboard shortcuts, NVDA announces the new font size. (#6915, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Ao aumentar ou diminuir o tamanho da fonte no Writer usando os atalhos de teclado correspondentes, o NVDA anuncia o novo tamanho da fonte. (#6915, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: When applying the "Body Text" or a heading paragraph style using the corresponding keyboard shortcut in Writer 25.2 or newer, NVDA announces the new paragraph style. (#6915, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Ao aplicar o estilo de pargrafo "Corpo de texto" ou de ttulo usando o atalho de teclado correspondente no Writer 25.2 ou mais recente, o NVDA anuncia o novo estilo de pargrafo. (#6915, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: When toggling double underline in Writer using the corresponding keyboard shortcut, NVDA announces the new state ("double underline on"/"double underline off"). (#6915, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Ao alternar o sublinhado duplo no Writer usando o atalho de teclado correspondente, o NVDA anuncia o novo estado ("duplo sublinhado ativado"/"duplo sublinhado desativado"). (#6915, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: NVDA can now report the first line indent in LibreOffice 25.8 and later. (#13052, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode relatar o recuo da primeira linha no LibreOffice 25.8 e verses posteriores. (#13052, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: OCR:
segment.target: OCR:

segment.source: In a recognition result, `NVDA+f5` manually refreshes the recognized content. (#17715, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Em um resultado de reconhecimento, `NVDA+f5` atualiza manualmente o contedo reconhecido. (#17715, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Added an unassigned gesture to toggle periodically refreshing the Windows OCR result. (#16897)
segment.target: Adicionado um comando gesto no atribudo para alternar a atualizao peridica do resultado do OCR do Windows. (#16897)

segment.source: Remote access functionality, based on the NVDA Remote add-on, has been integrated into NVDA. (#4390, @ctoth, @tspivey, @daiverd, NVDA Remote Contributors and funders)
segment.target: A funcionalidade de acesso remoto, baseada no complemento NVDA Remoto, foi integrada ao NVDA. (#4390, @ctoth, @tspivey, @daiverd, NVDA Remote Contributors and funders)

segment.source: It is now possible to specify mirror URLs to use for NVDA updates and the Add-on Store. (#14974, #17151, #17310, @christopherpross)
segment.target: Agora possvel especificar URLs espelho para usar nas atualizaes do NVDA e na Loja de Complementos. (#14974, #17151, #17310, @christopherpross)

segment.source: Support for math in PDFs has been added. (#9288, @NSoiffer)
segment.target: Foi adicionado suporte para matemtica em PDFs. (#9288, @NSoiffer)

segment.source: This works for formulas with associated MathML, such as some files generated by newer versions of TeX/LaTeX.
segment.target: Isso funciona para frmulas com MathML associado, como alguns arquivos gerados por verses mais recentes do TeX/LaTeX.

segment.source: Currently this is only supported in Foxit Reader & Foxit Editor.
segment.target: Atualmente, isso s compatvel com Foxit Reader & Foxit Editor.

segment.source: NVDA can now be configured to speak the current line or paragraph when navigating with braille navigation keys. (#17053, @nvdaes)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode ser configurado para falar a linha ou pargrafo atual ao navegar com teclas de navegao braille. (#17053, @nvdaes)

segment.source: NVDA is now able to report caret changes when pressing `alt+upArrow` or `alt+downArrow` gestures, for example in Visual Studio Code. (#17652, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O NVDA agora capaz de relatar alteraes no cursor do sistema ao pressionar os comandos gestos `alt+setaParaCima` ou `alt+setaParaBaixo`, por exemplo no Visual Studio Code. (#17652, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added commands to move the review cursor to the first and last character of the selected text, assigned to `NVDA+alt+home` and `NVDA+alt+end`, respectively. (#17299, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Adicionados comandos para mover o cursor de explorao para o primeiro e ltimo caractere do texto selecionado, atribudos a `NVDA+alt+home` e `NVDA+alt+end`, respectivamente. (#17299, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Added a general setting to prevent the display turning off during say all or reading with braille.
segment.target: Adicionada uma configurao geral para evitar que a tela desligue durante a leitura contnua ou lendo com braille.

segment.source: This option is enabled by default, but may result in increased battery depletion. (#17649,@LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Essa opo habilitada por padro, mas pode resultar em maior consumo de bateria. (#17649,@LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA is now translated into Bosnian. (#17953)
segment.target: O NVDA agora est traduzido para o bsnio. (#17953)

segment.source: In Adobe Acrobat, NVDA can now read and interact with math equations in PDF documents generated by recent versions of Microsoft Word. (#18056)
segment.target: No Adobe Acrobat, o NVDA agora pode ler e interagir com equaes matemticas em documentos PDF gerados por verses recentes do Microsoft Word. (#18056)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Atualizaes de componentes:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.33.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.33.0). (#17469, #17768, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Transcritor Braille LibLouis atualizado para [3.33.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.33.0). (#17469, #17768, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Added new Coptic, compact Cuneiform, and Portuguese 6 dot Computer Braille tables.
segment.target: Adicionadas novas tabelas braille copta, cuneiforme compacto e portugus informtico de 6 pontos.

segment.source: Updated CLDR to version 46.0. (#17484, @OzancanKaratas)
segment.target: CLDR atualizado para a verso 46.0. (#17484, @OzancanKaratas)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG to 1.52.0. (#17056)
segment.target: eSpeak NG atualizado para 1.52.0. (#17056)

segment.source: NVDA interface changes:
segment.target: Alteraes na interface do NVDA:

segment.source: The NVDA installer no longer plays a sound when launched. (#14068)
segment.target: O instalador do NVDA no reproduz mais um som quando iniciado. (#14068)

segment.source: The Report link destination, Character formatting information, and Speak selection dialogs, now include "Close" and "Copy" buttons for user convenience. (#17018, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Os dilogos de Anunciar destino de link, Informaes de formatao de caracteres e Seleo de fala agora incluem os botes "Fechar" e "Copiar" para convenincia do usurio. (#17018, @XLTechie)

segment.source: The exit dialog now allows you to restart NVDA with add-ons disabled and debug logging enabled simultaneously. (#11538, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: O dilogo de encerramento agora permite que voc reinicie o NVDA com complementos desabilitados e o registro de depurao habilitado simultaneamente. (#11538, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: The ability to opt out of using WASAPI for audio output has been removed. (#16080)
segment.target: A capacidade de optar por no usar WASAPI para sada de udio foi removida. (#16080)

segment.source: The Browse Mode setting "Automatically set system focus to focusable elements" has been removed, the behaviour is now disabled. (#17598)
segment.target: A configurao do Modo de navegao "Posicionar automaticamente foco do sistema em elementos focveis" foi removida, o comportamento agora est desabilitado. (#17598)

segment.source: NVDA will now only warn about add-on incompatibility when updating to a new version which has an incompatible add-on API to the current version. (#17071, #17506)
segment.target: O NVDA agora s avisar sobre a incompatibilidade de complementos ao atualizar para uma nova verso que tenha uma API de complemento incompatvel com a verso atual. (#17071, #17506)

segment.source: The "Contributors" file has been removed from the NVDA menu. (#16922)
segment.target: O arquivo "Colaboradores" foi removido do menu do NVDA. (#16922)

segment.source: The NVDA license is now formatted in HTML to improve readability. (#17600)
segment.target: A licena do NVDA agora est formatada em HTML para melhorar a legibilidade. (#17600)

segment.source: Short versions of the most commonly used command line options have been added: `-d` for `--disable-addons` and `-n` for `--lang`.
segment.target: Verses curtas das opes de linha de comando mais comumente usadas foram adicionadas: `-d` para `--disable-addons` e `-n` para `--lang`.

segment.source: Prefix matching on command line flags, e.g. using `--di` for `--disable-addons` is no longer supported. (#11644, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: A correspondncia de prefixos em sinalizadores flags de linha de comando, por exemplo, usar `--di` para `--disable-addons` no mais suportada. (#11644, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Changes to the COM Registration Fixing Tool: (#12355, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Alteraes na Ferramenta de Correo de Registro COM: (#12355, @XLTechie)

segment.source: It now starts with a more user friendly explanation of its purpose, instead of a warning. (#12351)
segment.target: Agora comea com uma explicao mais amigvel de seu propsito, em vez de um aviso. (#12351)

segment.source: The initial window can now be exited with `escape` or `alt+f4`. (#10799)
segment.target: A janela inicial agora pode ser fechada com `escape` ou `alt+f4`. (#10799)

segment.source: It will now show a message to the user, including the error, in the rare event of a Windows error while attempting COM re-registrations.
segment.target: Agora ele mostrar uma mensagem ao usurio, incluindo o erro, no caso raro de um erro do Windows ao tentar novamente registros COM.

segment.source: Speech:
segment.target: Fala:

segment.source: Microsoft Speech API version 5 and Microsoft Speech Platform voices now use WASAPI for audio output, which may improve the responsiveness of those voices. (#13284, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: As vozes da Microsoft Speech API verso 5 e da Microsoft Speech Platform agora usam WASAPI para sada de udio, o que pode melhorar a capacidade de resposta dessas vozes. (#13284, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: The silence at the beginning of speech will now be trimmed when using OneCore voices, SAPI5 voices, and some third-party voice add-ons to improve their responsiveness. (#17614, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: O silncio no incio da fala agora ser cortado ao usar vozes OneCore, vozes SAPI5 e alguns complementos de voz de terceiros para melhorar sua capacidade de resposta. (#17614, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Microsoft Speech API version 4 voices now use WASAPI for audio output, so that they can work with features such as audio ducking, leading silence trimming, and keeping audio device awake.
segment.target: As vozes da Microsoft Speech API verso 4 agora usam WASAPI para sada de udio, para que possam trabalhar com recursos como udio prioritrio reduo de udio , corte de silncio inicial e manter o dispositivo de udio acordado.

segment.source: If this does not work with your SAPI 4 voice, you can disable WASAPI for SAPI 4 in Advanced settings. (#17718, #17801, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Se isso no funcionar com a sua voz SAPI 4, voc pode desativar o WASAPI para SAPI 4 nas Configuraes avanadas. (#17718, #17801, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Unicode Normalization is now enabled by default for speech output. (#17017, @LeonarddeR).
segment.target: A normalizao Unicode agora est habilitada por padro para sada de fala. (#17017, @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: You can still disable this functionality in the Speech category of the NVDA Settings dialog.
segment.target: Voc ainda pode desabilitar essa funcionalidade na categoria Fala do dilogo Configuraes do NVDA.

segment.source: The keyboard settings for "Speak typed characters" and "Speak typed words" now have three options: Off, Only in edit controls, and Always. (#17505, @Cary-rowen)
segment.target: As configuraes de teclado para "Falar caracteres digitados" e "Falar palavras digitadas" agora tm trs opes: Desativado, Somente em controles de edio e Sempre. (#17505, @Cary-rowen)

segment.source: By default, "Speak typed characters" is now set to "Only in edit controls".
segment.target: Por padro, "Falar caracteres digitados" agora est definido como "Somente em controles de edio".

segment.source: Default input and output braille tables can now be determined based on the NVDA language. (#17306, #16390, #290, @nvdaes)
segment.target: As tabelas braille de entrada e sada padres agora podem ser determinadas com base no idioma do NVDA. (#17306, #16390, #290, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Speech:
segment.target: Fala:

segment.source: Fixed an issue where continuous reading (say all) stopped at the end of the first sentence when using some SAPI5 synthesizers. (#16691, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Corrigido um problema em que a leitura contnua (dizer tudo) parava no final da primeira frase ao usar alguns sintetizadores SAPI5. (#16691, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Voice parameters, such as rate and volume, will no longer be reset to default when using the synth settings ring to change between voices in the SAPI5 and SAPI4 synthesizer. (#17693, #2320, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Parmetros de voz, como velocidade e volume, no sero mais redefinidos para o padro ao usar o anel de configuraes de voz para alternar entre vozes no sintetizador SAPI5 e SAPI4. (#17693, #2320, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where some SAPI4 voices (e.g. IBM TTS Chinese) cannot be loaded. (#17726, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Corrigido um problema em que algumas vozes SAPI4 (por exemplo, IBM TTS chins) no podiam ser carregadas. (#17726, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: Native support for the Dot Pad tactile graphics device from Dot Inc as a multiline braille display. (#17007)
segment.target: Suporte nativo para o dispositivo grfico ttil Dot Pad da Dot Inc como uma linha braille multilinha. (#17007)

segment.source: When using the Seika Notetaker, space and space with dots gestures are now displayed correctly in the Input Gestures dialog. (#17047, @school510587)
segment.target: Ao usar o Seika Notetaker, os comandos gestos de espao e espao com pontos agora so exibidos corretamente no dilogo Definir Comandos. (#17047, @school510587)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer play error sounds or spam the log file when using the display speech output braille mode while no braille display is connected. (#17092, @Emil-18)
segment.target: O NVDA no deve mais reproduzir sons de erro ou enviar spam para o arquivo de log ao usar o modo de exibio braille em sada de fala quando nenhuma linha braille estiver conectada. (#17092, @Emil-18)

segment.source: When the Standard HID Braille Display driver is explicitly selected as the braille display driver, and the braille display list is opened, NVDA correctly identifies the HID driver as the selected driver instead of showing no driver selected. (#17537, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Quando o driver da linha Braille HID padro selecionado explicitamente como o driver da linha Braille, e a lista de linhas Braille aberta, o NVDA identifica corretamente o driver HID como o driver selecionado em vez de mostrar nenhum driver selecionado. (#17537, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The Humanware Brailliant driver is now more reliable in selecting the right connection endpoint, resulting in better connection stability and less errors. (#17537, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O driver Humanware Brailliant agora mais confivel na seleo do ponto de extremidade de conexo correto, resultando em melhor estabilidade de conexo e menos erros. (#17537, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Custom braille tables in the developer scratchpad are now properly ignored when running with add-ons disabled. (#17565, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: As tabelas braille personalizadas no bloco de rascunho scratchpad do desenvolvedor agora so ignoradas corretamente ao serem executadas com complementos desativados. (#17565, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where some USB braille displays were not properly detected by NVDA. (#18114, @christiancomaschi)
segment.target: Corrigido um problema em que algumas linhas braille USB no eram detectadas corretamente pelo NVDA. (#18114, @christiancomaschi)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: The command to "Report the destination URL of a link" now works as expected when using the legacy object model in Word, Outlook, Excel and PowerPoint. (#17292, #17362, #17435, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: O comando "Relatar a URL de destino de um link" agora funciona conforme o esperado ao usar o modelo de objeto legado no Word, Outlook, Excel e PowerPoint. (#17292, #17362, #17435, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Excel, the element list dialog (`NVDA+f7`) no longer fails to list comment or formulas on some non-English systems. (#11366, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: No Excel, a caixa de dilogo da lista de elementos (`NVDA+f7`) no falha mais ao listar comentrios ou frmulas em alguns sistemas que no sejam em ingls. (#11366, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Improvements in PowerPoint:
segment.target: Melhorias no PowerPoint:

segment.source: Caret reporting no longer breaks when text contains wide characters, such as emoji. (#17006 , @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O anncio do cursor do sistema no mais interrompido quando o texto contm caracteres largos, como emojis. (#17006 , @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Character location reporting is now accurate (e.g. when pressing `NVDA+delete`. (#9941, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O anncio de localizao de caractere agora preciso (por exemplo, ao pressionar `NVDA+delete`). (#9941, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA no longer starts say all when starting a slide show and the browse mode setting "Automatic Say All on page load" is disabled. (#17488, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O NVDA no inicia mais o recurso "Leitura contnua" quando iniciar uma apresentao de slides e a configurao do modo de navegao "Leitura Contnua Automtica ao carregar a pgina" est desabilitada. (#17488, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: LibreOffice:
segment.target: LibreOffice:

segment.source: When using the Microsoft Pinyin Input Method for Chinese and enabling the Pinyin compatibility option to use the previous version, typing in Writer (and potentially other applications) while an IME popup is showing no longer triggers an error. (#17198, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Ao usar o Mtodo de Entrada do Microsoft Pinyin para Chins e habilitar a opo de compatibilidade Pinyin para usar a verso anterior, digitar no Writer (e potencialmente em outros aplicativos) enquanto um pop-up do IME exibido no aciona mais um erro. (#17198, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: The current checkbox state (checked/unchecked) of checkboxes in dialogs is now also reported in braille, not just speech. (#17218, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: O estado atual da caixa de seleo (marcada/desmarcada) das caixas de verificao nos dilogo agora tambm relatado em braille, no apenas por fala. (#17218, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Math:
segment.target: Matemtica:

segment.source: Math reading has been fixed for some web elements.
segment.target: A leitura matemtica foi corrigida para alguns elementos da web.

segment.source: Specifically, MathML inside of span and other elements that have the attribute `role="math"`. (#15058)
segment.target: Especificamente, MathML dentro de span e outros elementos que tm o atributo `role="math"`. (#15058)

segment.source: Math equations only represented by an image and alt text with no MathML for rich navigation, are now treated like normal images, rather than math with no content, allowing the user to jump to them with `g` and to be able to arrow through the alt text by character. (#16007)
segment.target: As equaes matemticas representadas apenas por uma imagem e texto alternativo sem MathML para navegao avanada agora so tratadas como imagens normais, em vez de matemtica sem contedo, permitindo que o usurio pule para elas com `g` e seja capaz de usar setas no texto alternativo por caracteres. (#16007)

segment.source: IDEs:
segment.target: IDEs:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer crash when selecting all text in certain source files in Android Studio or IntelliJ Idea. (#17418, @thgcode)
segment.target: O NVDA no falhar mais ao selecionar todo o texto em determinados arquivos fonte no Android Studio ou no IntelliJ Idea. (#17418, @thgcode)

segment.source: In Visual Studio Code, NVDA no longer hijacks the `alt+upArrow` and `alt+downArrow` gestures for sentence navigation. (#17082, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: No Visual Studio Code, o NVDA no sequestra mais os comandos gestos `alt+setaParaCima` e `alt+setaParaBaixo` para navegao por frases. (#17082, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Certain section elements are now correctly recognized as editable controls in Visual Studio Code. (#17573, @Cary-rowen)
segment.target: Determinados elementos de seo agora so reconhecidos corretamente como controles editveis no Visual Studio Code. (#17573, @Cary-rowen)

segment.source: In Notepad and other UIA documents, and Notepad++ documents on Windows 11, if the last line is empty, the "braille next line command" will move the cursor to the last line.
segment.target: No Bloco de Notas e em outros documentos UIA, e tambm no Notepad++ no Windows 11, se a ltima linha estiver vazia, o "comando braille de prxima linha" mover o cursor para a ltima linha.

segment.source: In any document, if the cursor is on the last line, it will be moved to the end when using this command. (#17251, #17430, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Em qualquer documento, se o cursor estiver na ltima linha, ele ser movido para o final ao usar esse comando. (#17251, #17430, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Configuration profiles:
segment.target: Perfis de configurao:

segment.source: Braille is no longer dysfunctional when activating "say all" with an associated configuration profile. (#17163, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O Braille no mais disfuncional ao ativar "leitura contnua" com um perfil de configurao associado. (#17163, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where certain settings were explicitly saved to the active configuration profile even when the value of that setting was equal to the value in the base configuration. (#17157, @leonarddeR)
segment.target: Corrigido um problema em que determinadas configuraes eram salvas explicitamente no perfil de configurao ativo, mesmo quando o valor dessa configurao era igual ao valor na configurao base. (#17157, @leonarddeR)

segment.source: When spelling, unicode normalization now works more appropriately:
segment.target: Ao soletrar, a normalizao unicode agora funciona de forma mais apropriada:

segment.source: After reporting a normalized character, NVDA no longer incorrectly reports subsequent characters as normalized. (#17286, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Depois de relatar um caractere normalizado, o NVDA no relata mais incorretamente caracteres subsequentes como normalizados. (#17286, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Composite characters (such as e) are now reported correctly. (#17295, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Caracteres compostos (como e) agora so relatados corretamente. (#17295, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA is able to read the popup submenu items on Thunderbird search results page. (#4708, @thgcode)
segment.target: O NVDA capaz de ler os itens do submenu instantneo pop-up na pgina de resultados de pesquisa do Thunderbird. (#4708, @thgcode)

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool no longer reports success on failure. (#12355, @XLTechie)
segment.target: A Ferramenta de Correo de Registro COM no mais relata sucesso em caso de falha. (#12355, @XLTechie)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce Windows 11 clipboard history entries when closing the window while items are present. (#17308, @josephsl)
segment.target: O NVDA no anunciar mais as entradas do histrico da rea de transferncia do Windows 11 ao fechar a janela enquanto os itens estiverem presentes. (#17308, @josephsl)

segment.source: If the plugins are reloaded while a browseable message is opened, NVDA will no longer fail to report subsequent focus moves. (#17323, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Se os plug-ins forem recarregados enquanto uma mensagem navegvel estiver aberta, o NVDA no falhar mais em relatar movimentos de foco subsequentes. (#17323, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When using applications such as Skype, Discord, Signal and Phone Link for audio communication, NVDA speech and sounds no longer decrease in volume. (#17349, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Ao usar aplicativos como Skype, Discord, Signal e Phone Link para comunicao de udio, a fala e os sons do NVDA no diminuem mais de volume. (#17349, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Opening the NVDA Python Console will no longer fail in case an error occurs while retrieving snapshot variables. (#17391, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: A abertura do Console Python do NVDA no falhar mais caso ocorra um erro ao capturar as variveis do instantneo snapshot. (#17391, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In web browsers, changes to text selection no longer sometimes fail to be reported in editable text controls. (#17501, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Em navegadores web, as alteraes na seleo de texto s vezes no mais deixam de ser relatadas em controles de texto editveis. (#17501, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When anchor links point to the same object as the virtual caret is placed, NVDA no longer fails to scroll to the link destination. (#17669, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Quando links de ncora apontam para o mesmo objeto em que o cursor virtual colocado, o NVDA no falha mais ao rolar at o destino do link. (#17669, @nvdaes)

segment.source: The NVDA Highlighter Window icon is no longer fixed in the taskbar after restarting Explorer. (#17696, @hwf1324)
segment.target: O cone da janela do realador do NVDA no fica mais fixo na barra de tarefas aps reiniciar o Explorer. (#17696, @hwf1324)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Consulte [o guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter informaes sobre o processo de descontinuao e remoo de API do NVDA.

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Nota: esta uma verso de quebra de compatibilidade de API Add-on Interface de Programao de Aplicativos para complementos.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Os complementos precisaro ser testados novamente e ter seu manifest manifesto atualizado.

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Atualizaes de componentes:

segment.source: Updated Comtypes to 1.4.6. (#17061, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Comtypes atualizado para 1.4.6. (#17061, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 4.2.2. (#17181, @dpy013)
segment.target: wxPython atualizado para 4.2.2. (#17181, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated SCons to 4.8.1. (#17254)
segment.target: SCons atualizado para 4.8.1. (#17254)

segment.source: Updated sphinx to 8.1.2 and sphinx-rtd-theme to 3.0.1. (#17284, @josephsl)
segment.target: sphinx atualizado para 8.1.2 e sphinx-rtd-theme para 3.0.1. (#17284, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated Robot Framework to 7.1.1. (#17329, @josephsl)
segment.target: Robot Framework atualizado para 7.1.1. (#17329, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated configobj to 5.1.0 commit `8be5462`. (#17328)
segment.target: configobj atualizado para 5.1.0 commit `8be5462`. (#17328)

segment.source: Updated pre-commit to 4.0.1. (#17260)
segment.target: pre-commit atualizado para 4.0.1. (#17260)

segment.source: Updated typing-extensions to 4.12.2. (#17438, @josephsl)
segment.target: typing-extensions atualizado para 4.12.2. (#17438, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated licensecheck to 2024.3. (#17440, @josephsl)
segment.target: licensecheck atualizado para 2024.3. (#17440, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated markdown to 3.7. (#17459, @josephsl)
segment.target: markdown atualizado para 3.7. (#17459, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated nh3 0.2.19. (#17465, @josephsl)
segment.target: Atualizado nh3 0.2.19. (#17465, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated nuitka to 2.5.4. (#17458, @josephsl)
segment.target: nuitka atualizado para 2.5.4. (#17458, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated schedule to 1.2.2. (#17455, @josephsl)
segment.target: schedule atualizado para 1.2.2. (#17455, @josephsl)

segment.source: Updated requests to 2.32.3. (#17456, @josephsl)
segment.target: requests atualizado para 2.32.3. (#17456, @josephsl)

segment.source: `ui.browseableMessage` may now be called with options to present a button for copying to clipboard, and/or a button for closing the window. (#17018, @XLTechie)
segment.target: `ui.browseableMessage` agora pode ser chamado com opes para apresentar um boto para copiar para a rea de transferncia e/ou um boto para fechar a janela. (#17018, @XLTechie)

segment.source: Several additions to identify link types (#16994, @LeonarddeR, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Vrias adies para identificar tipos de link (#16994, @LeonarddeR, @nvdaes)

segment.source: A new `utils.urlUtils` module with different functions to determine link types
segment.target: Um novo mdulo `utils.urlUtils` com diferentes funes para determinar os tipos de link

segment.source: A new `INTERNAL_LINK` state has been added to `controlTypes.states.State`
segment.target: Um novo estado `INTERNAL_LINK` foi adicionado a `controlTypes.states.State`

segment.source: A new `linkType` property has been added on `NVDAObject`.
segment.target: Uma nova propriedade `linkType` foi adicionada em `NVDAObject`.

segment.source: It queries the `treeInterceptor` by default, if any.
segment.target: Ela consulta `treeInterceptor` por padro, se houver.

segment.source: `BrowseModeTreeInterceptor` object has a new `documentUrl` property
segment.target: Objeto `BrowseModeTreeInterceptor` tem uma nova propriedade `documentUrl`

segment.source: `BrowseModeTreeInterceptor` object has a new `getLinkTypeInDocument` method which accepts an URL to check the link type of the object
segment.target: Objeto `BrowseModeTreeInterceptor` tem um novo mtodo `getLinkTypeInDocument` que aceita uma URL para verificar o tipo de link do objeto

segment.source: A `toggleBooleanValue` helper function has been added to `globalCommands`.
segment.target: Uma funo auxiliar `toggleBooleanValue` foi adicionada a `globalCommands`.

segment.source: It can be used in scripts to report the result when a boolean is toggled in `config.conf`
segment.target: Ela pode ser usada em scripts para relatar o resultado quando um booleano alternado em `config.conf`

segment.source: Removed the requirement to indent function parameter lists by two tabs from NVDA's Coding Standards, to be compatible with modern automatic linting. (#17126, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Removido o requisito de recuar listas de parmetros de funo em dois tabs dos Padres de Codificao do NVDA, para ser compatvel com o linting automtico moderno. (#17126, @XLTechie)

segment.source: Added the [VS Code workspace configuration for NVDA](https://nvaccess.org/nvaccess/vscode-nvda) as a git submodule. (#17003)
segment.target: Adicionada a [Configurao do espao de trabalho do VS Code para o NVDA](https://nvaccess.org/nvaccess/vscode-nvda) como um submdulo git. (#17003)

segment.source: A new function, `gui.guiHelper.wxCallOnMain`, has been added, which allows safely and synchronously calling wx functions from non-GUI threads, and getting their return value. (#17304)
segment.target: Uma nova funo, `gui.guiHelper.wxCallOnMain`, foi adicionada, que permite chamar funes wx de forma segura e sncrona a partir de threads no-GUI e obter seu valor de retorno. (#17304)

segment.source: A new message dialog API has been added to `gui.message`. (#13007)
segment.target: Uma nova API de dilogo de mensagem foi adicionada a `gui.message`. (#13007)

segment.source: Added classes: `ReturnCode`, `EscapeCode`, `DialogType`, `Button`, `DefaultButton`, `DefaultButtonSet`, `MessageDialog`.
segment.target: Classes adicionadas: `ReturnCode`, `EscapeCode`, `DialogType`, `Button`, `DefaultButton`, `DefaultButtonSet`, `MessageDialog`.

segment.source: In the `brailleTables` module, a `getDefaultTableForCurrentLang` function has been added (#17222, @nvdaes)
segment.target: No mdulo `brailleTables`, uma funo `getDefaultTableForCurrentLang` foi adicionada (#17222, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Added an `updateCheck.UpdateInfo` data class, which encapsulates metadata about NVDA updates. (#17310, @christopherpross)
segment.target: Adicionada uma classe de dados `updateCheck.UpdateInfo`, que encapsula metadados sobre atualizaes do NVDA. (#17310, @christopherpross)

segment.source: Retrieving the `labeledBy` property now works for:
segment.target: A captura da propriedade `labeledBy` agora funciona para:

segment.source: objects in applications implementing the `labelled-by` IAccessible2 relation. (#17436, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: objetos em aplicativos que implementam a relao `labelled-by` IAccessible2. (#17436, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: UIA elements supporting the corresponding `LabeledBy` UIA property. (#17442, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Elementos UIA que do suporte propriedade `LabeledBy` UIA correspondente. (#17442, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Added the ability to associate `wx.ComboBox` and a label `wx.StaticText` using `gui.guiHelper.associateElements`. (#17476)
segment.target: Adicionada a capacidade de associar `wx.ComboBox` e um rtulo `wx.StaticText` usando `gui.guiHelper.associateElements`. (#17476)

segment.source: Added the following extension points (#17428, @ctoth):
segment.target: Adicionados os seguintes pontos de extenso (#17428, @ctoth):

segment.source: `inputCore.decide_handleRawKey`: called on each keypress
segment.target: `inputCore.decide_handleRawKey`: chamado a cada pressionamento de tecla

segment.source: `speech.extensions.post_speechPaused`: called when speech is paused or unpaused
segment.target: `speech.extensions.post_speechPaused`: chamado quando a fala pausada ou retomada

segment.source: Changes to braille display auto detection registration in `bdDetect.DriverRegistrar`: (#17521, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Alteraes no registro de deteco automtica de linha braille em `bdDetect.DriverRegistrar`: (#17521, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the `addUsbDevice` method to register one USB device at a time.
segment.target: Adicionado o mtodo `addUsbDevice` para registrar um dispositivo USB por vez.

segment.source: Added the `matchFunc` parameter to `addUsbDevices` which is also available on `addUsbDevice`.
segment.target: Adicionado o parmetro `matchFunc` a `addUsbDevices` que tambm est disponvel em `addUsbDevice`.

segment.source: This way device detection can be constrained further in cases where a VID/PID-combination is shared by multiple devices across multiple drivers, or when a HID device offers multiple endpoints, for example.
segment.target: Dessa forma, a deteco de dispositivos pode ser ainda mais restrita nos casos em que uma combinao VID/PID compartilhada por vrios dispositivos em vrios drivers ou quando um dispositivo HID oferece vrios pontos de extremidade endpoints , por exemplo.

segment.source: See the method documentation as well as examples in the albatross and brailliantB drivers for more information.
segment.target: Consulte a documentao do mtodo, bem como exemplos nos drivers albatross e brailliantB para obter mais informaes.

segment.source: Added a new function, `utils.mmdevice.getOutputDevices`, to enumerate audio output devices. (#17678)
segment.target: Adicionada uma nova funo, `utils.mmdevice.getOutputDevices`, para enumerar dispositivos de sada de udio. (#17678)

segment.source: Added a new extension point `pre_synthSpeak` in `synthDriverHandler`, which will be called before the speech manager calls `speak` of the current synthesizer. (#17648)
segment.target: Adicionado um novo ponto de extenso `pre_synthSpeak` em `synthDriverHandler`, que ser chamado antes que o gerenciador de fala chame `speak` do sintetizador atual. (#17648)

segment.source: NVDA supports the `text-indent` IAccessible2 object attribute. (#13052, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: O NVDA suporta o atributo `text-indent` de objeto IAccessible2. (#13052, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: When a script using `gesture.send` is triggered with a gesture that includes `numLock` as a modifier, Num Lock is no longer turned off. (#10827, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Quando um script usando `gesture.send` acionado com um comando gesto que inclui `numLock` como modificador, o Num Lock no mais desativado. (#10827, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: API Breaking Changes
segment.target: Alteraes de Quebra da API

segment.source: These are breaking API changes.
segment.target: Estas so alteraes de quebra da API.

segment.source: Please open a GitHub issue if your add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.
segment.target: Por favor abra um issue debate no GitHub se o seu complemento tiver um problema com a atualizao para a nova API.

segment.source: The `addonStore.network.BASE_URL` constant has been removed.
segment.target: A constante `addonStore.network.BASE_URL` foi removida.

segment.source: As the Add-on Store base URL is now configurable directly within NVDA, no replacement is planned. (#17099)
segment.target: Como a URL base da Loja de Complementos agora pode ser configurada diretamente no NVDA, nenhuma substituio est planejada. (#17099)

segment.source: The `updateCheck.CHECK_URL` constant has been removed.
segment.target: A constante `updateCheck.CHECK_URL` foi removida.

segment.source: As the NVDA update check URL is now configurable directly within NVDA, no replacement is planned. (#17151)
segment.target: Como a URL de verificao de atualizao do NVDA agora pode ser configurada diretamente no NVDA, nenhuma substituio est planejada. (#17151)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA` has been removed with no public replacement. (#14047, #16820, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA` foi removido sem substituio pblica. (#14047, #16820, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.IAccessible.ia2TextMozilla.FakeEmbeddingTextInfo` has been removed. (#16768, @jcsteh)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.IAccessible.ia2TextMozilla.FakeEmbeddingTextInfo` foi removido. (#16768, @jcsteh)

segment.source: The following symbols in `appModules.soffice` have been renamed (#6915, @michaelweghorn):
segment.target: Os seguintes smbolos em `appModules.soffice` foram renomeados (#6915, @michaelweghorn):

segment.source: `SymphonyDocument.announceToolbarButtonToggle` to `SymphonyDocument.announceFormattingGestureChange`
segment.target: `SymphonyDocument.announceToolbarButtonToggle` para `SymphonyDocument.announceFormattingGestureChange`

segment.source: `SymphonyDocument.script_toggleTextAttribute` to `SymphonyDocument.script_changeTextFormatting`
segment.target: `SymphonyDocument.script_toggleTextAttribute` para `SymphonyDocument.script_changeTextFormatting`

segment.source: The `space` keyword argument for `brailleDisplayDrivers.seikantk.InputGesture` now expects an `int` rather than a `bool`. (#17047, @school510587)
segment.target: O argumento de palavra-chave `space` para `brailleDisplayDrivers.seikantk.InputGesture` agora espera um `int` e no um `bool`. (#17047, @school510587)

segment.source: The `[upgrade]` configuration section including `[upgrade][newLaptopKeyboardLayout]` has been removed. (#17191)
segment.target: A seo de configurao `[upgrade]` incluindo `[upgrade][newLaptopKeyboardLayout]` foi removida. (#17191)

segment.source: `updateCheck.checkForUpdate` now returns an `UpdateInfo` object instead of a dictionary. (#17310, @christopherpross)
segment.target: `updateCheck.checkForUpdate` agora retorna um objeto `UpdateInfo` em vez de um dicionrio. (#17310, @christopherpross)

segment.source: The constructors of `updateCheck.UpdateResultDialog` and `updateCheck.UpdateDownloader` have been updated to take `UpdateInfo` objects instead of dictionaries of metadata. (#17310, @christopherpross)
segment.target: Os construtores de `updateCheck.UpdateResultDialog` e `updateCheck.UpdateDownloader` foram atualizados para aceitar objetos `UpdateInfo` em vez de dicionrios de metadados. (#17310, @christopherpross)

segment.source: Due to the retirement of NVDA's winmm support (#17496, #17532, #17678):
segment.target: Devido retirada do suporte winmm do NVDA (#17496, #17532, #17678):

segment.source: The following symbols have been removed from `nvwave` without replacements: `CALLBACK_EVENT`, `CALLBACK_FUNCTION`, `CALLBACK_NULL`, `HWAVEOUT`, `LPHWAVEOUT`, `LPWAVEFORMATEX`, `LPWAVEHDR`, `MAXPNAMELEN`, `MMSYSERR_NOERROR`, `usingWasapiWavePlayer`, `WAVEHDR`, `WAVEOUTCAPS`, `waveOutProc`, `WAVE_MAPPER`, `WHDR_DONE`, `WinmmWavePlayer`, and `winmm`.
segment.target: Os seguintes smbolos foram removidos de `nvwave` sem substituies: `CALLBACK_EVENT`, `CALLBACK_FUNCTION`, `CALLBACK_NULL`, `HWAVEOUT`, `LPHWAVEOUT`, `LPWAVEFORMATEX`, `LPWAVEHDR`, `MAXPNAMELEN`, `MMSYSERR_NOERROR`, `usingWasapiWavePlayer`, `WAVEHDR`, `WAVEOUTCAPS`, `waveOutProc`, `WAVE_MAPPER`, `WHDR_DONE`, `WinmmWavePlayer`, e `winmm`.

segment.source: The following symbols have been removed from `nvwave`: `getOutputDeviceNames`, `outputDeviceIDToName`, `outputDeviceNameToID`.
segment.target: Os seguintes smbolos foram removidos de `nvwave`: `getOutputDeviceNames`, `outputDeviceIDToName`, `outputDeviceNameToID`.

segment.source: Use `utils.mmdevice.getOutputDevices` instead.
segment.target: Use `utils.mmdevice.getOutputDevices` em seu lugar.

segment.source: `nvwave.WasapiWavePlayer` has been renamed to `WavePlayer`.
segment.target: `nvwave.WasapiWavePlayer` foi renomeado para `WavePlayer`.

segment.source: Additionally, the method signature of its `__init__` has changed as follows:
segment.target: Alm disso, a assinatura do mtodo `__init__` foi alterada da seguinte maneira:

segment.source: The `outputDevice` parameter should now only be passed string arguments.
segment.target: O parmetro `outputDevice` agora s deve receber apenas argumentos de cadeia de caracteres string.

segment.source: The deprecated `closeWhenIdle` and `buffered` parameters have been removed.
segment.target: Os parmetros obsoletos `closeWhenIdle` e `buffered` foram removidos.

segment.source: `gui.settingsDialogs.AdvancedPanelControls.wasapiComboBox` has been removed.
segment.target: `gui.settingsDialogs.AdvancedPanelControls.wasapiComboBox` foi removido.

segment.source: The `WASAPI` key has been removed from the `audio` section of the config spec.
segment.target: A chave `WASAPI` foi removida da seo `audio` da especificao de configurao.

segment.source: The configuration key `config.conf["speech"]["outputDevice"]` has been removed.
segment.target: A chave de configurao `config.conf["speech"]["outputDevice"]` foi removida.

segment.source: It has been replaced by `config.conf["audio"]["outputDevice"]`, which stores a Windows core audio endpoint device ID. (#17547)
segment.target: Ela foi substituda por `config.conf["audio"]["outputDevice"]`, que armazena um ID de dispositivo de ponto de extremidade de udio do ncleo do Windows. (#17547)

segment.source: In `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.ScintillaTextInfo`, if no text is selected, the `collapse` method is overriden to expand to line if the `end` parameter is set to `True` (#17431, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Em `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.ScintillaTextInfo`, se nenhum texto for selecionado, o mtodo `collapse` ser substitudo para expandir para linha se o parmetro `end` for definido como `True` (#17431, @nvdaes)

segment.source: The following symbols have been removed with no replacement: `languageHandler.getLanguageCliArgs`, `__main__.quitGroup` and `__main__.installGroup` . (#17486, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Os seguintes smbolos foram removidos sem substituio: `languageHandler.getLanguageCliArgs`, `__main__.quitGroup` e `__main__.installGroup` . (#17486, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Prefix matching on command line flags, e.g. using `--di` for `--disable-addons` is no longer supported. (#11644, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: A correspondncia de prefixos em sinalizadores de linha de comando, por exemplo, o uso de `--di` para `--disable-addons` no mais suportado. (#11644, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: The `useAsFallBack` keyword argument of `bdDetect.DriverRegistrar` has been renamed to `useAsFallback`. (#17521, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O argumento `useAsFallBack` da palavra-chave de `bdDetect.DriverRegistrar` foi renomeado para `useAsFallback`. (#17521, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The `[addonStore][showWarning]` configuration setting has been removed.
segment.target: A definio de configurao `[addonStore][showWarning]` foi removida.

segment.source: Instead use `addonStore.dataManager.addonDataManager.storeSettings.showWarning`. (#17597)
segment.target: Em vez disso, use `addonStore.dataManager.addonDataManager.storeSettings.showWarning`. (#17597)

segment.source: `ui.browseableMessage` now takes a parameter `sanitizeHtmlFunc`.
segment.target: `ui.browseableMessage` agora recebe um parmetro `sanitizeHtmlFunc`.

segment.source: This defaults to `nh3.clean` with default arguments.
segment.target: O padro `nh3.clean` com argumentos padro.

segment.source: This means any HTML passed into `ui.browseableMessage` using `isHtml=True` is now sanitized by default.
segment.target: Isso significa que qualquer HTML passado para `ui.browseableMessage` usando `isHtml=True` agora sanitizado por padro.

segment.source: To change sanitization rules, such as whitelisting tags or attributes, create a function that calls `nh3.clean` with the desired parameters. (#16985)
segment.target: Para alterar as regras de sanitizao, como tags etiquetas ou atributos na lista de permisses, crie uma funo que chame `nh3.clean` com os parmetros desejados. (#16985)

segment.source: `updateCheck.UpdateAskInstallDialog` no longer automatically performs an action when the update or postpone buttons are pressed.
segment.target: `updateCheck.UpdateAskInstallDialog` no executa mais uma ao automaticamente quando os botes de atualizao ou adiamento so pressionados.

segment.source: Instead, a `callback` property has been added, which returns a function that performs the appropriate action when called with the return value from the dialog. (#17582)
segment.target: Em vez disso, uma propriedade `callback` foi adicionada, que retorna uma funo que executa a ao apropriada quando chamada com o valor retornado da caixa de dilogo. (#17582)

segment.source: Dialogs opened with `gui.runScriptModalDialog` are now recognised as modal by NVDA. (#17582)
segment.target: Caixas de dilogo abertas com `gui.runScriptModalDialog` agora so reconhecidas como modais pelo NVDA. (#17582)

segment.source: The following API symbols related to the setting "Automatically set system focus to focusable elements" have been removed with no replacement: (#17598)
segment.target: Os seguintes smbolos de API relacionados configurao "Posicionar automaticamente foco do sistema em elementos focveis" foram removidos sem substituio: (#17598)

segment.source: `globalCommands.GlobalCommands.script_toggleAutoFocusFocusableElements`
segment.target: `globalCommands.GlobalCommands.script_toggleAutoFocusFocusableElements`

segment.source: `config.conf["virtualBuffers"]["autoFocusFocusableElements"]`
segment.target: `config.conf["virtualBuffers"]["autoFocusFocusableElements"]`

segment.source: `gui.settingsDialogs.BrowseModePanel.autoFocusFocusableElementsCheckBox`
segment.target: `gui.settingsDialogs.BrowseModePanel.autoFocusFocusableElementsCheckBox`

segment.source: Because SAPI5 voices now use `nvwave.WavePlayer` to output audio: (#17592, @gexgd0419)
segment.target: Como as vozes SAPI5 agora usam `nvwave.WavePlayer` para sada de udio: (#17592, @gexgd0419)

segment.source: `synthDrivers.sapi5.SPAudioState` has been removed.
segment.target: `synthDrivers.sapi5.SPAudioState` foi removido.

segment.source: `synthDrivers.sapi5.SynthDriver.ttsAudioStream` has been removed.
segment.target: `synthDrivers.sapi5.SynthDriver.ttsAudioStream` foi removido.

segment.source: Instances of `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting.DriverSetting` with an `id` that starts with an underscore (_) are no longer shown in NVDA's settings. (#17599)
