segment.target: Instncias de `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting.DriverSetting` com um `id` que comea com um sublinhado (_) no so mais exibidas nas configuraes do NVDA. (#17599)

segment.source: Changed keyboard typing echo configuration from boolean to integer values. (#17505, @Cary-rowen)
segment.target: Alterada a configurao de eco de digitao do teclado de valores booleanos para inteiros. (#17505, @Cary-rowen)

segment.source: `config.conf["keyboard"]["speakTypedCharacters"]` and `config.conf["keyboard"]["speakTypedWords"]` now use integer values.
segment.target: `config.conf["keyboard"]["speakTypedCharacters"]` e `config.conf["keyboard"]["speakTypedWords"]` agora usam valores inteiros.

segment.source: Added `TypingEcho` enum in `config.configFlags` to represent these modes, 0=Off, 1=Only in edit controls, 2=Always.
segment.target: Adicionado `TypingEcho` enum em `config.configFlags` para representar esses modos, 0=Desligado, 1=Somente em controles de edio, 2=Sempre.

segment.source: `gui.settingsDialogs.KeyboardSettingsPanel.wordsCheckBox` and `gui.settingsDialogs.KeyboardSettingsPanel.charsCheckBox` has been removed.
segment.target: `gui.settingsDialogs.KeyboardSettingsPanel.wordsCheckBox` e `gui.settingsDialogs.KeyboardSettingsPanel.charsCheckBox` foram removidos.

segment.source: The `winUser.paint` has been renamed from `painStruct` to `paintStruct`, fixing a bug where passing in a `PAINTSTRUCT` would raise an exception. (#17744)
segment.target: O `winUser.paint` foi renomeado de `painStruct` para `paintStruct`, corrigindo uma falha em que passar um `PAINTSTRUCT` geraria uma exceo. (#17744)

segment.source: `documentationUtils.getDocFilePath` and `installer.getDocFilePath` no longer look for `.txt` files in locale documentation folders. (#17911, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: `documentationUtils.getDocFilePath` e `installer.getDocFilePath` no procura mais por arquivos `.txt` em pastas de documentao de localidade. (#17911, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: `config.conf["documentFormatting"]["reportFontAttributes"]` has been removed, use `config.conf["documentFormatting"]["fontAttributeReporting"]` instead. (#18066)
segment.target: `config.conf["documentFormatting"]["reportFontAttributes"]` foi removido, use em vez disso `config.conf["documentFormatting"]["fontAttributeReporting"]`. (#18066)

segment.source: `config.conf["speech"]["includeCLDR"]` has been removed, check/modify whether `config.conf["speech"]["symbolDictionaries"]` contains `"cldr"` instead. (#18066)
segment.target: `config.conf["speech"]["includeCLDR"]` has been removed, em vez disso verifique/modifique se `config.conf["speech"]["symbolDictionaries"]` contm `"cldr"`. (#18066)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: The `braille.filter_displaySize` extension point is deprecated.
segment.target: O ponto de extenso `braille.filter_displaySize` est obsoleto.

segment.source: Please use `braille.filter_displayDimensions` instead. (#17011)
segment.target: Por favor, use `braille.filter_displayDimensions` em vez dele. (#17011)

segment.source: The `gui.message.messageBox` and `gui.runScriptModalDialog` functions, and `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` class are deprecated.
segment.target: As funes `gui.message.messageBox` e `gui.runScriptModalDialog`, e a classe `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` esto obsoletas.

segment.source: Use `gui.message.MessageDialog` instead. (#17582)
segment.target: Use `gui.message.MessageDialog` em vez delas. (#17582)

segment.source: The following symbols are deprecated (#17486, @CyrilleB79):
segment.target: Os seguintes smbolos esto obsoletos (#17486, @CyrilleB79):

segment.source: `NoConsoleOptionParser`, `stringToBool`, `stringToLang` in `__main__`; use the same symbols in `argsParsing` instead.
segment.target: `NoConsoleOptionParser`, `stringToBool`, `stringToLang` em `__main__`; em vez disso, use os mesmos smbolos em `argsParsing`.

segment.source: `__main__.parser`; use `argsParsing.getParser()` instead.
segment.target: `__main__.parser`; em vez disso use `argsParsing.getParser()`.

segment.source: `bdDetect.DeviceType` is deprecated in favour of `bdDetect.ProtocolType` and `bdDetect.CommunicationType` to take into account the fact that both HID and Serial communication can take place over USB and Bluetooth. (#17537 , @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `bdDetect.DeviceType` foi preterido em favor de `bdDetect.ProtocolType` e `bdDetect.CommunicationType` para levar em conta o fato de que tanto a comunicao HID quanto a comunicao serial podem ocorrer via USB e Bluetooth. (#17537 , @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix bugs with braille devices and reading math in Chromium.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir falhas com dispositivos braille e leitura de matemtica no Chromium.

segment.source: Bug fixes
segment.target: Correo de falhas

segment.source: Fixed bug with with reading math in Chromium Browsers (Chrome, Edge). (#17421, @NSoiffer)
segment.target: Corrigida falha com a leitura de matemtica em navegadores Chromium (Chrome, Edge). (#17421, @NSoiffer)

segment.source: Humanware Brailliant BI 40X devices running firmware version 2.4 now work as expected. (#17518, @bramd)
segment.target: Dispositivos Humanware Brailliant BI 40X executando a verso 2.4 do firmware agora funcionam como esperado. (#17518, @bramd)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug when saving speech symbol dictionaries.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir uma falha ao salvar dicionrios de smbolos de fala.

segment.source: Bug fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixed bug where speech symbols dictionaries were not saved and the dialog would not be closed. (#17344)
segment.target: Corrigida a falha em que os dicionrios de smbolos de fala no eram salvos e o dilogo no era fechado. (#17344)

segment.source: This release includes a number of improvements in Microsoft Office, braille, and document formatting.
segment.target: Esta verso inclui uma srie de melhorias em Microsoft Office, braille e formatao de documentos.

segment.source: In Word or Excel, it is now possible to double-press the comment gesture to read the comment or note in a browsable dialog.
segment.target: No Word ou Excel, agora possvel pressionar duas vezes o comando gesto de comentrio para ler o comentrio ou nota em um dilogo navegvel.

segment.source: You can now use the review cursor selection command to select text in PowerPoint.
segment.target: Agora voc pode usar o comando de seleo do cursor de explorao para selecionar texto no PowerPoint.

segment.source: NVDA also no longer brailles garbage characters when showing row or column header text in tables in Word when using the object model.
segment.target: O NVDA tambm no coloca mais caracteres lixo em braille ao mostrar texto de cabealho de linha ou coluna em tabelas no Word ao usar o modelo de objeto.

segment.source: NVDA can now be configured to report font attributes in speech and braille separately.
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode ser configurado para relatar atributos de fonte em fala e braille separadamente.

segment.source: A new setting has been added to configure the timeout to perform a multiple press gesture, such as the report time/date command.
segment.target: Uma nova configurao foi adicionada para definir o tempo limite para executar um comando gesto de mltiplos pressionamentos, como o comando de relatar hora/data.

segment.source: You can now configure how NVDA shows text formatting in braille, and set NVDA to show the start of paragraphs in braille.
segment.target: Agora voc pode configurar como o NVDA mostra a formatao de texto em braille e definir o NVDA para mostrar o incio dos pargrafos em braille.

segment.source: NVDA can now speak the character at the cursor when performing a braille cursor routing action.
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode falar o caractere no cursor ao executar uma ao de direcionamento do cursor braille.

segment.source: Cursor routing reliability has been improved, and support for routing keys in PowerPoint has been added.
segment.target: A confiabilidade do direcionamento do cursor foi melhorada e o suporte para teclas de direcionamento no PowerPoint foi adicionado.

segment.source: All lines of cells will now be used when using a multi-line braille display via HID braille.
segment.target: Todas as linhas de celas agora sero usadas ao utilizar uma linha braille multilinha via braille HID.

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unstable after restarting NVDA during an automatic Braille Bluetooth scan.
segment.target: O NVDA no fica mais instvel aps reiniciar o NVDA durante uma varredura automtica por Bluetooth Braille.

segment.source: The minimum required version of Poedit that works with NVDA is now version 3.5.
segment.target: A verso mnima necessria do Poedit que funciona com o NVDA agora a verso 3.5.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated, adding support for the Faroese and Xextan languages.
segment.target: O eSpeak NG foi atualizado, adicionando suporte aos idiomas feros e xextan.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, adding new Braille tables for Thai and Greek international braille with single-cell accented letters.
segment.target: LibLouis foi atualizado, adicionando novas tabelas Braille para braille internacional tailands e grego com letras acentuadas de clula nica.

segment.source: There have also been a number of fixes, including to mouse tracking in Firefox, and the on-demand speech mode.
segment.target: Tambm houve uma srie de correes, abrangendo o rastreamento do mouse no Firefox e o modo de fala sob demanda.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: New braille features:
segment.target: Novos recursos braille:

segment.source: It is now possible to change the way NVDA displays certain text formatting attributes in braille.
segment.target: Agora possvel alterar a maneira como o NVDA exibe certos atributos de formatao de texto em braille.

segment.source: The available options are:
segment.target: As opes disponveis so:

segment.source: Liblouis (default): Uses formatting markers defined in the selected braille table.
segment.target: Liblouis (padro): Usa marcadores de formatao definidos na tabela braille selecionada.

segment.source: Tags: Uses start and end tags to denote where certain font attributes begin and end. (#16864)
segment.target: Etiquetas: Usa identificadores de incio e fim para denotar onde certos atributos de fonte comeam e terminam. (#16864)

segment.source: When the "Read by paragraph" option is enabled, NVDA can now be configured to indicate the start of paragraphs in braille. (#16895, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Quando a opo "Ler por pargrafo" est habilitada, o NVDA agora pode ser configurado para indicar o incio dos pargrafos em braille. (#16895, @nvdaes)

segment.source: When performing a braille cursor routing action, NVDA can now automatically speak the character at the cursor. (#8072, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ao executar uma ao de direcionamento do cursor braille, o NVDA agora pode falar automaticamente o caractere no cursor. (#8072, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This option is disabled by default.
segment.target: Esta opo est desabilitada por padro.

segment.source: You can enable "Speak character when routing cursor in text" in NVDA's braille settings.
segment.target: Voc pode habilitar "Falar caractere sob o cursor ao rotear o cursor em textos" nas configuraes de braille do NVDA.

segment.source: The comment command in Microsoft Word and notes command in Microsoft Excel can now be pressed twice to show the comment or note in a browsable message. (#16800, #16878, @Cary-Rowen)
segment.target: O comando de comentrio no Microsoft Word e o comando de notas no Microsoft Excel agora podem ser pressionados duas vezes para mostrar o comentrio ou a nota numa mensagem navegvel. (#16800, #16878, @Cary-Rowen)

segment.source: NVDA can now be configured to report font attributes in speech and braille separately. (#16755)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode ser configurado para relatar atributos de fonte em fala e braille separadamente. (#16755)

segment.source: The timeout to perform a multiple keypress is now configurable; this may be especially useful for people with dexterity impairment. (#11929, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: O tempo limite para executar um pressionamento mltiplo de tecla agora configurvel; isso pode ser especialmente til para pessoas com deficincia motora dexterity impairment. (#11929, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: The `-c`/`--config-path` and `--disable-addons` command line options are now respected when launching an update from within NVDA. (#16937)
segment.target: As opes de linha de comando `-c`/`--config-path` e `--disable-addons` agora so respeitadas ao iniciar uma atualizao de dentro do NVDA. (#16937)

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Atualizaes de componentes:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.31.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.31.0). (#17080, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Transcritor Braille LibLouis atualizado para [3.31.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.31.0). (#17080, @LeonarddeR, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Fixed translation of numbers in Spanish Braille.
segment.target: Corrigida a transcrio de nmeros em Braille espanhol.

segment.source: New Braille tables:
segment.target: Novas Tabelas braille:

segment.source: Thai grade 1
segment.target: Tailands grau 1

segment.source: Greek international Braille (single-cell accented letters)
segment.target: Braille grego internacional (letras acentuadas de clula nica)

segment.source: Renamed tables:
segment.target: Tabelas renomeadas:

segment.source: "Thai 6 dot" was renamed to "Thai grade 0" for consistency reasons.
segment.target: "Tailands de 6 pontos" foi renomeada para "Tailands grau 0" por questes de consistncia.

segment.source: The existing "Greek international braille" table was renamed to "Greek international braille (2-cell accented letters)" to clarify the distinction between the two Greek systems.
segment.target: A tabela existente "Braille grego internacional" foi renomeada para "Braille grego internacional (letras acentuadas de 2 clulas)" para esclarecer a distino entre os dois sistemas gregos.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `961454ff`. (#16775)
segment.target: eSpeak NG foi atualizado para 1.52-dev commit `961454ff`. (#16775)

segment.source: Added new languages Faroese and Xextan.
segment.target: Adicionados novos idiomas: feros e xextan.

segment.source: When using a multi-line braille display via the standard HID braille driver, all lines of cells will be used. (#16993, @alexmoon)
segment.target: Ao usar uma linha braille multilinha por meio do driver braille HID padro, todas as linhas de celas sero usadas. (#16993, @alexmoon)

segment.source: The stability of NVDA's Poedit support has been improved with the side effect that the minimum required version of Poedit is now version 3.5. (#16889, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: A estabilidade do suporte ao Poedit do NVDA foi melhorada com o efeito colateral de que a verso mnima necessria do Poedit agora a verso 3.5. (#16889, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Braille fixes:
segment.target: Correes Braille:

segment.source: It is now possible to use braille display routing keys to move the text cursor in Microsoft PowerPoint. (#9101)
segment.target: Agora possvel usar as teclas de direcionamento sensores em linha braille para mover o cursor de texto no Microsoft PowerPoint. (#9101)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Word without UI Automation, NVDA no longer outputs garbage characters in table headers defined with the set row and column header commands. (#7212)
segment.target: Ao acessar o Microsoft Word sem a UI Automation Automao da Interface do Usurio , o NVDA no emite mais caracteres lixo em cabealhos de tabela definidos com os comandos definir cabealho de linha e coluna. (#7212)

segment.source: The Seika Notetaker driver now correctly generates braille input for space, backspace and dots with space/backspace gestures. (#16642, @school510587)
segment.target: O driver Seika Notetaker agora gera corretamente a entrada braille para espao, backspace e comandos gestos com pontos de espao/backspace. (#16642, @school510587)

segment.source: Cursor routing is now much more reliable when a line contains one or more Unicode variation selectors or decomposed characters. (#10960, @mltony, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O direcionamento do cursor agora muito mais confivel quando uma linha contm um ou mais seletores de variao Unicode ou caracteres decompostos. (#10960, @mltony, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA no longer throws an error when panning the braille display forward in some empty edit controls. (#12885)
segment.target: O NVDA no gera mais um erro ao panoramizar a linha braille para frente em alguns controles de edio vazios. (#12885)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unstable after restarting NVDA during an automatic Braille Bluetooth scan. (#16933)
segment.target: O NVDA no fica mais instvel aps reiniciar NVDA durante uma varredura automtica de Braille Bluetooth. (#16933)

segment.source: It is now possible to use the review cursor selection commands to select text in Microsoft PowerPoint. (#17004)
segment.target: Agora possvel usar os comandos de seleo do cursor de explorao para selecionar texto no Microsoft PowerPoint. (#17004)

segment.source: In on-demand speech mode, NVDA does not talk any more when a message is opened in Outlook, when a new page is loaded in a browser, or when displaying a new slide in a PowerPoint slideshow. (#16825, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: No modo de fala sob demanda, o NVDA no fala mais quando uma mensagem aberta no Outlook, quando uma nova pgina carregada em um navegador ou ao exibir um novo slide em uma apresentao de slides do PowerPoint. (#16825, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving the mouse over text before or after a link now reliably reports the text. (#15990, @jcsteh)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox, mover o mouse sobre o texto antes ou depois de um link agora relata o texto de forma confivel. (#15990, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally fails to open browsable messages (such as pressing `NVDA+f` twice). (#16806, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O NVDA no falha mais ocasionalmente ao abrir mensagens navegveis (como pressionar `NVDA+f` duas vezes). (#16806, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Updating NVDA while add-on updates are pending no longer results in the add-on being removed. (#16837)
segment.target: Atualizar o NVDA enquanto atualizaes de complementos esto pendentes no resulta mais na remoo do complemento. (#16837)

segment.source: It is now possible to interact with Data validation dropdown lists in Microsoft Excel 365. (#15138)
segment.target: Agora possvel interagir com listas suspensas de validao de dados no Microsoft Excel 365. (#15138)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer as sluggish when arrowing up and down through large files in VS Code. (#17039)
segment.target: O NVDA no mais to lento ao usar seta para cima e para baixo em arquivos grandes no VS Code. (#17039)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes unresponsive after holding down an arrow key for a long time while in browse mode, particularly in Microsoft Word and Microsoft Outlook. (#16812)
segment.target: O NVDA no fica mais sem resposta aps manter pressionada uma tecla de seta por um longo tempo enquanto estiver no modo de navegao, particularmente no Microsoft Word e no Microsoft Outlook. (#16812)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reads the last line when the cursor is on the second-last line of a multiline edit control in Java applications. (#17027)
segment.target: O NVDA no l mais a ltima linha quando o cursor est na penltima linha de um controle de edio multilinha em aplicativos Java. (#17027)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Consulte [o guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter informaes sobre o processo de descontinuao e remoo de API do NVDA.

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Atualizaes de componentes:

segment.source: Updated py2exe to 0.13.0.2 (#16907, @dpy013)
segment.target: Atualizado py2exe para 0.13.0.2 (#16907, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated setuptools to 72.0 (#16907, @dpy013)
segment.target: Atualizado setuptools para 72.0 (#16907, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated Ruff to 0.5.6. (#16868, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Ruff atualizado para 0.5.6. (#16868, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Updated nh3 to 0.2.18 (#17020, @dpy013)
segment.target: Atualizado nh3 para 0.2.18 (#17020, @dpy013)

segment.source: Added a `.editorconfig` file to NVDA's repository in order for several IDEs to pick up basic NVDA code style rules by default. (#16795, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Adicionado um arquivo `.editorconfig` ao repositrio do NVDA para que vrios IDEs Ambientes de Desenvolvimento Integrado peguem regras bsicas de estilo de cdigo do NVDA por padro. (#16795, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added support for custom speech symbol dictionaries. (#16739, #16823, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para dicionrios de smbolos de fala personalizados. (#16739, #16823, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Dictionaries can be provided in locale specific folders in an add-on package, e.g. `locale\en`.
segment.target: Dicionrios podem ser fornecidos em pastas especficas de localidade locale em um pacote de complemento, por exemplo `locale\pt_BR`.

segment.source: Dictionary metadata can be added to an optional `symbolDictionaries` section in the add-on manifest.
segment.target: Metadados do dicionrio podem ser adicionados a uma seo `symbolDictionaries` opcional no manifesto manifest do complemento.

segment.source: Please consult the [Custom speech symbol dictionaries section in the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#AddonSymbolDictionaries) for more details.
segment.target: Consulte a [seo Dicionrios de smbolos de fala personalizados no guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#AddonSymbolDictionaries) para obter mais detalhes.

segment.source: It is now possible to redirect objects retrieved from on-screen coordinates, by using the `NVDAObject.objectFromPointRedirect` method. (#16788, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Agora possvel redirecionar objetos recuperados de coordenadas na tela, usando o mtodo `NVDAObject.objectFromPointRedirect`. (#16788, @Emil-18)

segment.source: Running SCons with the parameter `--all-cores` will automatically pick the maximum number of available CPU cores. (#16943, #16868, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Executar o SCons com o parmetro `--all-cores` escolher automaticamente o nmero mximo de ncleos de CPU disponveis. (#16943, #16868, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Developer info now includes information on app architecture (such as AMD64) for the navigator object. (#16488, @josephsl)
segment.target: As informaes do desenvolvedor agora incluem informaes sobre a arquitetura do aplicativo (como AMD64) para o objeto em navegao. (#16488, @josephsl)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: The `bool` configuration key `[documentFormatting][reportFontAttributes]` is deprecated for removal in 2025.1, instead use `[fontAttributeReporting]`. (#16748)
segment.target: A chave `bool` booleana da configurao `[documentFormatting][reportFontAttributes]` est obsoleta para remoo na 2025.1, em vez disso use `[fontAttributeReporting]`. (#16748)

segment.source: The new key has an `int` value matching an `OutputMode` `enum` with options for speech, braille, speech and braille and off.
segment.target: A nova chave tem um valor `int` inteiro correspondente a uma `enum` enumerao `OutputMode` com opes para fala, braille, fala e braille, e desligada.

segment.source: API consumers can use the `bool` value as previously, or check the `OutputMode` if handling speech or braille specifically.
segment.target: Os consumidores de API podem usar o valor `bool` como antes ou verificar se `OutputMode` est lidando especificamente com fala ou braille.

segment.source: These keys are currently synchronized until 2025.1.
segment.target: Essas chaves esto atualmente sincronizadas at 2025.1.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.InaccurateTextChangeEventEmittingEditableText` is deprecated with no replacement. (#16817, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.InaccurateTextChangeEventEmittingEditableText` est obsoleto sem substituio. (#16817, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug with the automatic add-on update notification.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir uma falha na notificao automtica de atualizao de complementos.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: When automatically checking for add-on updates, NVDA no longer freezes on poor connections. (#17036)
segment.target: Ao verificar automaticamente atualizaes de complementos, o NVDA no trava mais em conexes ruins. (#17036)

segment.source: The Add-on Store will now notify you if any add-on updates are available on NVDA startup.
segment.target: A Loja de Complementos agora ir notific-lo se houver atualizaes de complementos disponveis na inicializao do NVDA.

segment.source: There are now options to apply Unicode normalization to speech and braille output.
segment.target: Agora existem opes para aplicar a Normalizao Unicode sada de fala e braille.

segment.source: This can be useful when reading characters that are unknown to a particular speech synthesizer or braille table and which have a compatible alternative, like the bold and italic characters commonly used on social media.
segment.target: Isso pode ser til ao ler caracteres que so desconhecidos para um sintetizador de fala ou tabela braille em particular e que tm uma alternativa compatvel, como os caracteres em negrito e itlico comumente usados em mdias sociais.

segment.source: It also allows reading of equations in the Microsoft Word equation editor.
segment.target: Tambm permite a leitura de equaes no editor de equaes do Microsoft Word.

segment.source: Help Tech Activator Pro braille displays are now supported.
segment.target: As linhas braille Help Tech Activator Pro agora so suportadas.

segment.source: Unassigned commands have been added to scroll the mouse wheel vertically and horizontally.
segment.target: Comandos no atribudos foram adicionados para rolar a roda do mouse vertical e horizontalmente.

segment.source: There are several bug fixes, particularly for the Windows 11 Emoji Panel and Clipboard history.
segment.target: H vrias correes de falhas, particularmente para o Painel de Emojis do Windows 11 e histrico da rea de Transferncia.

segment.source: For web browsers, there are fixes for reporting error messages, figures, captions, table labels and checkbox/radio button menu items.
segment.target: Para navegadores web, h correes para relatar mensagens de erro, figuras, legendas, rtulos de tabela e itens de menu de caixa de seleo/boto de opo.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, adding new Braille tables for Cyrillic Serbian, Yiddish, several ancient languages, Turkish, and the International Phonetic Alphabet.
segment.target: O LibLouis foi atualizado, adicionando novas tabelas Braille para o cirlico srvio, idiche, vrios idiomas antigos, turco e o alfabeto fontico internacional.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated, adding support for the Karakalpak language.
segment.target: O eSpeak foi atualizado, adicionando suporte para o idioma Caracalpaque.

segment.source: Unicode CLDR has also been updated.
segment.target: O Unicode CLDR tambm foi atualizado.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: New key commands:
segment.target: Novos comandos de teclas:

segment.source: Added unassigned commands for vertical and horizontal scrolling of the mouse wheel, to enhance navigation on web pages and apps with dynamic content, such as Dism++. (#16462, @Cary-Rowen)
segment.target: Adicionados comandos no atribudos para rolagem vertical e horizontal da roda do mouse, para aprimorar a navegao em pginas web e aplicativos com contedo dinmico, como Dism++. (#16462, @Cary-Rowen)

segment.source: Added support for Unicode Normalization to speech and braille output. (#11570, #16466 @LeonarddeR).
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para Normalizao Unicode para sada de fala e braille. (#11570, #16466 @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: This can be useful when reading characters that are unknown to a particular speech synthesizer or braille table and which have a compatible alternative, like the bold and italic characters commonly used on social media.
segment.target: Isso pode ser til ao ler caracteres que so desconhecidos para um sintetizador de fala ou tabela braille especfica e que tm uma alternativa compatvel, como os caracteres em negrito e itlico comumente usados em mdias sociais.

segment.source: It also allows reading of equations in the Microsoft Word equation editor. (#4631)
segment.target: Tambm permite a leitura de equaes no editor de equaes do Microsoft Word. (#4631)

segment.source: You can enable this functionality for both speech and braille in their respective settings categories in the NVDA Settings dialog.
segment.target: Voc pode habilitar essa funcionalidade para fala e braille em suas respectivas categorias de configuraes no dilogo Configuraes do NVDA.

segment.source: By default, after NVDA startup, you will be notified if any add-on updates are available. (#15035)
segment.target: Por padro, aps a inicializao do NVDA, voc ser notificado se houver atualizaes de complementos disponveis. (#15035)

segment.source: This can be disabled in the "Add-on Store" category of settings.
segment.target: Isso pode ser desabilitado na categoria de configuraes "Loja de Complementos".

segment.source: NVDA checks daily for add-on updates.
segment.target: O NVDA verifica diariamente se h atualizaes de complementos.

segment.source: Only updates within the same channel will be checked (e.g. installed beta add-ons will only notify for updates in the beta channel).
segment.target: Somente atualizaes dentro do mesmo canal sero verificadas (por exemplo, complementos beta instalados s notificaro sobre atualizaes no canal beta).

segment.source: Added support for the Help Tech Activator Pro displays. (#16668)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para as linhas Help Tech Activator Pro. (#16668)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Atualizaes de componentes:

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `54ee11a79`. (#16495)
segment.target: eSpeak NG foi atualizado para 1.52-dev commit `54ee11a79`. (#16495)

segment.source: Added new language Karakalpak.
segment.target: Adicionado novo idioma Caracalpaque.

segment.source: Updated Unicode CLDR to version 45.0. (#16507, @OzancanKaratas)
segment.target: Unicode CLDR atualizado para a verso 45.0. (#16507, @OzancanKaratas)

segment.source: Updated fast_diff_match_patch (used to detect changes in terminals and other dynamic content) to version 2.1.0. (#16508, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Atualizado o fast_diff_match_patch (usado para detectar alteraes em terminais e outros contedos dinmicos) para a verso 2.1.0. (#16508, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.30.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.30.0). (#16652, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Transcritor braille LibLouis atualizado para [3.30.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.30.0). (#16652, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: New braille tables:
segment.target: Novas tabelas braille:

segment.source: Cyrillic Serbian.
segment.target: Cirlico Srvio.

segment.source: Yiddish.
segment.target: Idiche.

segment.source: Several ancient languages: Biblical Hebrew, Akkadian, Syriac, Ugaritic and transliterated Cuneiform text.
segment.target: Vrias lnguas antigas: hebraico bblico, acadiano, siraco, ugartico e texto cuneiforme transliterado.

segment.source: Turkish grade 2. (#16735)
segment.target: Turco grau 2. (#16735)

segment.source: International Phonetic Alphabet. (#16773)
segment.target: Alfabeto Fontico Internacional. (#16773)

segment.source: Updated NSIS to 3.10 (#16674, @dpy013)
segment.target: NSIS atualizado para 3.10 (#16674, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated markdown to 3.6 (#16725, @dpy013)
segment.target: Markdown atualizado para 3.6 (#16725, @dpy013)

segment.source: Updated nh3 to 0.2.17 (#16725, @dpy013)
segment.target: Atualizado nh3 para 0.2.17 (#16725, @dpy013)

segment.source: The fallback braille input table is now equal to the fallback output table, which is Unified English Braille Code grade 1. (#9863, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: A tabela de entrada braille de fallback agora igual tabela de sada de fallback, que o Cdigo Braille Ingls Unificado grau 1. (#9863, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: NVDA will now report figures with no accessible children, but with a label or description. (#14514)
segment.target: O NVDA agora relatar figuras sem filhos acessveis, mas com um rtulo ou descrio. (#14514)

segment.source: When reading by line in browse mode, "caption" is no longer reported on each line of a long figure or table caption. (#14874)
segment.target: Ao ler por linha no modo de navegao, "legenda" no mais relatada em cada linha de uma figura longa ou legenda de tabela. (#14874)

segment.source: In the Python console, the last unexecuted command will no longer be lost when moving in the input history. (#16653, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: No console Python, o ltimo comando no executado no ser mais perdido ao se mover no histrico de entrada. (#16653, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: A unique anonymous ID is now sent as part of optional NVDA usage statistics gathering. (#16266)
segment.target: Um ID annimo exclusivo agora enviado como parte da coleta opcional de estatsticas de uso do NVDA. (#16266)

segment.source: By default, a new folder will be created when making a portable copy.
segment.target: Por padro, uma nova pasta ser criada ao fazer uma cpia porttil.

segment.source: A warning message will inform you if you try writing to a non-empty directory. (#16686)
segment.target: Uma mensagem de aviso informar se voc tentar gravar em um diretrio no vazio. (#16686)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Correes em Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer appear to get stuck when closing the clipboard history and emoji panel. (#16346, #16347, @josephsl)
segment.target: O NVDA no parecer mais travar ao fechar o histrico da rea de transferncia e o painel de emojis. (#16346, #16347, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will announce visible candidates again when opening the IME interface. (#14023, @josephsl)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar novamente os candidatos visveis ao abrir a interface do IME. (#14023, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "clipboard history" twice when navigating through the emoji panel menu items. (#16532, @josephsl)
segment.target: O NVDA no anunciar mais "histrico da rea de transferncia" duas vezes ao navegar pelos itens do menu do painel de emojis. (#16532, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer cut off speech and braille when reviewing kaomojis and symbols in the emoji panel. (#16533, @josephsl)
segment.target: O NVDA no cortar mais a fala e o braille ao revisar kaomojis e smbolos no painel de emojis. (#16533, @josephsl)

segment.source: Web browser fixes:
segment.target: Correes em navegador Web:

segment.source: Error messages referenced with `aria-errormessage` are now reported in Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox. (#8318)
segment.target: Mensagens de erro referenciadas com `aria-errormessage` agora so relatadas no Google Chrome e no Mozilla Firefox. (#8318)

segment.source: If present, NVDA will now use `aria-labelledby` to provide accessible names for tables in Mozilla Firefox. (#5183)
segment.target: Se presente, o NVDA agora usar `aria-labelledby` para fornecer nomes acessveis para tabelas no Mozilla Firefox. (#5183)

segment.source: NVDA will correctly announce radio and checkbox menu items when first entering sub-menus in Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox. (#14550)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar corretamente os itens de menu de rdio e caixa de seleo ao entrar pela primeira vez em submenus no Google Chrome e no Mozilla Firefox. (#14550)

segment.source: NVDA's browse mode find functionality is now more accurate when the page contains emojis. (#16317, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: A funcionalidade de localizao do modo de navegao do NVDA agora mais precisa quando a pgina contm emojis. (#16317, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, NVDA now correctly reports the current character, word and line when the cursor is at the insertion point at the end of a line. (#3156, @jcsteh)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox, o NVDA agora informa corretamente o caractere, a palavra e a linha atuais quando o cursor est no ponto de insero no final de uma linha. (#3156, @jcsteh)

segment.source: No longer cause Google Chrome to crash when closing a document or exiting Chrome. (#16893)
segment.target: No faz mais com que o Google Chrome falhe ao fechar um documento ou sair do Chrome. (#16893)

segment.source: NVDA will announce correctly the autocomplete suggestions in Eclipse and other Eclipse-based environments on Windows 11. (#16416, @thgcode)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar corretamente as sugestes de preenchimento automtico no Eclipse e outros ambientes baseados em Eclipse no Windows 11. (#16416, @thgcode)

segment.source: Improved reliability of automatic text readout, particularly in terminal applications. (#15850, #16027, @Danstiv)
segment.target: Maior confiabilidade da leitura automtica de texto, especialmente em aplicativos de terminal. (#15850, #16027, @Danstiv)

segment.source: It is once again possible to reset the configuration to factory defaults reliably. (#16755, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Mais uma vez, possvel redefinir a configurao para os padres de fbrica de forma confivel. (#16755, @Emil-18)

segment.source: NVDA will correctly announce selection changes when editing a cell's text in Microsoft Excel. (#15843)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar corretamente as alteraes de seleo ao editar o texto de uma clula no Microsoft Excel. (#15843)

segment.source: In applications using Java Access Bridge, NVDA will now correctly read the last blank line of a text instead of repeating the previous line. (#9376, @dmitrii-drobotov)
segment.target: Em aplicativos que usam o Java Access Bridge, o NVDA agora ler corretamente a ltima linha em branco de um texto em vez de repetir a linha anterior. (#9376, @dmitrii-drobotov)

segment.source: In LibreOffice Writer (version 24.8 and newer), when toggling text formatting (bold, italic, underline, subscript/superscript, alignment) using the corresponding keyboard shortcut, NVDA announces the new formatting attribute (e.g. "Bold on", "Bold off"). (#4248, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: No LibreOffice Writer (verso 24.8 e mais recentes), ao alternar a formatao de texto (negrito, itlico, sublinhado, subscrito/sobrescrito, alinhamento) usando o atalho de teclado correspondente, o NVDA anuncia o novo atributo de formatao (por exemplo, "Negrito ativado", "Negrito desativado"). (#4248, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: When navigating with the cursor keys in text boxes in applications which use UI Automation, NVDA no longer sometimes reports the wrong character, word, etc. (#16711, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Ao navegar com as teclas do cursor em caixas de texto em aplicativos que usam UI Automation Automao de Interface do Usurio , o NVDA no relata mais caracteres, palavras, etc, errados. (#16711, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When pasting into the Windows 10/11 Calculator, NVDA now correctly reports the full number pasted. (#16573, @TristanBurchett)
segment.target: Ao colar na Calculadora do Windows 10/11, o NVDA agora informa corretamente o nmero completo colado. (#16573, @TristanBurchett)

segment.source: Speech is no longer silent after disconnecting from and reconnecting to a Remote Desktop session. (#16722, @jcsteh)
segment.target: A fala no fica mais silenciosa aps desconectar e reconectar a uma sesso de rea de Trabalho Remota. (#16722, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Support added for text review commands for an object's name in Visual Studio Code. (#16248, @Cary-Rowen)
segment.target: Suporte adicionado para comandos de explorao de texto para o nome de um objeto no Visual Studio Code. (#16248, @Cary-Rowen)

segment.source: Playing NVDA sounds no longer fails on a mono audio device. (#16770, @jcsteh)
segment.target: A reproduo de sons do NVDA no falha mais em um dispositivo de udio mono. (#16770, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA will report addresses when arrowing through To/CC/BCC fields in outlook.com / Modern Outlook. (#16856)
segment.target: O NVDA relatar endereos ao navegar pelos campos Para/CC/CCO no outlook.com / Outlook Moderno. (#16856)

segment.source: NVDA now handles add-on installation failures more gracefully. (#16704)
segment.target: O NVDA agora lida com falhas de instalao de complementos de forma mais elegante. (#16704)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: NVDA now uses Ruff instead of flake8 for linting. (#14817)
segment.target: O NVDA agora usa Ruff em vez de flake8 para linting. (#14817)

segment.source: Fixed NVDA's build system to work properly when using Visual Studio 2022 version 17.10 and above. (#16480, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Corrigido o sistema de compilao do NVDA para funcionar corretamente ao usar o Visual Studio 2022 verso 17.10 e superior. (#16480, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: A fixed width font is now used in Log Viewer and in the NVDA Python Console so that the cursor remains in the same column during vertical navigation.
segment.target: Uma fonte de largura fixa agora usada no Visualizador de Log e no Console Python do NVDA para que o cursor permanea na mesma coluna durante a navegao vertical.

segment.source: It is especially useful to read the error location markers in tracebacks. (#16321, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: especialmente til ler os marcadores de localizao de erro em tracebacks. (#16321, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Support for custom braille tables has been added. (#3304, #16208, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Foi adicionado suporte para tabelas braille personalizadas. (#3304, #16208, @JulienCochuyt, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Tables can be provided in the `brailleTables` folder in an add-on package.
segment.target: As tabelas podem ser fornecidas na pasta `brailleTables` num pacote de complemento.

segment.source: Table metadata can be added to an optional `brailleTables` section in the add-on manifest or to a `.ini` file with the same format found in the brailleTables subdirectory of the scratchpad directory.
segment.target: Os metadados da tabela podem ser adicionados a uma seo `brailleTables` opcional no manifesto manifest do complemento ou a um arquivo `.ini` com o mesmo formato encontrado no subdiretrio brailleTables do diretrio scratchpad.

segment.source: Please consult the [braille translation tables section in the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#BrailleTables) for more details.
segment.target: Consulte a [seo de tabelas de transcrio braille no guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#BrailleTables) para obter mais detalhes.

segment.source: When a `gainFocus` event is queued with an object that has a valid `focusRedirect` property, the object pointed to by the `focusRedirect` property is now held by `eventHandler.lastQueuedFocusObject`, rather than the originally queued object. (#15843)
segment.target: Quando um evento `gainFocus` enfileirado queued com um objeto que tem uma propriedade `focusRedirect` vlida, o objeto apontado pela propriedade `focusRedirect` agora mantido por `eventHandler.lastQueuedFocusObject`, em vez do objeto originalmente enfileirado. (#15843)

segment.source: NVDA will log its executable architecture (x86) at startup. (#16432, @josephsl)
segment.target: O NVDA registrar colocar no log sua arquitetura executvel (x86) na inicializao. (#16432, @josephsl)

segment.source: `wx.CallAfter`, which is wrapped in `monkeyPatches/wxMonkeyPatches.py`, now includes proper `functools.wraps` indication. (#16520, @XLTechie)
segment.target: `wx.CallAfter`, que encapsulado em `monkeyPatches/wxMonkeyPatches.py`, agora inclui indicao `functools.wraps` adequada. (#16520, @XLTechie)

segment.source: There is a new module for scheduling tasks `utils.schedule`, using the pip module `schedule`. (#16636)
segment.target: H um novo mdulo para agendamento de tarefas `utils.schedule`, usando o mdulo pip `schedule`. (#16636)

segment.source: You can use `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJobAtStartUp` to automatically schedule a job that happens after NVDA starts, and every 24 hours after that.
segment.target: Voc pode usar para `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJobAtStartUp` agendar automaticamente um trabalho que acontece depois que o NVDA inicia, e a cada 24 horas depois disso.

segment.source: Jobs are scheduled with a delay to avoid conflicts.
segment.target: Os trabalhos so agendados com um atraso para evitar conflitos.

segment.source: `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJob` and `scheduleJob` can be used to schedule jobs at custom times, where a `JobClashError` will be raised on a known job scheduling clash.
segment.target: `scheduleThread.scheduleDailyJob` e `scheduleJob` pode ser usado para agendar trabalhos em horrios personalizados, onde um `JobClashError` ser gerado em um conflito conhecido de agendamento de trabalhos.

segment.source: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosting Edge WebView2 (msedgewebview2.exe) controls. (#16705, @josephsl)
segment.target: Agora possvel criar mdulos de aplicativo app modules para aplicativos que hospedam controles Edge WebView2 (msedgewebview2.exe). (#16705, @josephsl

segment.source: There is a new feature called sound split.
segment.target: H um novo recurso chamado diviso de som.

segment.source: This allows splitting NVDA sounds into one channel (e.g. left) while sounds from all other applications are directed to the other channel (e.g. right).
segment.target: Isso permite dividir os sons do NVDA em um canal (por exemplo, esquerda), enquanto os sons de todos os outros aplicativos so direcionados para o outro canal (por exemplo, direita).

segment.source: There are new commands for modifying the synth settings ring, allowing users to jump to the first or last setting, and to increase or decrease the current setting in larger steps.
segment.target: Existem novos comandos para modificar o anel de configuraes de voz, permitindo aos usurios pular para a primeira ou ltima configurao e aumentar ou diminuir a configurao atual em intervalos maiores.

segment.source: There are also new quick navigation commands, allowing users to bind gestures to quickly jump between: paragraph, vertically aligned paragraph, same style text, different style text, menu item, toggle button, progress bar, figure, and math formula.
segment.target: Existem tambm novos comandos de navegao rpida, permitindo que os usurios vinculem atalhos gestos para saltar rapidamente entre: pargrafo, pargrafo alinhado verticalmente, texto de mesmo estilo, texto de estilo diferente, item de menu, boto de alternncia, barra de progresso, figura e frmula matemtica.

segment.source: There are many new braille features and bug fixes.
segment.target: H muitos novos recursos braille e correes de falhas.

segment.source: A new braille mode called "display speech output" has been added.
segment.target: Um novo modo braille chamado "exibir sada de fala" foi adicionado.

segment.source: When active, the braille display shows exactly what NVDA speaks.
segment.target: Quando ativo, a linha braille mostra exatamente o que o NVDA fala.

segment.source: Support was also added for the BrailleEdgeS2 and BrailleEdgeS3 displays.
segment.target: Tambm foi adicionado suporte para as linhas BrailleEdgeS2 e BrailleEdgeS3.

segment.source: LibLouis was updated, adding new detailed (with capital letters indicated) Belarusian and Ukrainian Braille tables, a Lao table, and a Spanish table for reading Greek texts.
segment.target: LibLouis foi atualizado, adicionando novas tabelas braille detalhadas (com letras maisculas indicadas) de bielorrusso e ucraniano, uma tabela do Laos e uma tabela de espanhol para leitura de textos gregos.

segment.source: eSpeak was updated, adding new language Tigrinya.
segment.target: eSpeak foi atualizado, adicionando novo idioma Tigrnia.

segment.source: There are many minor bug fixes for applications, such as Thunderbird, Adobe Reader, web browsers, Nudi and Geekbench.
segment.target: Existem muitas pequenas correes de falhas para aplicativos, como Thunderbird, Adobe Reader, navegadores web, Nudi e Geekbench.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: New key commands:
segment.target: Novos comandos de teclas:

segment.source: New Quick Navigation command `p` for jumping to next/previous text paragraph in browse mode. (#15998, @mltony)
segment.target: Novo comando de navegao rpida `p` para pular para o pargrafo de texto seguinte/anterior no modo de navegao. (#15998, @mltony)

segment.source: New unassigned Quick Navigation commands, which can be used to jump to the next/previous:
segment.target: Novos comandos de Navegao Rpida no atribudos, que podem ser usados para saltar para o prximo/anterior:

segment.source: figure (#10826)
segment.target: figura (#10826)

segment.source: vertically aligned paragraph (#15999, @mltony)
segment.target: pargrafo alinhado verticalmente (#15999, @mltony)

segment.source: menu item (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: item de menu (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: toggle button (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: boto de alternncia (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: progress bar (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: barra de progresso (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: math formula (#16001, @mltony)
segment.target: frmula matemtica (#16001, @mltony)

segment.source: same style text (#16000, @mltony)
segment.target: texto de mesmo estilo (#16000, @mltony)

segment.source: different style text (#16000, @mltony)
segment.target: texto de estilo diferente (#16000, @mltony)

segment.source: Added commands to jump first, last, forward and backward through the synth settings ring. (#13768, #16095, @rmcpantoja)
segment.target: Adicionados comandos para pular ao primeiro, ltimo, avanar e retroceder no anel de configuraes de voz. (#13768, #16095, @rmcpantoja)

segment.source: Setting the first/last setting in the synth settings ring has no assigned gesture. (#13768)
segment.target: Definir a primeira/ltima configurao no anel de configuraes de voz no tem nenhum atalho gesto atribudo. (#13768)

segment.source: Decrease and increase the current setting of the synth settings ring in a larger step (#13768):
segment.target: Diminua e aumente a configurao atual do anel de configuraes de voz em um intervalo maior (#13768):

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+control+pageUp` and `NVDA+control+pageDown`.
segment.target: Computador de mesa: `NVDA+control+pageUp` e `NVDA+control+pageDown`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+control+shift+pageUp` and `NVDA+control+shift+pageDown`.
segment.target: Computador porttil: `NVDA+control+shift+pageUp` e `NVDA+control+shift+pageDown`.

segment.source: Added a new unassigned input gesture to toggle the reporting of figures and captions. (#10826, #14349)
segment.target: Adicionado um novo comando gesto de entrada no atribudo para alternar o relato de figuras e legendas. (#10826, #14349)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: Added support for the BrailleEdgeS2 and BrailleEdgeS3 displays. (#16033, #16279, @EdKweon)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para as linhas BrailleEdgeS2 e BrailleEdgeS3. (#16033, #16279, @EdKweon)

segment.source: A new braille mode called "display speech output" has been added. (#15898, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Um novo modo braille chamado "exibir sada de fala" foi adicionado. (#15898, @Emil-18)

segment.source: When active, the braille display shows exactly what NVDA speaks.
segment.target: Quando ativo, a linha braille mostra exatamente o que o NVDA fala.

segment.source: It can be toggled by pressing `NVDA+alt+t`, or from the braille settings dialog.
segment.target: Pode ser alternado pressionando `NVDA+alt+t` ou no dilogo de configuraes de braille.

segment.source: Sound split: (#12985, @mltony)
segment.target: Diviso de som: (#12985, @mltony)

segment.source: Allows splitting NVDA sounds into one channel (e.g. left) while sounds from all other applications are directed to the other channel (e.g. right).
segment.target: Permite dividir os sons do NVDA em um canal (por exemplo, esquerda) enquanto os sons de todos os outros aplicativos so direcionados para o outro canal (por exemplo, direita).

segment.source: Toggled by `NVDA+alt+s`.
segment.target: Alternado por `NVDA+alt+s`.

segment.source: Reporting row and column headers is now supported in contenteditable HTML elements. (#14113)
segment.target: Relatar cabealhos de linhas e colunas agora suportado em elementos de contedo HTML editveis. (#14113)

segment.source: Added an option to disable the reporting of figures and captions in Document Formatting settings. (#10826, #14349)
segment.target: Adicionada uma opo de desabilitar relatar figuras e legendas nas configuraes de Formatao de Documentos. (#10826, #14349)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will announce alerts from voice typing and suggested actions including the top suggestion when copying data such as phone numbers to the clipboard (Windows 11 2022 Update and later). (#16009, @josephsl)
segment.target: No Windows 11, o NVDA anunciar alertas de digitao por voz e aes sugeridas, incluindo a sugesto principal ao copiar dados como nmeros de telefone para a rea de transferncia (Windows 11 Atualizao de 2022 e posteriores). (#16009, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will keep the audio device awake after speech stops, in order to prevent the start of the next speech being clipped with some audio devices such as Bluetooth headphones. (#14386, @jcsteh, @mltony)
segment.target: O NVDA manter o dispositivo de udio despertado aps a fala parar, para evitar que o incio da prxima fala seja cortado com alguns dispositivos de udio, como fones de ouvido Bluetooth. (#14386, @jcsteh, @mltony)

segment.source: HP Secure Browser is now supported. (#16377)
segment.target: O HP Secure Browser agora compatvel. (#16377)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Loja de Complementos:

segment.source: The minimum and the last tested NVDA version for an add-on are now displayed in the "other details" area. (#15776, @Nael-Sayegh)
segment.target: A verso mnima e a ltima verso testada do NVDA para um complemento so agora exibidas na rea "outros detalhes". (#15776, @Nael-Sayegh)

segment.source: The community reviews action will be available in all tabs of the store. (#16179, @nvdaes)
segment.target: A ao de resenhas da comunidade estar disponvel em todas as abas da loja. (#16179, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Atualizaes de componentes:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis Braille translator to [3.29.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.29.0). (#16259, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Transcritor Braille LibLouis atualizado para [3.29.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.29.0). (#16259, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: New detailed (with capital letters indicated) Belarusian and Ukrainian Braille tables.
segment.target: Novas tabelas Braille detalhadas (com letras maisculas indicadas) de bielorrusso e ucraniano.

segment.source: New Spanish table for reading Greek texts.
segment.target: Nova tabela espanhola para leitura de textos gregos.

segment.source: New table for Lao Grade 1. (#16470)
segment.target: Nova tabela para o Laos Grau 1. (#16470)

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `cb62d93fd7`. (#15913)
segment.target: eSpeak NG foi atualizado para 1.52-dev commit `cb62d93fd7`. (#15913)

segment.source: Added new language Tigrinya.
segment.target: Adicionado novo idioma Tigrnia.

segment.source: Changed several gestures for BrailleSense devices to avoid conflicts with characters of the French braille table. (#15306)
segment.target: Alterados vrios comandos gestos para dispositivos BrailleSense para evitar conflitos com caracteres da tabela braille francesa. (#15306)

segment.source: `alt+leftArrow` is now mapped to `dot2+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+setaParaEsquerda` agora est mapeado para `ponto2+ponto7+espao`

segment.source: `alt+rightArrow` is now mapped to `dot5+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+setaParaDireita` agora est mapeado para `ponto5+ponto7+espao`

segment.source: `alt+upArrow` is now mapped to `dot2+dot3+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+setaParaCima` agora est mapeado para `ponto2+ponto3+ponto7+espao`

segment.source: `alt+downArrow` is now mapped to `dot5+dot6+dot7+space`
segment.target: `alt+setaParaBaixo` agora est mapeado para `ponto5+ponto6+ponto7+espao`

segment.source: Padding dots commonly used in tables of contents are not reported anymore at low punctuation levels. (#15845, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Os pontos de preenchimento comumente usados em sumrios ndices no so mais relatados em graus de pontuao baixos. (#15845, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixed math attributes being read in Adobe Reader, this resulted in poor or wrong speech and braille. (#17980)
segment.target: Corrigido atributos matemticos sendo lidos no Adobe Reader, isso resultava em fala e braille ruins ou incorretos. (#17980)

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Correes do Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce hardware keyboard input suggestions. (#16283, @josephsl)
segment.target: NVDA mais uma vez anunciar sugestes de entrada de teclado de hardware. (#16283, @josephsl)

segment.source: In Version 24H2 (2024 Update and Windows Server 2025), mouse and touch interaction can be used in quick settings. (#16348, @josephsl)
segment.target: Na verso 24H2 (Atualizao de 2024 e Windows Server 2025), a interao por mouse e toque pode ser usada em configuraes rpidas. (#16348, @josephsl)

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Loja de Complementos:

segment.source: When pressing `ctrl+tab`, focus properly moves to the new current tab title. (#14986, @ABuffEr)
segment.target: Ao pressionar `ctrl+tab`, o foco se move corretamente para o novo ttulo da aba atual. (#14986, @ABuffEr)

segment.source: If cache files are not correct, NVDA no longer will restart. (#16362, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Se os arquivos de cache no estiverem corretos, o NVDA no ser mais reiniciado. (#16362, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Fixes for Chromium-based browsers when used with UIA:
segment.target: Correes para navegadores baseados em Chromium quando usados com UIA:

segment.source: Fixed bugs causing NVDA to hang. (#16393, #16394)
segment.target: Corrigidas falhas que faziam com que o NVDA travasse. (#16393, #16394)

segment.source: Backspace key is now working correctly in Gmail sign-in fields. (#16395)
segment.target: A tecla Backspace agora funciona corretamente nos campos de login do Gmail. (#16395)

segment.source: Backspace now works correctly when using Nudi 6.1 with NVDA's "Handle keys from other applications" setting enabled. (#15822, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Backspace agora funciona corretamente ao usar o Nudi 6.1 com a configurao "Processar teclas de outros aplicativos" do NVDA habilitada. (#15822, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where audio coordinates would be played while the application is in sleep mode when "Play audio coordinates when mouse moves" is enabled. (#8059, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Corrigida uma falha onde as coordenadas de udio eram reproduzidas enquanto o aplicativo estivesse no modo dormir quando "Tocar sons de coordenada quando o mouse movido" estava habilitada. (#8059, @hwf1324)

segment.source: In Adobe Reader, NVDA no longer ignores alternative text set on formulas in PDFs. (#12715)
segment.target: No Adobe Reader, o NVDA no ignora mais textos alternativos definidos em frmulas em PDFs. (#12715)

segment.source: Fixed a bug causing NVDA to fail to read the ribbon and options within Geekbench. (#16251, @mzanm)
segment.target: Corrigido uma falha que fazia com que o NVDA no conseguisse ler a faixa de opes e as opes do Geekbench. (#16251, @mzanm)

segment.source: Fixed a rare case when saving the configuration may fail to save all profiles. (#16343, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Corrigido um caso raro em que salvar a configurao poderia falhar ao salvar todos os perfis. (#16343, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In Firefox and Chromium-based browsers, NVDA will correctly enter focus mode when pressing enter when positioned within a presentational list (ul / ol) inside editable content. (#16325)
segment.target: Nos navegadores baseados em Firefox e Chromium, o NVDA entrar corretamente no modo de foco ao pressionar enter quando posicionado dentro de uma lista de apresentao (ul / ol) dentro de contedo editvel. (#16325)

segment.source: Column state change is now correctly reported when selecting columns to display in Thunderbird message list. (#16323)
segment.target: A alterao do estado da coluna agora relatada corretamente ao selecionar colunas a serem exibidas na lista de mensagens do Thunderbird. (#16323)

segment.source: The command line switch `-h`/`--help` works properly again. (#16522, @XLTechie)
segment.target: A opo de linha de comando `-h`/`--help` funciona corretamente novamente. (#16522, @XLTechie)

segment.source: NVDA's support for the Poedit translation software version 3.4 or higher correctly functions when translating languages with 1 or more than 2 plural forms (e.g. Chinese, Polish). (#16318)
segment.target: O suporte do NVDA para o software de traduo Poedit verso 3.4 ou superior funciona corretamente ao traduzir idiomas com 1 ou mais de 2 formas plurais (por exemplo, chins, polons). (#16318)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Consulte [o guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter informaes sobre o processo de descontinuao e remoo de API do NVDA.

segment.source: Instantiating `winVersion.WinVersion` objects with unknown Windows versions above 10.0.22000 such as 10.0.25398 returns "Windows 11 unknown" instead of "Windows 10 unknown" for release name. (#15992, @josephsl)
segment.target: Instanciar objetos `winVersion.WinVersion` com verses desconhecidas do Windows acima de 10.0.22000, como 10.0.25398, retorna "Windows 11 desconhecido" em vez de "Windows 10 desconhecido" para o nome da verso. (#15992, @josephsl)

segment.source: Make the AppVeyor build process easier for NVDA forks, by adding configurable variables in appveyor.yml to disable or modify NV Access specific portions of the build scripts. (#16216, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Torna o processo de compilao de AppVeyor mais fcil para bifurcaes forks do NVDA, adicionando variveis configurveis em appveyor.yml para desabilitar ou modificar partes especficas da NV Access dos scripts de compilao build scripts. (#16216, @XLTechie)

segment.source: Added a how-to document, explaining the process of building NVDA forks on AppVeyor. (#16293, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Adicionado um documento de instrues how-to , explicando o processo de compilao de bifurcaes forks do NVDA em AppVeyor. (#16293, @XLTechie)

segment.source: A new "on-demand" speech mode has been added.
segment.target: Um novo modo de fala "sob demanda" foi adicionado.

segment.source: When speech is on-demand, NVDA does not speak automatically (e.g. when moving the cursor) but still speaks when calling commands whose goal is explicitly to report something (e.g. report window title).
segment.target: Quando a fala est sob demanda, o NVDA no fala automaticamente (por exemplo, ao mover o cursor), mas ainda fala ao chamar comandos cujo objetivo explicitamente relatar algo (por exemplo, informar o ttulo da janela).

segment.source: In the Speech category of NVDA's settings, it is now possible to exclude unwanted speech modes from the Cycle speech modes command (`NVDA+s`).
segment.target: Na categoria Fala das configuraes do NVDA, agora possvel excluir modos de fala indesejados do comando de Alternar modos de fala (`NVDA+s`).

segment.source: A new Native Selection mode (toggled by `NVDA+shift+f10`) is now available in NVDA's browse mode for Mozilla Firefox.
segment.target: Um novo modo de Seleo Nativa (alternado por `NVDA+shift+f10`) est agora disponvel no modo de navegao do NVDA para Mozilla Firefox.

segment.source: When turned on, selecting text in browse mode will also manipulate Firefox's own native selection.
segment.target: Quando ativado, a seleo de texto no modo de navegao tambm manipular a seleo nativa do Firefox.

segment.source: Copying text with `control+c` will pass straight through to Firefox, thus copying the rich content, rather than NVDA's plain text representation.
segment.target: A cpia do texto com `control+c` passar diretamente para o Firefox, copiando assim o contedo rico formatado , em vez da representao de texto sem formatao do NVDA.

segment.source: The Add-on Store now supports bulk actions (e.g. installing, enabling add-ons) by selecting multiple add-ons
segment.target: A Loja de Complementos agora oferece suporte a aes em massa (por exemplo, instalar, habilitar complementos) selecionando vrios complementos.

segment.source: There is a new action to open a reviews webpage for the selected add-on.
segment.target: H uma nova ao para abrir uma pgina web de resenhas para o complemento selecionado.

segment.source: The audio output device and ducking mode options have been removed from the "Select Synthesizer" dialog.
segment.target: As opes do dispositivo de sada de udio e do modo prioritrio de reduo foram removidas do dilogo "Selecionar Sintetizador".

segment.source: They can be found in the audio settings panel which can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`.
segment.target: Elas podem ser encontradas no painel de configuraes de udio, que pode ser aberto com `NVDA+control+u`.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: eSpeak-NG, transcritor braille LibLouis e Unicode CLDR foram atualizados.

segment.source: New Thai, Filipino and Romanian braille tables are available.
segment.target: Novas tabelas braille tailandesas, filipinas e romenas esto disponveis.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, particularly for the Add-on Store, braille, Libre Office, Microsoft Office and audio.
segment.target: Existem muitas correes de falhas, particularmente para a Loja de Complementos, braille, Libre Office, Microsoft Office e udio.

segment.source: Important notes
segment.target: Notas importantes

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Esta verso quebra a compatibilidade com complementos existentes.

segment.source: Windows 7, and Windows 8 are no longer supported.
segment.target: O Windows 7 e o Windows 8 no so mais suportados.

segment.source: Windows 8.1 is the minimum Windows version supported.
segment.target: Windows 8.1 a verso mnima do Windows suportada.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Loja de Complementos:

segment.source: The Add-on Store now supports bulk actions (e.g. installing, enabling add-ons) by selecting multiple add-ons. (#15350, #15623, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: A Loja de Complementos agora oferece suporte a aes em massa (por exemplo, instalar, habilitar complementos) selecionando vrios complementos. (#15350, #15623, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: A new action has been added to open a dedicated webpage to see or provide feedback about the selected add-on. (#15576, @nvdaes)
segment.target: Uma nova ao foi adicionada para abrir uma pgina web dedicada para ver ou fornecer comentrios sobre o complemento selecionado. (#15576, @nvdaes)

segment.source: Added support for Bluetooth Low Energy HID Braille displays. (#15470)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para linhas Braille HID Bluetooth de Baixa Energia Bluetooth Low Energy. (#15470)

segment.source: A new Native Selection mode (toggled by `NVDA+shift+f10`) is now available in NVDA's browse mode for Mozilla Firefox.
segment.target: Um novo modo de Seleo Nativa (alternado por `NVDA+shift+f10`) est agora disponvel no modo de navegao do NVDA para Mozilla Firefox.

segment.source: When turned on, selecting text in browse mode will also manipulate Firefox's own native selection.
segment.target: Quando ativado, a seleo de texto no modo de navegao tambm manipular a seleo nativa do Firefox.

segment.source: Copying text with `control+c` will pass straight through to Firefox, thus copying the rich content, rather than NVDA's plain text representation.
segment.target: A cpia do texto com `control+c` passar diretamente para o Firefox, copiando assim o contedo rico formatado , em vez da representao de texto sem formatao do NVDA.

segment.source: Note however that as Firefox is handling the actual copy, NVDA will not report a "copy to clipboard" message in this mode. (#15830)
segment.target: Observe, no entanto, que como o Firefox est manipulando a cpia real, o NVDA no relatar uma mensagem "cpia para a rea de transferncia" neste modo. (#15830)

segment.source: When copying text in Microsoft Word with NVDA's browse mode enabled, formatting is now also included.
segment.target: Ao copiar texto no Microsoft Word com o modo de navegao do NVDA habilitado, a formatao agora tambm includa.

segment.source: A side affect of this is that NVDA will no longer report a "copy to clipboard" message when pressing `control+c` in Microsoft Word / Outlook browse mode, as the application is now handling the copy, not NVDA. (#16129)
segment.target: Um efeito colateral disso que o NVDA no relatar mais uma mensagem "cpia para a rea de transferncia" ao pressionar `control+c` no modo de navegao do Microsoft Word / Outlook, pois o aplicativo agora est manipulando a cpia, e no o NVDA. (#16129)

segment.source: A new "on-demand" speech mode has been added.
segment.target: Um novo modo de fala "sob demanda" foi adicionado.

segment.source: When speech is on-demand, NVDA does not speak automatically (e.g. when moving the cursor) but still speaks when calling commands whose goal is explicitly to report something (e.g. report window title). (#481, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Quando a fala est sob demanda, o NVDA no fala automaticamente (por exemplo, ao mover o cursor), mas ainda fala ao chamar comandos cujo objetivo explicitamente informar algo (por exemplo, relatar o ttulo da janela). (#481, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: In the Speech category of NVDA's settings, it is now possible to exclude unwanted speech modes from the Cycle speech modes command (`NVDA+s`). (#15806, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Na categoria Fala das configuraes do NVDA, agora possvel excluir modos de fala indesejados do comando Alternar modos de fala (`NVDA+s`). (#15806, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: If you are currently using the NoBeepsSpeechMode add-on consider uninstalling it, and disabling "beeps" and "on-demand" modes in the settings.
segment.target: Se voc estiver usando o complemento Modo de Fala Sem Bipe NoBeepsSpeechMode , considere desinstal-lo e desativar os modos "bipes" e "sob demanda" nas configuraes.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: NVDA no longer supports Windows 7 and Windows 8.
segment.target: O NVDA no suporta mais o Windows 7 e o Windows 8.

segment.source: Windows 8.1 is the minimum Windows version supported. (#15544)
segment.target: Windows 8.1 a verso mnima do Windows suportada. (#15544)

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Atualizaes de componentes:

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.28.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.28.0). (#15435, #15876, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Transcritor braille LibLouis atualizado para [3.28.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.28.0). (#15435, #15876, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Added new Thai, Romanian, and Filipino Braille tables.
segment.target: Adicionadas novas Tabelas Braille tailandesas, romenas e filipinas.

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `530bf0abf`. (#15036)
segment.target: eSpeak NG foi atualizado para 1.52-dev commit `530bf0abf`. (#15036)

segment.source: CLDR emoji and symbol annotations has been updated to version 44.0. (#15712, @OzancanKaratas)
segment.target: Anotaes do CLDR de emojis e smbolos foram atualizadas para a verso 44.0. (#15712, @OzancanKaratas)

segment.source: Updated Java Access Bridge to 17.0.9+8Zulu (17.46.19). (#15744)
segment.target: Java Access Bridge atualizado para 17.0.9+8Zulu (17.46.19). (#15744)

segment.source: Key Commands:
segment.target: Teclas de comando:

segment.source: The following commands now support two and three presses to spell the reported information and spell with character descriptions: report selection, report clipboard text and report focused object. (#15449, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Os comandos a seguir agora suportam dois e trs pressionamentos para soletrar as informaes relatadas e soletrar as descries de caracteres: relatar seleo, relatar texto da rea de transferncia e relatar objeto focalizado. (#15449, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: The command to toggle the screen curtain now has a default gesture: `NVDA+control+escape`. (#10560, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: O comando para alternar a cortina de tela agora tem um gesto padro: `NVDA+control+escape`. (#10560, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When pressed four times, the report selection command now shows the selection in a browsable message. (#15858, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Quando pressionado quatro vezes, o comando relatar seleo agora mostra a seleo numa mensagem navegvel. (#15858, @Emil-18)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When requesting formatting information on Excel cells, borders and background will only be reported if there is such formatting. (#15560, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Ao solicitar informaes de formatao em clulas do Excel, as bordas e plano de fundo s sero informados se houver tal formatao. (#15560, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: NVDA will again no longer report unlabelled groupings such as in recent versions of Microsoft Office 365 menus. (#15638)
segment.target: O NVDA no relatar mais agrupamentos no rotulados, como nas verses recentes dos menus do Microsoft Office 365. (#15638)

segment.source: The audio output device and ducking mode options have been removed from the "Select Synthesizer" dialog.
segment.target: As opes de dispositivo de sada de udio e do modo prioritrio de reduo foram removidas do dilogo "Selecionar Sintetizador".

segment.source: They can be found in the audio settings panel which can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`. (#15512, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Elas podem ser encontradas no painel de configuraes de udio, que pode ser aberto com `NVDA+control+u`. (#15512, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: The option "Report role when mouse enters object" in NVDA's mouse settings category has been renamed to "Report object when mouse enters it".
segment.target: A opo "Anunciar funo quando o mouse entra no objeto" na categoria de configuraes de mouse do NVDA foi renomeada para "Anunciar objeto quando o mouse entra nele".

segment.source: This option now announces additional relevant information about an object when the mouse enters it, such as states (checked/pressed) or cell coordinates in a table. (#15420, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Esta opo agora anuncia informaes adicionais relevantes sobre um objeto quando o mouse entra nele, como estados (marcado/pressionado) ou coordenadas de clulas numa tabela. (#15420, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: New items have been added to the Help menu for the NV Access "Get Help" page and Shop. (#14631)
segment.target: Novos itens foram adicionados ao menu Ajuda da pgina "Obter Ajuda" da NV Access e da Loja. (#14631)

segment.source: NVDA's support for [Poedit](https://poedit.net) is overhauled for Poedit version 3 and above.
segment.target: O suporte do NVDA para o [Poedit](https://poedit.net) foi reformulado para o Poedit verso 3 e superior.

segment.source: Users of Poedit 1 are encouraged to update to Poedit 3 if they want to rely on enhanced accessibility in Poedit, such as shortcuts to read translator notes and comments. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Os usurios do Poedit 1 so incentivados a atualizar para o Poedit 3 se quiserem contar com a acessibilidade aprimorada do Poedit, como atalhos para ler notas e comentrios de tradutor. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Braille viewer and speech viewer are now disabled in secure mode. (#15680)
segment.target: O visualizador de braille e o visualizador de fala agora esto desabilitados no modo seguro. (#15680)

segment.source: During object navigation, disabled (unavailable) objects will not be ignored anymore. (#15477, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Durante a navegao de objetos, os objetos desabilitados (indisponveis) no sero mais ignorados. (#15477, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Added table of contents to key commands document. (#16106)
segment.target: Adicionado sumrio ao documento de comandos principais. (#16106)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Loja de Complementos:

segment.source: When the status of an add-on is changed while it has focus, e.g. a change from "downloading" to "downloaded", the updated item is now announced correctly. (#15859, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Quando o status de um complemento alterado enquanto ele tem foco, por exemplo, uma mudana de "baixando" para "baixado", o item atualizado agora anunciado corretamente. (#15859, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: When installing add-ons install prompts are no longer overlapped by the restart dialog. (#15613, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Ao instalar complementos, os prompts de instalao no so mais sobrepostos pela caixa de dilogo de reinicializao. (#15613, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: When reinstalling an incompatible add-on it is no longer forcefully disabled. (#15584, @lukaszgo1)
