segment.target: Ao reinstalar um complemento incompatvel, ele no mais desabilitado fora. (#15584, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: Disabled and incompatible add-ons can now be updated. (#15568, #15029)
segment.target: Complementos desabilitados e incompatveis agora podem ser atualizados. (#15568, #15029)

segment.source: NVDA now recovers and displays an error in a case where an add-on fails to download correctly. (#15796)
segment.target: O NVDA agora recupera e exibe um erro caso um complemento no seja baixado corretamente. (#15796)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to restart intermittently after opening and closing Add-on Store. (#16019, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: O NVDA no falha mais ao reiniciar intermitentemente aps abrir e fechar a Loja de Complementos. (#16019, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: Audio:
segment.target: udio:

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes briefly when multiple sounds are played in rapid succession. (#15311, #15757, @jcsteh)
segment.target: O NVDA no congela mais brevemente quando vrios sons so reproduzidos em rpida sucesso. (#15311, #15757, @jcsteh)

segment.source: If the audio output device is set to something other than the default and that device becomes available again after being unavailable, NVDA will now switch back to the configured device instead of continuing to use the default device. (#15759, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Se o dispositivo de sada de udio estiver configurado para algo diferente do padro e esse dispositivo ficar disponvel novamente aps ficar indisponvel, o NVDA ir agora voltar para o dispositivo configurado em vez de continuar a usar o dispositivo padro. (#15759, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA now resumes audio if the configuration of the output device changes or another application releases exclusive control of the device. (#15758, #15775, @jcsteh)
segment.target: O NVDA agora retoma o udio se a configurao do dispositivo de sada for alterada ou se outro aplicativo liberar o controle exclusivo do dispositivo. (#15758, #15775, @jcsteh)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braile:

segment.source: Multi line braille displays will no longer crash the BRLTTY driver and are treated as one continuous display. (#15386)
segment.target: As linhas braille multilinhas no travaro mais o driver BRLTTY e sero tratadas como uma linha contnua. (#15386)

segment.source: More objects which contain useful text are detected, and text content is displayed in braille. (#15605)
segment.target: Mais objetos que contm texto til so detectados e o contedo do texto exibido em braille. (#15605)

segment.source: Contracted braille input works properly again. (#15773, @aaclause)
segment.target: A entrada digitao em braille abreviado funciona corretamente novamente. (#15773, @aaclause)

segment.source: Braille is now updated when moving the navigator object between table cells in more situations (#15755, @Emil-18)
segment.target: Braille agora atualizado ao mover o objeto de navegao entre clulas de tabela em mais situaes (#15755, @Emil-18)

segment.source: The result of reporting current focus, current navigator object, and current selection commands is now shown in braille. (#15844, @Emil-18)
segment.target: O resultado de relatar foco atual, objeto de navegao atual, e comandos de seleo atuais agora mostrado em braille. (#15844, @Emil-18)

segment.source: The Albatross braille driver no longer handles a Esp32 microcontroller as an Albatross display. (#15671)
segment.target: O driver braille Albatross no trata mais um microcontrolador Esp32 como uma linha Albatross. (#15671)

segment.source: LibreOffice:
segment.target: LibreOffice:

segment.source: Words deleted using the `control+backspace` keyboard shortcut are now also properly announced when the deleted word is followed by whitespace (like spaces and tabs). (#15436, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Palavras excludas usando o atalho de teclado `control+backspace` agora tambm so anunciadas corretamente quando a palavra excluda seguida por espaos em branco (como espaos e tabs). (#15436, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Announcement of the status bar using the `NVDA+end` keyboard shortcut now also works for dialogs in LibreOffice version 24.2 and newer. (#15591, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: O anncio da barra de status usando o atalho de teclado `NVDA+end` agora tambm funciona para caixas de dilogo no LibreOffice verso 24.2 e mais recente. (#15591, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: All expected text attributes are now supported in LibreOffice versions 24.2 and above.
segment.target: Todos os atributos de texto esperados agora so suportados nas verses 24.2 e superiores do LibreOffice.

segment.source: This makes the announcement of spelling errors work when announcing a line in Writer. (#15648, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: Isso faz com que o anncio de erros ortogrficos funcione ao anunciar uma linha no Writer. (#15648, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Announcement of heading levels now also works for LibreOffice versions 24.2 and newer. (#15881, @michaelweghorn)
segment.target: O anncio dos nveis de ttulo agora tambm funciona para as verses 24.2 e mais recentes do LibreOffice. (#15881, @michaelweghorn)

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: In Excel with UIA disabled, braille is updated, and the active cell content is spoken, when `control+y`, `control+z` or `alt+backspace` is pressed. (#15547)
segment.target: No Excel com UIA desativado, o braille atualizado e o contedo da clula ativa falado quando `control+y`, `control+z` ou `alt+backspace` pressionado. (#15547)

segment.source: In Word with UIA disabled braille is updated when `control+v`, `control+x`, `control+y`, `control+z`, `alt+backspace`, `backspace` or `control+backspace` is pressed.
segment.target: No Word com UIA desativado, o braille atualizado quando `control+v`, `control+x`, `control+y`, `control+z`, `alt+backspace`, `backspace` ou `control+backspace` pressionado.

segment.source: It is also updated with UIA enabled, when typing text and braille is tethered to review and review follows caret. (#3276)
segment.target: Ele tambm atualizado com o UIA habilitado, ao digitar texto e o braille est vinculado explorao e a explorao segue o cursor do sistema. (#3276)

segment.source: In Word, the landing cell will now be correctly reported when using the native Word commands for table navigation `alt+home`, `alt+end`, `alt+pageUp` and `alt+pageDown`. (#15805, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: No Word, a clula inicial agora ser informada corretamente ao usar os comandos nativos do Word para navegao em tabela `alt+home`, `alt+end`, `alt+pageUp` e `alt+pageDown`. (#15805, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Reporting of object shortcut keys has been improved. (#10807, #15816, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Informao de teclas de atalho de objetos foi aprimorada. (#10807, #15816, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: The SAPI4 synthesizer now properly supports volume, rate and pitch changes embedded in speech. (#15271, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O sintetizador SAPI4 agora suporta adequadamente alteraes de volume, velocidade e tom incorporadas na fala. (#15271, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Multi line state is now correctly reported in applications using Java Access Bridge. (#14609)
segment.target: O estado multilinha agora relatado corretamente em aplicativos que usam Java Access Bridge. (#14609)

segment.source: NVDA will announce dialog content for more Windows 10 and 11 dialogs. (#15729, @josephsl)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar o contedo de dilogo para mais caixas de dilogo do Windows 10 e 11. (#15729, @josephsl)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to read a newly loaded page in Microsoft Edge when using UI Automation. (#15736)
segment.target: O NVDA no falhar mais ao ler uma pgina recm-carregada no Microsoft Edge ao usar UI Automation. (#15736)

segment.source: When using say all or commands which spell text, pauses between sentences or characters no longer gradually decrease over time. (#15739, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Ao usar comandos de leitura contnua ou que soletram texto, as pausas entre frases ou caracteres no diminuem mais gradualmente com o tempo. (#15739, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes when speaking a large amount of text. (#15752, @jcsteh)
segment.target: O NVDA s vezes no congela mais ao falar uma grande quantidade de texto. (#15752, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Edge using UI Automation, NVDA is able to activate more controls in browse mode. (#14612)
segment.target: Ao acessar o Microsoft Edge usando UI Automation, o NVDA capaz de ativar mais controles no modo de navegao. (#14612)

segment.source: NVDA will not fail to start anymore when the configuration file is corrupted, but it will restore the configuration to default as it did in the past. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: O NVDA no ir mais falhar ao iniciar quando o arquivo de configurao estiver corrompido, mas ir restaurar a configurao padro como fazia no passado. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Fixed support for System List view (`SysListView32`) controls in Windows Forms applications. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Suporte corrigido para controles de exibio de lista do sistema (`SysListView32`) em aplicativos Windows Forms. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: It is not possible anymore to overwrite NVDA's Python console history. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: No mais possvel sobrescrever o histrico do console Python do NVDA. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: NVDA should remain responsive when being flooded with many UI Automation events, e.g. when large chunks of text are printed to a terminal or when listening to voice messages in WhatsApp messenger. (#14888, #15169)
segment.target: O NVDA deve permanecer responsivo quando for inundado com muitos eventos de UI Automation, por exemplo, quando grandes pedaos de texto so impressos em um terminal ou ao ouvir mensagens de voz no WhatsApp Messenger. (#14888, #15169)

segment.source: This new behavior can be disabled using the new "Use enhanced event processing" setting in NVDA's advanced settings.
segment.target: Este novo comportamento pode ser desabilitado usando a nova configurao "Usar processamento melhorado de eventos" nas configuraes avanadas do NVDA.

segment.source: NVDA is again able to track the focus in applications running within Windows Defender Application Guard (WDAG). (#15164)
segment.target: O NVDA novamente capaz de rastrear o foco em aplicativos executados no Windows Defender Application Guard (WDAG). (#15164)

segment.source: The speech text is no longer updated when the mouse moves in the Speech Viewer. (#15952, @hwf1324)
segment.target: O texto da fala no mais atualizado quando o mouse se move no Visualizador de Fala. (#15952, @hwf1324)

segment.source: NVDA will again switch back to browse mode when closing combo boxes with `escape` or `alt+upArrow` in Firefox or Chrome. (#15653)
segment.target: O NVDA voltar novamente ao modo de navegao ao fechar caixas de combinao com `escape` ou `alt+seta para cima` no Firefox ou Chrome. (#15653)

segment.source: Arrowing up and down in combo boxes in iTunes will no longer inappropriately switch back to browse mode. (#15653)
segment.target: Mover as setas para cima e para baixo nas caixas de combinao do iTunes no retornar mais de forma inadequada ao modo de navegao. (#15653)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Consulte [o guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter informaes sobre o processo de descontinuao e remoo de API do NVDA.

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Nota: esta uma verso de quebra de compatibilidade de API Add-on Interface de Programao de Aplicativos para complementos.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Os complementos precisaro ser testados novamente e ter seu manifest manifesto atualizado.

segment.source: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2022.
segment.target: A compilao do NVDA agora requer o Visual Studio 2022.

segment.source: Please refer to the [NVDA docs](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) for the specific list of Visual Studio components. (#14313)
segment.target: Consulte a [Documentao do NVDA](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) para obter a lista especfica de componentes do Visual Studio. (#14313)

segment.source: Added the following extension points:
segment.target: Adicionados os seguintes pontos de extenso:

segment.source: `treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange`. (#14969, @nvdaes)
segment.target: `treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange`. (#14969, @nvdaes)

segment.source: `speech.speechCanceled`. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `speech.speechCanceled`. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `_onErrorSoundRequested` (should be retrieved calling `logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()`) (#15691, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: `_onErrorSoundRequested` (deve ser recuperado chamando `logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()`) (#15691, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: It is now possible to use plural forms in an add-on's translations. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)
segment.target: Agora possvel usar formas plurais nas tradues de um complemento. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)

segment.source: Included python3.dll in the binary distribution for use by add-ons with external libraries utilizing the [stable ABI](https://docs.python.org/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)
segment.target: Incluso python3.dll na distribuio binria para uso por complementos com bibliotecas externas utilizando a [ABI Interface Binria de Aplicativo estvel](https://docs.python.org/pt-br/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)

segment.source: The `BrailleDisplayDriver` base class now has `numRows` and `numCols` properties to provide information about multi line braille displays.
segment.target: A classe base `BrailleDisplayDriver` agora possui propriedades `numRows` e `numCols` para fornecer informaes sobre linhas braille multilinhas.

segment.source: Setting `numCells` is still supported for single line braille displays and `numCells` will return the total number of cells for multi line braille displays. (#15386)
segment.target: A configurao `numCells` ainda suportada para linhas braille de linha nica e `numCells` retornar o nmero total de celas para linhas braille multilinhas. (#15386)

segment.source: Updated BrlAPI for BRLTTY to version 0.8.5, and its corresponding python module to a Python 3.11 compatible build. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: BrlAPI para BRLTTY atualizado para a verso 0.8.5 e seu mdulo python correspondente para uma compilao compatvel com Python 3.11. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the `speech.speakSsml` function, which allows you to write NVDA speech sequences using [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Adicionada a funo `speech.speakSsml` que permite escrever sequncias de fala do NVDA usando [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The following tags are currently supported and translated to appropriate NVDA speech commands:
segment.target: Os identificadores tags a seguir so atualmente suportados e traduzidos para comandos de voz apropriados do NVDA:

segment.source: `Prosody` (`pitch`, `rate` and `volume`). Only multiplication (e.g. `200%` are supported.
segment.target: `Prosody` (`pitch`, `rate` e `volume`). Somente multiplicao (por exemplo, `200%`) suportado.

segment.source: `say-as` with the `interpret` attribute set to `characters`
segment.target: `say-as` com o atributo `interpret` definido como `characters`

segment.source: `voice` with the `xml:lang` set to an XML language
segment.target: `voice` com o `xml:lang` definido para uma linguagem XML

segment.source: `break` with the `time` attribute set to a value in milliseconds, e.g. `200ms`
segment.target: `break` com o atributo `time` definido para um valor em milissegundos, por exemplo `200ms`

segment.source: `mark` with the `name` attribute set to a mark name, e.g. `mark1`, requires providing a callback
segment.target: `mark` com o atributo `name` definido como um nome de marca, por exemplo, `mark1`, requer o fornecimento de um retorno de chamada

segment.source: Example: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">hello</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">John</prosody></speak>')`
segment.target: Exemplo: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">ol</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">Joo</prosody></speak>')`

segment.source: The SSML parsing capabilities are backed by the `SsmlParser` class in the `speechXml` module.
segment.target: Os recursos de anlise SSML so apoiados pela classe `SsmlParser` no mdulo `speechXml`.

segment.source: Changes to the NVDA Controller Client library:
segment.target: Mudanas na biblioteca do NVDA Controller Client Cliente Controlador do NVDA:

segment.source: The file names of the library no longer contain a suffix denoting the architecture, i.e. `nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll` are now called `nvdaControllerClient.dll`. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Os nomes dos arquivos da biblioteca no contm mais um sufixo que denota a arquitetura, ou seja, `nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll` agora so chamados de `nvdaControllerClient.dll`. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from Rust. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Adicionado um exemplo para demonstrar o uso de nvdaControllerClient.dll de Rust. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the following functions to the controller client: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Adicionadas as seguintes funes ao cliente controlador: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `nvdaController_getProcessId`: To get the process id (PID) of the current instance of NVDA the controller client is using.
segment.target: `nvdaController_getProcessId`: Para obter o ID identificador do processo (PID) da instncia atual do NVDA que o cliente controlador est usando.

segment.source: `nvdaController_speakSsml`: To instruct NVDA to speak according to the given SSML. This function also supports:
segment.target: `nvdaController_speakSsml`: Para instruir o NVDA a falar de acordo com o SSML fornecido. Esta funo tambm suporta:

segment.source: Providing the symbol level.
segment.target: Fornecer o nvel do smbolo.

segment.source: Providing the priority of speech to be spoken.
segment.target: Fornecer a prioridade da fala a ser falada.

segment.source: Speaking both synchronously (blocking) and asynchronously (instant return).
segment.target: Falar de forma sncrona (bloqueio) e assncrona (retorno instantneo).

segment.source: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: To register a callback of type `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` that is called in synchronous mode for every `<mark />` tag encountered in the SSML sequence provided to `nvdaController_speakSsml`.
segment.target: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: para registrar um retorno de chamada do tipo `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` que chamado no modo sncrono para cada tag `<mark />` encontrada na sequncia SSML fornecida para `nvdaController_speakSsml`.

segment.source: Note: the new functions in the controller client only support NVDA 2024.1 and above.
segment.target: Nota: as novas funes no cliente controlador suportam apenas o NVDA 2024.1 e superior.

segment.source: Updated `include` dependencies:
segment.target: Dependncias `include` atualizadas:
detours para `4b8c659f549b0ab21cf649377c7a84eb708f5e68`. (#15695)

segment.source: w3c-aria-practices to `9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864`. (#15695)
segment.target: w3c-aria-practices para `9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864`. (#15695)

segment.source: Device info yielded by `hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices` now contain the bus reported description of the USB device (key `busReportedDeviceDescription`). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: As informaes do dispositivo fornecidas por `hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices` agora contm a descrio relatada pelo barramento do dispositivo USB (chave `busReportedDeviceDescription`). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: For USB serial devices, `bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver` and `bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices` now yield device matches containing a `deviceInfo` dictionary enriched with data about the USB device, such as `busReportedDeviceDescription`. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Para dispositivos seriais USB, `bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver` e `bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices` agora produz correspondncias de dispositivos contendo um dicionrio `deviceInfo` enriquecido com dados sobre o dispositivo USB, como `busReportedDeviceDescription`. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: When the configuration file `nvda.ini` is corrupted, a backup copy is saved before it is reinitialized. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Quando o arquivo de configurao `nvda.ini` est corrompido, uma cpia de backup salva antes de ser reinicializado. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When defining a script with the script decorator, the `speakOnDemand` boolean argument can be specified to control if a script should speak while in "on-demand" speech mode. (#481, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Ao definir um script com o decorador de script, o argumento booleano `speakOnDemand` pode ser especificado para controlar se um script deve falar enquanto estiver no modo de fala "sob demanda". (#481, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Scripts that provide information (e.g. say window title, report time/date) should speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Scripts que fornecem informaes (por exemplo, dizer ttulo da janela, relatar hora/data) devem falar no modo "sob demanda".

segment.source: Scripts that perform an action (e.g. move the cursor, change a parameter) should not speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Scripts que executam uma ao (por exemplo, mover o cursor, alterar um parmetro) no devem falar no modo "sob demanda".

segment.source: Fixed bug where deleting git-tracked files during `scons -c` resulted in missing UIA COM interfaces on rebuild. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Corrigido a falha em que a excluso de arquivos rastreados pelo git git-tracked durante `scons -c` resultava na falta de interfaces UIA COM na reconstruo. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)

segment.source: Fix a bug where some code changes were not detected when building `dist`, that prevented a new build from being triggered.
segment.target: Corrigido a falha em que algumas alteraes de cdigo no eram detectadas durante a compilao `dist`, o que impedia que uma nova compilao fosse acionada.

segment.source: Now `dist` always rebuilds. (#13372, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Agora `dist` sempre reconstri. (#13372, @hwf1324)

segment.source: A `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` with default type of standard, no longer throws a None conversion exception because no sound is assigned. (#16223, @XLTechie)
segment.target: Um `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` com tipo predefinido de padro, no lana mais uma exceo de converso None nenhum porque nenhum som atribudo. (#16223, @XLTechie)

segment.source: API Breaking Changes
segment.target: Alteraes de Quebra da API

segment.source: These are breaking API changes.
segment.target: Estas so alteraes de quebra da API.

segment.source: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.
segment.target: Por favor abra um issue debate no GitHub se o seu complemento tiver um problema com a atualizao para a nova API.

segment.source: NVDA is now built with Python 3.11. (#12064)
segment.target: O NVDA agora compilado com Python 3.11. (#12064)

segment.source: Updated pip dependencies:
segment.target: Dependncias pip atualizadas:

segment.source: configobj to 5.1.0dev commit `e2ba4457c4651fa54f8d59d8dcdd3da950e956b8`. (#15544)
segment.target: configobj para 5.1.0dev commit `e2ba4457c4651fa54f8d59d8dcdd3da950e956b8`. (#15544)

segment.source: Comtypes to 1.2.0. (#15513, @codeofdusk)
segment.target: Comtypes para 1.2.0. (#15513, @codeofdusk)

segment.source: Flake8 to 4.0.1. (#15636, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: Flake8 para 4.0.1. (#15636, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: py2exe to 0.13.0.1dev commit `4e7b2b2c60face592e67cb1bc935172a20fa371d`. (#15544)
segment.target: py2exe para 0.13.0.1dev commit `4e7b2b2c60face592e67cb1bc935172a20fa371d`. (#15544)

segment.source: robotframework to 6.1.1. (#15544)
segment.target: robotframework para 6.1.1. (#15544)

segment.source: SCons to 4.5.2. (#15529, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: SCons para 4.5.2. (#15529, @LeonarddeR)
sphinx para 7.2.6. (#15544)

segment.source: Removed pip dependencies:
segment.target: Dependncias pip removidas:

segment.source: typing_extensions, these should be supported natively in Python 3.11 (#15544)
segment.target: typing_extensions, elas devem ser suportadas nativamente no Python 3.11 (#15544)

segment.source: nose, instead unittest-xml-reporting is used to generate XML reports. (#15544)
segment.target: nose, em vez disso, o unittest-xml-reporting usado para gerar relatrios XML. (#15544)

segment.source: `IAccessibleHandler.SecureDesktopNVDAObject` has been removed.
segment.target: `IAccessibleHandler.SecureDesktopNVDAObject` foi removido.

segment.source: Instead, when NVDA is running on the user profile, track the existence of the secure desktop with the extension point: `winAPI.secureDesktop.post_secureDesktopStateChange`. (#14488)
segment.target: Em vez disso, quando o NVDA estiver sendo executado no perfil do usurio, rastreie a existncia da rea de trabalho segura com o ponto de extenso: `winAPI.secureDesktop.post_secureDesktopStateChange`. (#14488)

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` has been removed with no public replacement. (#15163, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` foi removido sem substituio pblica. (#15163, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices and bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been removed.
segment.target: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices e bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` foram removidos.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` class method instead.
segment.target: Em vez disso, os drivers de linhas Braille devem implementar o mtodo de classe `registerAutomaticDetection`.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Esse mtodo recebe um objeto `DriverRegistrar` no qual os mtodos `addUsbDevices` e `addBluetoothDevices` podem ser usados. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` now requires both the `threadSafe` and `supportsAutomaticDetection` attributes to be set to `True`. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: A implementao padro do mtodo de verificao check em `BrailleDisplayDriver` agora requer que os atributos `threadSafe` e `supportsAutomaticDetection` sejam definidos como `True`. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is no longer possible, as functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Passar funes lambda para `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` no mais possvel, pois as funes devem ser fracamente referenciadas. (#14627, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` has been removed. (#14924, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` foi removido. (#14924, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: To support capital pitch changes, synthesizers must now explicitly declare their support for the `PitchCommand` in the `supportedCommands` attribute on the driver. (#15433, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Para suportar mudanas de tonalidade em maisculas, os sintetizadores agora devem declarar explicitamente seu suporte para o `PitchCommand` no atributo `supportedCommands` do driver. (#15433, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars` has been removed. Use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead of `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath`. (#15614, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars` foi removido. Use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` em vez de `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath`. (#15614, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: `languageHandler.makeNpgettext` and `languageHandler.makePgettext` have been removed.
segment.target: `languageHandler.makeNpgettext` e `languageHandler.makePgettext` foram removidos.

segment.source: `npgettext` and `pgettext` are supported natively now. (#15546)
segment.target: `npgettext` e `pgettext` agora so suportados nativamente. (#15546)

segment.source: The app module for [Poedit](https://poedit.net) has been changed significantly. The `fetchObject` function has been removed. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: O mdulo do aplicativo para [Poedit](https://poedit.net) foi alterado significativamente. A funo `fetchObject` foi removida. (#15313, #7303, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The following redundant types and constants have been removed from `hwPortUtils`: (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Os seguintes tipos e constantes redundantes foram removidas de `hwPortUtils`: (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `PCWSTR`
segment.target: `PCWSTR`

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: Using `watchdog.getFormattedStacksForAllThreads` is deprecated - please use `logHandler.getFormattedStacksForAllThreads` instead. (#15616, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: O uso de `watchdog.getFormattedStacksForAllThreads` est obsoleto - use `logHandler.getFormattedStacksForAllThreads` em seu lugar. (#15616, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.canConfigTerminateOnDesktopSwitch` has been deprecated, as it became obsolete since Windows 7 is no longer supported. (#15644, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `easeOfAccess.canConfigTerminateOnDesktopSwitch` foi descontinuado, pois se tornou obsoleto desde que o Windows 7 no mais suportado. (#15644, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `winVersion.isFullScreenMagnificationAvailable` has been deprecated - use `visionEnhancementProviders.screenCurtain.ScreenCurtainProvider.canStart` instead. (#15664, @josephsl)
segment.target: `winVersion.isFullScreenMagnificationAvailable` foi descontinuado - use `visionEnhancementProviders.screenCurtain.ScreenCurtainProvider.canStart` em seu lugar. (#15664, @josephsl)

segment.source: The following Windows release constants has been deprecated from winVersion module (#15647, @josephsl):
segment.target: As seguintes constantes de verso do Windows foram descontinuadas do mdulo winVersion (#15647, @josephsl):

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN7`
segment.target: `winVersion.WIN7`

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN7_SP1`
segment.target: `winVersion.WIN7_SP1`

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN8`
segment.target: `winVersion.WIN8`

segment.source: The `bdDetect.KEY_*` constants have been deprecated.
segment.target: As constantes `bdDetect.KEY_*` foram descontinuadas.

segment.source: Use `bdDetect.DeviceType.*` instead. (#15772, @LeonarddeR).
segment.target: Use `bdDetect.DeviceType.*` em vez disso. (#15772, @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: The `bdDetect.DETECT_USB` and `bdDetect.DETECT_BLUETOOTH` constants have been deprecated with no public replacement. (#15772, @LeonarddeR).
segment.target: As constantes `bdDetect.DETECT_USB` e `bdDetect.DETECT_BLUETOOTH` foram descontinuadas sem substituio pblica. (#15772, @LeonarddeR).

segment.source: Using `gui.ExecAndPump` is deprecated - please use `systemUtils.ExecAndPump` instead. (#15852, @lukaszgo1)
segment.target: O uso de `gui.ExecAndPump` est obsoleto - use `systemUtils.ExecAndPump` em seu lugar. (#15852, @lukaszgo1)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue and installer issue.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir uma questo de segurana e um problema do instalador.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana seguindo a [poltica de segurana](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md) do NVDA.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Prevents loading custom configuration while secure mode is forced.
segment.target: Impede o carregamento da configurao personalizada enquanto o modo seguro estiver em vigor.

segment.source: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))
segment.target: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixed bug which caused the NVDA process to fail to exit correctly. (#16123)
segment.target: Corrigido a falha que fazia com que o processo do NVDA no fosse encerrado corretamente. (#16123)

segment.source: Fixed bug where if the previous NVDA process failed to exit correctly, an NVDA installation could fail to an unrecoverable state. (#16122)
segment.target: Corrigido o erro em que se o processo anterior do NVDA no fosse encerrado corretamente, uma instalao do NVDA poderia falhar e chegar a um estado irrecupervel. (#16122)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir um problema de segurana.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana seguindo a [poltica de segurana](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md) do NVDA.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Prevents possible reflected XSS attack from crafted content to cause arbitrary code execution.
segment.target: Impede que possveis ataques XSS refletidos de contedo criado causem execuo arbitrria de cdigo.

segment.source: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))
segment.target: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir um problema de segurana.

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: A correo de segurana na 2023.3.1 no foi resolvida corretamente.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana seguindo a [poltica de segurana](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md) do NVDA.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: A correo de segurana na 2023.3.1 no foi resolvida corretamente.

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Impede possvel acesso ao sistema e execuo arbitrria de cdigo com privilgios de sistema para usurios no autenticados.

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir um problema de segurana.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana seguindo a [poltica de segurana](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md) do NVDA.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Impede possvel acesso ao sistema e execuo arbitrria de cdigo com privilgios de sistema para usurios no autenticados.

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.source: This release includes improvements to performance, responsiveness and stability of audio output.
segment.target: Esta verso inclui melhorias no desempenho, responsividade e estabilidade da sada de udio.

segment.source: Options have been added to control the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps, or to have them follow the volume of the voice you are using.
segment.target: Foram adicionadas opes para controlar o volume dos sons e bipes do NVDA, ou para que eles sigam o volume da voz que voc est usando.

segment.source: NVDA can now periodically refresh OCR results, speaking new text as it appears.
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode atualizar periodicamente os resultados do OCR, falando o novo texto conforme ele aparece.

segment.source: This can be configured in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Isso pode ser configurado na categoria OCR do Windows no dilogo de configuraes do NVDA.

segment.source: There's been several braille fixes, improving device detection and caret movement.
segment.target: Houve vrias correes para braille, melhorando a deteco de dispositivos e o movimento do cursor.

segment.source: It is now possible to opt-out unwanted drivers from automatic detection, to improve autodetection performance.
segment.target: Agora possvel desativar a deteco automtica de drivers indesejados, para melhorar o desempenho da deteco automtica.

segment.source: There are also new BRLTTY commands.
segment.target: H tambm novos comandos BRLTTY.

segment.source: There's also been bug fixes for the Add-on Store, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Edge context menus, and Windows Calculator.
segment.target: Tambm houve correes de falhas para a Loja de Complementos, Microsoft Office, menus de contexto do Microsoft Edge e Calculadora do Windows.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Gerenciamento de som aprimorado:

segment.source: A new Audio Settings panel:
segment.target: Um novo painel Configuraes de udio:

segment.source: This can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`. (#15497)
segment.target: Isso pode ser aberto com `NVDA+control+u`. (#15497)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Uma opo nas configuraes de udio para que o volume dos sons e bipes do NVDA siga a configurao de volume da voz que voc est usando. (#1409)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Uma opo nas configuraes de udio para configurar separadamente o volume dos sons do NVDA. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: The settings to change audio output device and toggle audio ducking have been moved to the new Audio settings panel from the Select Synthesizer dialog.
segment.target: As configuraes para alterar o dispositivo de sada de udio e alternar o udio prioritrio reduo de udio foram movidas para o novo painel Configuraes de udio no dilogo Selecionar Sintetizador.

segment.source: These options will be removed from the "select synthesizer" dialog in 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)
segment.target: Essas opes sero removidas da caixa de dilogo "selecionar sintetizador" em 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)

segment.source: NVDA will now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697, #11169, #11615, #5096, #10185, #11061)
segment.target: O NVDA agora emitir udio atravs da API de Sesso de udio do Windows (WASAPI), o que pode melhorar a responsividade, o desempenho e a estabilidade da fala e dos sons do NVDA. (#14697, #11169, #11615, #5096, #10185, #11061)

segment.source: Note: WASAPI is incompatible with some add-ons.
segment.target: Nota: WASAPI incompatvel com alguns complementos.

segment.source: Compatible updates are available for these add-ons, please update them before updating NVDA.
segment.target: Atualizaes compatveis esto disponveis para esses complementos, atualize-os antes de atualizar o NVDA.

segment.source: Incompatible versions of these add-ons will be disabled when updating NVDA:
segment.target: Verses incompatveis destes complementos sero desabilitadas ao atualizar o NVDA:

segment.source: Tony's Enhancements version 1.15 or older. (#15402)
segment.target: Tony's Enhancements verso 1.15 ou anterior. (#15402)

segment.source: NVDA global commands extension 12.0.8 or older. (#15443)
segment.target: NVDA global commands extension 12.0.8 ou anterior. (#15443)

segment.source: NVDA is now able to continually update the result when performing optical character recognition (OCR), speaking new text as it appears. (#2797)
segment.target: O NVDA agora capaz de atualizar continuamente o resultado ao realizar o reconhecimento ptico de caracteres (OCR), falando o novo texto medida que ele aparece. (#2797)

segment.source: To enable this functionality, enable the option "Periodically refresh recognized content" in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Para habilitar esta funcionalidade, habilite a opo "Atualizar periodicamente o contedo reconhecido" na categoria OCR do Windows no dilogo de Configuraes do NVDA.

segment.source: Once enabled, you can toggle speaking new text by toggling report dynamic content changes (pressing `NVDA+5`).
segment.target: Uma vez habilitado, voc pode alternar a fala de novo texto alternando o relato de alteraes de contedo dinmico (pressionando `NVDA+5`).

segment.source: When using automatic detection of braille displays, it is now possible to opt-out drivers from detection from the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Ao usar a deteco automtica de linhas braille, agora possvel desativar a deteco de drivers no dilogo de seleo de linhas braille. (#15196)

segment.source: A new option in Document Formatting settings, "Ignore blank lines for line indentation reporting". (#13394)
segment.target: Uma nova opo nas configuraes de Formatao de Documento, "Ignorar linhas em branco ao anunciar recuo de linhas". (#13394)

segment.source: Added an unassigned gesture to navigate by tab groupings in browse mode. (#15046)
segment.target: Adicionado um comando gesto no atribudo para navegar por agrupamentos de guias no modo de navegao. (#15046)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: When the text in a terminal changes without updating the caret, the text on a braille display will now properly update when positioned on a changed line.
segment.target: Quando o texto em um terminal muda sem atualizar o cursor, o texto em uma linha braille agora ser atualizado corretamente quando posicionado em uma linha alterada.

segment.source: This includes situations where braille is tethered to review. (#15115)
segment.target: Isso inclui situaes em que o braille est vinculado explorao. (#15115)

segment.source: More BRLTTY key bindings are now mapped to NVDA commands (#6483):
segment.target: Mais combinaes de teclas BRLTTY agora so mapeadas para comandos do NVDA (#6483):

segment.source: `learn`: toggle NVDA input help
segment.target: `learn`: alterna a ajuda de entrada do NVDA

segment.source: `prefmenu`: open the NVDA menu
segment.target: `prefmenu`: abre o menu do NVDA

segment.source: `prefload`/`prefsave`: Load/save NVDA configuration
segment.target: `prefload`/`prefsave`: Carrega/salva a configurao do NVDA

segment.source: `time`: Show time
segment.target: `time`: Mostra hora

segment.source: `say_line`: Speak the current line where the review cursor is located
segment.target: `say_line`: Fala a linha atual onde o cursor de explorao est localizado

segment.source: `say_below`: Say all using review cursor
segment.target: `say_below`: Leitura contnua usando o cursor de explorao

segment.source: The BRLTTY driver is only available when a BRLTTY instance with BrlAPI enabled is running. (#15335)
segment.target: O driver BRLTTY s est disponvel quando uma instncia BRLTTY com BrlAPI habilitada est em execuo. (#15335)

segment.source: The advanced setting to enable support for HID braille has been removed in favor of a new option.
segment.target: A configurao avanada para habilitar o suporte para Braille HID foi removida em favor de uma nova opo.

segment.source: You can now disable specific drivers for braille display auto detection in the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Agora voc pode desabilitar drivers especficos para deteco automtica de linha braille no dilogo de seleo de linha braille. (#15196)

segment.source: Add-on Store: Installed add-ons will now be listed in the Available Add-ons tab, if they are available in the store. (#15374)
segment.target: Loja de Complementos: Os complementos instalados agora sero listados na guia Complementos disponveis, se estiverem disponveis na loja. (#15374)

segment.source: Some shortcut keys have been updated in the NVDA menu. (#15364)
segment.target: Algumas teclas de atalho foram atualizadas no menu do NVDA. (#15364)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: Fixed crash in Microsoft Word when Document formatting options "report headings" and "report comments and notes" were not enabled. (#15019)
segment.target: Corrigida falha no Microsoft Word quando as opes de formatao de documentos "relatar ttulos" e "relatar comentrios e notas" no estavam habilitadas. (#15019)

segment.source: In Word and Excel, text alignment will be correctly reported in more situations. (#15206, #15220)
segment.target: No Word e no Excel, o alinhamento do texto ser informado corretamente em mais situaes. (#15206, #15220)

segment.source: Fixes the announcement of some cell formatting shortcuts in Excel. (#15527)
segment.target: Corrige o anncio de alguns atalhos de formatao de clulas no Excel. (#15527)

segment.source: Microsoft Edge:
segment.target: Microsoft Edge:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer jump back to the last browse mode position when opening the context menu in Microsoft Edge. (#15309)
segment.target: O NVDA no voltar mais para a ltima posio do modo de navegao ao abrir o menu de contexto no Microsoft Edge. (#15309)

segment.source: NVDA is once again able to read context menus of downloads in Microsoft Edge. (#14916)
segment.target: O NVDA mais uma vez capaz de ler menus de contexto de downloads no Microsoft Edge. (#14916)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: The braille cursor and selection indicators will now always be updated correctly after showing or hiding respective indicators with a gesture. (#15115)
segment.target: O cursor braille e os indicadores de seleo agora sero sempre atualizados corretamente aps mostrar ou ocultar os respectivos indicadores com um comando gesto. (#15115)

segment.source: Fixed bug where Albatross braille displays try to initialize although another braille device has been connected. (#15226)
segment.target: Corrigido o erro em que as linhas braille Albatross tentavam inicializar, embora outro dispositivo braille estivesse conectado. (#15226)

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Loja de Complementos:

segment.source: Fixed bug where unchecking "include incompatible add-ons" would result in incompatible add-ons still being listed in the store. (#15411)
segment.target: Corrigido o erro em que desmarcar "incluir complementos incompatveis" resultaria em complementos incompatveis ainda listados na loja. (#15411)

segment.source: Add-ons blocked due to compatibility reasons should now be filtered correctly when toggling the filter for enabled/disabled status. (#15416)
segment.target: Complementos bloqueados por motivos de compatibilidade agora devem ser filtrados corretamente ao alternar o filtro para status habilitado/desabilitado. (#15416)

segment.source: Fixed bug preventing overridden enabled incompatible add-ons being upgraded or replaced using the external install tool. (#15417)
segment.target: Falha corrigida que impedia que complementos incompatveis habilitados e sobrepujados fossem atualizados ou substitudos usando a ferramenta de instalao externa. (#15417)

segment.source: Fixed bug where NVDA would not speak until restarted after add-on installation. (#14525)
segment.target: Corrigida falha onde o NVDA no falava at ser reiniciado aps a instalao do complemento. (#14525)

segment.source: Fixed bug where add-ons cannot be installed if a previous download failed or was cancelled. (#15469)
segment.target: Corrigido o erro em que complementos no podiam ser instalados se um download anterior falhasse ou fosse cancelado. (#15469)

segment.source: Fixed issues with handling incompatible add-ons when upgrading NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)
segment.target: Corrigidos problemas com o tratamento de complementos incompatveis ao atualizar o NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)

segment.source: NVDA once again announces calculation results in the Windows 32bit calculator on Server, LTSC and LTSB versions of Windows. (#15230)
segment.target: O NVDA mais uma vez anuncia os resultados dos clculos na calculadora de 32bit do Windows nas verses Server, LTSC e LTSB do Windows. (#15230)

segment.source: NVDA no longer ignores focus changes when a nested window (grand child window) gets focus. (#15432)
segment.target: O NVDA no ignora mais as mudanas de foco quando uma janela aninhada (janela secundria) recebe o foco. (#15432)

segment.source: Fixed a potential cause of crashing during NVDA startup. (#15517)
segment.target: Corrigida uma causa potencial de travamento durante a inicializao do NVDA. (#15517)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Consulte [o guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter informaes sobre o processo de descontinuao e remoo de API do NVDA.

segment.source: `braille.handler.handleUpdate` and `braille.handler.handleReviewMove` have been changed in order not to update instantly.
segment.target: `braille.handler.handleUpdate` e `braille.handler.handleReviewMove` foram alterados para no serem atualizados instantaneamente.

segment.source: Before this change, when either of these methods was called very often, this would drain many resources.
segment.target: Antes dessa mudana, quando qualquer um desses mtodos era chamado com muita frequncia, isso drenava muitos recursos.

segment.source: These methods now queue an update at the end of every core cycle instead.
segment.target: Esses mtodos agora enfileiram uma atualizao no final de cada ciclo principal.

segment.source: They should also be thread safe, making it possible to call them from background threads. (#15163)
segment.target: Eles tambm devem ser thread-safe, possibilitando cham-los de threads em segundo plano. (#15163)

segment.source: Added official support to register custom braille display drivers in the automatic braille display detection process.
segment.target: Adicionado suporte oficial para registrar drivers de linhas braille personalizados no processo de deteco automtica de linha braille.

segment.source: Consult the `braille.BrailleDisplayDriver` class documentation for more details.
segment.target: Consulte a documentao da classe `braille.BrailleDisplayDriver` para mais detalhes.

segment.source: Most notably, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` and the `registerAutomaticDetection` `classmethod` must be implemented. (#15196)
segment.target: Mais notavelmente, o atributo `supportsAutomaticDetection` deve ser definido como `True` e deve ser implementado `registerAutomaticDetection` `classmethod`. (#15196)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` is now deprecated with no public replacement.
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` agora est obsoleto sem substituio pblica.

segment.source: It will be removed in 2024.1. (#15163)
segment.target: Ele ser removido em 2024.1. (#15163)

segment.source: Importing the constants `xlCenter`, `xlJustify`, `xlLeft`, `xlRight`, `xlDistributed`, `xlBottom`, `xlTop` from `NVDAObjects.window.excel` is deprecated.
segment.target: A importao das constantes `xlCenter`, `xlJustify`, `xlLeft`, `xlRight`, `xlDistributed`, `xlBottom`, `xlTop` de `NVDAObjects.window.excel` est obsoleta.

segment.source: Use `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Use enumeraes `XlHAlign` ou `XlVAlign`. (#15205)

segment.source: The mapping `NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels` is deprecated.
segment.target: O mapeamento `NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels` est obsoleto.

segment.source: Use the `displayString` methods of `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Use os mtodos `displayString` de enumeraes `XlHAlign` ou `XlVAlign`. (#15205)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices` and `bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been deprecated.
segment.target: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices` e `bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` foram descontinuados.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` classmethod instead.
segment.target: Os drivers de linhas Braille devem implementar o mtodo de classe `registerAutomaticDetection`.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200)
segment.target: Esse mtodo recebe um objeto `DriverRegistrar` no qual os mtodos `addUsbDevices` e `addBluetoothDevices` podem ser usados. (#15200)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` uses `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices` for devices that are marked as thread safe.
segment.target: A implementao padro do mtodo check de verificao em `BrailleDisplayDriver` usa `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices` para dispositivos marcados como thread-safe.

segment.source: Starting from NVDA 2024.1, in order for the base method to use `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices`, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` as well. (#15200)
segment.target: A partir do NVDA 2024.1, para que o mtodo base use `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices`, o atributo `supportsAutomaticDetection` tambm deve ser definido como `True`. (#15200)

segment.source: This release introduces the Add-on Store to replace the Add-ons Manager.
segment.target: Esta verso introduz a Loja de Complementos para substituir o Gestor de Complementos.

segment.source: In the Add-on Store you can browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: Na Loja de Complementos, voc pode navegar, pesquisar, instalar e atualizar complementos da comunidade.

segment.source: You can now manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons at your own risk.
segment.target: Agora pode sobrepujar manualmente os problemas de incompatibilidade com complementos desatualizados por sua conta e risco.

segment.source: There are new braille features, commands, and display support.
segment.target: H novos recursos, comandos e suporte para linhas braille.

segment.source: There are also new input gestures for OCR and flattened object navigation.
segment.target: Existem tambm novos comandos gestos de entrada para OCR e navegao plana de objetos.

segment.source: Navigating and reporting formatting in Microsoft Office is improved.
segment.target: A navegao e o relato de formatao no Microsoft Office foram aprimorados.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, particularly for braille, Microsoft Office, web browsers and Windows 11.
segment.target: Existem muitas correes de falhas, particularmente para braille, Microsoft Office, navegadores web e Windows 11.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: eSpeak-NG, Transcritor braille LibLouis e Unicode CLDR foram atualizados.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Add-on Store has been added to NVDA. (#13985)
segment.target: Loja de Complementos Add-on Store foi adicionada ao NVDA. (#13985)

segment.source: Browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: Navegue, pesquise, instale e atualize complementos da comunidade.

segment.source: Manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons.
segment.target: Supere manualmente os problemas de incompatibilidade com complementos desatualizados.

segment.source: The Add-ons Manager has been removed and replaced by the Add-on Store.
segment.target: O Gestor de Complementos foi removido e substitudo pela Loja de Complementos.

segment.source: For more information please read the updated user guide.
segment.target: Para obter mais informaes, leia o guia do usurio atualizado.

segment.source: New input gestures:
segment.target: Novos comandos gestos de entrada:

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the available languages for Windows OCR. (#13036)
segment.target: Um comando no atribudo para percorrer os idiomas disponveis para OCR do Windows. (#13036)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the braille show messages modes. (#14864)
segment.target: Um comando no atribudo para percorrer os modos de mensagens braille. (#14864)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to toggle showing the selection indicator for braille. (#14948)
segment.target: Um comando no atribudo para alternar exibio do indicador de seleo para braille. (#14948)

segment.source: Added default keyboard gesture assignments to move to the next or previous object in a flattened view of the object hierarchy. (#15053)
segment.target: Adicionadas atribuies padro de comandos de teclado para mover para o objeto seguinte ou anterior em uma viso plana da hierarquia de objetos. (#15053)

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+numpad9` and `NVDA+numpad3` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: Computador de mesa Desktop : `NVDA+9 do teclado numrico` e `NVDA+3 do teclado numrico` para mover para os objetos anteriores e seguintes, respectivamente.

segment.source: Laptop: `shift+NVDA+[` and `shift+NVDA+]` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: Computador porttil Laptop : `shift+NVDA+[` e `shift+NVDA+]` para mover para o objeto anterior e prximo, respectivamente.

segment.source: New braille features:
segment.target: Novos recursos braille:

segment.source: Added support for the Help Tech Activator braille display. (#14917)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para a linha braille Help Tech Activator. (#14917)

segment.source: A new option to toggle showing the selection indicator (dots 7 and 8). (#14948)
segment.target: Uma nova opo para alternar a exibio do indicador de seleo (pontos 7 e 8). (#14948)

segment.source: A new option to optionally move the system caret or focus when changing the review cursor position with braille routing keys. (#14885, #3166)
segment.target: Uma nova opo para mover opcionalmente o cursor do sistema ou o foco ao alterar a posio do cursor de explorao com as teclas de sincronizao braille. (#14885, #3166)

segment.source: When pressing `numpad2` three times to report the numerical value of the character at the position of the review cursor, the information is now also provided in braille. (#14826)
segment.target: Ao pressionar `2 do teclado numrico` trs vezes para relatar o valor numrico do caractere na posio do cursor de explorao, a informao agora tambm fornecida em braille. (#14826)

segment.source: Added support for the `aria-brailleroledescription` ARIA 1.3 attribute, allowing web authors to override the type of an element shown on the braille display. (#14748)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para o atributo ARIA 1.3 `aria-brailleroledescription`, permitindo que os autores web substituam o tipo de um elemento mostrado na linha braille. (#14748)

segment.source: Baum braille driver: added several braille chord gestures for performing common keyboard commands such as `windows+d` and `alt+tab`.
segment.target: Driver braille Baum: adicionados vrios comandos gestos com conjunto de teclas acordes braille para executar comandos de teclado comuns, como `windows+d` e `alt+tab`.

segment.source: Please refer to the NVDA User Guide for a full list. (#14714)
segment.target: Consulte o Guia do Usurio do NVDA para obter uma lista completa. (#14714)

segment.source: Added pronunciation of Unicode symbols:
segment.target: Adicionada pronncia de smbolos Unicode:

segment.source: braille symbols such as ``. (#13778)
segment.target: smbolos braille como ``. (#14548)

segment.source: Mac Option key symbol ``. (#14682)
segment.target: Smbolo da tecla Option do Mac ``. (#14682)

segment.source: Added gestures for Tivomatic Caiku Albatross braille displays. (#14844, #15002)
segment.target: Comandos Gestos adicionados para linhas braille Tivomatic Caiku Albatross. (#14844, #15002)

segment.source: showing the braille settings dialog
segment.target: mostrar a caixa de dilogo de configuraes braille

segment.source: accessing the status bar
segment.target: acessar a barra de status

segment.source: cycling the braille cursor shape
segment.target: percorrer a forma do cursor braille

segment.source: cycling the braille show messages mode
segment.target: percorrer o modo de mostra de mensagens braille

segment.source: toggling the braille cursor on/off
segment.target: alternar ligar/desligar o cursor braille

segment.source: toggling the "braille show selection indicator" state
segment.target: alternar o estado "mostrar indicador de seleo em braille"

segment.source: cycling the "braille move system caret when routing review cursor" mode. (#15122)
segment.target: percorrer o modo "braille move cursor do sistema ao sincronizar o cursor de explorao". (#15122)

segment.source: Microsoft Office features:
segment.target: Recursos do Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When highlighted text is enabled Document Formatting, highlight colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#7396, #12101, #5866)
segment.target: Quando o texto destacado est ativado na Formatao de documentos, as cores de destaque agora so relatadas no Microsoft Word. (#7396, #12101, #5866)

segment.source: When colors are enabled Document Formatting, background colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#5866)
segment.target: Quando as cores esto habilitadas na Formatao de documentos, as cores de fundo agora so informadas no Microsoft Word. (#5866)

segment.source: When using Excel shortcuts to toggle format such as bold, italic, underline and strike through of a cell in Excel, the result is now reported. (#14923)
segment.target: Ao usar atalhos do Excel para alternar o formato, como negrito, itlico, sublinhado e tachado riscado de uma clula no Excel, o resultado agora relatado. (#14923)

segment.source: Experimental enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Gerenciamento de som aprimorado experimental:

segment.source: NVDA can now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode emitir udio por meio da API de Sesso de udio do Windows (WASAPI), que pode melhorar a capacidade de resposta, o desempenho e a estabilidade da fala e dos sons do NVDA. (#14697)

segment.source: WASAPI usage can be enabled in Advanced settings.
segment.target: O uso de WASAPI pode ser habilitado nas Configuraes Avanadas.

segment.source: Additionally, if WASAPI is enabled, the following Advanced settings can also be configured.
segment.target: Alm disso, se o WASAPI estiver habilitado, as seguintes Configuraes Avanadas tambm podero ser definidas.

segment.source: An option to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Uma opo para que o volume dos sons e bipes do NVDA siga a configurao de volume da voz que voc est usando. (#1409)

segment.source: An option to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Uma opo para configurar separadamente o volume dos sons do NVDA. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: There is a known issue with intermittent crashing when WASAPI is enabled. (#15150)
segment.target: H um problema conhecido de travamento intermitente quando o WASAPI est habilitado. (#15150)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, NVDA now reports when a control opens a dialog, grid, list or tree if the author has specified this using `aria-haspopup`. (#8235)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox e no Google Chrome, o NVDA agora informa quando um controle abre uma caixa de dilogo, grade, lista ou rvore se o autor especificou isso usando `aria-haspopup`. (#8235)

segment.source: It is now possible to use system variables (such as `%temp%` or `%homepath%`) in the path specification while creating portable copies of NVDA. (#14680)
segment.target: Agora possvel usar variveis de sistema (como `%temp%` ou `%homepath%`) na especificao de caminho ao criar cpias portteis do NVDA. (#14680)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA can announce virtual desktop names when opening, changing, and closing them. (#5641)
segment.target: No Windows 10 Atualizao de Maio de 2019 e posterior, o NVDA pode anunciar nomes de reas de trabalho virtuais ao abri-las, alter-las e fech-las. (#5641)

segment.source: A system wide parameter has been added to allow users and system administrators to force NVDA to start in secure mode. (#10018)
segment.target: Um parmetro de todo o sistema foi adicionado para permitir que usurios e administradores de sistema forcem o NVDA a iniciar em modo seguro. (#10018)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Atualizaes de componentes:

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)
segment.target: eSpeak NG foi atualizado para 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)
segment.target: Transcritor braille LibLouis atualizado para [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 43.0. (#14918)
segment.target: Atualizado o CLDR Repositrio de Dados de Localidade Comum para a verso 43.0. (#14918)

segment.source: LibreOffice changes:
segment.target: Alteraes para LibreOffice:

segment.source: When reporting the review cursor location, the current cursor/caret location is now reported relative to the current page in LibreOffice Writer 7.6 and newer, similar to what is done for Microsoft Word. (#11696)
segment.target: Ao relatar a localizao do cursor de explorao, a localizao atual do cursor/smbolo do cursor agora relatada em relao pgina atual no LibreOffice Writer 7.6 e mais recente, semelhante ao que feito para o Microsoft Word. (#11696)

segment.source: Announcement of the status bar (e.g. triggered by `NVDA+end`) works for LibreOffice. (#11698)
segment.target: O anncio da barra de status (por exemplo, acionado por `NVDA+end`) funciona para o LibreOffice. (#11698)

segment.source: When moving to a different cell in LibreOffice Calc, NVDA no longer incorrectly announces the coordinates of the previously focused cell when cell coordinate announcement is disabled in NVDA's settings. (#15098)
segment.target: Ao mover para uma clula diferente no LibreOffice Calc, o NVDA no anuncia mais incorretamente as coordenadas da clula focalizada anteriormente quando o anncio de coordenada de clula est desabilitado nas configuraes do NVDA. (#15098)

segment.source: Braille changes:
segment.target: Alteraes para braille:

segment.source: When using a braille display via the Standard HID braille driver, the dpad can be used to emulate the arrow keys and enter.
segment.target: Ao usar uma linha braille por meio do driver de braille HID Padro, o bloco direcional dpad pode ser usado para emular as teclas de setas e enter.

segment.source: Also `space+dot1` and `space+dot4` now map to up and down arrow respectively. (#14713)
segment.target: Alm disso, `espao+ponto1` e `espao+ponto4` agora so mapeados respectivamente para as setas para cima e baixo. (#14713)

segment.source: Updates to dynamic web content (ARIA live regions) are now displayed in braille.
segment.target: As atualizaes do contedo dinmico da web (ARIA live regions) agora so exibidas em braille.

segment.source: This can be disabled in the Advanced Settings panel. (#7756)
segment.target: Isso pode ser desabilitado no painel Configuraes Avanadas. (#7756)

segment.source: Dash and em-dash symbols will always be sent to the synthesizer. (#13830)
segment.target: Os smbolos de hfen tracinho e travesso sempre sero enviados ao sintetizador. (#13830)

segment.source: Distance reported in Microsoft Word will now honour the unit defined in Word's advanced options even when using UIA to access Word documents. (#14542)
segment.target: A distncia relatada no Microsoft Word agora respeitar a unidade definida nas opes avanadas do Word, mesmo ao usar o UIA para acessar documentos do Word. (#14542)

segment.source: NVDA responds faster when moving the cursor in edit controls. (#14708)
segment.target: O NVDA responde mais rpido ao mover o cursor nos controles de edio. (#14708)

segment.source: Script for reporting the destination of a link now reports from the caret / focus position rather than the navigator object. (#14659)
segment.target: O script para relatar o destino de um link agora relata a partir da posio do cursor / foco em vez do objeto em navegao. (#14659)

segment.source: Portable copy creation no longer requires that a drive letter be entered as part of the absolute path. (#14680)
segment.target: A criao de cpia porttil no requer mais que uma letra de unidade seja inserida como parte do caminho absoluto. (#14680)

segment.source: If Windows is configured to display seconds in the system tray clock, using `NVDA+f12` to report the time now honors that setting. (#14742)
segment.target: Se o Windows estiver configurado para exibir segundos no relgio da bandeja do sistema, usar `NVDA+f12` para relatar a hora agora respeita essa configurao. (#14742)

segment.source: NVDA will now report unlabeled groupings that have useful position information, such as in recent versions of Microsoft Office 365 menus. (#14878)
segment.target: O NVDA agora relatar agrupamentos no rotulados que possuem informaes de posio teis, como nas verses recentes dos menus do Microsoft Office 365. (#14878)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: Several stability fixes to input/output for braille displays, resulting in less frequent errors and crashes of NVDA. (#14627)
segment.target: Vrias correes de estabilidade para entrada/sada para linhas braille, resultando em erros e travamentos menos frequentes do NVDA. (#14627)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer unnecessarily switch to no braille multiple times during auto detection, resulting in a cleaner log and less overhead. (#14524)
segment.target: O NVDA no mudar mais desnecessariamente para sem braille vrias vezes durante a deteco automtica, resultando em um log registro de eventos mais limpo e menos sobrecarga. (#14524)

segment.source: NVDA will now switch back to USB if a HID Bluetooth device (such as the HumanWare Brailliant or APH Mantis) is automatically detected and an USB connection becomes available.
segment.target: O NVDA agora voltar para USB se um dispositivo Bluetooth HID (como o HumanWare Brailliant ou APH Mantis) for detectado automaticamente e uma conexo USB estiver disponvel.

segment.source: This only worked for Bluetooth Serial ports before. (#14524)
segment.target: Antes isso s funcionava para portas seriais Bluetooth. (#14524)

segment.source: When no braille display is connected and the braille viewer is closed by pressing `alt+f4` or clicking the close button, the display size of the braille subsystem will again be reset to no cells. (#15214)
segment.target: Quando nenhuma linha braille estiver conectada e o visualizador de braille for fechado pressionando `alt+f4` ou clicando no boto fechar, o tamanho da linha do subsistema braille ser novamente redefinido para nenhuma cela. (#15214)

segment.source: Web browsers:
segment.target: Navegadores web:

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally causes Mozilla Firefox to crash or stop responding. (#14647)
segment.target: O NVDA no faz mais ocasionalmente com que o Mozilla Firefox trave ou pare de responder. (#14647)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, typed characters are no longer reported in some text boxes even when speak typed characters is disabled. (#8442)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox e no Google Chrome, os caracteres digitados no so mais relatados em algumas caixas de texto, mesmo quando a fala dos caracteres digitados est desativada. (#8442)

segment.source: You can now use browse mode in Chromium Embedded Controls where it was not possible previously. (#13493, #8553)
segment.target: Agora voc pode usar o modo de navegao nos Controles Incorporados do Chromium, onde antes no era possvel. (#13493, #8553)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving the mouse over text after a link now reliably reports the text. (#9235)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox, mover o mouse sobre o texto aps um link agora informa o texto de forma confivel. (#9235)

segment.source: The destination of graphic links is now reported accurately in more cases in Chrome and Edge. (#14783)
segment.target: O destino dos links grficos agora relatado com preciso em mais casos no Chrome e no Edge. (#14783)

segment.source: When trying to report the URL for a link without a href attribute NVDA is no longer silent.
segment.target: Ao tentar relatar a URL de um link sem um atributo href, o NVDA no fica mais silencioso.

segment.source: Instead NVDA reports that the link has no destination. (#14723)
segment.target: Em vez disso, o NVDA informa que o link no tem destino. (#14723)

segment.source: In Browse mode, NVDA will no longer incorrectly ignore focus moving to a parent or child control e.g. moving from a control to its parent list item or gridcell. (#14611)
segment.target: No modo de navegao, o NVDA no ir mais ignorar incorretamente o foco movendo-se para um controle pai ou filho, por exemplo, movendo de um controle para seu item de lista pai ou clula de grade. (#14611)

segment.source: Note however that this fix only applies when the Automatically set focus to focusable elements" option in Browse Mode settings is turned off (which is the default).
segment.target: No entanto, observe que essa correo s se aplica quando a opo "Posicionar automaticamente foco do sistema em elementos focveis" nas configuraes do Modo de Navegao est desativada (que o padro).

segment.source: Fixes for Windows 11:
segment.target: Correes para o Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA can once again announce Notepad status bar contents. (#14573)
segment.target: O NVDA pode mais uma vez anunciar o contedo da barra de status do Bloco de Notas. (#14573)

segment.source: Switching between tabs will announce the new tab name and position for Notepad and File Explorer. (#14587, #14388)
segment.target: Alternar entre as abas anunciar o novo nome da aba e a posio para Bloco de Notas e para o Explorador de Arquivos. (#14587, #14388)

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce candidate items when entering text in languages such as Chinese and Japanese. (#14509)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar mais uma vez itens candidatos ao inserir texto em idiomas como chins e japons. (#14509)

segment.source: It is once again possible to open the Contributors and License items on the NVDA Help menu. (#14725)
segment.target: novamente possvel abrir os itens Colaboradores e Licena no menu Ajuda do NVDA. (#14725)

segment.source: Microsoft Office fixes:
segment.target: Correes para o Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When rapidly moving through cells in Excel, NVDA is now less likely to report the wrong cell or selection. (#14983, #12200, #12108)
segment.target: Ao mover-se rapidamente pelas clulas no Excel, agora menos provvel que o NVDA relate a clula ou seleo errada. (#14983, #12200, #12108)

segment.source: When landing on an Excel cell from outside a work sheet, braille and focus highlighter are no longer needlessly updated to the object that had focus previously. (#15136)
segment.target: Ao pousar em uma clula do Excel de fora de uma planilha, o braille e o marcador de foco no so mais atualizados desnecessariamente para o objeto que tinha o foco anteriormente. (#15136)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce focusing password fields in Microsoft Excel and Outlook. (#14839)
segment.target: O NVDA no falha mais em anunciar os campos de senha em foco no Microsoft Excel e no Outlook. (#14839)

segment.source: For symbols which do not have a symbol description in the current locale, the default English symbol level will be used. (#14558, #14417)
segment.target: Para smbolos que no possuem uma descrio de smbolo na localidade atual, o nvel de smbolo padro em ingls ser usado. (#14558, #14417)

segment.source: It is now possible to use the backslash character in the replacement field of a dictionaries entry, when the type is not set to regular expression. (#14556)
segment.target: Agora possvel usar o caractere de barra invertida no campo de substituio de uma entrada de dicionrio, quando o tipo no estiver definido como expresso regular. (#14556)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator, a portable copy of NVDA will no longer do nothing or play error tones when entering expressions in standard calculator in compact overlay mode. (#14679)
