segment.target: Na Calculadora do Windows 10 e 11, uma cpia porttil do NVDA no far mais nada ou nem reproduzir tons de erro ao inserir expresses na calculadora padro no modo de sobreposio compacta. (#14679)

segment.source: NVDA again recovers from many more situations such as applications that stop responding which previously caused it to freeze completely. (#14759)
segment.target: O NVDA novamente se recupera de inmeras situaes, como aplicativos que param de responder, o que anteriormente o fazia congelar completamente. (#14759)

segment.source: When forcing UIA support with certain terminal and consoles, a bug is fixed which caused a freeze and the log file to be spammed. (#14689)
segment.target: Ao forar o suporte UIA com determinados terminais e consoles, uma falha est corrigida que causava um congelamento e o arquivo de log ser sujado spammed. (#14689)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer refuse to save the configuration after a configuration reset. (#13187)
segment.target: O NVDA no se recusar mais a salvar a configurao aps uma restaurao da configurao. (#13187)

segment.source: When running a temporary version from the launcher, NVDA will not mislead users into thinking they can save the configuration. (#14914)
segment.target: Ao executar uma verso temporria do instalador, o NVDA no enganar os usurios fazendo-os pensar que podem salvar a configurao. (#14914)

segment.source: NVDA now generally responds slightly faster to commands and focus changes. (#14928)
segment.target: O NVDA agora geralmente responde um pouco mais rpido aos comandos e mudanas de foco. (#14928)

segment.source: Displaying the OCR settings will not fail on some systems anymore. (#15017)
segment.target: A exibio das configuraes de OCR no falhar mais em alguns sistemas. (#15017)

segment.source: Fix bug related to saving and loading the NVDA configuration, including switching synthesizers. (#14760)
segment.target: Correo de falha relacionada a salvar e carregar a configurao do NVDA, incluindo a troca de sintetizadores. (#14760)

segment.source: Fix bug causing text review "flick up" touch gesture to move pages rather than move to previous line. (#15127)
segment.target: Correo da falha que fazia com que o gesto de toque da explorao de texto "varrer para cima" mover pginas em vez de ir para a linha anterior. (#15127)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Consulte [o guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter informaes sobre o processo de descontinuao e remoo de API do NVDA.

segment.source: Suggested conventions have been added to the add-on manifest specification.
segment.target: Convenes sugeridas foram adicionadas especificao do manifesto manifest do complemento.

segment.source: These are optional for NVDA compatibility, but are encouraged or required for submitting to the Add-on Store. (#14754)
segment.target: Estas so opcionais para compatibilidade com NVDA, mas so encorajadas ou exigidas para envio Loja de Complementos. (#14754)

segment.source: Use `lowerCamelCase` for the name field.
segment.target: Use `lowerCamelCase` primeiraPalavraTodaMinsculaEAsSeguintesColadasComeandoCadaComLetraMaiscula para o campo name nome.

segment.source: Use `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` format for the version field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Use o formato `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` <principal>.<secundrio>.<correo> para o campo version verso (necessrio para dados da loja de complementos).

segment.source: Use `https://` as the schema for the url field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Use `https://` como esquema para o campo url (necessrio para dados da loja de complementos).

segment.source: Added a new extension point type called `Chain`, which can be used to iterate over iterables returned by registered handlers. (#14531)
segment.target: Adicionado um novo tipo de ponto de extenso chamado `Chain`, que pode ser usado para iterar sobre iterveis retornados por manipuladores handlers registrados. (#14531)

segment.source: Added the `bdDetect.scanForDevices` extension point.
segment.target: Adicionado o ponto de extenso `bdDetect.scanForDevices`.

segment.source: Handlers can be registered that yield `BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch` pairs that don't fit in existing categories, like USB or Bluetooth. (#14531)
segment.target: Os manipuladores podem ser registrados para gerar pares `BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch` que no se encaixam nas categorias existentes, como USB ou Bluetooth. (#14531)

segment.source: Added extension point: `synthDriverHandler.synthChanged`. (#14618)
segment.target: Adicionado ponto de extenso: `synthDriverHandler.synthChanged`. (#14618)

segment.source: The NVDA Synth Settings Ring now caches available setting values the first time they're needed, rather than when loading the synthesizer. (#14704)
segment.target: O Anel de Configuraes de Voz do NVDA agora armazena em cache os valores de configurao disponveis na primeira vez em que so necessrios, em vez de carregar o sintetizador. (#14704)

segment.source: You can now call the export method on a gesture map to export it to a dictionary.
segment.target: Agora voc pode chamar o mtodo de exportao em um mapa de gestos para export-lo para um dicionrio.

segment.source: This dictionary can be imported in another gesture by passing it either to the constructor of `GlobalGestureMap` or to the update method on an existing map. (#14582)
segment.target: Este dicionrio pode ser importado em outro gesture passando-o para o construtor de `GlobalGestureMap` ou para o mtodo de atualizao em um mapa existente. (#14582)

segment.source: `hwIo.base.IoBase` and its derivatives now have a new constructor parameter to take a `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`.
segment.target: `hwIo.base.IoBase` e seus derivados agora tm um novo parmetro de construtor para receber um `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`.

segment.source: If not provided, the default thread is used. (#14627)
segment.target: Se no for fornecido, o encadeamento thread padro ser usado. (#14627)

segment.source: `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread` now has a `setWaitableTimer` method to set a waitable timer using a python function.
segment.target: `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread` agora tem um mtodo `setWaitableTimer` para definir um temporizador de espera usando uma funo python.

segment.source: Similarly, the new `getCompletionRoutine` method allows you to convert a python method into a completion routine safely. (#14627)
segment.target: Da mesma forma, o novo mtodo `getCompletionRoutine` permite que voc converta um mtodo python em uma rotina de concluso com segurana. (#14627)

segment.source: `offsets.OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects` should now always return `List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]` as expected for a subclass of `textInfos.TextInfo`. (#12424)
segment.target: `offsets.OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects` agora deve sempre retornar `List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]` como esperado para uma subclasse de `textInfos.TextInfo`. (#12424)

segment.source: `highlight-color` is now a format field attribute. (#14610)
segment.target: `highlight-color` agora um atributo de campo de formato. (#14610)

segment.source: NVDA should more accurately determine if a logged message is coming from NVDA core. (#14812)
segment.target: O NVDA deve determinar com mais preciso se uma mensagem em log est vindo do ncleo core do NVDA. (#14812)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer log inaccurate warnings or errors about deprecated appModules. (#14806)
segment.target: O NVDA no mais colocar no log avisos imprecisos ou erros sobre appModules mdulos de aplicativos obsoletos. (#14806)

segment.source: All NVDA extension points are now briefly described in a new, dedicated chapter in the Developer Guide. (#14648)
segment.target: Todos os pontos de extenso do NVDA agora so brevemente descritos em um novo captulo dedicado no Guia do Desenvolvedor. (#14648)

segment.source: `scons checkpot` will no longer check the `userConfig` subfolder anymore. (#14820)
segment.target: `scons checkpot` no verificar mais a subpasta `userConfig`. (#14820)

segment.source: Translatable strings can now be defined with a singular and a plural form using `ngettext` and `npgettext`. (#12445)
segment.target: Cadeia de caracteres Strings traduzveis agora podem ser definidas com uma forma singular e plural usando `ngettext` e `npgettext`. (#12445)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is deprecated.
segment.target: Passar funes lambda para `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` est obsoleto.

segment.source: Instead, functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627)
segment.target: Em vez disso, as funes devem ser fracamente referenciadas. (#14627)

segment.source: Importing `LPOVERLAPPED_COMPLETION_ROUTINE` from `hwIo.base` is deprecated.
segment.target: A importao de `LPOVERLAPPED_COMPLETION_ROUTINE` de `hwIo.base` est obsoleta.

segment.source: Instead import from `hwIo.ioThread`. (#14627)
segment.target: Em vez disso, importe de `hwIo.ioThread`. (#14627)

segment.source: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` is deprecated.
segment.target: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` est obsoleto.

segment.source: It was introduced in NVDA 2023.1 and was never meant to be part of the public API.
segment.target: Foi introduzido no NVDA 2023.1 e nunca foi feito para fazer parte da API pblica.

segment.source: Until removal, it behaves as a no-op, i.e. a context manager yielding nothing. (#14924)
segment.target: At a remoo, ele se comporta como um no-op, ou seja, um gerenciador de contexto que no produz nada. (#14924)

segment.source: `gui.MainFrame.onAddonsManagerCommand` is deprecated, use `gui.MainFrame.onAddonStoreCommand` instead. (#13985)
segment.target: `gui.MainFrame.onAddonsManagerCommand` est obsoleto, use `gui.MainFrame.onAddonStoreCommand` em seu lugar. (#13985)

segment.source: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath` is deprecated, use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead. (#15021)
segment.target: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath` est obsoleto, use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` em seu lugar. (#15021)

segment.source: Importing `voiceDictsPath` and `voiceDictsBackupPath` from `speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade` is deprecated.
segment.target: A importao de `voiceDictsPath` e `voiceDictsBackupPath` de `speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade` est obsoleta.

segment.source: Instead use `WritePaths.voiceDictsDir` and `WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir` from `NVDAState`. (#15048)
segment.target: Em vez disso, use `WritePaths.voiceDictsDir` e `WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir` de `NVDAState`. (#15048)

segment.source: `config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY` is deprecated.
segment.target: `config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY` est obsoleto.

segment.source: Instead use `config.RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY`. (#15049)
segment.target: Em vez disso, use `config.RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY`. (#15049)

segment.source: A new option has been added, "Paragraph Style" in "Document Navigation".
segment.target: Foi adicionada uma nova opo, "Estilo de Pargrafo" em "Navegao de Documento".

segment.source: This can be used with text editors that do not support paragraph navigation natively, such as Notepad and Notepad++.
segment.target: Isso pode ser usado com editores de texto que no suportam a navegao de pargrafos nativamente, como Bloco de notas e Notepad++.

segment.source: There is a new global command to report the destination of a link, mapped to `NVDA+k`.
segment.target: H um novo comando global para relatar o destino de um link, mapeado para `NVDA+k`.

segment.source: Support for annotated web content (such as comments and footnotes) has improved.
segment.target: Melhorado o suporte para contedo web anotado (como comentrios e notas de rodap).

segment.source: Press `NVDA+d` to cycle through summaries when annotations are reported (e.g. "has comment, has footnote").
segment.target: Pressione `NVDA+d` para percorrer os resumos quando as anotaes forem relatadas (por exemplo, "tem comentrios, tem nota de rodap").

segment.source: Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 braille displays are now supported.
segment.target: As linhas Braille Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 agora so suportadas.

segment.source: Support for ARM64 and AMD64 versions of Windows has improved.
segment.target: O suporte para as verses ARM64 e AMD64 do Windows melhorou.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, notably Windows 11 fixes.
segment.target: Existem muitas correes de falhas, principalmente correes em Windows 11.

segment.source: eSpeak, LibLouis, Sonic rate boost and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: eSpeak, LibLouis, Aumento especial de velocidade Sonic e Unicode CLDR foram atualizados.

segment.source: There are new Georgian, Swahili (Kenya) and Chichewa (Malawi) braille tables.
segment.target: Existem novas tabelas braille georgiana, suali (Qunia) e nianja (Malawi).

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Nota:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Esta verso quebra a compatibilidade com os complementos existentes.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation: Automatic reporting of column and row headers in tables. (#14228)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation Automao da Interface do Usurio : anncio automtico de cabealhos de colunas e linhas em tabelas. (#14228)

segment.source: Note: This is referring to tables formatted via the "Table" button on the Insert pane of the Ribbon.
segment.target: NOTA: Isso se refere s tabelas formatadas atravs do boto "Tabela" no painel Inserir da Faixa de Opes.

segment.source: "First Column" and "Header Row" in "Table Style Options" correspond to column and row headers respectively.
segment.target: "Primeira coluna" e "Linha do cabealho" em "Opes de estilo de tabela" correspondem aos cabealhos da coluna e da linha, respectivamente.

segment.source: This is not referring to screen reader specific headers via named ranges, which is currently not supported via UI Automation.
segment.target: Isso no est se referindo aos cabealhos especficos do leitor de tela por meio de intervalos nomeados, que atualmente no so suportados via UI Automation.

segment.source: An unassigned script has been added to toggle delayed character descriptions. (#14267)
segment.target: Um script no atribudo foi adicionado para alternar as descries de caracteres com atraso. (#14267)

segment.source: Added an experimental option to leverage the UIA notification support in Windows Terminal to report new or changed text in the terminal, resulting in improved stability and responsivity. (#13781)
segment.target: Adicionado uma opo experimental para alavancar o suporte de notificaes UIA no Terminal Windows para relatar texto novo ou alterado no terminal, resultando em maior estabilidade e responsividade. (#13781)

segment.source: Consult the user guide for limitations of this experimental option.
segment.target: Consulte o Guia do Usurio para as limitaes desta opo experimental.

segment.source: On Windows 11 ARM64, browse mode is now available in AMD64 apps such as Firefox, Google Chrome and 1Password. (#14397)
segment.target: No Windows 11 ARM64, o modo de navegao agora est disponvel em aplicativos AMD64, como Firefox, Google Chrome e 1Password. (#14397)

segment.source: A new option has been added, "Paragraph Style" in "Document Navigation".
segment.target: Uma nova opo foi adicionada, "Estilo de Pargrafo" em "Navegao de Documento".

segment.source: This adds support for single line break (normal) and multi line break (block) paragraph navigation.
segment.target: Isso adiciona suporte para navegao de pargrafos com quebra de linha nica (normal) e quebra de linha mltipla (bloco).

segment.source: This can be used with text editors that do not support paragraph navigation natively, such as Notepad and Notepad++. (#13797)
segment.target: Isso pode ser usado com editores de texto que no suportam a navegao de pargrafos nativamente, como Bloco de notas e Notepad++. (#13797)

segment.source: The presence of multiple annotations are now reported.
segment.target: A presena de mltiplas anotaes agora relatada.

segment.source: `NVDA+d` now cycles through reporting the summary of each annotation target for origins with multiple annotation targets.
segment.target: `NVDA+d` agora circula informando o resumo de cada destino de anotao para origens com vrios destinos de anotao.

segment.source: For example, when text has a comment and a footnote associated with it. (#14507, #14480)
segment.target: Por exemplo, quando o texto tem um comentrio e uma nota de rodap associada a ele. (#14507, #14480)

segment.source: Added support for Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 braille displays. (#13045)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para Linhas Braille Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80. (#13045)

segment.source: New global command: Report link destination (`NVDA+k`).
segment.target: Novo comando global: Relatar destino de link (`NVDA+k`).

segment.source: Pressed once will speak/braille the destination of the link that is in the navigator object.
segment.target: Pressionado uma vez ir falar/braille o destino do link que est no objeto de navegao.

segment.source: Pressing twice will show it in a window, for more detailed review. (#14583)
segment.target: Pressionar duas vezes o mostrar em uma janela, para uma explorao mais detalhada. (#14583)

segment.source: New unmapped global command (Tools category): Report link destination in a window.
segment.target: Novo comando global no mapeado (categoria de ferramentas): Relatar destino de link numa janela.

segment.source: Same as pressing `NVDA+k` twice, but may be more useful for braille users. (#14583)
segment.target: O mesmo que pressionar `NVDA+k` duas vezes, mas pode ser mais til para os usurios de Braille. (#14583)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.24.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.24.0). (#14436)
segment.target: Atualizado o transcritor braille LibLouis para [3.24.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.24.0). (#14436)

segment.source: Major updates to Hungarian, UEB, and Chinese bopomofo braille.
segment.target: Principais atualizaes para braille hngaro, UEB Braille Ingls Unificado e bopomofo chins.

segment.source: Support for the Danish braille standard 2022.
segment.target: Suporte ao Braille dinamarqus padro 2022.

segment.source: New braille tables for Georgian literary braille, Swahili (Kenya) and Chichewa (Malawi).
segment.target: Novas tabelas braille para braille literrio georgiano, suali (Qunia) e nianja (Malawi).

segment.source: Updated Sonic rate boost library to commit `1d70513`. (#14180)
segment.target: Biblioteca Sonic de aumento de velocidade atualizada para commit `1d70513`. (#14180)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 42.0. (#14273)
segment.target: Atualizado o CLDR Repositrio de Dados de Localidade Comum para a verso 42.0. (#14273)

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `f520fecb`. (#14281, #14675)
segment.target: eSpeak NG foi atualizado para o 1.52-dev commit `f520fecb`. (#14281, #14675)

segment.source: Fixed reporting of large numbers. (#14241)
segment.target: Corrigido anncio de grandes nmeros. (#14241)

segment.source: Java applications with controls using the selectable state will now announce when an item is not selected rather than when the item is selected. (#14336)
segment.target: Os aplicativos Java com controles usando o estado selecionvel agora anunciaro quando um item no est selecionado ao invs de quando o item est selecionado. (#14336)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Correes para Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA will announce search highlights when opening Start menu. (#13841)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar os destaques da pesquisa ao abrir o menu Iniciar. (#13841)

segment.source: On ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)
segment.target: Em ARM, os aplicativos x64 no so mais identificados como aplicativos ARM64. (#14403)

segment.source: Clipboard history menu items such as "pin item" can be accessed. (#14508)
segment.target: Itens de menu de histrico da rea de transferncia, como "fixar item", podem ser acessados. (#14508)

segment.source: In Windows 11 22H2 and newer, it is again possible to use mouse and touch interaction to interact with areas such as the system tray overflow window and "Open With" dialog. (#14538, #14539)
segment.target: No Windows 11 22H2 e mais recente, novamente possvel usar o mouse e a interao por toque para interagir com reas como a janela de estouro da bandeja do sistema e a caixa de dilogo "Abrir com". (#14538, #14539)

segment.source: Suggestions are reported when typing an @mention in in Microsoft Excel comments. (#13764)
segment.target: As sugestes so relatadas ao digitar uma @meno nos comentrios do Microsoft Excel. (#13764)

segment.source: In the Google Chrome location bar, suggestion controls (switch to tab, remove suggestion etc) are now reported when selected. (#13522)
segment.target: Na barra de localizao do Google Chrome, os controles de sugesto (alternar para a guia, remover sugestes, etc) agora so relatados quando selecionados. (#13522)

segment.source: When requesting formatting information, colors are now explicitly reported in Wordpad or log viewer, rather than only "Default color". (#13959)
segment.target: Ao solicitar informaes de formatao, as cores agora so relatadas explicitamente no Wordpad ou no visualizador de log, em vez de apenas "cor padro". (#13959)

segment.source: In Firefox, activating the "Show options" button on GitHub issue pages now works reliably. (#14269)
segment.target: No Firefox, ativar o boto "Mostrar opes" nas pginas de issue do GitHub agora funciona de maneira confivel. (#14269)

segment.source: The date picker controls in Outlook 2016 / 365 Advanced search dialog now report their label and value. (#12726)
segment.target: Os controles do seletor de data no dilogo de pesquisa avanada do Outlook 2016 / 365 agora relatam seu rtulo e valor. (#12726)

segment.source: ARIA switch controls are now actually reported as switches in Firefox, Chrome and Edge, rather than checkboxes. (#11310)
segment.target: Os controles ARIA de interruptores agora so relatados como interruptores no Firefox, Chrome e Edge, em vez de caixas de seleo. (#11310)

segment.source: NVDA will automatically announce the sort state on an HTML table column header when changed by pressing an inner button. (#10890)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar automaticamente o estado de classificao ordenao em um cabealho de coluna de tabela HTML quando alterado pressionando um boto interno. (#10890)

segment.source: A landmark or region's name is always automatically spoken when jumping inside from outside using quick navigation or focus in browse mode. (#13307)
segment.target: Um nome de marco ou da regio sempre falado automaticamente ao saltar de fora para dentro usando navegao rpida ou foco no modo de navegao. (#13307)

segment.source: When beep or announce 'cap' for capitals is enabled with delayed character descriptions, NVDA no longer beeps or announces 'cap' twice. (#14239)
segment.target: Quando bipar ou anunciar 'maiscula' para maisculas ativado com descries de caracteres com atraso, o NVDA no bipa ou anuncia 'maiscula' duas vezes. (#14239)

segment.source: Controls in tables in Java applications will now be announced more accurately by NVDA. (#14347)
segment.target: Os controles nas tabelas nos aplicativos Java agora sero anunciados com mais preciso pelo NVDA. (#14347)

segment.source: Some settings will no longer be unexpectedly different when used with multiple profiles. (#14170)
segment.target: Algumas configuraes no sero mais inesperadamente diferentes quando usadas com vrios perfis. (#14170)

segment.source: The following settings have been addressed:
segment.target: As seguintes configuraes foram abordadas:

segment.source: Line indentation in Document formatting settings.
segment.target: Recuo de linha nas configuraes de formatao de documentos.

segment.source: Cell borders in doc formatting settings
segment.target: Bordas de clula em configuraes de formatao de documento

segment.source: Show messages in braille settings
segment.target: Mostrar mensagens em configuraes de Braille

segment.source: Tether Braille in braille settings
segment.target: Vincular braille em configuraes de braille

segment.source: In some rare cases, these settings used in profiles may be unexpectedly modified when installing this version of NVDA.
segment.target: Em alguns casos raros, essas configuraes usadas nos perfis podem ser inesperadamente modificadas ao instalar esta verso do NVDA.

segment.source: Please check these options in your profiles after upgrading NVDA to this version.
segment.target: Verifique essas opes em seus perfis aps a atualizao do NVDA para esta verso.

segment.source: Emojis should now be reported in more languages. (#14433)
segment.target: Os emojis agora devem ser relatados em mais idiomas. (#14433)

segment.source: The presence of an annotation is no longer missing in braille for some elements. (#13815)
segment.target: A presena de uma anotao no est mais faltando em Braille para alguns elementos. (#13815)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where config changes not save correctly when changing between a "Default" option and the value of the "Default" option. (#14133)
segment.target: Corrigido um problema em que as alteraes de configurao no salvam corretamente ao alterar uma opo "padro" e o valor da opo "padro". (#14133)

segment.source: When configuring NVDA there will always be at least one key defined as an NVDA key. (#14527)
segment.target: Ao configurar o NVDA, sempre haver pelo menos uma tecla definida como uma tecla NVDA. (#14527)

segment.source: When accessing the NVDA menu via the notification area, NVDA will not suggest a pending update anymore when no update is available. (#14523)
segment.target: Ao acessar o menu NVDA atravs da rea de notificao, o NVDA no sugerir mais uma atualizao pendente quando nenhuma atualizao estiver disponvel. (#14523)

segment.source: Remaining, elapsed and total time is now reported correctly for audio files over a day long in foobar2000. (#14127)
segment.target: Agora, o tempo restante, decorrido e total relatado corretamente para arquivos de udio com mais de um dia de durao no foobar2000. (#14127)

segment.source: In web browsers such as Chrome and Firefox, alerts such as file downloads are shown in braille in addition to being spoken. (#14562)
segment.target: Nos navegadores Web, como Chrome e Firefox, alertas como downloads de arquivos so mostrados em Braille, alm de serem falados. (#14562)

segment.source: Bug fixed when navigating to the first and last column in a table in Firefox (#14554)
segment.target: Falha corrigida ao navegar para a primeira e a ltima coluna em uma tabela no Firefox (#14554)

segment.source: When NVDA is launched with `--lang=Windows` parameter, it is again possible to open NVDA's General settings dialog. (#14407)
segment.target: Quando o NVDA iniciado com o parmetro `--lang=Windows`, novamente possvel abrir o dilogo Configuraes gerais do NVDA. (#14407)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to continue reading in Kindle for PC after turning the page. (#14390)
segment.target: O NVDA no falha mais em continuar lendo no Kindle para PC depois de virar a pgina. (#14390)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Observao: esta uma verso de quebra de compatibilidade de API Add-on Interface de Programao de Aplicativos para complementos.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Os complementos precisaro ser testados novamente e ter seu manifest manifesto atualizado.

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Consulte [o guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter informaes sobre o processo de descontinuao e remoo de API do NVDA.

segment.source: System tests should now pass when run locally on non-English systems. (#13362)
segment.target: Os testes do sistema agora devem passar quando executados localmente em sistemas que no estejam em ingls. (#13362)

segment.source: In Windows 11 on ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)
segment.target: No Windows 11 em ARM, os aplicativos x64 no so mais identificados como aplicativos ARM64. (#14403)

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to use `SearchField` and `SuggestionListItem` `UIA` `NVDAObjects` in new UI Automation scenarios, where automatic reporting of search suggestions, and where typing has been exposed via UI Automation with the `controllerFor` pattern.
segment.target: No mais necessrio usar `SearchField` e `SuggestionListItem` `UIA` `NVDAObjects` em novos cenrios de UI Automation, onde relato automtico de sugestes de pesquisa e onde a digitao foi exposta por UI Automation com o padro `controllerFor`.

segment.source: This functionality is now available generically via `behaviours.EditableText` and the base `NVDAObject` respectively. (#14222)
segment.target: Essa funcionalidade est agora disponvel genericamente via `behaviours.EditableText` e a base `NVDAObject` respectivamente. (#14222)

segment.source: The UIA debug logging category when enabled now produces significantly more logging for UIA event handlers and utilities. (#14256)
segment.target: A categoria de log de depurao da UIA quando ativada agora produz significativamente mais registro para os manipuladores e utilitrios de eventos da UIA. (#14256)

segment.source: NVDAHelper build standards updated. (#13072)
segment.target: Atualizados os padres de compilaes build standards de NVDAHelper. (#13072)

segment.source: Now uses the C++20 standard, was C++17.
segment.target: Agora usa o padro C++20, era C++17.

segment.source: Now uses the `/permissive-` compiler flag which disables permissive behaviors, and sets the `/Zc` compiler options for strict conformance.
segment.target: Agora usa o sinalizador flag do compilador `/permissive-` que desativa comportamentos permissivos e define as opes de compilador `/Zc` para conformidade estrita.

segment.source: Some plugin objects (e.g. drivers and add-ons) now have a more informative description in the NVDA python console. (#14463)
segment.target: Alguns objetos de plug-in (por exemplo, drivers e complementos) agora tm uma descrio mais informativa no console python do NVDA. (#14463)

segment.source: NVDA can now be fully compiled with Visual Studio 2022, no longer requiring the Visual Studio 2019 build tools. (#14326)
segment.target: Agora, o NVDA pode ser totalmente compilado com o Visual Studio 2022, que no exige mais as ferramentas de compilao build do Visual Studio 2019. (#14326)

segment.source: More detailed logging for NVDA freezes to aid debugging. (#14309)
segment.target: Log mais detalhado para congelamentos do NVDA para ajudar na depurao. (#14309)

segment.source: The singleton `braille._BgThread` class has been replaced with `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`. (#14130)
segment.target: A classe singleton `braille._BgThread` foi substituda por `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`. (#14130)

segment.source: A single instance `hwIo.bgThread` (in NVDA core) of this class provides background i/o for thread safe braille display drivers.
segment.target: Uma nica instncia `hwIo.bgThread` (no ncleo do NVDA) desta classe fornece E/S i/o de fundo para drivers de linha braille segura.

segment.source: This new class is not a singleton by design, add-on authors are encouraged to use their own instance when doing hardware i/o.
segment.target: Esta nova classe no um singleton por design, os autores de complementos so incentivados a usar sua prpria instncia ao fazer entrada/sada de hardware.

segment.source: The processor architecture for the computer can be queried from `winVersion.WinVersion.processorArchitecture attribute.` (#14439)
segment.target: A arquitetura do processador para o computador pode ser consultada de `winVersion.WinVersion.processorArchitecture attribute`. (#14439)

segment.source: New extension points have been added. (#14503)
segment.target: Novos pontos de extenso foram adicionados. (#14503)

segment.source: `inputCore.decide_executeGesture`
segment.target: `inputCore.decide_executeGesture`

segment.source: `tones.decide_beep`
segment.target: `tones.decide_beep`

segment.source: `nvwave.decide_playWaveFile`
segment.target: `nvwave.decide_playWaveFile`

segment.source: `braille.pre_writeCells`
segment.target: `braille.pre_writeCells`

segment.source: `braille.filter_displaySize`
segment.target: `braille.filter_displaySize`

segment.source: `braille.decide_enabled`
segment.target: `braille.decide_enabled`

segment.source: `braille.displayChanged`
segment.target: `braille.displayChanged`

segment.source: `braille.displaySizeChanged`
segment.target: `braille.displaySizeChanged`

segment.source: It is possible to set useConfig to False on supported settings for a synthesizer driver. (#14601)
segment.target: possvel definir o useConfig como False em configuraes suportadas para um driver de sintetizador. (#14601)

segment.source: API Breaking Changes
segment.target: Alteraes de Quebra da API

segment.source: These are breaking API changes.
segment.target: Estas so alteraes de quebra da API.

segment.source: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.
segment.target: Por favor abra um issue GitHub se o seu complemento tiver um problema com a atualizao para a nova API.

segment.source: The configuration specification has been altered, keys have been removed or modified:
segment.target: A especificao de configurao foi alterada, as chaves foram removidas ou modificadas:

segment.source: In `[documentFormatting]` section (#14233):
segment.target: Na seo `[documentFormatting]` (#14233):

segment.source: `reportLineIndentation` stores an int value (0 to 3) instead of a boolean
segment.target: `reportLineIndentation` armazena um valor int (0 a 3) em vez de um booleano

segment.source: `reportLineIndentationWithTones` has been removed.
segment.target: `reportLineIndentationWithTones` foi removido.

segment.source: `reportBorderStyle` and `reportBorderColor` have been removed and are replaced by `reportCellBorders`.
segment.target: `reportBorderStyle` e `reportBorderColor` foram removidos e esto substitudos por `reportCellBorders`.

segment.source: In `[braille]` section (#14233):
segment.target: Na seo `[braille]` (#14233):

segment.source: `noMessageTimeout` has been removed, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.
segment.target: `noMessageTimeout` foi removido, substitudo por um valor para `showMessages`.

segment.source: `messageTimeout` cannot take the value 0 anymore, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.
segment.target: `messageTimeout` no pode mais tomar o valor 0, substitudo por um valor para `showMessages`.

segment.source: `autoTether` has been removed; `tetherTo` can now take the value "auto" instead.
segment.target: `autoTether` foi removido; `tetherTo` agora pode pegar o valor "auto" automtico.

segment.source: In `[keyboard]` section (#14528):
segment.target: Na seo `[keyboard]` (#14528):

segment.source: `useCapsLockAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useNumpadInsertAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useExtendedInsertAsNVDAModifierKey` have been removed.
segment.target: `useCapsLockAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useNumpadInsertAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useExtendedInsertAsNVDAModifierKey` foram removidos.

segment.source: They are replaced by `NVDAModifierKeys`.
segment.target: Eles esto substitudos por `NVDAModifierKeys`.

segment.source: The `NVDAHelper.RemoteLoader64` class has been removed with no replacement. (#14449)
segment.target: A classe `NVDAHelper.RemoteLoader64` foi removida sem substituio. (#14449)

segment.source: The following functions in `winAPI.sessionTracking` are removed with no replacement. (#14416, #14490)
segment.target: As seguintes funes em `winAPI.sessionTracking` esto removidas sem substituio. (#14416, #14490)

segment.source: `isWindowsLocked`
segment.target: `isWindowsLocked`

segment.source: `handleSessionChange`
segment.target: `handleSessionChange`

segment.source: `unregister`
segment.target: `unregister`

segment.source: `register`
segment.target: `register`

segment.source: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`
segment.target: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`

segment.source: It is no longer possible to enable/disable the braille handler by setting `braille.handler.enabled`.
segment.target: No mais possvel habilitar/desabilitar o manipulador Braille definindo `braille.handler.enabled`.

segment.source: To disable the braille handler programatically, register a handler to `braille.handler.decide_enabled`. (#14503)
segment.target: Para desativar o manipulador Braille programaticamente, registre um manipulador em `braille.handler.decide_enabled`. (#14503)

segment.source: It is no longer possible to update the display size of the handler by setting `braille.handler.displaySize`.
segment.target: No mais possvel atualizar o tamanho da linha do manipulador definindo `braille.handler.displaySize`.

segment.source: To update the displaySize programatically, register a handler to `braille.handler.filter_displaySize`.
segment.target: Para atualizar o displaySize programaticamente, registre um manipulador em `braille.handler.filter_displaySize`.

segment.source: Refer to `brailleViewer` for an example on how to do this. (#14503)
segment.target: Consulte `brailleViewer` para obter um exemplo de como fazer isso. (#14503)

segment.source: There have been changes to the usage of `addonHandler.Addon.loadModule`. (#14481)
segment.target: Houve mudanas no uso de `addonHandler.Addon.loadModule`. (#14481)

segment.source: `loadModule` now expects dot as a separator, rather than backslash.
segment.target: `loadModule` agora espera o ponto como um separador, em vez de barra invertida.

segment.source: For example "lib.example" instead of "lib\example".
segment.target: Por exemplo, "lib.example" em vez de "lib\example".

segment.source: `loadModule` now raises an exception when a module can't be loaded or has errors, instead of silently returning `None` without giving information about the cause.
segment.target: `loadModule` agora levanta uma exceo quando um mdulo no pode ser carregado ou tem erros, em vez de retornar silenciosamente `None` sem fornecer informaes sobre a causa.

segment.source: The following symbols have been removed from `appModules.foobar2000` with no direct replacement. (#14570)
segment.target: Os seguintes smbolos foram removidos de `appModules.foobar2000` sem substituio direta. (#14570)

segment.source: `statusBarTimes`
segment.target: `statusBarTimes`

segment.source: `parseIntervalToTimestamp`
segment.target: `parseIntervalToTimestamp`

segment.source: `getOutputFormat`
segment.target: `getOutputFormat`

segment.source: `getParsingFormat`
segment.target: `getParsingFormat`

segment.source: The following are no longer singletons - their get method has been removed.
segment.target: A seguir, no so mais singletons - o mtodo GET foi removido.

segment.source: Usage of `Example.get()` is now `Example()`. (#14248)
segment.target: Uso de `Example.get()` agora `Example()`. (#14248)

segment.source: `UIAHandler.customAnnotations.CustomAnnotationTypesCommon`
segment.target: `UIAHandler.customAnnotations.CustomAnnotationTypesCommon`

segment.source: `UIAHandler.customProps.CustomPropertiesCommon`
segment.target: `UIAHandler.customProps.CustomPropertiesCommon`

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomProperties`
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomProperties`

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomAnnotationTypes`
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomAnnotationTypes`

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA` is deprecated and usage is discouraged. (#14047)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA` est obsoleto e o uso desencorajado. (#14047)

segment.source: `config.addConfigDirsToPythonPackagePath` has been moved.
segment.target: `config.addConfigDirsToPythonPackagePath` foi movido.

segment.source: Use `addonHandler.packaging.addDirsToPythonPackagePath` instead. (#14350)
segment.target: Ao invs use `addonHandler.packaging.addDirsToPythonPackagePath`. (#14350)

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.TETHER_*` are deprecated.
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.TETHER_*` esto obsoletos.

segment.source: Use `configFlags.TetherTo.*.value` instead. (#14233)
segment.target: Em vez disso use `configFlags.TetherTo.*.value`. (#14233)

segment.source: `utils.security.postSessionLockStateChanged` is deprecated.
segment.target: `utils.security.postSessionLockStateChanged` est obsoleto.

segment.source: Use `utils.security.post_sessionLockStateChanged` instead. (#14486)
segment.target: Em seu lugar use `utils.security.post_sessionLockStateChanged`. (#14486)

segment.source: `NVDAObject.hasDetails`, `NVDAObject.detailsSummary`, `NVDAObject.detailsRole` has been deprecated.
segment.target: `NVDAObject.hasDetails`, `NVDAObject.detailsSummary`, `NVDAObject.detailsRole` foram depreciados.

segment.source: Use `NVDAObject.annotations` instead. (#14507)
segment.target: Ao invs use `NVDAObject.annotations`. (#14507)

segment.source: `keyboardHandler.SUPPORTED_NVDA_MODIFIER_KEYS` is deprecated with no direct replacement.
segment.target: `keyboardHandler.SUPPORTED_NVDA_MODIFIER_KEYS` est depreciado sem substituio direta.

segment.source: Consider using the class `config.configFlags.NVDAKey` instead. (#14528)
segment.target: Em seu lugar considere usar a classe `config.configFlags.NVDAKey`. (#14528)

segment.source: `gui.MainFrame.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` has been deprecated.
segment.target: `gui.MainFrame.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` est obsoleto.

segment.source: Use `gui.MainFrame.SysTrayIcon.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` instead. (#14523)
segment.target: Ao invs use `gui.MainFrame.SysTrayIcon.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand`. (#14523)

segment.source: This release includes several new key commands, including table say all commands.
segment.target: Esta verso inclui vrias novas teclas de comando, incluindo comandos para leitura contnua em tabela.

segment.source: A "Quick Start Guide" section has been added to the User Guide.
segment.target: Uma seo "Guia de Incio Rpido" foi adicionada ao Guia do Usurio.

segment.source: There are also several bug fixes.
segment.target: H tambm vrias correes de falhas.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated and LibLouis has been updated.
segment.target: eSpeak e LibLouis foram atualizados.

segment.source: There are new Chinese, Swedish, Luganda and Kinyarwanda braille tables.
segment.target: Existem novas tabelas braille de chins, sueco, luganda e quiniaruanda.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Added a "Quick Start Guide" section to the User Guide. (#13934)
segment.target: Adicionada uma seo "Guia de Incio Rpido" ao Guia do Usurio. (#13934)

segment.source: Introduced a new command to check the keyboard shortcut of the current focus. (#13960)
segment.target: Introduzido um novo comando para verificar a tecla de atalho do foco atual. (#13960)

segment.source: Desktop: `shift+numpad2`.
segment.target: Computador de mesa: `shift+2 do teclado numrico`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+ctrl+shift+.`.
segment.target: Computador porttil: `NVDA+ctrl+shift+.`.

segment.source: Introduced new commands to move the review cursor by page where supported by the application. (#14021)
segment.target: Introduzidos novos comandos para mover o cursor de explorao por pgina onde suportado pelo aplicativo. (#14021)

segment.source: Move to previous page:
segment.target: Mover para a pgina anterior:

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+pageUp`.
segment.target: Computador de mesa: `NVDA+pageUp`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageUp`.
segment.target: Computador porttil: `NVDA+shift+pageUp`.

segment.source: Move to next page:
segment.target: Mover para a prxima pgina:

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+pageDown`.
segment.target: Computador de mesa: `NVDA+pageDown`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageDown`.
segment.target: Computador porttil: `NVDA+shift+pageDown`.

segment.source: Added the following table commands. (#14070)
segment.target: Adicionado os seguintes comandos de tabela. (#14070)

segment.source: Say all in column: `NVDA+control+alt+downArrow`
segment.target: Leitura contnua na coluna: `NVDA+control+alt+Seta para baixo`

segment.source: Say all in row: `NVDA+control+alt+rightArrow`
segment.target: Leitura contnua na linha: `NVDA+control+alt+Seta para direita`

segment.source: Read entire column: `NVDA+control+alt+upArrow`
segment.target: Leia a coluna inteira: `NVDA+control+alt+Seta para cima`

segment.source: Read entire row: `NVDA+control+alt+leftArrow`
segment.target: Leia a linha inteira: `NVDA+control+alt+Seta para esquerda`

segment.source: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation: NVDA now announces when moving out of a table within a spreadsheet. (#14165)
segment.target: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation Automao de Interface do Usurio : o NVDA agora anuncia quando sai de uma tabela dentro de uma planilha. (#14165)

segment.source: Reporting table headers can now be configured separately for rows and columns. (#14075)
segment.target: Anunciar cabealhos de tabela agora pode ser configurado separadamente para linhas e colunas. (#14075)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `735ecdb8`. (#14060, #14079, #14118, #14203)
segment.target: eSpeak NG foi atualizado para 1.52-dev commit `735ecdb8`. (#14060, #14079, #14118, #14203)

segment.source: Fixed reporting of Latin characters when using Mandarin. (#12952, #13572, #14197)
segment.target: Corrigido o anncio de caracteres latinos ao usar o mandarim. (#12952, #13572, #14197)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.23.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.23.0). (#14112)
segment.target: Transcritor braille LibLouis atualizado para [3.23.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.23.0). (#14112)

segment.source: Added braille tables:
segment.target: Adicionada tabelas braille:

segment.source: Chinese common braille (simplified Chinese characters)
segment.target: Chins braille comum (caracteres de chins simplificado)

segment.source: Kinyarwanda literary braille
segment.target: Quiniaruanda braille literrio

segment.source: Luganda literary braille
segment.target: Luganda braille literrio

segment.source: Swedish uncontracted braille
segment.target: Sueco braille no abreviado

segment.source: Swedish partially contracted braille
segment.target: Sueco braille parcialmente abreviado

segment.source: Swedish contracted braille
segment.target: Sueco braille abreviado

segment.source: Chinese (China, Mandarin) Current Braille System (no tones) (#14138)
segment.target: Chins (China, mandarim) Sistema Braille Atual (sem tons) (#14138)

segment.source: NVDA now includes the architecture of the operating system as part of user statistics tracking. (#14019)
segment.target: O NVDA agora inclui a arquitetura do sistema operacional como parte do rastreamento de estatsticas do usurio. (#14019)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: When updating NVDA using the Windows Package Manager CLI (aka winget), a released version of NVDA is no longer always treated as newer than whatever alpha version is installed. (#12469)
segment.target: Ao atualizar o NVDA usando a CLI do Gerenciador de Pacotes do Windows Windows Package Manager (tambm conhecido como winget), uma verso de lanamento do NVDA nem sempre tratada como mais recente do que qualquer verso alfa instalada. (#12469)

segment.source: NVDA will now correctly announce Group boxes in Java applications. (#13962)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciar corretamente as caixas de grupo em aplicativos Java. (#13962)

segment.source: Caret properly follows spoken text during "say all" in applications such as Bookworm, WordPad, or the NVDA log viewer. (#13420, #9179)
segment.target: O cursor segue corretamente o texto falado durante "leitura contnua" em aplicativos como Bookworm, WordPad ou o visualizador de log do NVDA. (#13420, #9179)

segment.source: In programs using UI Automation, partially checked checkboxes will be reported correctly. (#13975)
segment.target: Em programas que usam UI Automation, as caixas de seleo parcialmente marcadas sero informadas corretamente. (#13975)

segment.source: Improved performance and stability in Microsoft Visual Studio, Windows Terminal, and other UI Automation based applications. (#11077, #11209)
segment.target: Desempenho e estabilidade aprimorados no Microsoft Visual Studio, Windows Terminal e outros aplicativos baseados em UI Automation. (#11077, #11209)

segment.source: These fixes apply to Windows 11 Sun Valley 2 (version 22H2) and later.
segment.target: Essas correes se aplicam ao Windows 11 Sun Valley 2 (verso 22H2) e posterior.

segment.source: Selective registration for UI Automation events and property changes now enabled by default.
segment.target: O registro seletivo para eventos UI Automation e alteraes de propriedade agora ativados por padro.

segment.source: Text reporting, Braille output, and password suppression now work as expected in the embedded Windows Terminal control in Visual Studio 2022. (#14194)
segment.target: Anncio de texto, sada em Braille e supresso de senha agora funcionam como esperado no controle incorporado do Terminal Windows no Visual Studio 2022. (#14194)

segment.source: NVDA is now DPI aware when using multiple monitors.
segment.target: NVDA agora ciente do DPI ao usar vrios monitores.

segment.source: There are several fixes for using a DPI setting higher than 100% or multiple monitors.
segment.target: Existem vrias correes para usar uma configurao de DPI superior a 100% ou vrios monitores.

segment.source: Issues may still exist with versions of Windows older than Windows 10 1809.
segment.target: Ainda podem existir problemas com verses do Windows anteriores ao Windows 10 1809.

segment.source: For these fixes to work, applications which NVDA interacts with also need to be DPI aware.
segment.target: Para que essas correes funcionem, os aplicativos com os quais o NVDA interage tambm precisam estar cientes do DPI.

segment.source: Note there are still known issues with Chrome and Edge. (#13254)
segment.target: Observe que ainda h problemas conhecidos com o Chrome e o Edge. (#13254)

segment.source: Visual highlighting frames should now be correctly placed in most applications. (#13370, #3875, #12070)
segment.target: Os quadros de realce visual agora devem ser colocados corretamente na maioria dos aplicativos. (#13370, #3875, #12070)

segment.source: Touch screen interaction should now be accurate for most applications. (#7083)
segment.target: A interao da tela de toque agora deve ser precisa para a maioria dos aplicativos. (#7083)

segment.source: Mouse tracking should now work for most applications. (#6722)
segment.target: O rastreamento do mouse agora deve funcionar para a maioria dos aplicativos. (#6722)

segment.source: Orientation state (landscape/portrait) changes are now correctly ignored when there is no change (e.g. monitor changes). (#14035)
segment.target: As alteraes do estado de orientao (paisagem/retrato) agora so ignoradas corretamente quando no h alterao (por exemplo, alteraes no monitor). (#14035)

segment.source: NVDA will announce dragging items on screen in places such as rearranging Windows 10 Start menu tiles and virtual desktops in Windows 11. (#12271, #14081)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar o arrastar de itens na tela em locais como reorganizar blocos do menu Iniciar do Windows 10 e reas de trabalho virtuais no Windows 11. (#12271, #14081)

segment.source: In advanced settings, "Play a sound for logged errors" option is now correctly restored to its default value when pressing the "Restore defaults" button. (#14149)
segment.target: Em configuraes avanadas, a opo "Tocar um som para erros registrados" agora restaurada corretamente para seu valor padro ao pressionar o boto "Restaurar padres". (#14149)

segment.source: NVDA can now select text using the `NVDA+f10` keyboard shortcut on Java applications. (#14163)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode selecionar texto usando o atalho de teclado `NVDA+f10` em aplicativos Java. (#14163)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer get stuck in a menu when arrowing up and down threaded conversations in Microsoft Teams. (#14355)
segment.target: O NVDA no ficar mais preso em um menu ao navegar para cima e para baixo em conversas encadeadas no Microsoft Teams. (#14355)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Consulte [o guia do desenvolvedor](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) para obter informaes sobre o processo de descontinuao e remoo de API do NVDA.

segment.source: The [NVDA API Announcement mailing list](https://groups.google.com/a/nvaccess.org/g/nvda-api/about) was created. (#13999)
segment.target: A [lista de discusso de anncios da API do NVDA](https://groups.google.com/a/nvaccess.org/g/nvda-api/about) foi criada. (#13999)

segment.source: NVDA no longer processes `textChange` events for most UI Automation applications due to their extreme negative performance impact. (#11002, #14067)
segment.target: O NVDA no processa mais eventos `textChange` para a maioria dos aplicativos de UI Automation devido ao seu impacto extremamente negativo no desempenho. (#11002, #14067)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: `core.post_windowMessageReceipt` is deprecated, use `winAPI.messageWindow.pre_handleWindowMessage` instead.
segment.target: `core.post_windowMessageReceipt` est obsoleto, use `winAPI.messageWindow.pre_handleWindowMessage` em seu lugar.

segment.source: `winKernel.SYSTEM_POWER_STATUS` is deprecated and usage is discouraged, this has been moved to `winAPI._powerTracking.SystemPowerStatus`.
segment.target: `winKernel.SYSTEM_POWER_STATUS` est obsoleto e o uso desencorajado, ele foi movido para `winAPI._powerTracking.SystemPowerStatus`.

segment.source: `winUser.SM_*` constants are deprecated, use `winAPI.winUser.constants.SystemMetrics` instead.
segment.target: As constantes `winUser.SM_*` esto obsoletas, use `winAPI.winUser.constants.SystemMetrics` em seu lugar.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix issues with 2022.3.2, 2022.3.1 and 2022.3.
segment.target: Esta uma verso menor para corrigir problemas com 2022.3.2, 2022.3.1 e 2022.3.

segment.source: This also addresses a security issue.
segment.target: Tambm resolve um problema de segurana.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Prevents possible system access (e.g. NVDA Python console) for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Impede possvel acesso ao sistema (por exemplo, console NVDA Python) para usurios no autenticados.

segment.source: ([GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7))
segment.target: ([GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixed bug where if NVDA freezes when locking, NVDA will allow access to the users desktop while on the Windows lock screen. (#14416)
segment.target: Corrigido falha em que, se o NVDA congelar ao bloquear, o NVDA permitir o acesso rea de trabalho do usurio enquanto estiver na tela de bloqueio do Windows. (#14416)

segment.source: Fixed bug where if NVDA freezes when locking, NVDA will not behave correctly, as if the device was still locked. (#14416)
segment.target: Corrigido falha onde se o NVDA congela ao bloquear, o NVDA no ir se comportar corretamente, como se o dispositivo ainda estivesse bloqueado. (#14416)

segment.source: Fixed accessibility issues with the Windows "forgot my PIN" process and Windows update/install experience. (#14368)
segment.target: Corrigidos problemas de acessibilidade com o processo "esqueci meu PIN" do Windows e a experincia de atualizao/instalao do Windows. (#14368)

segment.source: Fixed bug when trying to install NVDA in some Windows environments, e.g. Windows Server. (#14379)
segment.target: Corrigido falha ao tentar instalar o NVDA em alguns ambientes Windows, por exemplo, Windows Server. (#14379)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: `utils.security.isObjectAboveLockScreen(obj)` is deprecated, instead use `obj.isBelowLockScreen`. (#14416)
segment.target: `utils.security.isObjectAboveLockScreen(obj)` est obsoleto, em vez disso use `obj.isBelowLockScreen`. (#14416)

segment.source: The following functions in `winAPI.sessionTracking` are deprecated for removal in 2023.1. (#14416)
segment.target: As seguintes funes em `winAPI.sessionTracking` so obsoletas para remoo em 2023.1. (#14416)

segment.source: `isWindowsLocked`
segment.target: `isWindowsLocked`

segment.source: `handleSessionChange`
segment.target: `handleSessionChange`

segment.source: `unregister`
segment.target: `unregister`

segment.source: `register`
segment.target: `register`

segment.source: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`
segment.target: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix regressions with 2022.3.1 and address a security issue.
segment.target: Esta uma verso menor para corrigir regresses com 2022.3.1 e resolver um problema de segurana.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Prevents possible system level access for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Impede o possvel acesso ao nvel de sistema para usurios no autenticados.

segment.source: ([GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w))
segment.target: ([GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixes a regression from 2022.3.1 where certain functionality was disabled on secure screens. (#14286)
segment.target: Corrige uma regresso de 2022.3.1 em que certas funcionalidades foram desativadas em telas seguras. (#14286)

segment.source: Fixes a regression from 2022.3.1 where certain functionality was disabled after sign-in, if NVDA started on the lock screen. (#14301)
segment.target: Corrige uma regresso de 2022.3.1 em que certas funcionalidades eram desativadas aps a entrada login , se o NVDA iniciasse na tela de bloqueio. (#14301)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues.
segment.target: Esta uma verso menor para corrigir vrios problemas de segurana.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana para <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to elevate from user to system privileges.
segment.target: Corrigido o exploit onde era possvel elevar de usurio para privilgios de sistema.

segment.source: ([GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5))
segment.target: ([GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5))

segment.source: Fixed a security issue allowing access to the python console on the lock screen via a race condition for NVDA startup.
segment.target: Corrigido um problema de segurana que permitia o acesso ao console python na tela de bloqueio por meio de uma condio de corrida race condition para inicializao do NVDA.

segment.source: ([GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w))
segment.target: ([GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w))

segment.source: Fixed issue where speech viewer text is cached when locking Windows.
segment.target: Corrigido o problema em que o texto do visualizador de fala armazenado em cache ao bloquear o Windows.

segment.source: ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))
segment.target: ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Prevent an unauthenticated user from updating settings for speech and Braille viewer on the lock screen. ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))
segment.target: Evitar que um usurio no autenticado atualize as configuraes dos visualizadores de fala e Braille na tela de bloqueio. ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))

segment.source: A significant amount of this release was contributed by the NVDA development community.
segment.target: Uma poro expressiva desta verso foi contribuda pela comunidade de desenvolvimento do NVDA.

segment.source: This includes delayed character descriptions and improved Windows Console support.
segment.target: Isso inclui descries de caracteres com atraso e suporte aprimorado ao Console do Windows.

segment.source: This release also includes several bug fixes.
segment.target: Esta verso tambm inclui vrias correes de falhas.

segment.source: Notably, up-to-date versions of Adobe Acrobat/Reader will no longer crash when reading a PDF document.
segment.target: Notavelmente, as verses atualizadas do Adobe Acrobat/Reader no travaro mais ao ler um documento PDF.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated, which introduces 3 new languages: Belarusian, Luxembourgish and Totontepec Mixe.
segment.target: O eSpeak foi atualizado, introduzindo 3 novos idiomas: bielorrusso, luxemburgus e Mixe de Totontepec.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: In the Windows Console Host used by Command Prompt, PowerShell, and the Windows Subsystem for Linux on Windows 11 version 22H2 (Sun Valley 2) and later:
segment.target: No Host de Console do Windows usado pelo Prompt de Comando, PowerShell e o Subsistema Windows para Linux no Windows 11 verso 22H2 (Sun Valley 2) e posteriores:

segment.source: Vastly improved performance and stability. (#10964)
segment.target: Desempenho e estabilidade muito melhorados. (#10964)

segment.source: When pressing `control+f` to find text, the review cursor position is updated to follow the found term. (#11172)
segment.target: Ao pressionar `control+f` para localizar o texto, a posio do cursor de explorao atualizada para seguir o termo encontrado. (#11172)

segment.source: Reporting of typed text that does not appear on-screen (such as passwords) is disabled by default.
segment.target: O relato de texto digitado que no aparece na tela (como senhas) desabilitado por padro.

segment.source: It can be re-enabled in NVDA's advanced settings panel. (#11554)
segment.target: Ele pode ser reativado no painel de configuraes avanadas do NVDA. (#11554)

segment.source: Text that has scrolled offscreen can be reviewed without scrolling the console window. (#12669)
segment.target: O texto que rolou para fora da tela pode ser explorado sem rolar a janela do console. (#12669)

segment.source: More detailed text formatting information is available. ([microsoft/terminal PR 10336](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/10336))
segment.target: Informaes de formatao de texto mais detalhadas esto disponveis. ([microsoft/terminal PR 10336](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/10336))

segment.source: A new Speech option has been added to read character descriptions after a delay. (#13509)
segment.target: Uma nova opo de fala foi adicionada para ler as descries dos caracteres aps um atraso. (#13509)

segment.source: A new Braille option has been added to determine if scrolling the display forward/back should interrupt speech. (#2124)
segment.target: Uma nova opo Braille foi adicionada para determinar se rolar a linha para frente/trs deve interromper a fala. (#2124)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `9de65fcb`. (#13295)
segment.target: eSpeak NG foi atualizado para 1.52-dev commit `9de65fcb`. (#13295)

segment.source: Added languages:
segment.target: Idiomas adicionados:

segment.source: Belarusian
segment.target: Bielorrusso

segment.source: Luxembourgish
segment.target: Luxemburgus

segment.source: Totontepec Mixe
segment.target: Mixe de Totontepec

segment.source: When using UI Automation to access Microsoft Excel spreadsheet controls, NVDA is now able to report when a cell is merged. (#12843)
segment.target: Ao usar a UI Automation para acessar os controles de planilhas do Microsoft Excel, o NVDA agora capaz de informar quando uma clula est mesclada. (#12843)

segment.source: Instead of reporting "has details" the purpose of details is included where possible, for example "has comment". (#13649)
segment.target: Em vez de relatar "tem detalhes", o objetivo dos detalhes includo sempre que possvel, por exemplo, "tem comentrios". (#13649)

segment.source: The installation size of NVDA is now shown in Windows Programs and Feature section. (#13909)
segment.target: O tamanho da instalao do NVDA agora mostrado na seo Programas e Recursos do Windows. (#13909)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat / Reader 64 bit will no longer crash when reading a PDF document. (#12920)
segment.target: Adobe Acrobat / Reader 64 bits no travar mais ao ler um documento PDF. (#12920)

segment.source: Note that the most up to date version of Adobe Acrobat / Reader is also required to avoid the crash.
segment.target: Observe que a verso mais atualizada do Adobe Acrobat / Reader tambm necessria para evitar o travamento.

segment.source: Font size measurements are now translatable in NVDA. (#13573)
segment.target: As medidas de tamanho de fonte agora so traduzveis no NVDA. (#13573)

segment.source: Ignore Java Access Bridge events where no window handle can be found for Java applications.
segment.target: Ignora eventos Java Access Bridge onde nenhum identificador de janela pode ser encontrado para aplicativos Java.

segment.source: This will improve performance for some Java applications including IntelliJ IDEA. (#13039)
segment.target: Isso melhorar o desempenho de alguns aplicativos Java, incluindo o IntelliJ IDEA. (#13039)

segment.source: Announcement of selected cells for LibreOffice Calc is more efficient and no longer results in a Calc freeze when many cells are selected. (#13232)
segment.target: O anncio de clulas selecionadas para o LibreOffice Calc mais eficiente e no resulta mais no congelamento do Calc quando muitas clulas so selecionadas. (#13232)

segment.source: When running under a different user, Microsoft Edge is no longer inaccessible. (#13032)
segment.target: Ao executar com um usurio diferente, o Microsoft Edge no mais fica inacessvel. (#13032)

segment.source: When rate boost is off, eSpeak's rate does not drop anymore between rates 99% and 100%. (#13876)
segment.target: Quando o aumento especial de velocidade est desativado, a velocidade do eSpeak no cai mais entre as velocidades de 99% e 100%. (#13876)

segment.source: Fix bug which allowed 2 Input Gestures dialogs to open. (#13854)
segment.target: Correo de falha que permitia a abertura de 2 dilogos Definir Comandos. (#13854)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Updated Comtypes to version 1.1.11. (#12953)
segment.target: Comtypes atualizado para a verso 1.1.11. (#12953)

segment.source: In builds of Windows Console (`conhost.exe`) with an NVDA API level of 2 (`FORMATTED`) or greater, such as those included with Windows 11 version 22H2 (Sun Valley 2), UI Automation is now used by default. (#10964)
segment.target: Nas compilaes de Console do Windows (`conhost.exe`) com um nvel de API do NVDA de 2 (`FORMATTED`) ou superior, como aqueles includos no Windows 11 verso 22H2 (Sun Valley 2), a UI Automation agora usada por padro. (#10964)

segment.source: This can be overridden by changing the "Windows Console support" setting in NVDA's advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Isso pode ser substitudo alterando a configurao "Suporte ao Console do Windows" no painel de configuraes avanadas do NVDA.

segment.source: To find your Windows Console's NVDA API level, set "Windows Console support" to "UIA when available", then check the NVDA+F1 log opened from a running Windows Console instance.
segment.target: Para encontrar o nvel de API do NVDA do seu console do Windows, defina "Suporte ao console do Windows" para "UIA quando disponvel" e verifique o log do NVDA+F1 aberto a partir de uma instncia do console do Windows em execuo.

segment.source: The Chromium virtual buffer is now loaded even when the document object has the MSAA `STATE_SYSTEM_BUSY` exposed via IA2. (#13306)
segment.target: O exibidor buffer virtual do Chromium agora carregado mesmo quando o objeto documento tem o MSAA `STATE_SYSTEM_BUSY` exposto via IA2. (#13306)

segment.source: A config spec type `featureFlag` has been created for use with experimental features in NVDA. See `devDocs/featureFlag.md` for more information. (#13859)
segment.target: Um tipo de especificao de configurao `featureFlag` foi criado para uso com recursos experimentais no NVDA. Veja `devDocs/featureFlag.md` para mais informaes. (#13859)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: There are no deprecations proposed in 2022.3.
segment.target: No h obsolescncias propostas em 2022.3.

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir um problema de segurana.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixed an exploit where it was possible to open the NVDA python console via the log viewer on the lock screen.
segment.target: Corrigido um exploit onde era possvel abrir o console python do NVDA atravs do visualizador de log na tela de bloqueio.

segment.source: ([GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg))
segment.target: ([GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix an accidental API breakage introduced in 2022.2.1.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir uma quebra acidental de API introduzida em 2022.2.1.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixed a bug where NVDA did not announce "Secure Desktop" when entering a secure desktop.
segment.target: Corrigida uma falha onde o NVDA no anunciava "rea de Trabalho Segura" ao entrar numa rea de trabalho segura.

segment.source: This caused NVDA remote to not recognize secure desktops. (#14094)
segment.target: Isso fez com que o NVDA remoto no reconhecesse reas de trabalho seguras. (#14094)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug introduced in 2022.2.1 with input gestures.
segment.target: Esta uma verso de correo patch para corrigir uma falha introduzida em 2022.2.1 com comandos gestos de entrada.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixed a bug where input gestures didn't always work. (#14065)
segment.target: Corrigido uma falha onde os comandos gestos de entrada nem sempre funcionavam. (#14065)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Esta uma verso menor para corrigir um problema de segurana.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana para <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to run a python console from the lockscreen. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: Corrigido exploit onde era possvel executar um console python a partir da tela de bloqueio. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to escape the lockscreen using object navigation. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: Corrigido exploit onde era possvel escapar da tela de bloqueio usando a navegao de objetos. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: These deprecations are currently not scheduled for removal.
segment.target: Estas obsolescncias ainda no esto agendadas para remoo.

segment.source: The deprecated aliases will remain until further notice.
segment.target: Os nomes alternativos aliases obsoletos permanecero at segunda ordem.

segment.source: Please test the new API and provide feedback.
segment.target: Por favor, teste a nova API Interface de Programao de Aplicativos e fornea retroinformao feedback.

segment.source: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.
segment.target: Para autores de complemento add-on , abra um problema issue no GitHub se essas alteraes impedirem que a API atenda s suas necessidades.

segment.source: `appModules.lockapp.LockAppObject` should be replaced with `NVDAObjects.lockscreen.LockScreenObject`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: `appModules.lockapp.LockAppObject` deve ser substitudo por `NVDAObjects.lockscreen.LockScreenObject`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: `appModules.lockapp.AppModule.SAFE_SCRIPTS` should be replaced with `utils.security.getSafeScripts()`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: `appModules.lockapp.AppModule.SAFE_SCRIPTS` deve ser substitudo por `utils.security.getSafeScripts()`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: This release includes many bug fixes.
segment.target: Esta verso inclui muitas correes de falhas.

segment.source: Notably, there are significant improvements for Java based applications, braille displays and Windows features.
segment.target: Notavelmente, h melhorias significativas para aplicativos baseados em Java, linhas braille e recursos do Windows.

segment.source: New table navigation commands have been introduced.
segment.target: Novos comandos de navegao em tabela foram introduzidos.

segment.source: Unicode CLDR has been updated.
segment.target: CLDR Unicode foi atualizado.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, which includes a new German braille table.
segment.target: LibLouis foi atualizado, o que inclui uma nova tabela braille alem.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Support for interacting with Microsoft Loop Components in Microsoft Office products. (#13617)
segment.target: Suporte para interagir com Componentes Microsoft Loop em produtos do Microsoft Office. (#13617)

segment.source: New table navigation commands have been added. (#957)
segment.target: Novos comandos de navegao em tabela foram adicionados. (#957)

segment.source: `control+alt+home/end` to jump to first/last column.
segment.target: `control+alt+home/end` para pular para a primeira/ltima coluna.

segment.source: `control+alt+pageUp/pageDown` to jump to first/last row.
segment.target: `control+alt+pageUp/pageDown` para pular para a primeira/ltima linha.

segment.source: An unassigned script to cycle through language and dialect switching modes has been added. (#10253)
segment.target: Um script no atribudo sem tecla de atalho para alternar entre os modos de alternncia de idioma e dialeto foi adicionado. (#10253)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: NSIS has been updated to version 3.08. (#9134)
segment.target: NSIS foi atualizado para a verso 3.08. (#9134)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 41.0. (#13582)
segment.target: CLDR Common Locale Data Repository / Repositrio de Dados de Localidade Comum foi atualizado para a verso 41.0. (#13582)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.22.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.22.0). (#13775)
segment.target: Transcritor braille LibLouis atualizado para [3.22.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.22.0). (#13775)

segment.source: New braille table: German grade 2 (detailed)
segment.target: Nova tabela braille: alemo grau 2 (detalhado)

segment.source: Added new role for "busy indicator" controls. (#10644)
segment.target: Adicionada nova funo role para controles de "indicador de ocupado". (#10644)

segment.source: NVDA now announces when an NVDA action cannot be performed. (#13500)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anuncia quando uma ao do NVDA no pode ser executada. (#13500)

segment.source: This includes when:
segment.target: Isso inclui quando:

segment.source: Using the NVDA Windows Store version.
segment.target: Usando a verso NVDA da Loja do Windows Store.

segment.source: In a secure context.
segment.target: Num contexto seguro.

segment.source: Waiting for a response to a modal dialog.
segment.target: Aguardando uma resposta a uma caixa de dilogo modal.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixes for Java based applications:
segment.target: Correes para aplicativos baseados em Java:

segment.source: NVDA will now announce read-only state. (#13692)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciar o estado de somente leitura. (#13692)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce disabled/enabled state correctly. (#10993)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciar o estado desabilitado/habilitado corretamente. (#10993)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce function key shortcuts. (#13643)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciar atalhos de teclas de funo. (#13643)

segment.source: NVDA can now beep or speak on progress bars. (#13594)
segment.target: O NVDA agora pode bipar ou falar nas barras de progresso. (#13594)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer incorrectly remove text from widgets when presenting to the user. (#13102)
segment.target: O NVDA no ir mais remover incorretamente o texto dos widgets objetos ao apresentar ao usurio. (#13102)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce the state of toggle buttons. (#9728)
