segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciar o estado dos botes de alternncia. (#9728)

segment.source: NVDA will now identify the window in a Java application with multiple windows. (#9184)
segment.target: O NVDA agora identificar a janela em um aplicativo Java com mltiplas janelas. (#9184)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce position information for tab controls. (#13744)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciar informaes de posio para controles de guias. (#13744)

segment.source: Braille fixes:
segment.target: Correes para Braille:

segment.source: Fix braille output when navigating certain text in Mozilla rich edit controls, such as drafting a message in Thunderbird. (#12542)
segment.target: Corrige a sada braille ao navegar em determinado texto nos controles de edio rica do Mozilla, como redigir uma mensagem no Thunderbird. (#12542)

segment.source: When braille is tethered automatically and the mouse is moved with mouse tracking enabled,
segment.target: Quando o braille vinculado automaticamente e o mouse movido com o rastreamento do mouse ativado,

segment.source: text review commands now update the braille display with the spoken content. (#11519)
segment.target: os comandos de explorao de texto agora atualizam a linha braille com o contedo falado. (#11519)

segment.source: It is now possible to pan the braille display through content after use of text review commands. (#8682)
segment.target: Agora possvel movimentar a linha braille pelo contedo aps o uso de comandos de explorao de texto. (#8682)

segment.source: The NVDA installer can now run from directories with special characters. (#13270)
segment.target: O instalador do NVDA agora pode ser executado a partir de diretrios com caracteres especiais. (#13270)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer fails to report items in web pages when aria-rowindex, aria-colindex, aria-rowcount or aria-colcount attributes are invalid. (#13405)
segment.target: No Firefox, o NVDA no falha mais em informar itens em pginas da web quando os atributos aria-rowindex, aria-colindex, aria-rowcount ou aria-colcount so invlidos. (#13405)

segment.source: The cursor does not switch row or column anymore when using table navigation to navigate through merged cells. (#7278)
segment.target: O cursor no muda mais de linha ou coluna ao usar a navegao de tabela para navegar pelas clulas mescladas. (#7278)

segment.source: When reading non-interactive PDFs in Adobe Reader, the type and state of form fields (such as checkboxes and radio buttons) are now reported. (#13285)
segment.target: Ao ler PDFs no interativos no Adobe Reader, o tipo e o estado dos campos de formulrio (como caixas de seleo e botes de opo) agora so informados. (#13285)

segment.source: "Reset configuration to factory defaults" is now accessible in the NVDA menu during secure mode. (#13547)
segment.target: "Redefinir configurao para os padres de fbrica" agora est acessvel no menu do NVDA durante o modo seguro. (#13547)

segment.source: Any locked mouse keys will be unlocked when NVDA exits, previously the mouse button would remain locked. (#13410)
segment.target: Quaisquer teclas de mouse bloqueadas sero desbloqueadas quando o NVDA sair, anteriormente o boto do mouse permaneceria bloqueado. (#13410)

segment.source: Visual Studio now reports line numbers. (#13604)
segment.target: O Visual Studio agora informa nmeros de linha. (#13604)

segment.source: Note that for line number reporting to work, showing line numbers must be enabled in Visual Studio and NVDA.
segment.target: Observe que para que o relato de nmero da linha funcione, mostrar nmero das linhas deve estar habilitado no Visual Studio e no NVDA.

segment.source: Visual Studio now correctly reports line indentation. (#13574)
segment.target: O Visual Studio agora informa corretamente o recuo indentao da linha. (#13574)

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce Start menu search result details in recent Windows 10 and 11 releases. (#13544)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar mais uma vez os detalhes dos resultados de pesquisa do menu Iniciar nas verses recentes do Windows 10 e 11. (#13544)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator version 10.1908 and later,
segment.target: Na Calculadora verso 10.1908 e posterior do Windows 10 e 11,

segment.source: NVDA will announce results when more commands are pressed, such as commands from scientific mode. (#13383)
segment.target: o NVDA anunciar os resultados quando mais comandos forem pressionados, como comandos do modo cientfico. (#13383)

segment.source: In Windows 11, it is again possible to navigate and interact with user interface elements,
segment.target: No Windows 11, novamente possvel navegar e interagir com os elementos da interface do usurio,

segment.source: such as Taskbar and Task View using mouse and touch interaction. (#13506)
segment.target: como a Barra de Tarefas e a Exibio de Tarefas usando a interao por mouse e por toque. (#13506)

segment.source: NVDA will announce status bar content in Windows 11 Notepad. (#13688)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar o contedo da barra de status no Bloco de Notas do Windows 11. (#13688)

segment.source: Navigator object highlighting now shows up immediately upon activation of the feature. (#13641)
segment.target: O realce do objeto de navegao agora aparece imediatamente aps a ativao do recurso. (#13641)

segment.source: Fix reading single column list view items. (#13659, #13735)
segment.target: Corrige a leitura de itens em visualizao de lista de coluna nica. (#13659, #13735)

segment.source: Fix eSpeak automatic language switching for English and French falling back to British English and French (France). (#13727)
segment.target: Corrige a alternncia automtica de idioma do eSpeak para ingls e francs voltando para ingls britnico e francs (Frana). (#13727)

segment.source: Fix OneCore automatic language switching when trying to switch to a formerly installed language. (#13732)
segment.target: Corrige a alternncia automtica de idioma do OneCore ao tentar alternar para um idioma instalado anteriormente. (#13732)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Compiling NVDA dependencies with Visual Studio 2022 (17.0) is now supported.
segment.target: Agora h suporte para compilar dependncias do NVDA com o Visual Studio 2022 (17.0).

segment.source: For development and release builds, Visual Studio 2019 is still used. (#13033)
segment.target: Para compilaes de desenvolvimento e lanamento, o Visual Studio 2019 ainda usado. (#13033)

segment.source: When retrieving the count of selected children via accSelection,
segment.target: Ao recuperar a contagem de filhos selecionados via accSelection,

segment.source: the case where a negative child ID or an IDispatch is returned by `IAccessible::get_accSelection` is now handled properly. (#13277)
segment.target: o caso em que um ID filho negativo ou um IDispatch retornado por `IAccessible::get_accSelection` agora tratado corretamente. (#13277)

segment.source: New convenience functions `registerExecutableWithAppModule` and `unregisterExecutable` were added to the `appModuleHandler` module.
segment.target: Novas funes de convenincia `registerExecutableWithAppModule` e `unregisterExecutable` foram adicionadas ao mdulo `appModuleHandler`.

segment.source: They can be used to use a single App Module with multiple executables. (#13366)
segment.target: Elas podem ser usadas para utilizar um nico mdulo de aplicativo App Module por vrios executveis. (#13366)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Obsolescncias

segment.source: These are proposed API breaking changes.
segment.target: Estas so as alteraes propostas de quebra de API.

segment.source: The deprecated part of the API will continue to be available until the specified release.
segment.target: A parte obsoleta da API Interface de Programao de Aplicativos continuar disponvel at a verso especificada.

segment.source: If no release is specified, the plan for removal has not been determined.
segment.target: Se nenhuma verso for especificada, o plano de remoo no foi determinado.

segment.source: Note, the roadmap for removals is 'best effort' and may be subject to change.
segment.target: Observe que o roteiro para remoes o "melhor esforo" e pode estar sujeito a alteraes.

segment.source: Please test the new API and provide feedback.
segment.target: Por favor, teste a nova API e fornea retroinformao feedback.

segment.source: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.
segment.target: Para autores de complemento add-on , abra um problema issue no GitHub se essas alteraes impedirem que a API atenda s suas necessidades.

segment.source: `appModuleHandler.NVDAProcessID` is deprecated, use `globalVars.appPid` instead. (#13646)
segment.target: `appModuleHandler.NVDAProcessID` est obsoleto, use `globalVars.appPid` em vez disso. (#13646)

segment.source: `gui.quit` is deprecated, use `wx.CallAfter(mainFrame.onExitCommand, None)` instead. (#13498)
segment.target: `gui.quit` est obsoleto, use `wx.CallAfter(mainFrame.onExitCommand, None)` em vez disso. (#13498)

segment.source: Some alias appModules are marked as deprecated.
segment.target: Alguns nomes alternativos alias de mdulos de aplicativos appModules esto marcados como obsoletos.

segment.source: Code which imports from one of them, should instead import from the replacement module. (#13366)
segment.target: Cdigo que importar de um deles, deve importar do mdulo de substituio no seu lugar. (#13366)

segment.source: Removed module name |Replacement module
segment.target: Nome do mdulo removido |Mdulo de substituio

segment.target: teamtalk3 |teamtalk4classic

segment.target: textinputhost |windowsinternal_composableshell_experiences_textinput_inputapp

segment.target: win32calc |calc

segment.target: zend-eclipse-php |eclipse

segment.source: zendstudio |eclipse
segment.target: zendstudio |eclipse

segment.source: This release includes major improvements to UIA support with MS Office.
segment.target: Esta verso inclui grandes melhorias no suporte a UIA com o Ms Office.

segment.source: For Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 and higher on Windows 11, NVDA will use UI Automation to access Microsoft Word documents by default.
segment.target: Para o Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 ou superior no Windows 11, o NVDA usar a UI Automation para acessar documentos do Microsoft Word por padro.

segment.source: This provides a significant performance improvement over the old Object model access.
segment.target: Isso fornece uma melhoria significativa de desempenho em relao ao antigo acesso do modelo de objeto.

segment.source: There are improvements to braille display drivers including Seika Notetaker, Papenmeier and HID Braille.
segment.target: H melhorias nos drivers de linhas braille, incluindo Seika Notetaker, Papenmeier e HID Braille.

segment.source: There are also various Windows 11 bug fixes, for apps such as Calculator, Console, Terminal, Mail and Emoji Panel.
segment.target: H tambm vrias correes de falhas do Windows 11, para aplicativos como Calculadora, Console, Terminal, Email e Painel de Emoji.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG and LibLouis have been updated, adding new Japanese, German and Catalan tables.
segment.target: eSpeak-NG e LibLouis foram atualizados, adicionando novas tabelas japonesa, alem e catal.

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Nota:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Esta verso quebra a compatibilidade com complementos existentes.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Support for reporting notes in MS Excel with UI Automation enabled on Windows 11. (#12861)
segment.target: Suporte para anncio de notas no MS Excel com UI Automation Automao de Interface do Usurio habilitada no Windows 11. (#12861)

segment.source: In recent builds of Microsoft Word via UI Automation on Windows 11, the existence of bookmarks, draft comments and resolved comments are now reported in both speech and braille. (#12861)
segment.target: Em compilaes recentes do Microsoft Word via UI Automation no Windows 11, a existncia de marcadores, comentrios de rascunho e comentrios resolvidos agora so relatados em fala e braille. (#12861)

segment.source: The new `--lang` command line parameter allows overriding the configured NVDA language. (#10044)
segment.target: O novo parmetro de linha de comando `--lang` permite suplantar o idioma configurado do NVDA. (#10044)

segment.source: NVDA now warns about command line parameters which are unknown and not used by any add-ons. (#12795)
segment.target: O NVDA agora avisa sobre parmetros de linha de comando que so desconhecidos e no so usados por quaisquer complementos. (#12795)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word accessed via UI Automation, NVDA will now make use of mathPlayer to read and navigate Office math equations. (#12946)
segment.target: No Microsoft Word acessado via UI Automation, o NVDA agora far uso do mathPlayer para ler e navegar pelas equaes matemticas do Office. (#12946)

segment.source: For this to work, you must be running Microsoft Word 365/2016 build 14326 or later.
segment.target: Para que isso funcione, voc deve estar executando o Microsoft Word 365/2016 compilao 14326 ou posterior.

segment.source: MathType equations must also be manually converted to Office Math by selecting each, opening the context menu, choosing Equation options, Convert to Office Math.
segment.target: As equaes MathType tambm devem ser convertidas manualmente para Matemtica do Office selecionando cada uma delas, abrindo o menu de contexto, escolhendo opes de Equao, Converter para Matemtica do Office.

segment.source: Reporting of "has details" and the associated command to summarize the details relation have been updated to work in focus mode. (#13106)
segment.target: O anncio de "possui detalhes" e o comando associado para resumir a relao de detalhes foram atualizados para trabalhar no modo de foco. (#13106)

segment.source: Seika Notetaker can now be auto-detected when connected via USB and Bluetooth. (#13191, #13142)
segment.target: A Seika Notetaker agora pode ser detectada automaticamente quando conectada via USB e Bluetooth. (#13191, #13142)

segment.source: This affects the following devices: MiniSeika (16, 24 cells), V6, and V6Pro (40 cells)
segment.target: Isso afeta os seguintes dispositivos: MiniSeika (16, 24 celas), V6 e V6Pro (40 celas)

segment.source: Manually selecting the bluetooth COM port is also now supported.
segment.target: A seleo manual da porta COM do bluetooth tambm suportada.

segment.source: Added a command to toggle the braille viewer; there is no default associated gesture. (#13258)
segment.target: Adicionado um comando para alternar o visualizador de braille; no h nenhum gesto padro associado. (#13258)

segment.source: Added commands for toggling multiple modifiers simultaneously with a Braille display (#13152)
segment.target: Comandos adicionados para alternar vrios modificadores simultaneamente com uma linha Braille (#13152)

segment.source: The Speech Dictionary dialog now features a "Remove all" button to help clear a whole dictionary. (#11802)
segment.target: O dilogo Dicionrio de Fala agora apresenta um boto "Remover todas" para ajudar a limpar um dicionrio inteiro. (#11802)

segment.source: Added support for Windows 11 Calculator. (#13212)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para a Calculadora do Windows 11. (#13212)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word with UI Automation enabled on Windows 11, line numbers and section numbers can now be reported. (#13283, #13515)
segment.target: No Microsoft Word com UI Automation habilitada no Windows 11, nmeros de linha e nmeros de seo agora podem ser relatados. (#13283, #13515)

segment.source: For Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 and higher on Windows 11, NVDA will use UI Automation to access Microsoft Word documents by default, providing a significant performance improvement over the old Object model access. (#13437)
segment.target: Para o Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 ou superior no Windows 11, o NVDA usar a UI Automation para acessar documentos do Microsoft Word por padro, proporcionando uma melhoria significativa de desempenho em relao ao antigo acesso do modelo de objeto. (#13437)

segment.source: This includes documents in Microsoft Word itself, and also the message reader and composer in Microsoft Outlook.
segment.target: Isso inclui documentos no prprio Microsoft Word, e tambm o leitor e compositor de mensagens no Microsoft Outlook.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `7e5457f91e10`. (#12950)
segment.target: Espeak-ng foi atualizado para 1.51-dev commit `7e5457f91e10`. (#12950)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.21.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.21.0). (#13141, #13438)
segment.target: Transcritor braille liblouis atualizado para [3.21.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.21.0). (#13141, #13438)

segment.source: Added new braille table: Japanese (Kantenji) literary braille.
segment.target: Adicionada nova tabela braille: braille literrio japons (Kantenji).

segment.source: Added new German 6 dot computer braille table.
segment.target: Adicionada nova tabela braille informtico alemo de 6 pontos.

segment.source: Added Catalan grade 1 braille table. (#13408)
segment.target: Adicionada tabela braille catal grau 1. (#13408)

segment.source: NVDA will report selection and merged cells in LibreOffice Calc 7.3 and above. (#9310, #6897)
segment.target: O NVDA relatar a seleo e clulas mescladas no LibreOffice Calc 7.3 ou superior. (#9310, #6897)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) to 40.0. (#12999)
segment.target: Atualizado o Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) Repositrio de Dados de Localidade Comum Unicode para 40.0. (#12999)

segment.source: `NVDA+Numpad Delete` reports the location of the caret or focused object by default. (#13060)
segment.target: `NVDA+Delete do teclado Numrico` informa a localizao do cursor do sistema ou objeto focalizado por padro. (#13060)

segment.source: `NVDA+Shift+Numpad Delete` reports the location of the review cursor. (#13060)
segment.target: `NVDA+Shift+Delete do teclado Numrico` informa a localizao do cursor de explorao. (#13060)

segment.source: Added default bindings for toggling modifier keys to Freedom Scientific displays (#13152)
segment.target: Adicionadas associaes padro para alternar teclas modificadoras para linhas da Freedom Scientific (#13152)

segment.source: "Baseline" is no longer reported via the report text formatting command (`NVDA+f`). (#11815)
segment.target: "Linha base" no mais relatada atravs do comando de anunciar formatao de texto (`NVDA+f`). (#11815)

segment.source: Activate long description no longer has a default gesture assigned. (#13380)
segment.target: Ativar descrio longa no tem mais um comando gesto padro atribudo. (#13380)

segment.source: Report details summary now has a default gesture (`NVDA+d`). (#13380)
segment.target: O anncio de sumrio dos detalhes agora tem um comando gesto padro (`NVDA+d`). (#13380)

segment.source: NVDA needs to be restarted after installing MathPlayer. (#13486)
segment.target: O NVDA precisa ser reiniciado aps a instalao do MathPlayer. (#13486)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Clipboard manager pane should no longer incorrectly steal focus when opening some Office programs. (#12736)
segment.target: O painel do gerenciador da rea de transferncia no deve mais roubar o foco incorretamente ao abrir alguns programas do Office. (#12736)

segment.source: On a system where the user has chosen to swap the primary mouse button from the left to the right, NVDA will no longer accidentally bring up a context menu instead of activating an item, in applications such as web browsers. (#12642)
segment.target: Em um sistema onde o usurio optou por trocar o boto principal do mouse da esquerda para a direita, o NVDA no mais abrir acidentalmente um menu de contexto em vez de ativar um item, em aplicativos como navegadores web. (#12642)

segment.source: When moving the review cursor past the end of text controls, such as in Microsoft Word with UI Automation, "bottom" is correctly reported in more situations. (#12808)
segment.target: Ao mover o cursor de explorao alm do final dos controles de texto, como no Microsoft Word com UI Automation, "fundo" relatado corretamente em mais situaes. (#12808)

segment.source: NVDA can report the application name and version for binaries placed in system32 when running under 64-bit version of Windows. (#12943)
segment.target: O NVDA pode relatar o nome e a verso do aplicativo para binrios colocados em system32 quando executado na verso de 64-bit do Windows. (#12943)

segment.source: Improved consistency of output reading in terminal programs. (#12974)
segment.target: Melhor consistncia de leitura da sada em programas de terminal. (#12974)

segment.source: Note that in some situations, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters after the caret may again be read out.
segment.target: Observe que, em algumas situaes, ao inserir ou excluir caracteres no meio de uma linha, os caracteres aps o cursor do sistema podem ser lidos novamente.

segment.source: MS word with UIA: heading quick nav in browse mode no longer gets stuck on the final heading of a document, nor is this heading shown twice in the NVDA elements list. (#9540)
segment.target: MS word com UIA Automao de Interface do Usurio : navegao rpida de ttulo no modo de navegao no fica mais presa no ttulo final de um documento, nem este ttulo mostrado duas vezes na lista de elementos do NVDA. (#9540)

segment.source: In Windows 8 and later, the File Explorer status bar can now be retrieved using the standard gesture NVDA+end (desktop) / NVDA+shift+end (laptop). (#12845)
segment.target: No Windows 8 ou posterior, a barra de status do Explorador de Arquivos agora pode ser recuperada usando o comando gesto padro NVDA+end (computador de mesa) / NVDA+shift+end (computador porttil). (#12845)

segment.source: Incoming messages in the chat of Skype for Business are reported again. (#9295)
segment.target: As mensagens recebidas no chat do Skype for Business so relatadas novamente. (#9295)

segment.source: NVDA can again duck audio when using the SAPI5 synthesizer on Windows 11. (#12913)
segment.target: O NVDA pode novamente reduzir o udio ao usar o sintetizador SAPI5 no Windows 11. (#12913)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will announce labels for history and memory list items. (#11858)
segment.target: Na Calculadora do Windows 10, o NVDA anunciar rtulos para itens de lista de histrico e memria. (#11858)

segment.source: Gestures such as scrolling and routing again work with HID Braille devices. (#13228)
segment.target: Gestos como rolagem e encaminhamento funcionam novamente com dispositivos HID Braille. (#13228)

segment.source: Windows 11 Mail: After switching focus between apps, while reading a long email, NVDA no longer gets stuck on a line of the email. (#13050)
segment.target: Email do Windows 11: Depois de alternar o foco entre os aplicativos, ao ler um longo e-mail, o NVDA no fica mais preso em uma linha do e-mail. (#13050)

segment.source: HID braille: chorded gestures (e.g. `space+dot4`) can be successfully performed from the Braille display. (#13326)
segment.target: HID braille: comandos gestos com conjunto de teclas acordes (por exemplo, `espao+ponto4`) podem ser executados com sucesso a partir da linha Braille. (#13326)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where multiple settings dialogs could be opened at the same time. (#12818)
segment.target: Corrigido um problema em que vrias caixas de dilogo de configuraes podiam ser abertas ao mesmo tempo. (#12818)

segment.source: Fixed a problem where some Focus Blue Braille displays would stop working after waking the computer from sleep. (#9830)
segment.target: Corrigido um problema em que algumas linhas Braille Focus Blue paravam de funcionar depois de acordar o computador do modo de suspenso. (#9830)

segment.source: "Baseline" is no longer spuriously reported when the "report superscript and subscript" option is active. (#11078)
segment.target: "Linha base" no mais relatada de forma espria quando a opo "anunciar sobrescrito e subscrito" estiver ativa. (#11078)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer prevent navigation in emoji panel when selecting emojis. (#13104)
segment.target: No Windows 11, o NVDA no impedir mais a navegao no painel de emojis ao selecionar emojis. (#13104)

segment.source: Prevents a bug causing double-reporting when using Windows Console and Terminal. (#13261)
segment.target: Evita que uma falha cause relatos duplos ao usar o Windows Console e Terminal. (#13261)

segment.source: Fixed several cases where list items could not be reported in 64 bit applications, such as REAPER. (#8175)
segment.target: Corrigidos vrios casos em que os itens de lista no podiam ser relatados em aplicativos de 64 bit, como REAPER. (#8175)

segment.source: In the Microsoft Edge downloads manager, NVDA will now automatically switch to focus mode once the list item with the most recent download gains focus. (#13221)
segment.target: No gerenciador de downloads do Microsoft Edge, o NVDA agora alternar automaticamente para o modo de foco assim que o item da lista com o download mais recente ganhar foco. (#13221)

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes 64-bit versions of Notepad++ 8.3 and above to crash. (#13311)
segment.target: O NVDA no causa mais falhas nas verses de 64-bit do Notepad++ 8.3 ou superior. (#13311)

segment.source: Adobe Reader no longer crashes on startup if Adobe Reader's protected mode is enabled. (#11568)
segment.target: O Adobe Reader no trava mais na inicializao se o modo protegido do Adobe Reader estiver ativado. (#11568)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where selecting the Papenmeier Braille Display Driver caused NVDA to crash. (#13348)
segment.target: Corrigido um erro em que selecionar o driver da linha Braille Papenmeier causava o travamento do NVDA. (#13348)

segment.source: In Microsoft word with UIA: page number and other formatting is no longer inappropriately announced when moving from a blank table cell to a cell with content, or from the end of the document into existing content. (#13458, #13459)
segment.target: No Microsoft Word com UIA: o nmero da pgina e outras formataes no so mais anunciados de forma inadequada ao passar de uma clula da tabela em branco para uma clula com contedo ou do final do documento para o contedo existente. (#13458, #13459)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to report the page title and start automatically reading, when a page loads in Google chrome 100. (#13571)
segment.target: O NVDA no deixar de informar o ttulo da pgina e comear a ler automaticamente, quando uma pgina for carregada no Google Chrome 100. (#13571)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when resetting the NVDA configuration to factory defaults while speak command keys is on. (#13634)
segment.target: O NVDA no trava mais ao redefinir a configurao NVDA para os padres de fbrica enquanto a fala de teclas de comando est ativada. (#13634)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Note: this is a Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Nota: esta uma verso de quebra de compatibilidade da API de complemento Add-on. Os complementos precisaro ser testados novamente e ter seu manifesto manifest atualizado.

segment.source: Although NVDA still requires Visual Studio 2019, Builds should no longer fail if a newer version of Visual Studio (E.g. 2022) is installed along side 2019. (#13033, #13387)
segment.target: Embora o NVDA ainda exija o Visual Studio 2019, as compilaes no devem mais falhar se uma verso mais recente do Visual Studio (por exemplo, 2022) for instalada ao lado da 2019. (#13033, #13387)

segment.source: Updated SCons to version 4.3.0. (#13033)
segment.target: SCons atualizado para a verso 4.3.0. (#13033)

segment.source: Updated py2exe to version 0.11.1.0. (#13510)
segment.target: Atualizado py2exe para a verso 0.11.1.0. (#13510)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been removed. Use `apiLevel` instead. (#12955, #12660)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` foi removido. Use `apiLevel` em vez disso. (#12955, #12660)

segment.target: `TVItemStruct` foi removido de `sysTreeView32`. (#12935)

segment.source: `MessageItem` has been removed from the Outlook appModule. (#12935)
segment.target: `MessageItem` foi removido do Mdulo de aplicativo appModule do Outlook. (#12935)

segment.source: `audioDucking.AUDIODUCKINGMODE_*` constants are now a `DisplayStringIntEnum`. (#12926)
segment.target: As constantes `audioDucking.AUDIODUCKINGMODE_*` so agora um `DisplayStringIntEnum`. (#12926)

segment.source: usages should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*`
segment.target: os usos devem ser substitudos por `AudioDuckingMode.*`

segment.source: usages of `audioDucking.audioDuckingModes` should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*.displayString`
segment.target: usos de `audioDucking.audioDuckingModes` devem ser substitudos por `AudioDuckingMode.*.displayString`

segment.source: `audioDucking.ANRUS_ducking_*` constants usages should be replaced with `ANRUSDucking.*`. (#12926)
segment.target: Os usos das constantes `audioDucking.ANRUS_ducking_*` devem ser substitudos por `ANRUSDucking.*`. (#12926)

segment.source: `synthDrivers.sapi5` changes (#12927):
segment.target: Alteraes em `synthDrivers.sapi5` (#12927):

segment.source: `SPAS_*` usages should be replaced with `SPAudioState.*`
segment.target: Os usos de `SPAS_*` devem ser substitudos por `SPAudioState.*`

segment.source: `constants.SVSF*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.*`
segment.target: Os usos de `constants.SVSF*` devem ser substitudos por `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.*`

segment.source: Note: `SVSFlagsAsync` should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.Async` not `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.lagsAsync`
segment.target: Nota: `SVSFlagsAsync` deve ser substitudo por `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.Async` e no por `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.lagsAsync`

segment.source: `constants.SVE*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceEvents.*`
segment.target: Os usos de `constants.SVE*` devem ser substitudos por `SpeechVoiceEvents.*`

segment.source: The `soffice` appModule has the following classes and functions removed `JAB_OOTableCell`, `JAB_OOTable`, `gridCoordStringToNumbers`. (#12849)
segment.target: O Mdulo de aplicativo `soffice` tem as seguintes classes e funes removidas `JAB_OOTableCell`, `JAB_OOTable`, `gridCoordStringToNumbers`. (#12849)

segment.source: `core.CallCancelled` is now `exceptions.CallCancelled`. (#12940)
segment.target: `core.CallCancelled` agora `exceptions.CallCancelled`. (#12940)

segment.source: All constants starting with RPC from `core` and `logHandler` are moved into `RPCConstants.RPC` enum. (#12940)
segment.target: Todas as constantes comeando com RPC de `core` e `logHandler` esto movidas para a enum enumerao `RPCConstants.RPC`. (#12940)

segment.source: It is recommended that `mouseHandler.doPrimaryClick` and `mouseHandler.doSecondaryClick` functions should be used to click the mouse to perform a logical action such as activating (primary) or secondary (show context menu),
segment.target: Recomenda-se que as funes `mouseHandler.doPrimaryClick` e `mouseHandler.doSecondaryClick` sejam usadas para clicar o mouse para realizar uma ao lgica como ativar (primrio) ou secundrio (mostrar menu de contexto),

segment.source: rather than using `executeMouseEvent` and specifying the left or right mouse button specifically.
segment.target: em vez de usar `executeMouseEvent` e especificar o boto esquerdo ou direito do mouse especificamente.

segment.source: This ensures code will honor the Windows user setting for swapping the primary mouse button. (#12642)
segment.target: Isso garante que o cdigo respeite a configurao do usurio do Windows para trocar o boto principal do mouse. (#12642)

segment.source: `config.getSystemConfigPath` has been removed - there is no replacement. (#12943)
segment.target: `config.getSystemConfigPath` foi removido - no h substituio. (#12943)

segment.source: `shlobj.SHGetFolderPath` has been removed - please use `shlobj.SHGetKnownFolderPath` instead. (#12943)
segment.target: `shlobj.SHGetFolderPath` foi removido - por favor, use `shlobj.SHGetKnownFolderPath`. (#12943)

segment.source: `shlobj` constants have been removed. A new enum has been created, `shlobj.FolderId` for usage with `SHGetKnownFolderPath`. (#12943)
segment.target: As constantes `shlobj` foram removidas. Uma nova enum foi criada, `shlobj.FolderId` para uso com `SHGetKnownFolderPath`. (#12943)

segment.source: `diffHandler.get_dmp_algo` and `diffHandler.get_difflib_algo` have been replaced with `diffHandler.prefer_dmp` and `diffHandler.prefer_difflib` respectively. (#12974)
segment.target: `diffHandler.get_dmp_algo` e `diffHandler.get_difflib_algo` foram substitudos por `diffHandler.prefer_dmp` e `diffHandler.prefer_difflib` respectivamente. (#12974)

segment.source: `languageHandler.curLang` has been removed - to get the current NVDA language use `languageHandler.getLanguage()`. (#13082)
segment.target: `languageHandler.curLang` foi removido - para obter o idioma atual do NVDA use `languageHandler.getLanguage()`. (#13082)

segment.source: A `getStatusBarText` method can be implemented on an appModule to customize the way NVDA fetches the text from the status bar. (#12845)
segment.target: Um mtodo `getStatusBarText` pode ser implementado num Mdulo de aplicativo para personalizar a forma como o NVDA busca o texto da barra de status. (#12845)

segment.source: `globalVars.appArgsExtra` has been removed. (#13087)
segment.target: `globalVars.appArgsExtra` foi removido. (#13087)

segment.source: If your add-on need to process additional command line arguments see the documentation of `addonHandler.isCLIParamKnown` and the developer guide for details.
segment.target: Se seu complemento precisar processar argumentos de linha de comando adicionais, consulte a documentao de `addonHandler.isCLIParamKnown` e o guia do desenvolvedor para obter detalhes.

segment.source: The UIA handler module and other UIA support modules are now part of a UIAHandler package. (#10916)
segment.target: O mdulo manipulador handler UIA e outros mdulos de suporte UIA agora fazem parte de um pacote UIAHandler. (#10916)

segment.source: `UIAUtils` is now `UIAHandler.utils`
segment.target: `UIAUtils` agora `UIAHandler.utils`

segment.source: `UIABrowseMode` is now `UIAHandler.browseMode`
segment.target: `UIABrowseMode` agora `UIAHandler.browseMode`

segment.source: `_UIAConstants` is now `UIAHandler.constants`
segment.target: `_UIConstants` agora `UIAHandler.constants`

segment.source: `_UIACustomProps` is now `UIAHandler.customProps`
segment.target: `_UIACustomProps` agora `UIAHandler.customProps`

segment.source: `_UIACustomAnnotations` is now `UIAHandler.customAnnotations`
segment.target: `_UIACustomAnnotations` agora `UIAHandler.customAnnotations`

segment.source: The `IAccessibleHandler` `IA2_RELATION_*` constants have been replaced with the `IAccessibleHandler.RelationType` enum. (#13096)
segment.target: As constantes `IAccessibleHandler` `IA2_RELATION_*` foram substitudas pela enum `IAccessibleHandler.RelationType`. (#13096)

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_FROM`
segment.target: Removido `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_FROM`

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_TO`
segment.target: Removido `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_TO`

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_CONTAINING_DOCUMENT`
segment.target: Removido `IA2_RELATION_CONTAINING_DOCUMENT`

segment.source: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are removed from `languageHandler` - use members of `languageHandler.LOCALE` instead. (#12753)
segment.target: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` e `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` foram removidos de `languageHandler` - use membros de `languageHandler.LOCALE` em vez disso. (#12753)

segment.source: Switched from Minhook to Microsoft Detours as a hooking library for NVDA. Hooking with this library is mainly used to aid the display model. (#12964)
segment.target: Mudou do Minhook para o Microsoft Detours como uma biblioteca de ganchos hooking para o NVDA. A conexo com esta biblioteca usada principalmente para auxiliar o modelo de exibio display model. (#12964)

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` is removed. (#13211)
segment.target: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` foi removido. (#13211)

segment.source: SCons now warns to build with a number of jobs that is equal to the number of logical processors in the system.
segment.target: SCons agora adverte para compilar com um nmero de tarefas igual ao nmero de processadores lgicos no sistema.

segment.source: This can dramatically decrease build times on multi core systems. (#13226, #13371)
segment.target: Isso pode diminuir drasticamente os tempos de compilao em sistemas com vrios ncleos. (#13226, #13371)

segment.source: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants are removed - please use `characterProcessing.SymbolLevel.*` instead. (#13248)
segment.target: As constantes `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` foram removidas - por favor, use `characterProcessing.SymbolLevel.*` em vez disso. (#13248)

segment.source: Functions `loadState` and `saveState` are removed from addonHandler - please use `addonHandler.state.load` and `addonHandler.state.save` instead. (#13245)
segment.target: As funes `loadState` e `saveState` foram removidas do addonHandler - por favor, use `addonHandler.state.load` e `addonHandler.state.save`. (#13245)

segment.source: Moved the UWP/OneCore interaction layer of NVDAHelper [from C++/CX to C++/Winrt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/cpp-and-winrt-apis/move-to-winrt-from-cx). (#10662)
segment.target: Movida a camada de interao UWP/OneCore do NVDAHelper [de C++/CX para C++/WinRT](https://docs.microsoft.com/pt-br/windows/uwp/cpp-and-winrt-apis/move-to-winrt-from-cx). (#10662)

segment.source: It is now mandatory to subclass `DictionaryDialog` to use it. (#13268)
segment.target: Agora obrigatrio usar a subclasse `DictionaryDialog`. (#13268)

segment.source: `config.RUN_REGKEY`, `config.NVDA_REGKEY` are deprecated, please use `config.RegistryKey.RUN`, `config.RegistryKey.NVDA` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: `config.RUN_REGKEY`, `config.NVDA_REGKEY` esto obsoletos, por favor use `config.RegistryKey.RUN`, `config.RegistryKey.NVDA`. Eles sero removidos em 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.ROOT_KEY`, `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_PATH` are deprecated, please use`easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.ROOT`, `easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.APP` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: `easeOfAccess.ROOT_KEY`, `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_PATH` esto obsoletos, por favor use `easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.ROOT`, `easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.APP` em vez disso. Eles sero removidos em 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_NAME` has been deprecated, to be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_NAME` foi descontinuado, para ser removido em 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `DictionaryDialog` and `DictionaryEntryDialog` are moved from `gui.settingsDialogs` to `gui.speechDict`. (#13294)
segment.target: `DictionaryDialog` e `DictionaryEntryDialog` esto movidos de `gui.settingsDialogs` para `gui.speechDict`. (#13294)

segment.source: IAccessible2 relations are now shown in developer info for IAccessible2 objects. (#13315)
segment.target: As relaes IAccessible2 agora so mostradas nas informaes do desenvolvedor para objetos IAccessible2. (#13315)

segment.source: `languageHandler.windowsPrimaryLCIDsToLocaleNames` has been removed, instead use `languageHandler.windowsLCIDToLocaleName` or `winKernel.LCIDToLocaleName`. (#13342)
segment.target: `languageHandler.windowsPrimaryLCIDsToLocaleNames` foi removido, em vez disso use `languageHandler.windowsLCIDToLocaleName` ou `winKernel.LCIDToLocaleName`. (#13342)

segment.source: `UIAAutomationId` property for UIA objects should be preferred over `cachedAutomationId`. (#13125, #11447)
segment.target: A propriedade `UIAAutomationId` para objetos UIA deve ser preferida sobre `cachedAutomationId`. (#13125, #11447)

segment.source: `cachedAutomationId` can be used if obtained directly from the element.
segment.target: `cachedAutomationId` pode ser usado se obtido diretamente do elemento.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct` has moved to `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.Scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct`. (#13364)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct` foi movido para `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.Scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct`. (#13364)

segment.source: Boolean `gui.isInMessageBox` is removed, please use the function `gui.message.isModalMessageBoxActive` instead. (#12984, #13376)
segment.target: `gui.isInMessageBox` booleano foi removido, por favor use a funo `gui.message.isModalMessageBoxActive`. (#12984, #13376)

segment.source: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules. (#12510, #13588)
segment.target: `controlTypes` foi dividido em vrios submdulos. (#12510, #13588)

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` have been replaced with `Role.*` and `State.*`.
segment.target: `ROLE_*` e `STATE_*` foram substitudos por `Role.*` e `State.*`.

segment.source: Although still available, the following should be considered deprecated:
segment.target: Embora ainda disponvel, o seguinte deve ser considerado obsoleto:

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*`, use `Role.*` and `State.*` instead.
segment.target: `ROLE_*` e `STATE_*`, use em vez disso `Role.*` e `State.*`.

segment.source: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels`, usages like `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced with their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.
segment.target: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` e `negativeStateLabels`, usos como `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` devem ser substitudos por seus equivalentes `Role.*.displayString` ou `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.

segment.source: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` should use `processAndLabelStates` instead.
segment.target: Em vez de `processPositiveStates` e `processNegativeStates` deve usar `processAndLabelStates`.

segment.source: Excel cell state constants (`NVSTATE_*`) are now values in the `NvCellState` enum, mirrored in the `NvCellState` enum in `NVDAObjects/window/excel.py` and mapped to `controlTypes.State` via _nvCellStatesToStates. (#13465)
segment.target: Constantes de estado de clula do Excel (`NVSTATE_*`) agora so valores na enum `NvCellState`, espelhados na enum `NvCellState` em `NVDAObjects/window/excel.py` e mapeados para `controlTypes.State` via _nvCellStatesToStates. (#13465)

segment.source: `EXCEL_CELLINFO` struct member `state` is now `nvCellStates`.
segment.target: `state` membro da estrutura `EXCEL_CELLINFO` agora `nvCellStates`.

segment.source: `mathPres.ensureInit` has been removed, MathPlayer is now initialized when NVDA starts. (#13486)
segment.target: `mathPres.ensureInit` foi removido, MathPlayer agora inicializado quando o NVDA iniciado. (#13486)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Esta uma verso menor para corrigir um problema de segurana.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana para <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-xc5m-v23f-pgr7`.
segment.target: Solucionado comunicado de segurana `GHSA-xc5m-v23f-pgr7`.

segment.source: The symbol pronunciation dialog is now disabled in secure mode.
segment.target: O dilogo de pronncia de smbolo agora est desabilitado no modo seguro.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues raised.
segment.target: Esta uma verso menor para corrigir vrios problemas de segurana levantados.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana para <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Correes de Segurana

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-354r-wr4v-cx28`. (#13488)
segment.target: Solucionado comunicado de segurana `GHSA-354r-wr4v-cx28`. (#13488)

segment.source: Remove the ability to start NVDA with debug logging enabled when NVDA runs in secure mode.
segment.target: Remove a capacidade de iniciar o NVDA com o registro de depurao ativado quando o NVDA for executado em modo seguro.

segment.source: Remove the ability to update NVDA when NVDA runs in secure mode.
segment.target: Remove a capacidade de atualizar o NVDA quando o NVDA for executado em modo seguro.

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-wg65-7r23-h6p9`. (#13489)
segment.target: Solucionado comunicado de segurana `GHSA-wg65-7r23-h6p9`. (#13489)

segment.source: Remove the ability to open the input gestures dialog in secure mode.
segment.target: Remove a capacidade de abrir o dilogo de definir comandos gestos de entrada no modo seguro.

segment.source: Remove the ability to open the default, temporary and voice dictionary dialogs in secure mode.
segment.target: Remove a capacidade de abrir os dilogos padro, temporrio e de dicionrio de fala no modo seguro.

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-mvc8-5rv9-w3hx`. (#13487)
segment.target: Solucionado comunicado de segurana `GHSA-mvc8-5rv9-w3hx`. (#13487)

segment.source: The wx GUI inspection tool is now disabled in secure mode.
segment.target: A ferramenta de inspeo wx GUI agora est desativada no modo seguro.

segment.source: This release is identical to 2021.3.2.
segment.target: Esta verso idntica a 2021.3.2.

segment.source: A bug existed in NVDA 2021.3.2 where it incorrectly identified itself as 2021.3.1.
segment.target: Existia uma falha no NVDA 2021.3.2 onde ele se identificava incorretamente como 2021.3.1.

segment.source: This release correctly identifies itself as 2021.3.3.
segment.target: Esta verso se identifica corretamente como 2021.3.3.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues raised.
segment.target: Esta uma verso menor para corrigir vrios problemas de segurana levantados.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Por favor, divulgue responsavelmente os problemas de segurana para <info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Security fix: Prevent object navigation outside of the lockscreen on Windows 10 and Windows 11. (#13328)
segment.target: Correo de segurana: impede a navegao de objetos fora da tela de bloqueio no Windows 10 e no Windows 11. (#13328)

segment.source: Security fix: The addons manager dialog is now disabled on secure screens. (#13059)
segment.target: Correo de segurana: o dilogo do gerenciador de complementos agora est desabilitado em telas seguras. (#13059)

segment.source: Security fix: NVDA context help is no longer available on secure screens. (#13353)
segment.target: Correo de segurana: ajuda de contexto do NVDA no est mais disponvel em telas seguras. (#13353)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several issues in 2021.3.
segment.target: Esta uma verso secundria para corrigir vrios problemas na 2021.3.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: The new HID Braille protocol is no longer preferred when another braille display driver can be used. (#13153)
segment.target: O novo protocolo HID Braille no mais preferido quando outro driver de linha braille pode ser usado. (#13153)

segment.source: The new HID Braille protocol can be disabled via a setting in the advanced settings panel. (#13180)
segment.target: O novo protocolo HID Braille pode ser desabilitado atravs duma configurao no painel de configuraes avanadas. (#13180)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Landmark is once again abbreviated in braille. #13158
segment.target: Marco mais uma vez abreviado em braille. (#13158)

segment.source: Fixed unstable braille display auto detection for Humanware Brailliant and APH Mantis Q40 braille displays when using Bluetooth. (#13153)
segment.target: Deteco automtica de linha braille instvel corrigida para linhas braille Humanware Brailliant e APH Mantis Q40 ao usar Bluetooth. (#13153)

segment.source: This release introduces support for the new HID Braille specification.
segment.target: Esta verso apresenta suporte para a nova especificao HID Braille.

segment.source: This specification aims to standardise support for Braille Displays without needing individual drivers.
segment.target: Esta especificao visa padronizar o suporte para linhas Braille sem a necessidade de drivers individuais.

segment.source: There are updates to eSpeak-NG and LibLouis, including new Russian and Tshivenda tables.
segment.target: H atualizaes para eSpeak-NG e LibLouis, incluindo novas tabelas em Russo e Venda.

segment.source: Error sounds can be enabled in stable builds of NVDA via a new advanced settings option.
segment.target: Os sons de erro podem ser habilitados em compilaes estveis do NVDA por meio de uma nova opo de configuraes avanadas.

segment.source: Say all in Word now scrolls the view to keep the current position visible.
segment.target: Leitura contnua em Word agora rola a tela para manter a posio atual visvel.

segment.source: There are lots of improvements when using Office with UIA.
segment.target: Existem muitas melhorias ao usar o Office com UIA.

segment.source: One UIA fix is that Outlook now ignores more types of layout tables in messages.
segment.target: Uma correo UIA que o Outlook agora ignora mais tipos de tabelas de leiaute nas mensagens.

segment.source: Important notes:
segment.target: Notas importantes:

segment.source: Due to an update to our security certificate, a small number of users get an error when NVDA 2021.2 checks for updates.
segment.target: Devido a uma atualizao do nosso certificado de segurana, um pequeno nmero de usurios recebe um erro quando o NVDA 2021.2 verifica se h atualizaes.

segment.source: NVDA now asks Windows to update security certificates, which will prevent this error in future.
segment.target: O NVDA agora pede ao Windows para atualizar os certificados de segurana, o que evitar este erro no futuro.

segment.source: Affected users will need to download this update manually.
segment.target: Os usurios afetados precisaro baixar esta atualizao manualmente.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Adds an input gesture for toggling settings for reporting the style of cell borders. (#10408)
segment.target: Adiciona um comando gesto de entrada para alternar as configuraes para informar o estilo das bordas das clulas. (#10408)

segment.source: Support for the new HID Braille specification which aims to standardise support for Braille Displays. (#12523)
segment.target: Suporte para a nova especificao HID Braille, que visa padronizar o suporte para linhas Braille. (#12523)

segment.source: Devices that support this specification will be auto detected by NVDA.
segment.target: Dispositivos que suportam esta especificao sero detectados automaticamente pelo NVDA.

segment.source: For technical details on NVDA's implementation of this specification, see https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/devDocs/hidBrailleTechnicalNotes.md
segment.target: Para obter detalhes tcnicos sobre a implementao desta especificao pelo NVDA, consulte https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/devDocs/hidBrailleTechnicalNotes.md

segment.source: Add support for the VisioBraille Vario 4 Braille Device. (#12607)
segment.target: Adiciona suporte para Dispositivo Braille VisioBraille Vario 4. (#12607)

segment.source: Error notifications can be enabled (advanced settings) when using any version of NVDA. (#12672)
segment.target: As notificaes de erro podem ser habilitadas (configuraes avanadas) ao usar qualquer verso do NVDA. (#12672)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and later, NVDA will announce the suggestion count when entering search terms in apps such as Settings and Microsoft Store. (#7330, #12758, #12790)
segment.target: No Windows 10 e posterior, o NVDA anunciar a contagem de sugestes ao inserir termos de pesquisa em aplicativos como Configuraes e Microsoft Store. (#7330, #12758, #12790)

segment.source: Table navigation is now supported in grid controls created using the Out-GridView cmdlet in PowerShell. (#12928)
segment.target: A navegao por tabela agora suportada em controles de grade criados usando o cmdlet Out-GridView no PowerShell. (#12928)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `74068b91bcd578bd7030a7a6cde2085114b79b44`. (#12665)
segment.target: Espeak-ng foi atualizado para 1.51-dev commit `74068b91bcd578bd7030a7a6cde2085114b79b44`. (#12665)

segment.source: NVDA will default to eSpeak if no installed OneCore voices support the NVDA preferred language. (#10451)
segment.target: O NVDA assumir como padro o eSpeak se nenhuma voz OneCore instalada for compatvel com o idioma preferido do NVDA. (#10451)

segment.source: If OneCore voices consistently fail to speak, revert to eSpeak as a synthesizer. (#11544)
segment.target: Se as vozes do OneCore falharem constantemente ao falar, reverte para o eSpeak como um sintetizador. (#11544)

segment.source: When reading status bar with `NVDA+end`, the review cursor is no longer moved to its location.
segment.target: Ao ler a barra de status com `NVDA+end`, o cursor de reviso no mais movido para sua localizao.

segment.source: If you need this functionality please assign a gesture to the appropriate script in the Object Navigation category in the Input Gestures dialog. (#8600)
segment.target: Se voc precisar desta funcionalidade, atribua um comando gesto ao script apropriado na categoria Navegao de objeto no dilogo Definir comandos Gestos de entrada. (#8600)

segment.source: When opening a settings dialog which is already open, NVDA sets focus on the existing dialog rather than raise an error. (#5383)
segment.target: Ao abrir uma caixa de dilogo de configuraes que j est aberta, o NVDA coloca o foco no dilogo existente ao invs de levantar um erro. (#5383)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.19.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.19.0). (#12810)
segment.target: Transcritor braille liblouis atualizado para [3.19.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.19.0). (#12810)

segment.source: New braille tables: Russian grade 1, Tshivenda grade 1, Tshivenda grade 2
segment.target: Novas tabelas braille: Russo grau 1, Venda grau 1, Venda grau 2

segment.source: Instead of "marked content" or "mrkd", "highlight" or "hlght" will be announced for speech and braille respectively. (#12892)
segment.target: Em vez de "contedo marcado" ou "mrcd", "destacado" realado ou "dstcd" rl sero anunciados para fala e braille, respectivamente. (#12892)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer attempt to exit when dialogs are awaiting a required action (eg Confirm/Cancel). (#12984)
segment.target: O NVDA no tentar mais sair quando os dilogos estiverem aguardando uma ao necessria (por exemplo, Confirmar/Cancelar). (#12984)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Tracking keyboard modifiers (such as Control, or Insert) is more robust when watchdog is recovering. (#12609)
segment.target: Rastrear modificadores de teclado (como Control, ou Insert) so mais robustos quando o watchdog est se recuperando. (#12609)

segment.source: It is once again possible to check for NVDA updates on certain systems; e.g. clean Windows installs. (#12729)
segment.target: mais uma vez possvel verificar as atualizaes do NVDA em determinados sistemas; por exemplo, instalaes limpas do Windows. (#12729)

segment.source: NVDA correctly announces blank table cells in Microsoft Word when using UI automation. (#11043)
segment.target: O NVDA anuncia corretamente as clulas de tabela em branco no Microsoft Word ao usar a UI automation automao da Interface do Usurio. (#11043)

segment.source: In ARIA data grid cells on the web, the Escape key will now be passed through to the grid and no longer turn off focus mode unconditionally. (#12413)
segment.target: Em clulas da grade de dados ARIA na web, a tecla Escape agora ser passada para a grade e no desligar mais o modo de foco incondicionalmente. (#12413)

segment.source: When reading a header cell of a table in Chrome, fix the column name being announced twice. (#10840)
segment.target: Ao ler uma clula de cabealho de uma tabela no Chrome, corrige o nome da coluna que est sendo anunciado duas vezes. (#10840)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports a numerical value for UIA sliders that have a textual representation of their value defined. (UIA ValuePattern is now preferred over RangeValuePattern). (#12724)
segment.target: O NVDA no informa mais um valor numrico para controles deslizantes UIA que tm uma representao textual de seu valor definido. (UIA ValuePattern agora tem preferncia sobre RangeValuePattern). (#12724)

segment.source: NVDA no longer treats the value of UIA sliders as always percentage based.
segment.target: O NVDA no trata mais o valor dos controles deslizantes UIA como sempre baseado em porcentagem.

segment.source: Reporting the location of a cell in Microsoft Excel when accessed via UI Automation again works correctly on Windows 11. (#12782)
segment.target: Relatar a localizao de uma clula no Microsoft Excel quando acessada via UI Automation funciona corretamente no Windows 11. (#12782)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sets invalid Python locales. (#12753)
segment.target: O NVDA no define mais localidades Python invlidas. (#12753)

segment.source: If a disabled addon is uninstalled and then re-installed it is re-enabled. (#12792)
segment.target: Se um complemento desativado for desinstalado e reinstalado, ele ser reativado. (#12792)

segment.source: Fixed bugs around updating and removing addons where the addon folder has been renamed or has files opened. (#12792, #12629)
segment.target: Falhas corrigidas em torno da atualizao e remoo de complementos onde a pasta addon foi renomeada ou tinha arquivos abertos. (#12792, #12629)

segment.source: When using UI Automation to access Microsoft Excel spreadsheet controls, NVDA no longer redundantly announces when a single cell is selected. (#12530)
segment.target: Ao usar UI Automation para acessar os controles da planilha do Microsoft Excel, o NVDA no anuncia mais redundantemente quando uma nica clula selecionada. (#12530)

segment.source: More dialog text is automatically read in LibreOffice Writer, such as in confirmation dialogs. (#11687)
segment.target: Mais texto de dilogo lido automaticamente no LibreOffice Writer, como nas caixas de dilogo de confirmao. (#11687)

segment.source: Reading / navigating with browse mode in Microsoft Word via UI automation now ensures the document is always scrolled so that the current browse mode position is visible, and that the caret position in focus mode correctly reflects the browse mode position. (#9611)
segment.target: Ler / navegar com o modo de navegao no Microsoft Word via UI automation agora garante que o documento seja sempre rolado para que a posio do modo de navegao atual seja visvel e que a posio do cursor no modo de foco reflita corretamente a posio do modo de navegao. (#9611)

segment.source: When performing Say all in Microsoft Word via UI automation, the document is now automatically scrolled, and the caret position is correctly updated. (#9611)
segment.target: Ao executar Leitura contnua no Microsoft Word via UI automation, o documento agora rolado automaticamente e a posio do cursor atualizada corretamente. (#9611)

segment.source: When reading emails in Outlook and NVDA is accessing the message with UI Automation, certain tables are now marked as layout tables, which means they will no longer be reported by default. (#11430)
segment.target: Ao ler e-mails no Outlook e o NVDA estiver acessando a mensagem com UI Automation, certas tabelas agora so marcadas como tabelas de leiaute, o que significa que no sero mais informadas por padro. (#11430)

segment.source: A rare error when changing audio devices has been fixed. (#12620)
segment.target: Um erro raro ao mudar os dispositivos de udio foi corrigido. (#12620)

segment.source: Input with literary braille tables should behave more reliably when in edit fields. (#12667)
segment.target: A digitao com tabelas braille literrio deve se comportar de forma mais confivel quando em campos de edio. (#12667)

segment.source: When navigating the Windows system tray calendar, NVDA now reports the day of the week in full. (#12757)
segment.target: Ao navegar no calendrio da bandeja do sistema Windows, o NVDA agora informa o dia da semana completo. (#12757)

segment.source: When using a Chinese input method such as Taiwan - Microsoft Quick in Microsoft Word, scrolling the braille display forward and backward no longer incorrectly keeps jumping back to the original caret position. (#12855)
segment.target: Ao usar um mtodo de entrada chins, como Taiwan - Microsoft Quick no Microsoft Word, rolar a linha braille para frente e para trs no faz mais o salto para a posio original do cursor. (#12855)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Word documents via UIA, navigating by sentence (alt+downArrow / alt+upArrow) is again possible. (#9254)
segment.target: Ao acessar documentos do Microsoft Word via UIA, a navegao por frase (alt+setaParaBaixo / alt+setaParaCima) novamente possvel. (#9254)

segment.source: When accessing MS Word with UIA, paragraph indenting is now reported. (#12899)
segment.target: Ao acessar o MS Word com UIA, o recuo de pargrafo agora informado. (#12899)

segment.source: When accessing MS Word with UIA, change tracking command and some other localized commands are now reported in Word . (#12904)
segment.target: Ao acessar o MS Word com UIA, o comando de rastreamento de alteraes e alguns outros comandos localizados agora so relatados no Word. (#12904)

segment.source: Fixed duplicate braille and speech when 'description' matches 'content' or 'name'. (#12888)
segment.target: Corrigido braille e fala duplicados quando 'descrio' corresponde a 'contedo' ou 'nome'. (#12888)

segment.source: In MS Word with UIA enabled, more accurate playing of spelling error sounds as you type. (#12161)
segment.target: No MS Word com UIA habilitada, reproduo mais precisa dos sons de erros ortogrficos medida que voc digita. (#12161)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer announce "pane" when pressing Alt+Tab to switch between programs. (#12648)
segment.target: No Windows 11, o NVDA no anunciar mais "painel" ao pressionar Alt+Tab para alternar entre os programas. (#12648)

segment.source: The new Modern Comments side track pane is now supported in MS Word when not accessing the document via UIA. Press alt+f12 to move between the side track pane and the document. (#12982)
segment.target: O novo painel lateral de comentrios modernos agora compatvel com o MS Word quando no possvel acessar o documento via UIA. Pressione alt+f12 para mover entre o painel de controle lateral e o documento. (#12982)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2019 16.10.4 or later.
segment.target: A compilao do NVDA agora requer o Visual Studio 2019 16.10.4 ou posterior.

segment.source: To match the production build environment, update Visual Studio to keep in sync with the [current version AppVeyor is using](https://www.appveyor.com/docs/windows-images-software/#visual-studio-2019). (#12728)
segment.target: Para corresponder ao ambiente de compilao de produo, atualize o Visual Studio para se manter sincronizado com a [verso atual que o AppVeyor est usando](https://www.appveyor.com/docs/windows-images-software/#visual-studio-2019). (#12728)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been deprecated for removal in 2022.1. (#12660)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` foi deprecado para remoo em 2022.1. (#12660)

segment.source: Instead use `apiLevel` (see the comments at `_UIAConstants.WinConsoleAPILevel` for details).
segment.target: Em vez disso, use `apiLevel` (veja os comentrios em `_UIAConstants.WinConsoleAPILevel` para detalhes).

segment.source: Transparency of text background color sourced from GDI applications (via the display model), is now exposed for add-ons or appModules. (#12658)
segment.target: A transparncia da cor de fundo do texto proveniente de aplicativos GDI (por meio do display model modelo de exibio), agora est exposta para complementos ou appModules. (#12658)

segment.source: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are moved to the `LOCALE` enum in languageHandler.
segment.target: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` e `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` so movidos para o enum `LOCALE` em languageHandler.

segment.source: They are still available at the module level but are deprecated and to be removed in NVDA 2022.1. (#12753)
segment.target: Eles ainda esto disponveis no nvel de mdulo, mas esto obsoletos e devem ser removidos no NVDA 2022.1. (#12753)

segment.source: The usage of functions `addonHandler.loadState` and `addonHandler.saveState` should be replaced with their equivalents `addonHandler.state.save` and `addonHandler.state.load` before 2022.1. (#12792)
segment.target: O uso das funes `addonHandler.loadState` e `addonHandler.saveState` deve ser substitudo por seus equivalentes `addonHandler.state.save` e `addonHandler.state.load` antes de 2022.1. (#12792)

segment.source: Braille output can now be checked in system tests. (#12917)
segment.target: A sada em Braille agora pode ser verificada em testes de sistema. (#12917)

segment.source: This release introduces preliminary Windows 11 support.
segment.target: Esta verso introduz suporte preliminar ao Windows 11.

segment.source: While Windows 11 is yet to be released, this release has been tested on preview versions of Windows 11.
segment.target: Embora o Windows 11 ainda no tenha sido lanado, esta verso foi testada em verses de pr-lanamento preview do Windows 11.

segment.source: This includes an important fix for Screen Curtain (see important notes).
segment.target: Isso inclui uma correo importante para a cortina de tela (consulte as notas importantes).

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool can now resolve more problems when running NVDA.
segment.target: A Ferramenta de Correo de Registro COM agora pode resolver mais problemas ao executar o NVDA.

segment.source: There are updates to the synthesizer eSpeak and braille translator LibLouis.
segment.target: H atualizaes para o sintetizador eSpeak e o transcritor braille LibLouis.

segment.source: There are also various bug fixes and improvements, notably for braille support and Windows terminals, calculator, emoji panel and clipboard history.
segment.target: Existem tambm vrias correes de falhas e melhorias, principalmente para suporte a braille e terminais Windows, calculadora, painel de emojis e histrico da rea de transferncia.

segment.source: Important notes
segment.target: Notas importantes

segment.source: Due to a change in the Windows Magnification API, Screen Curtain had to be updated to support the newest versions of Windows.
segment.target: Devido a uma alterao na API de Ampliao do Windows, a Cortina de Tela teve que ser atualizada para oferecer suporte s verses mais recentes do Windows.

segment.source: Use NVDA 2021.2 to activate Screen Curtain with Windows 10 21H2 (10.0.19044) or later.
segment.target: Use o NVDA 2021.2 para ativar a Cortina de Tela com o Windows 10 21H2 (10.0.19044) ou posterior.

segment.source: This includes Windows 10 Insiders and Windows 11.
segment.target: Isso inclui Windows 10 Insiders e Windows 11.

segment.source: For security purposes, when using a new version of Windows, get visual confirmation that the Screen Curtain makes the screen entirely black.
segment.target: Por motivos de segurana, ao usar uma nova verso do Windows, tente obter confirmao visual de que a Cortina de Tela torna a tela totalmente preta.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Experimental support for ARIA annotations:
segment.target: Suporte experimental para anotaes ARIA Accessible Rich Internet Applications / Aplicativos de Internet Ricos e Acessveis :

segment.source: adds a command to read a summary of details of an object with aria-details. (#12364)
segment.target: adiciona um comando para ler um resumo dos detalhes de um objeto com aria-details. (#12364)

segment.source: adds an option in advanced preferences to report if an object has details in browse mode. (#12439)
segment.target: adiciona uma opo nas preferncias avanadas para informar se um objeto tem detalhes no modo de navegao. (#12439)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Version 1909 and later (including Windows 11), NVDA will announce suggestion count when performing searches in File Explorer. (#10341, #12628)
segment.target: No Windows 10 Verso 1909 e posteriores (incluindo Windows 11), o NVDA anunciar a contagem de sugestes ao realizar pesquisas no Explorador de Arquivos. (#10341, #12628)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now announces the result of indent and hanging indent shortcuts when executed. (#6269)
segment.target: No Microsoft Word, o NVDA agora anuncia o resultado dos atalhos de recuo e recuo deslocado deslocamento no pargrafo quando executados. (#6269)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `ab11439b18238b7a08b965d1d5a6ef31cbb05cbb`. (#12449, #12202, #12280, #12568)
segment.target: Espeak-ng foi atualizado para 1.51-dev commit `ab11439b18238b7a08b965d1d5a6ef31cbb05cbb`. (#12449, #12202, #12280, #12568)

segment.source: If article is enabled in the user preferences for document formatting, NVDA announces "article" after the content. (#11103)
segment.target: Se artigo estiver habilitado nas preferncias do usurio para formatao de documento, o NVDA anuncia "artigo" aps o contedo. (#11103)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.18.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.18.0). (#12526)
segment.target: Transcritor braille liblouis atualizado para [3.18.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.18.0). (#12526)

segment.source: New braille tables: Bulgarian grade 1, Burmese grade 1, Burmese grade 2, Kazakh grade 1, Khmer grade 1, Northern Kurdish grade 0, Sepedi grade 1, Sepedi grade 2, Sesotho grade 1, Sesotho grade 2, Setswana grade 1, Setswana grade 2, Tatar grade 1, Vietnamese grade 0, Vietnamese grade 2, Southern Vietnamese grade 1, Xhosa grade 1, Xhosa grade 2, Yakut grade 1, Zulu grade 1, Zulu grade 2
segment.target: Novas tabelas braille: Blgaro grau 1, Birmans grau 1, Birmans grau 2, Cazaque grau 1, Quemer grau 1, Curdo Setentrional grau 0, Sepedi grau 1, Sepedi grau 2, Sesoto grau 1, Sesoto grau 2, Setswana grau 1, Setswana grau 2, Trtaro grau 1, Vietnamita grau 0, Vietnamita grau 2, Vietnamita Meridional grau 1, Xhosa grau 1, Xhosa grau 2, Iacuto grau 1, Zulu grau 1, Zulu grau 2

segment.source: Windows 10 OCR was renamed to Windows OCR. (#12690)
segment.target: O OCR do Windows 10 foi renomeado para OCR do Windows. (#12690)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will announce calculator expressions on a braille display. (#12268)
segment.target: Na Calculadora do Windows 10, o NVDA anunciar as expresses da calculadora numa linha braille. (#12268)

segment.source: In terminal programs on Windows 10 version 1607 and later, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters to the right of the caret are no longer read out. (#3200)
segment.target: Em programas de terminal no Windows 10 verso 1607 e posteriores, ao inserir ou excluir caracteres no meio de uma linha, os caracteres direita do cursor no so mais lidos. (#3200)

segment.source: Diff Match Patch now enabled by default. (#12485)
segment.target: Diff Match Patch agora habilitado por padro. (#12485)

segment.source: The braille input works properly with the following contracted tables: Arabic grade 2, Spanish grade 2, Urdu grade 2, Chinese (China, Mandarin) grade 2. (#12541)
segment.target: A insero de braille funciona corretamente com as seguintes tabelas estenografadas: rabe grau 2, Espanhol grau 2, Urdu grau 2, Chins (China, Mandarim) grau 2. (#12541)

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool now resolves more issues, especially on 64 bit Windows. (#12560)
segment.target: A Ferramenta de Correo de Registro COM agora resolve mais problemas, especialmente no Windows de 64 bit. (#12560)

segment.source: Improvements to button handling for the Seika Notetaker braille device from Nippon Telesoft. (#12598)
segment.target: Melhorias no manuseio de botes da linha braille Seika Notetaker da Nippon Telesoft. (#12598)

segment.source: Improvements to announcing the Windows emoji panel and clipboard history. (#11485)
segment.target: Melhorias no anncio do painel de emojis do Windows e do histrico da rea de transferncia. (#11485)

segment.source: Updated the Bengali alphabet character descriptions. (#12502)
segment.target: Atualizadas as descries dos caracteres do alfabeto bengali. (#12502)

segment.source: NVDA exits safely when a new process is started. (#12605)
segment.target: O NVDA sai com segurana quando um novo processo iniciado. (#12605)

segment.source: Reselecting the Handy Tech braille display driver from the Select Braille Display dialog no longer causes errors. (#12618)
segment.target: Resselecionar o driver controlador de linha braille da Handy Tech no dilogo Selecionar Linha Braille no causa mais erros. (#12618)

segment.source: Windows version 10.0.22000 or later is recognized as Windows 11, not Windows 10. (#12626)
segment.target: O Windows verso 10.0.22000 ou posterior reconhecido como Windows 11, no Windows 10. (#12626)

segment.source: Screen curtain support has been fixed and tested for Windows versions up until 10.0.22000. (#12684)
segment.target: O suporte para cortina de tela foi corrigido e testado para verses do Windows at 10.0.22000. (#12684)

segment.source: If no results are shown when filtering input gestures, the input gesture configuration dialog continues to work as expected. (#12673)
segment.target: Se nenhum resultado for mostrado ao filtrar os comandos gestos de entrada, o dilogo de configurao de Definir comando gesto de entrada continua a funcionar conforme o esperado. (#12673)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where the first menu item of a submenu is not announced in some contexts. (#12624)
segment.target: Corrigido uma falha onde o primeiro item de menu de um submenu no anunciado em alguns contextos. (#12624)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants should be replaced using their equivalent `SymbolLevel.*` before 2022.1. (#11856, #12636)
segment.target: Constantes `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` devem ser substitudas usando sua equivalente `SymbolLevel.*` antes de 2022.1. (#11856, #12636)

segment.source: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules, symbols marked for deprecation must be replaced before 2022.1. (#12510)
segment.target: `controlTypes` foi dividido em vrios submdulos, os smbolos marcados para depreciao devem ser substitudos antes de 2022.1. (#12510)

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` constants should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*` and `State.*`.
segment.target: Constantes `ROLE_*` e `STATE_*` devem ser substitudas por suas equivalentes `Role.*` e `State.*`.

segment.source: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels` have been deprecated, usages such as `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.
segment.target: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` e `negativeStateLabels` foram descontinuados, usos como `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` devem ser substitudos por seus equivalentes `Role.*.displayString` ou `State.*.NegativeDisplayString`.

segment.source: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` have been deprecated for removal.
segment.target: `processPositiveStates` e `processNegativeStates` foram descontinuados para remoo.

segment.source: On Windows 10 Version 1511 and later (including Insider Preview builds), the current Windows feature update release name is obtained from Windows Registry. (#12509)
segment.target: No Windows 10 Verso 1511 e posteriores (incluindo compilaes do Insider Preview), o nome da verso de atualizao de recurso do Windows em vigor obtido no Registro do Windows. (#12509)

segment.source: Deprecated: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` will be removed in 2022.1, there is no direct replacement. (#12544)
segment.target: Preterido: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` ser removido em 2022.1, no h substituio direta. (#12544)

segment.source: This release includes optional experimental support for UIA in Excel and Chromium browsers.
segment.target: Esta verso inclui suporte experimental opcional para UIA nos navegadores Excel e Chromium.

segment.source: There are fixes for several languages, and for accessing links in Braille.
segment.target: Existem correes para vrios idiomas e para acessar links em Braille.

segment.source: There are updates to Unicode CLDR, mathematical symbols, and LibLouis.
segment.target: H atualizaes para Unicode CLDR, smbolos matemticos e LibLouis.

segment.source: As well as many bug fixes and improvements, including in Office, Visual Studio, and several languages.
segment.target: Alm de muitas correes de falhas e melhorias, incluindo no Office, Visual Studio e vrias linguagens.

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Nota:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Esta verso quebra a compatibilidade com complementos existentes.

segment.source: This release also drops support for Adobe Flash.
segment.target: Esta verso tambm descontinua o suporte para Adobe Flash.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Early support for UIA with Chromium based browsers (such as Edge). (#12025)
segment.target: Suporte inicial para UIA com navegadores baseados em Chromium (como Edge). (#12025)

segment.source: Optional experimental support for Microsoft Excel via UI Automation. Only recommended for Microsoft Excel build 16.0.13522.10000 or higher. (#12210)
segment.target: Suporte experimental opcional para Microsoft Excel via UI Automation Automao de Interface do Usurio. Recomendado apenas para Microsoft Excel compilao 16.0.13522.10000 ou superior. (#12210)
