segment.source: Easier navigation of output in NVDA Python Console. (#9784)
segment.target: Navegao mais fcil da sada no Console Python do NVDA. (#9784)

segment.source: alt+up/down jumps to the previous/next output result (add shift for selecting).
segment.target: alt+cima/baixo salta para o resultado de sada anterior/seguinte (adicionar shift para selecionar).

segment.source: control+l clears the output pane.
segment.target: control+l limpa o painel da sada.

segment.source: NVDA now reports the categories assigned to an appointment in Microsoft Outlook, if any. (#11598)
segment.target: O NVDA agora informa as categorias atribudas a um compromisso no Microsoft Outlook, se houver. (#11598)

segment.source: Support for the Seika Notetaker braille display from Nippon Telesoft. (#11514)
segment.target: Suporte para linha braille Seika Notetaker da Nippon Telesoft. (#11514)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: In browse mode, controls can now be activated with braille cursor routing on their descriptor (ie. "lnk" for a link). This is especially useful for activating eg. check-boxes with no labels. (#7447)
segment.target: No modo de navegao, os controles agora podem ser ativados com o encaminhamento do cursor braille em seu descritor (ou seja, "lnk" para um link). Isso especialmente til para ativar, por exemplo, caixas de seleo sem rtulos. (#7447)

segment.source: NVDA now prevents the user from performing Windows 10 OCR if screen curtain is enabled. (#11911)
segment.target: O NVDA agora evita que o usurio execute OCR do Windows 10 se a cortina de tela estiver habilitada. (#11911)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) to 39.0. (#11943, #12314)
segment.target: Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) Repositrio de Dados de Localidade Comum Unicode atualizado para 39.0. (#11943, #12314)

segment.source: Added more mathematical symbols to the symbols dictionary. (#11467)
segment.target: Adicionados mais smbolos matemticos ao dicionrio de smbolos. (#11467)

segment.source: The user guide, changes file, and key commands listing now have a refreshed appearance. (#12027)
segment.target: O guia do usurio, o arquivo de novidades changes e a referncia rpida de comandos lista de teclas de comando agora tm uma aparncia atualizada. (#12027)

segment.source: "Unsupported" now reported when attempting to toggle screen layout in applications that do not support it, such as Microsoft Word. (#7297)
segment.target: Agora informado "No suportado" ao tentar alternar o leiaute da tela em aplicativos que no so compatveis, como o Microsoft Word. (#7297)

segment.source: 'Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events' option in the advanced settings panel now enabled by default. (#10885)
segment.target: A opo 'Tentar cancelar a fala de eventos com foco expirado' no painel de configuraes avanadas agora est habilitada por padro. (#10885)

segment.source: This behaviour can be disabled by setting this option to "No".
segment.target: Este comportamento pode ser desativado definindo esta opo como "No".

segment.source: Web applications (E.G. Gmail) no longer speak outdated information when moving focus rapidly.
segment.target: Os aplicativos web (por exemplo, Gmail) no falam mais informaes desatualizadas ao mover o foco rapidamente.

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.17.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.17.0). (#12137)
segment.target: Transcritor braille liblouis atualizado para [3.17.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.17.0). (#12137)

segment.source: New braille tables: Belarusian literary braille, Belarusian computer braille, Urdu grade 1, Urdu grade 2.
segment.target: Novas tabelas braille: Bielorrusso braille literrio, Bielorrusso braille informtico, Urdu grau 1, Urdu grau 2.

segment.source: Support for Adobe Flash content has been removed from NVDA due to the use of Flash being actively discouraged by Adobe. (#11131)
segment.target: O suporte para contedo Adobe Flash foi removido do NVDA devido ao uso do Flash ser ativamente desencorajado pela Adobe. (#11131)

segment.source: NVDA will exit even with windows still open, the exit process now closes all NVDA windows and dialogs. (#1740)
segment.target: O NVDA encerrar mesmo com as janelas ainda abertas, o processo de sada agora fecha todas as janelas e dilogos do NVDA. (#1740)

segment.source: The Speech Viewer can now be closed with `alt+F4` and has a standard close button for easier interaction with users of pointing devices. (#12330)
segment.target: O Visualizador de Fala agora pode ser fechado com `alt+F4` e tem um boto Fechar padro para facilitar a interao com usurios de dispositivos apontadores. (#12330)

segment.source: The Braille Viewer now has a standard close button for easier interaction with users of pointing devices. (#12328)
segment.target: O Visualizador de Braille agora possui um boto Fechar padro para facilitar a interao com os usurios de dispositivos apontadores. (#12328)

segment.source: In the Elements List dialog, the accelerator key on the "Activate" button has been removed in some locales to avoid collision with an element type radio button label. When available, the button is still the default of the dialog and as such can still be invoked by simply pressing enter from the elements list itself. (#6167)
segment.target: Na caixa de dilogo Lista de elementos, a tecla de atalho do boto "Ativar" foi removida em alguns locais para evitar a coliso com um rtulo do tipo de elemento boto de opo. Quando disponvel, o boto ainda o padro do dilogo e, como tal, ainda pode ser invocado simplesmente pressionando enter na prpria lista de elementos. (#6167)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: The list of messages in Outlook 2010 is once again readable. (#12241)
segment.target: A lista de mensagens no Outlook 2010 est novamente legvel. (#12241)

segment.source: In terminal programs on Windows 10 version 1607 and later, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters to the right of the caret are no longer read out. (#3200)
segment.target: Em programas de terminal no Windows 10 verso 1607 e posterior, ao inserir ou excluir caracteres no meio de uma linha, os caracteres direita do cursor no so mais lidos. (#3200)

segment.source: This experimental fix must be manually enabled in NVDA's advanced settings panel by changing the diff algorithm to Diff Match Patch.
segment.target: Esta correo experimental deve ser habilitada manualmente no painel de configuraes avanadas do NVDA, alterando o algoritmo diff para Diff Match Patch.

segment.source: In MS Outlook, inappropriate distance reporting when shift+tabbing from the message body to the subject field should not occur anymore. (#10254)
segment.target: No MS Outlook, anncios de distncia inadequados quando teclando shift+tab do corpo da mensagem para o campo de assunto no devem mais ocorrer. (#10254)

segment.source: In the Python Console, inserting a tab for indentation at the beginning of a non-empty input line and performing tab-completion in the middle of an input line are now supported. (#11532)
segment.target: No Console Python, agora h suporte para inserir um tab para recuo indentao no incio duma linha de entrada no vazia e realizar completamento com tab no meio duma linha de entrada. (#11532)

segment.source: Formatting information and other browseable messages no longer present unexpected blank lines when screen layout is turned off. (#12004)
segment.target: As informaes de formatao e outras mensagens navegveis no apresentam mais linhas em branco inesperadas quando o leiaute da tela est desativado. (#12004)

segment.source: It is now possible to read comments in MS Word with UIA enabled. (#9285)
segment.target: Agora possvel ler comentrios em MS Word com UIA habilitada. (#9285)

segment.source: Performance when interacting with Visual Studio has been improved. (#12171)
segment.target: O desempenho ao interagir com o Visual Studio foi aprimorado. (#12171)

segment.source: Fix graphical bugs such as missing elements when using NVDA with a right-to-left layout. (#8859)
segment.target: Corrige falhas grficas como elementos ausentes, ao usar o NVDA com um leiaute da direita para a esquerda. (#8859)

segment.source: Respect the GUI layout direction based on the NVDA language, not the system locale. (#638)
segment.target: Respeita a direo do leiaute da GUI Interface Grfica do Usurio com base no idioma do NVDA, no na localidade do sistema. (#638)

segment.source: known issue for right-to-left languages: the right border of groupings clips with labels/controls. (#12181)
segment.target: problema conhecido para idiomas da direita para a esquerda: a borda direita dos agrupamentos recorta em rtulos/controles. (#12181)

segment.source: The python locale is set to match the language selected in preferences consistently, and will occur when using the default language. (#12214)
segment.target: A localidade do python definida para corresponder ao idioma selecionado nas preferncias de forma consistente e ocorrer ao usar o idioma padro. (#12214)

segment.source: TextInfo.getTextInChunks no longer freezes when called on Rich Edit controls such as the NVDA log viewer. (#11613)
segment.target: TextInfo.getTextInChunks no congela mais quando chamado em controles de Edio Rica Rich Edit , como o visualizador de log do NVDA. (#11613)

segment.source: It is once again possible to use NVDA in languages containing underscores in the locale name such as de_CH on Windows 10 1803 and 1809. (#12250)
segment.target: mais uma vez possvel usar o NVDA em idiomas que contm sublinhados no nome da localidade, como de_CH no Windows 10 1803 e 1809. (#12250)

segment.source: In WordPad, configuration of superscript/subscript reporting works as expected. (#12262)
segment.target: No WordPad, a configurao de anncio de sobrescrito/subscrito funciona conforme o esperado. (#12262)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce the newly focused content on a web page if the old focus disappears and is replaced by the new focus in the same position. (#12147)
segment.target: O NVDA no falha mais em anunciar o contedo recm-focalizado em uma pgina web se o foco antigo desaparecer e for substitudo pelo novo foco na mesma posio. (#12147)

segment.source: Strikethrough, superscript and subscript formatting for entire Excel cells are now reported if the corresponding option is enabled. (#12264)
segment.target: A formatao tachado riscado , sobrescrito e subscrito para clulas inteiras do Excel agora relatada se a opo correspondente estiver ativada. (#12264)

segment.source: Fixed copying config during installation from a portable copy when default destination config directory is empty. (#12071, #12205)
segment.target: Corrigida cpia de configurao durante a instalao de uma cpia porttil quando o diretrio de configurao de destino padro est vazio. (#12071, #12205)

segment.source: Fixed incorrect announcement of some letters with accents or diacritic when 'Say cap before capitals' option is checked. (#11948)
segment.target: Corrigido anncio incorreto de algumas letras com acentos ou diacrticos quando a opo 'Dizer maiscula antes de maisculas' est marcada. (#11948)

segment.source: Fixed the pitch change failure in SAPI4 speech synthesizer. (#12311)
segment.target: Corrigida a falha de mudana de tonalidade no sintetizador de fala SAPI4. (#12311)

segment.source: The NVDA installer now also honors the `--minimal` command line parameter and does not play the start-up sound, following the same documented behavior as an installed or portable copy NVDA executable. (#12289)
segment.target: O instalador do NVDA agora tambm respeita o parmetro de linha de comando `--minimal` e no reproduz o som de inicializao, seguindo o mesmo comportamento documentado de uma cpia instalada ou porttil do executvel do NVDA. (#12289)

segment.source: In MS Word or Outlook, the table quick navigation key can now jump to layout table if "Include layout tables" option is enabled in Browse mode settings. (#11899)
segment.target: No MS Word ou Outlook, a tecla de navegao rpida da tabela agora pode pular para a tabela de apresentao layout table se a opo "Incluir tabelas de apresentao" estiver habilitada nas configuraes do Modo de navegao. (#11899)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "" for emojis in particular languages. (#11963)
segment.target: O NVDA no anunciar mais "" para emojis em idiomas especficos. (#11963)

segment.source: Espeak now supports Cantonese and Mandarin again. (#10418)
segment.target: Espeak agora suporta cantons e mandarim novamente. (#10418)

segment.source: In the new Chromium based Microsoft Edge, text fields such as the address bar are now announced when empty. (#12474)
segment.target: No novo Microsoft Edge baseado em Chromium, os campos de texto, como a barra de endereo, agora so anunciados quando esto vazios. (#12474)

segment.source: Fix Seika Braille driver. (#10787)
segment.target: Corrige driver controlador Braille da Seika. (#10787)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Observao: esta uma verso de quebra de compatibilidade de API Add-on Interface de Programao de Aplicativos para complementos. Os complementos precisaro ser testados novamente e ter seu manifesto manifest atualizado.

segment.source: NVDA's build system now fetches all Python dependencies with pip and stores them in a Python virtual environment. This is all done transparently.
segment.target: O sistema de compilao do NVDA agora busca todas as dependncias Python com pip e as armazena em um ambiente virtual Python. Tudo isso feito de forma transparente.

segment.source: To build NVDA, SCons should continue to be used in the usual way. E.g. executing scons.bat in the root of the repository. Running `py -m SCons` is no longer supported, and `scons.py` has also been removed.
segment.target: Para compilar o NVDA, os SCons devem continuar a ser usados da maneira usual. Por exemplo, executando scons.bat na raiz do repositrio. A execuo de `py -m SCons` no mais suportada e `scons.py` tambm foi removido.

segment.source: To run NVDA from source, rather than executing `source/nvda.pyw` directly, the developer should now use `runnvda.bat` in the root of the repository. If you do try to execute `source/nvda.pyw`, a message box will alert you this is no longer supported.
segment.target: Para executar o NVDA a partir do cdigo-fonte, ao invs de executar `source/nvda.pyw` diretamente, o desenvolvedor deve agora usar `runnvda.bat` na raiz do repositrio. Se voc tentar executar `source/nvda.pyw`, uma caixa de mensagem ir alert-lo de que no mais suportado.

segment.source: To perform unit tests, execute `rununittests.bat [<extra unittest discover options>]`
segment.target: Para realizar testes unitrios, execute `rununittests.bat [<opes extras de descoberta unittest>]`

segment.source: To perform system tests: execute `runsystemtests.bat [<extra robot options>]`
segment.target: Para realizar testes de sistema: execute `runsystemtests.bat [<opes extras do rob>]`

segment.source: To perform linting, execute `runlint.bat <base branch>`
segment.target: Para realizar linting, execute `runlint.bat <base branch>`

segment.source: Please refer to readme.md for more details.
segment.target: Consulte readme.md para obter mais detalhes.

segment.source: The following Python dependencies have also been upgraded:
segment.target: As seguintes dependncias Python tambm foram atualizadas:

segment.source: comtypes updated to 1.1.8.
segment.target: comtypes atualizado para 1.1.8.

segment.source: pySerial updated to 3.5.
segment.target: pySerial atualizado para 3.5.

segment.source: wxPython updated to 4.1.1.
segment.target: wxPython atualizado para 4.1.1.

segment.source: Py2exe updated to 0.10.1.0.
segment.target: Py2exe atualizado para 0.10.1.0.

segment.source: `LiveText._getTextLines` has been removed. (#11639)
segment.target: `LiveText._getTextLines` foi removido. (#11639)

segment.source: Instead, override `_getText` which returns a string of all text in the object.
segment.target: Em vez disso, sobrescreva `_getText` que retorna uma string de todo o texto no objeto.

segment.source: `LiveText` objects can now calculate diffs by character. (#11639)
segment.target: Objetos `LiveText` agora podem calcular diferenas por caractere. (#11639)

segment.source: To alter the diff behaviour for some object, override the `diffAlgo` property (see the docstring for details).
segment.target: Para alterar o comportamento diff de algum objeto, sobrescreva a propriedade `diffAlgo` (veja a docstring para detalhes).

segment.source: When defining a script with the script decorator, the 'allowInSleepMode' boolean argument can be specified to control if a script is available in sleep mode or not. (#11979)
segment.target: Ao definir um script com o decorador de script, o argumento booleano 'allowInSleepMode' pode ser especificado para controlar se um script est disponvel no modo dormir ou no. (#11979)

segment.source: The following functions are removed from the config module. (#11935)
segment.target: As funes a seguir foram removidas do mdulo de configurao. (#11935)

segment.source: canStartOnSecureScreens - use config.isInstalledCopy instead.
segment.target: canStartOnSecureScreens - use config.isInstalledCopy em seu lugar.

segment.source: hasUiAccess and execElevated - use them from the systemUtils module.
segment.target: hasUiAccess e execElevated - use-os a partir do mdulo systemUtils.

segment.source: getConfigDirs - use globalVars.appArgs.configPath instead.
segment.target: getConfigDirs - use globalVars.appArgs.configPath.

segment.source: Module level REASON_* constants are removed from controlTypes - please use controlTypes.OutputReason instead. (#11969)
segment.target: As constantes em nvel de mdulo REASON_* so removidas de controlTypes - use controlTypes.OutputReason em seu lugar. (#11969)

segment.source: REASON_QUICKNAV has been removed from browseMode - use controlTypes.OutputReason.QUICKNAV instead. (#11969)
segment.target: REASON_QUICKNAV foi removido de browseMode - use controlTypes.OutputReason.QUICKNAV em seu lugar. (#11969)

segment.source: `NVDAObject` (and derivatives) property `isCurrent` now strictly returns Enum class `controlTypes.IsCurrent`. (#11782)
segment.target: A propriedade `NVDAObject` (e derivadas) `isCurrent` agora retorna estritamente a classe Enum `controlTypes.IsCurrent`. (#11782)

segment.source: `isCurrent` is no longer Optional, and thus will not return None.
segment.target: `isCurrent` no mais opcional e, portanto, no retornar None.

segment.source: When an object is not current `controlTypes.IsCurrent.NO` is returned.
segment.target: Quando um objeto no atual `controlTypes.IsCurrent.NO` retornado.

segment.source: The `controlTypes.isCurrentLabels` mapping has been removed. (#11782)
segment.target: O mapeamento `controlTypes.isCurrentLabels` foi removido. (#11782)

segment.source: Instead use the `displayString` property on a `controlTypes.IsCurrent` enum value.
segment.target: Em vez disso, use a propriedade `displayString` em um valor enum `controlTypes.IsCurrent`.

segment.source: For example: `controlTypes.IsCurrent.YES.displayString`.
segment.target: Por exemplo: `controlTypes.IsCurrent.YES.displayString`.

segment.source: `winKernel.GetTimeFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetTimeFormatEx` instead. (#12139)
segment.target: `winKernel.GetTimeFormat` foi removido - use `winKernel.GetTimeFormatEx` em seu lugar. (#12139)

segment.source: `winKernel.GetDateFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetDateFormatEx` instead. (#12139)
segment.target: `winKernel.GetDateFormat` foi removido - use `winKernel.GetDateFormatEx` em seu lugar. (#12139)

segment.source: `gui.DriverSettingsMixin` has been removed - use `gui.AutoSettingsMixin`. (#12144)
segment.target: `gui.DriverSettingsMixin` foi removido - use `gui.AutoSettingsMixin`. (#12144)

segment.source: `speech.getSpeechForSpelling` has been removed - use `speech.getSpellingSpeech`. (#12145)
segment.target: `speech.getSpeechForSpelling` foi removido - use `speech.getSpellingSpeech`. (#12145)

segment.source: Commands cannot be directly imported from speech as `import speech; speech.ExampleCommand()` or `import speech.manager; speech.manager.ExampleCommand()` - use `from speech.commands import ExampleCommand` instead. (#12126)
segment.target: Os comandos no podem ser importados diretamente de speech como `import speech; speech.ExampleCommand()` ou `import speech.manager; speech.manager.ExampleCommand()` - use `from speech.commands import ExampleCommand` em vez disso. (#12126)

segment.source: `speakTextInfo` will no longer send speech through `speakWithoutPauses` if reason is `SAYALL`, as `SayAllHandler` does this manually now. (#12150)
segment.target: `speakTextInfo` no ir mais enviar speech fala atravs de `speakWithoutPauses` se a razo for `SAYALL`, j que `SayAllHandler` faz isso manualmente agora. (#12150)

segment.source: The `synthDriverHandler` module is no longer star imported into `globalCommands` and `gui.settingsDialogs` - use `from synthDriverHandler import synthFunctionExample` instead. (#12172)
segment.target: O mdulo `synthDriverHandler` no mais importado com asterisco para `globalCommands` e `gui.settingsDialogs` - use `from synthDriverHandler import synthFunctionExample` ao invs. (#12172)

segment.source: `ROLE_EQUATION` has been removed from controlTypes - use `ROLE_MATH` instead. (#12164)
segment.target: `ROLE_EQUATION` foi removido de controlTypes - use `ROLE_MATH` ao invs. (#12164)

segment.source: `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting`. (#12168)
segment.target: As classes `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting` foram removidas de `driverHandler` - por favor, use-as de `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting`. (#12168)

segment.source: `autoSettingsUtils.utils` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.utils`. (#12168)
segment.target: As classes `autoSettingsUtils.utils` foram removidas de `driverHandler` - por favor, use-as de `autoSettingsUtils.utils`. (#12168)

segment.source: Support of `TextInfo`s that do not inherit from `contentRecog.BaseContentRecogTextInfo` is removed. (#12157)
segment.target: O suporte de `TextInfo`s que no herdam de `contentRecog.BaseContentRecogTextInfo` foi removido. (#12157)

segment.source: `speech.speakWithoutPauses` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses(speakFunc=speech.speak).speakWithoutPauses` instead. (#12195, #12251)
segment.target: `speech.speakWithoutPauses` foi removido - por favor use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses(speakFunc = speech.speak).speakWithoutPauses` em seu lugar. (#12195, #12251)

segment.source: `speech.re_last_pause` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses.re_last_pause` instead. (#12195, #12251)
segment.target: `speech.re_last_pause` foi removido - por favor use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses.re_last_pause` em seu lugar. (#12195, #12251)

segment.source: `WelcomeDialog`, `LauncherDialog` and `AskAllowUsageStatsDialog` are moved to the `gui.startupDialogs`. (#12105)
segment.target: `WelcomeDialog`, `LauncherDialog` e `AskAllowUsageStatsDialog` esto movidos para o `gui.startupDialogs`. (#12105)

segment.source: `getDocFilePath` has been moved from `gui` to the `documentationUtils` module. (#12105)
segment.target: `getDocFilePath` foi movido de `gui` para o mdulo `documentationUtils`. (#12105)

segment.source: The gui.accPropServer module as well as the AccPropertyOverride and ListCtrlAccPropServer classes from the gui.nvdaControls module have been removed in favor of WX native support for overriding accessibility properties. When enhancing accessibility of WX controls, implement wx.Accessible instead. (#12215)
segment.target: O mdulo gui.accPropServer, bem como as classes AccPropertyOverride e ListCtrlAccPropServer do mdulo gui.nvdaControls foram removidos em favor do suporte nativo do WX para substituir as propriedades de acessibilidade. Ao aprimorar a acessibilidade dos controles WX, implemente wx.Accessible. (#12215)

segment.source: Files in `source/comInterfaces/` are now more easily consumable by developer tools such as IDEs. (#12201)
segment.target: Arquivos em `source/comInterfaces/` agora so mais facilmente consumveis por ferramentas de desenvolvedor como IDEs. (#12201)

segment.source: Convenience methods and types have been added to the winVersion module for getting and comparing Windows versions. (#11909)
segment.target: Mtodos e tipos de convenincia foram adicionados ao mdulo winVersion para obter e comparar verses do Windows. (#11909)

segment.source: isWin10 function found in winVersion module has been removed.
segment.target: A funo isWin10 encontrada no mdulo winVersion foi removida.

segment.source: class winVersion.WinVersion is a comparable and order-able type encapsulating Windows version information.
segment.target: classe winVersion.WinVersion um tipo comparvel e passvel de pedido que encapsula informaes de verso do Windows.

segment.source: Function winVersion.getWinVer has been added to get a winVersion.WinVersion representing the currently running OS.
segment.target: A funo winVersion.getWinVer foi adicionada para obter uma winVersion.WinVersion que representa o sistema operacional em execuo no momento.

segment.source: Convenience constants have been added for known Windows releases, see winVersion.WIN* constants.
segment.target: Constantes de convenincia foram adicionadas para verses conhecidas do Windows, consulte constantes winVersion.WIN*.

segment.source: IAccessibleHandler no longer star imports everything from IAccessible and IA2 COM interfaces - please use them directly. (#12232)
segment.target: IAccessibleHandler no importa mais tudo das interfaces COM IAccessible e IA2 - por favor, use-as diretamente. (#12232)

segment.source: TextInfo objects now have start and end properties which can be compared mathematically with operators such as < <= == != >= >. (#11613)
segment.target: Os objetos TextInfo agora tm propriedades de incio e fim que podem ser comparadas matematicamente com operadores como < <= == != >= >. (#11613)

segment.source: E.g. ti1.start <= ti2.end
segment.target: Por exemplo, ti1.start <= ti2.end

segment.source: This usage is now prefered instead of ti1.compareEndPoints(ti2,"startToEnd") <= 0
segment.target: Este uso agora preferido em vez de ti1.compareEndPoints(ti2,"startToEnd") <= 0

segment.source: TextInfo start and end properties can also be set to each other. (#11613)
segment.target: As propriedades de incio e fim de TextInfo tambm podem ser definidas entre si. (#11613)

segment.source: E.g. ti1.start = ti2.end
segment.target: Por exemplo, ti1.start = ti2.end

segment.source: This usage is prefered instead of ti1.SetEndPoint(ti2,"startToEnd")
segment.target: Este uso preferido em vez de ti1.SetEndPoint(ti2,"startToEnd")

segment.source: `wx.CENTRE_ON_SCREEN` and `wx.CENTER_ON_SCREEN` are removed, use `self.CentreOnScreen()` instead. (#12309)
segment.target: `wx.CENTRE_ON_SCREEN` e `wx.CENTER_ON_SCREEN` foram removidos, use `self.CentreOnScreen()` ao invs. (#12309)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.isSupported` has been removed, NVDA only supports versions of Windows where this evaluates to `True`. (#12222)
segment.target: `EasyOfAccess.isSupported` foi removido, o NVDA s suporta verses do Windows onde isso avaliado como `True`. (#12222)

segment.source: `sayAllHandler` has been moved to `speech.sayAll`. (#12251)
segment.target: `sayAllHandler` foi movido para `speech.sayAll`. (#12251)

segment.source: `speech.sayAll.SayAllHandler` exposes the functions `stop`, `isRunning`, `readObjects`, `readText`, `lastSayAllMode`.
segment.target: `speech.sayAll.SayAllHandler` expe as funes `stop`, `isRunning`, `readObjects`, `readText`, `lastSayAllMode`.

segment.source: `SayAllHandler.stop` also resets the `SayAllHandler` `SpeechWithoutPauses` instance.
segment.target: `SayAllHandler.stop` tambm redefine a instncia `SayAllHandler` `SpeechWithoutPauses`.

segment.source: `CURSOR_REVIEW` and `CURSOR_CARET` has been replaced with `CURSOR.REVIEW` and `CURSOR.CARET`.
segment.target: `CURSOR_REVIEW` e `CURSOR_CARET` foram substitudos por `CURSOR.REVIEW` e `CURSOR.CARET`.

segment.source: `speech.SpeechWithoutPauses` has been moved to `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses`. (#12251)
segment.target: `speech.SpeechWithoutPauses` foi movido para `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses`. (#12251)

segment.source: `speech.curWordChars` has been renamed `speech._curWordChars`. (#12395)
segment.target: `speech.curWordChars` foi renomeado para `speech._curWordChars`. (#12395)

segment.source: the following have been removed from `speech` and can be accessed through `speech.getState()`. These are readonly values now. (#12395)
segment.target: os seguintes foram removidos de `speech` e podem ser acessados atravs de `speech.getState()`. Esses so valores somente leitura agora. (#12395)

segment.source: speechMode
segment.target: speechMode

segment.source: speechMode_beeps_ms
segment.target: speechMode_beeps_ms

segment.source: beenCanceled
segment.target: beenCanceled

segment.source: isPaused
segment.target: isPaused

segment.source: to update `speech.speechMode` use `speech.setSpeechMode`. (#12395)
segment.target: para atualizar `speech.speechMode` use `speech.setSpeechMode`. (#12395)

segment.source: the following have been moved to `speech.SpeechMode`. (#12395)
segment.target: os seguintes foram movidos para `speech.SpeechMode`. (#12395)

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_off` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.off`
segment.target: `speech.speechMode_off` torna-se `speech.SpeechMode.off`

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_beeps` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.beeps`
segment.target: `speech.speechMode_beeps` torna-se `speech.SpeechMode.beeps`

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_talk` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.talk`
segment.target: `speech.speechMode_talk` torna-se `speech.SpeechMode.talk`

segment.source: `IAccessibleHandler.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType` is now `IAccessibleHandler.types.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType`. (#12367)
segment.target: `IAccessibleHandler.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType` agora `IAccessibleHandler.types.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType`. (#12367)

segment.source: The following in `NVDAObjects.UIA.WinConsoleUIA` have been changed (#12094)
segment.target: Os seguintes em `NVDAObjects.UIA.WinConsoleUIA` foram alterados (#12094)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.is21H1Plus` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable`.
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.is21H1Plus` renomeado para `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable`.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfo` renamed to start class name with upper case.
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfo` renomeado para iniciar o nome da classe com maisculas.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfoPre21H1` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.ConsoleUIATextInfoWorkaroundEndInclusive`
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfoPre21H1` renomeado para `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.ConsoleUIATextInfoWorkaroundEndInclusive`

segment.source: The implementation works around both end points being inclusive (in text ranges) before [microsoft/terminal PR 4018](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/4018)
segment.target: A implementao funciona em torno de ambos os pontos finais sendo inclusivos (em intervalos de texto) antes de [microsoft/terminal PR 4018](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/4018)

segment.source: Workarounds for `expand`, `collapse`, `compareEndPoints`, `setEndPoint`, etc
segment.target: Solues alternativas para `expand`, `collapse`, `compareEndPoints`, `setEndPoint`, etc

segment.source: This release includes new Chinese Input methods, an update to Liblouis and the elements list (NVDA+f7) now works in focus mode.
segment.target: Esta verso inclui novos mtodos de entrada em chins, uma atualizao para Liblouis e a lista de elementos (NVDA+f7) agora funciona no modo de foco.

segment.source: Context sensitive help is now available when pressing F1 in NVDA dialogs.
segment.target: A ajuda sensvel ao contexto agora est disponvel ao pressionar F1 nos dilogos do NVDA.

segment.source: Improvements to symbol pronunciation rules, speech dictionary, Braille message and skim reading.
segment.target: Melhorias nas regras de pronncia de smbolos, dicionrio de voz, mensagem em Braille e leitura dinmica.

segment.source: Bug fixes and improvements to Mail, Outlook, Teams, Visual Studio, Azure Data Studio, Foobar2000.
segment.target: Correes de falhas e melhorias para Mail, Outlook, Teams, Visual Studio, Azure Data Studio, Foobar2000.

segment.source: On the web, there are improvements to Google Docs, and greater support for ARIA.
segment.target: Na web, h melhorias no Google Docs e maior suporte para ARIA.

segment.source: Plus many other important bug fixes and improvements.
segment.target: Alm de muitas outras correes de falhas e melhorias importantes.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Pressing F1 inside NVDA dialogs will now open the help file to most relevant section. (#7757)
segment.target: Pressionar F1 dentro das caixas de dilogo do NVDA agora abrir o arquivo de ajuda na seo mais relevante. (#7757)

segment.source: Support for auto complete suggestions (IntelliSense) in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio plus Visual Studio 2017 and higher. (#7504)
segment.target: Suporte para sugestes de preenchimento automtico (IntelliSense) no Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio mais Visual Studio 2017 e superiores. (#7504)

segment.source: Symbol pronunciation: Support for grouping in a complex symbol definition and support group references in a replacement rule making them simpler and more powerful. (#11107)
segment.target: Pronncia de smbolo: Suporte para agrupamento numa definio de smbolo complexo e referncias de grupo de suporte em uma regra de substituio, tornando-os mais simples e poderosos. (#11107)

segment.source: Users are now notified when attempting to create Speech Dictionary entries with invalid regular expression substitutions. (#11407)
segment.target: Os usurios agora so notificados quando tentam criar entradas de dicionrio de voz com substituies de expresses regulares invlidas. (#11407)

segment.source: Specifically grouping errors are now detected.
segment.target: Erros de agrupamento especficos agora so detectados.

segment.source: Added support for the new chinese Traditional Quick and Pinyin Input methods in Windows 10. (#11562)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para os novos mtodos de entrada chins Tradicional Rpido Quick e Pinyin no Windows 10. (#11562)

segment.source: Tab headers are now considered form fields with quick navigation f key. (#10432)
segment.target: Os cabealhos das guias abas agora so considerados campos de formulrio com navegao rpida tecla f. (#10432)

segment.source: Added a command to toggle reporting of marked (highlighted) text; There is no default associated gesture. (#11807)
segment.target: Adicionado um comando para alternar anncio de texto marcado (realado); No h comando gesto padro associado. (#11807)

segment.source: Added the --copy-portable-config command line parameter that allows you to automatically copy the provided configuration to the user account when silently installing NVDA. (#9676)
segment.target: Adicionado o parmetro de linha de comando --copy-portable-config que permite que voc copie automaticamente a configurao fornecida para a conta do usurio ao instalar o NVDA silenciosamente. (#9676)

segment.source: Braille routing is now supported with the Braille Viewer for mouse users, hover to route to a braille cell. (#11804)
segment.target: O direcionamento de Braille agora compatvel com o Visualizador Braille para usurios de mouse, passe o mouse para direcionar para uma cela braille. (#11804)

segment.source: NVDA will now automatically detect the Humanware Brailliant BI 40X and 20X devices via both USB and Bluetooth. (#11819)
segment.target: O NVDA agora detectar automaticamente os dispositivos Humanware Brailliant BI 40X e 20X via USB e Bluetooth. (#11819)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.16.1:
segment.target: Transcritor braille liblouis atualizado para a verso 3.16.1:

segment.source: Addresses multiple crashes
segment.target: Resolve vrias falhas

segment.source: Adds Bashkir grade 1 Braille table
segment.target: Adiciona tabela Braille de Basquir grau 1

segment.source: Adds Coptic 8 dot computer braille table
segment.target: Adiciona tabela de braille informtico Copta de 8 pontos

segment.source: Adds Russian literary braille and Russian literary braille (detailed) tables
segment.target: Adiciona tabelas de braille literrio Russo e de braille literrio Russo (detalhado)

segment.source: Adds Added Afrikaans grade 2 braille table
segment.target: Adiciona tabela braille Africner grau 2

segment.source: Removes the Russian grade 1 Braille table
segment.target: Remove a tabela Braille de Russo grau 1

segment.source: When reading with say all in browse mode, the find next and find previous commands do not stop reading anymore if Allow skim reading option is enabled; say all rather resumes from after the next or previous found term. (#11563)
segment.target: Ao ler com leitura contnua no modo de navegao, os comandos localizar prximo e localizar anterior no param mais de ler se a opo Permitir leitura dinmica estiver habilitada; a leitura contnua recomea depois do prximo termo encontrado ou anterior. (#11563)

segment.source: For HIMS braille displays F3 has been remapped to Space + dots 148. (#11710)
segment.target: Na linha braille HIMS, F3 foi remapeado para Espao + pontos 148. (#11710)

segment.source: Improvements to the UX of the "braille message timeout" and "Show messages indefinitely" options. (#11602)
segment.target: Melhorias na Experincia do Usurio UX das opes "tempo limite da mensagem em braille" e "Mostrar mensagens indefinidamente". (#11602)

segment.source: In web browsers and other applications that support browse mode, the Elements List dialog (NVDA+F7) can now be invoked when in focus mode. (#10453)
segment.target: Em navegadores web e outros aplicativos que suportam o modo de navegao, o dilogo Lista de elementos (NVDA+F7) agora pode ser chamado no modo de foco. (#10453)

segment.source: Updates to ARIA live regions are now suppressed when reporting of dynamic content changes is disabled. (#9077)
segment.target: Atualizaes para regies ativas ARIA live regions agora so suprimidas quando o anncio de alteraes de contedo dinmico est desativado. (#9077)

segment.source: NVDA will now report "Copied to clipboard" before the copied text. (#6757)
segment.target: O NVDA agora relatar "Copiado para a rea de transferncia" antes do texto copiado. (#6757)

segment.source: Presentation of graphical view table in disk management has been improved. (#10048)
segment.target: A apresentao da tabela de visualizao grfica no gerenciamento de disco foi aprimorada. (#10048)

segment.source: Labels for controls are now disabled (greyed out) when the control is disabled. (#11809)
segment.target: Os rtulos dos controles agora esto desabilitados (esmaecidos) quando o controle desabilitado. (#11809)

segment.source: Updated CLDR emoji annotation to version 38. (#11817)
segment.target: Anotao de emoji CLDR atualizada para a verso 38. (#11817)

segment.source: The inbuilt "Focus Highlight" feature has been renamed "Vision Highlight". (#11700)
segment.target: O recurso embutido "Realce de Foco" foi renomeado para "Realce Visual". (#11700)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: NVDA once again works correctly with edit fields when using the Fast Log Entry application. (#8996)
segment.target: O NVDA mais uma vez funciona corretamente com os campos de edio ao usar o aplicativo Fast Log Entry. (#8996)

segment.source: Report elapsed time in Foobar2000 if no total time is available (e.g. when playing a live stream). (#11337)
segment.target: Relata o tempo decorrido no Foobar2000 se nenhum tempo total estiver disponvel (por exemplo, ao reproduzir uma transmisso ao vivo). (#11337)

segment.source: NVDA now honors the aria-roledescription attribute on elements in editable content in web pages. (#11607)
segment.target: O NVDA agora respeita o atributo aria-roledescription nos elementos em contedo editvel em pginas web. (#11607)

segment.source: 'list' is no longer announced on every line of a list in Google Docs or other editable content in Google Chrome. (#7562)
segment.target: 'lista' no mais anunciada em todas as linhas de uma lista no Google Docs ou outro contedo editvel no Google Chrome. (#7562)

segment.source: When arrowing by character or word from one list item to another in editable content on the web, entering the new list item is now announced. (#11569)
segment.target: Ao navegar por caractere ou palavra de um item de lista para outro em contedo editvel na web, a entrada no novo item de lista anunciado. (#11569)

segment.source: NVDA now reads the correct line when the caret is placed at the end of a link on the end of a list item in Google Docs or other editable content on the web. (#11606)
segment.target: NVDA agora l a linha correta quando o cursor colocado no final de um link no fim de um item de lista no Google Docs ou outro contedo editvel na web. (#11606)

segment.source: On Windows 7, opening and closing the start menu from the desktop now sets focus correctly. (#10567)
segment.target: No Windows 7, abrir e fechar o menu Iniciar na rea de trabalho agora define o foco corretamente. (#10567)

segment.source: When "attempt to cancel expired focus events" is enabled, the title of the tab is now announced again when switching tabs in Firefox. (#11397)
segment.target: Quando "tentar cancelar eventos de foco expirados" est habilitado, o ttulo da aba anunciado novamente ao alternar entre abas no Firefox. (#11397)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce a list item after typing a character in a list when speaking with the SAPI5 Ivona voices. (#11651)
segment.target: O NVDA no falha mais em anunciar um item de lista aps digitar um caractere em uma lista ao falar com as vozes SAPI5 Ivona. (#11651)

segment.source: It is again possible to use browse mode when reading emails in Windows 10 Mail 16005.13110 and later. (#11439)
segment.target: novamente possvel usar o modo de navegao ao ler e-mails no Windows 10 Mail 16005.13110 e posteriores. (#11439)

segment.source: When using the SAPI5 Ivona voices from harposoftware.com, NVDA is now able to save configuration, switch synthesizers, and no longer will stay silent after restarting. (#11650)
segment.target: Ao usar as vozes SAPI5 Ivona de harposoftware.com, o NVDA agora capaz de salvar a configurao, trocar de sintetizador e no mais ficar em silncio aps reiniciar. (#11650)

segment.source: It is now possible to enter number 6 in computer braille from a braille keyboard on HIMS displays. (#11710)
segment.target: Agora possvel inserir o nmero 6 em braille informtico a partir de um teclado braille em linhas HIMS. (#11710)

segment.source: Major performance improvements in Azure Data Studio. (#11533, #11715)
segment.target: Grande melhoria de desempenho no Azure Data Studio. (#11533, #11715)

segment.source: With "Attempt to Cancel speech for expired focus events" enabled the title of the NVDA Find dialog is announced again. (#11632)
segment.target: Com a opo "Tentativa de cancelar a fala para eventos de foco expirados" habilitada, o ttulo do dilogo Localizar do NVDA anunciado novamente. (#11632)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer freeze when waking the computer and focus lands in a Microsoft Edge document. (#11576)
segment.target: O NVDA no deve mais congelar ao despertar o computador e o foco pousar em um documento do Microsoft Edge. (#11576)

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to press tab or move focus after closing a context menu in MS Edge for browse mode to be functional again. (#11202)
segment.target: No mais necessrio pressionar tab ou mover o foco aps fechar um menu de contexto no MS Edge para que o modo de navegao volte a funcionar. (#11202)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read items in list views within a 64-bit application such as Tortoise SVN. (#8175)
segment.target: O NVDA no falha mais em ler itens em visualizaes de lista num aplicativo de 64-bit como o Tortoise SVN. (#8175)

segment.source: ARIA treegrids are now exposed as normal tables in browse mode in both Firefox and Chrome. (#9715)
segment.target: Treegrids ARIA agora so expostos como tabelas normais no modo de navegao no Firefox e no Chrome. (#9715)

segment.source: A reverse search can now be initiated with 'find previous' via NVDA+shift+F3 (#11770)
segment.target: Uma pesquisa reversa agora pode ser iniciada com 'localizar anterior' via NVDA+shift+F3 (#11770)

segment.source: An NVDA script is no longer treated as being repeated if an unrelated key press happens in between the two executions of the script. (#11388)
segment.target: Um script NVDA no mais tratado como sendo repetido se um pressionamento de tecla no relacionado ocorrer entre as duas execues do script. (#11388)

segment.source: Strong and emphasis tags in Internet Explorer can again be suppressed from being reported by turning off Report Emphasis in NVDA's Document Formatting settings. (#11808)
segment.target: As marcaes de forte e nfase no Internet Explorer podem novamente ser suprimidas de serem informadas desligando o Anncio de nfase nas configuraes de Formatao de Documento do NVDA. (#11808)

segment.source: A freeze of several seconds experienced by a small amount of users when arrowing between cells in Excel should no longer occur. (#11818)
segment.target: Um congelamento de vrios segundos experimentado por uma pequena quantidade de usurios quando usando setas entre clulas no Excel no deve mais ocorrer. (#11818)

segment.source: In Microsoft Teams builds with version numbers like 1.3.00.28xxx, NVDA no longer fails reading messages in chats or Teams channels due to an incorrectly focused menu. (#11821)
segment.target: Em compilaes do Microsoft Teams com nmeros de verso como 1.3.00.28xxx, o NVDA no falha mais na leitura de mensagens em bate-papos chats ou canais do Teams devido a um menu focalizado incorretamente. (#11821)

segment.source: Text marked both as being a spelling and grammar error at the same time in Google Chrome will be appropriately announced as both a spelling and grammar error by NVDA. (#11787)
segment.target: O texto marcado como erro ortogrfico e gramatical ao mesmo tempo no Google Chrome ser anunciado apropriadamente como erro ortogrfico e gramatical pelo NVDA. (#11787)

segment.source: When using Outlook (French locale), the shortcut for 'Reply all' (control+shift+R) works again. (#11196)
segment.target: Ao usar o Outlook (localidade francesa), o atalho para 'Responder a todos' (control+shift+R) funciona novamente. (#11196)

segment.source: In Visual Studio, IntelliSense tool tips that provide additional details about the currently selected IntelliSense item are now only reported once. (#11611)
segment.target: No Visual Studio, as dicas de ferramenta IntelliSense que fornecem detalhes adicionais sobre o item IntelliSense selecionado atualmente so relatadas apenas uma vez. (#11611)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will not announce progress of calculations if speak typed characters is disabled. (#9428)
segment.target: Na Calculadora do Windows 10, o NVDA no anunciar o progresso dos clculos se a fala dos caracteres digitados estiver desabilitada. (#9428)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when using English US grade 2 and expand to computer Braille at the cursor is on, when displaying certain content such as a URL in Braille. (#11754)
segment.target: O NVDA no trava mais ao usar o Ingls Estadunidense grau 2 e expande para o Braille informtico quando o cursor est ativado, ao exibir determinado contedo, como uma URL em Braille. (#11754)

segment.source: It is again possible to report formatting information for the focused Excel cell using NVDA+F. (#11914)
segment.target: novamente possvel relatar informaes de formatao para a clula Excel em foco usando NVDA+F. (#11914)

segment.source: QWERTY input on Papenmeier braille displays that support it again works and no longer causes NVDA to randomly freeze. (#11944)
segment.target: A digitao QWERTY em linhas braille Papenmeier que a suportam novamente funciona e no faz mais com que o NVDA congele aleatoriamente. (#11944)

segment.source: In Chromium based browsers, several cases were solved where table navigation didn't work and NVDA didn't report the number of rows/columns of the table. (#12359)
segment.target: Nos navegadores baseados em Chromium, vrios casos foram resolvidos em que a navegao nas tabelas no funcionava e o NVDA no informava o nmero de linhas/colunas da tabela. (#12359)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: System tests can now send keys using spy.emulateKeyPress, which takes a key identifier that conforms to NVDA's own key names, and by default also blocks until the action is executed. (#11581)
segment.target: Os testes de sistema agora podem enviar teclas usando spy.emulateKeyPress, que recebe um identificador de tecla que est em conformidade com os nomes de tecla do NVDA e, por padro, tambm bloqueia at que a ao seja executada. (#11581)

segment.source: NVDA no longer requires the current directory to be the NVDA application directory in order to function. (#6491)
segment.target: O NVDA no requer mais que o diretrio atual seja o diretrio do aplicativo NVDA para funcionar. (#6491)

segment.source: The aria live politeness setting for live regions can now be found on NVDA Objects using the liveRegionPoliteness property. (#11596)
segment.target: A configurao aria live politeness polidez para regies ativas agora pode ser encontrada em Objetos NVDA usando a propriedade liveRegionPoliteness. (#11596)

segment.source: It is now possible to define separate gestures for Outlook and Word document. (#11196)
segment.target: Agora possvel definir comandos gestos separados para documentos do Outlook e do Word. (#11196)

segment.source: This release includes several large improvements to stability and performance particularly in Microsoft Office applications. There are new settings to toggle touchscreen support and graphics reporting.
segment.target: Esta verso inclui vrios grandes aprimoramentos de estabilidade e desempenho, especialmente em aplicativos do Microsoft Office. Existem novas configuraes para alternar o suporte a tela de toque e anunciar grficos.

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content can be reported in browsers, and there are new German braille tables.
segment.target: A existncia de contedo marcado (realado) pode ser informada em navegadores, e h novas tabelas braille alems.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: You can now toggle reporting of graphics from NVDA's document formatting settings. Note that disabling this option will still read the alternative texts of graphics. (#4837)
segment.target: Agora voc pode alternar os anncios de grficos das configuraes de formatao de documentos do NVDA. Observe que desabilitar esta opo ainda ler os textos alternativos dos grficos. (#4837)

segment.source: You can now toggle NVDA's touchscreen support. An option has been added to the Touch Interaction panel of NVDA's settings. The default gesture is NVDA+control+alt+t. (#9682)
segment.target: Agora voc pode alternar o suporte a tela de toque do NVDA. Uma opo foi adicionada ao painel Interao por Toque das configuraes do NVDA. O comando gesto padro NVDA+control+alt+t. (#9682)

segment.source: Added new German braille tables. (#11268)
segment.target: Adicionadas novas tabelas braille em alemo. (#11268)

segment.source: NVDA now detects read-only text UIA controls. (#10494)
segment.target: O NVDA agora detecta controles UIA de texto somente leitura. (#10494)

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content is reported in both speech and braille in all web browsers. (#11436)
segment.target: A existncia de contedo marcado (realado) informada em voz e braille em todos os navegadores web. (#11436)

segment.source: This can be toggled on and off by a new NVDA Document Formatting option for Highlighting.
segment.target: Isso pode ser ativado e desativado por uma nova opo de formatao de documento do NVDA para realce.

segment.source: New emulated system keyboard keys can be added from NVDA's Input gestures dialog. (#6060)
segment.target: Novas teclas emuladas do teclado do sistema podem ser adicionadas a partir do dilogo Definir comandos Gestos de entrada do NVDA. (#6060)

segment.source: To do this, press the add button after you selected the Emulated system keyboard keys category.
segment.target: Para fazer isso, pressione o boto adicionar depois de selecionar a categoria Teclas de teclado do sistema emulado.

segment.source: Handy Tech Active Braille with joystick is now supported. (#11655)
segment.target: Handy Tech Active Braille com joystick agora compatvel. (#11655)

segment.source: "Automatic focus mode for caret movement" setting is now compatible with disabling "Automatically set focus to focusable elements". (#11663)
segment.target: A configurao "Modo de foco automtico quando o cursor do aplicativo muda" agora compatvel com a desativao de "Posicionar automaticamente foco do sistema em elementos focveis". (#11663)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: The Report formatting script (NVDA+f) has now been changed to report the formatting at the system caret rather than at the review cursor position. To report formatting at the review cursor position now use NVDA+shift+f. (#9505)
segment.target: O script de anncio de formatao (NVDA+f) agora foi alterado para informar a formatao no cursor do sistema em vez de na posio do cursor de explorao. Para informar a formatao na posio do cursor de explorao, use NVDA+shift+f. (#9505)

segment.source: NVDA no longer automatically sets the system focus to focusable elements by default in browse mode, improving performance and stability. (#11190)
segment.target: O NVDA no define mais automaticamente o foco do sistema para elementos focalizveis por padro no modo de navegao, melhorando o desempenho e a estabilidade. (#11190)

segment.source: CLDR updated from version 36.1 to version 37. (#11303)
segment.target: CLDR atualizado da verso 36.1 para a verso 37. (#11303)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4
segment.target: Atualizado eSpeak-NG para 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4

segment.source: You can now utilize table navigation in list boxes with checkable list items when the particular list has multiple columns. (#8857)
segment.target: Agora voc pode utilizar a navegao de tabela em caixas de lista com itens de lista marcveis quando a lista particular tiver vrias colunas. (#8857)

segment.source: In the Add-ons manager, when prompted to confirm removal of an add-on, "No" is now the default. (#10015)
segment.target: No gerenciador de complementos, quando solicitado a confirmar a remoo de um complemento, "No" agora o padro. (#10015)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the Elements List dialog now presents formulas in their localized form. (#9144)
segment.target: No Microsoft Excel, o dilogo Lista de elementos agora apresenta frmulas em sua forma localizada. (#9144)

segment.source: NVDA now reports the correct terminology for notes in MS Excel. (#11311)
segment.target: NVDA agora informa a terminologia correta para notas no Ms Excel. (#11311)

segment.source: When using the "move review cursor to focus" command in browse mode, the review cursor is now set at the position of the virtual caret. (#9622)
segment.target: Ao usar o comando "mover o cursor de explorao para o foco" no modo de navegao, o cursor de explorao agora definido na posio do cursor virtual. (#9622)

segment.source: Information reported in browse mode, such as the formatting info with NVDA+F, are now displayed in a slightly bigger window centered on screen. (#9910)
segment.target: As informaes relatadas no modo de navegao, como as informaes de formatao com NVDA+F, agora so exibidas em uma janela um pouco maior centralizada na tela. (#9910)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: NVDA now always speaks when navigating by word and landing on any single symbol followed by white space, whatever the verbosity settings. (#5133)
segment.target: O NVDA agora sempre fala ao navegar por palavra e ao chegar em qualquer smbolo individual seguido de espao em branco, quaisquer que sejam as configuraes de verbosidade. (#5133)

segment.source: In applications using QT 5.11 or newer, object descriptions are again reported. (#8604)
segment.target: Em aplicativos que usam QT 5.11 ou mais recente, as descries dos objetos so informadas novamente. (#8604)

segment.source: When deleting a word with control+delete, NVDA no longer remains silent. (#3298, #11029)
segment.target: Ao excluir uma palavra com control+delete, o NVDA no fica mais em silncio. (#3298, #11029)

segment.source: Now the word to the right of the deleted word is announced.
segment.target: Agora, a palavra direita da palavra excluda anunciada.

segment.source: In general settings panel, the language list is now sorted correctly. (#10348)
segment.target: No painel de configuraes gerais, a lista de idiomas agora est ordenada corretamente. (#10348)

segment.source: In the Input Gestures dialog, significantly improved performance while filtering. (#10307)
segment.target: No dilogo Definir comandos Gestos de entrada , desempenho significativamente melhorado durante a filtragem. (#10307)

segment.source: You can now send Unicode characters beyond U+FFFF from a braille display. (#10796)
segment.target: Agora voc pode enviar caracteres Unicode alm do U+FFFF duma linha braille. (#10796)

segment.source: NVDA will announce Open With dialog content in Windows 10 May 2020 Update. (#11335)
segment.target: O NVDA anunciar o contedo do dilogo Abrir com no Windows 10 Atualizao de Maio de 2020. (#11335)

segment.source: A new experimental option in Advanced settings (Enable selective registration for UI Automation events and property changes) can provide major performance improvements in Microsoft Visual Studio and other UIAutomation based applications if enabled. (#11077, #11209)
segment.target: Uma nova opo experimental nas configuraes avanadas (Habilitar registro seletivo de eventos de UI Automation e mudanas de propriedades) pode fornecer grandes melhorias de desempenho no Microsoft Visual Studio e outros aplicativos baseados em UIAutomation, se habilitada. (#11077, #11209)

segment.source: For checkable list items, the selected state is no longer announced redundantly, and if applicable, the unselected state is announced instead. (#8554)
segment.target: Para itens de lista marcveis, o estado selecionado no mais anunciado de forma redundante e, se aplicvel, o estado no selecionado anunciado. (#8554)

segment.source: On Windows 10 May 2020 Update, NVDA now shows the Microsoft Sound Mapper when viewing output devices from synthesizer dialog. (#11349)
segment.target: No Windows 10 Atualizao de Maio de 2020, o NVDA agora mostra o Mapeador de Som da Microsoft ao visualizar os dispositivos de sada no dilogo do sintetizador. (#11349)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, numbers are now announced correctly for ordered lists if the list does not start with 1. (#8438)
segment.target: No Internet Explorer, os nmeros agora so anunciados corretamente para as listas ordenadas se a lista no comear com 1. (#8438)

segment.source: In Google chrome, NVDA will now report not checked for all checkable controls (not just check boxes) that are currently not checked. (#11377)
segment.target: No Google Chrome, o NVDA agora informar no marcado para todos os controles marcveis (no apenas caixas de seleo) que no esto marcados no momento. (#11377)

segment.source: It is once again possible to navigate in various controls when NVDA's language is set to Aragonese. (#11384)
segment.target: mais uma vez possvel navegar em vrios controles quando o idioma do NVDA est definido para o aragons. (#11384)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer sometimes freeze in Microsoft Word when rapidly arrowing up and down or typing characters with Braille enabled. (#11431, #11425, #11414)
segment.target: O NVDA no deve mais travar s vezes no Microsoft Word ao mover rapidamente para cima e para baixo ou digitar caracteres com Braille habilitado. (#11431, #11425, #11414)

segment.source: NVDA no longer appends nonexistent trailing space when copying the current navigator object to the clipboard. (#11438)
segment.target: O NVDA no acrescenta mais espao direita inexistente ao copiar o objeto d navegao atual para a rea de transferncia. (#11438)

segment.source: NVDA no longer activates the Say All profile if there is nothing to read. (#10899, #9947)
segment.target: O NVDA no ativa mais o perfil Leitura Contnua se no houver nada para ler. (#10899, #9947)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unable to read the features list in Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager. (#11468)
segment.target: O NVDA no mais incapaz de ler a lista de recursos no Gerenciador dos Servios de Informaes da Internet (IIS). (#11468)

segment.source: NVDA now keeps the audio device open improving performance on some sound cards (#5172, #10721)
segment.target: O NVDA agora mantm o dispositivo de udio aberto, melhorando o desempenho em algumas placas de som (#5172, #10721)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer freeze or exit when holding down control+shift+downArrow in Microsoft Word. (#9463)
segment.target: O NVDA no congela ou fecha mais ao manter pressionado control+shift+seta para baixo no Microsoft Word. (#9463)

segment.source: The expanded / collapsed state of directories in the navigation treeview on drive.google.com is now always reported by NVDA. (#11520)
segment.target: O estado expandido/recolhido dos diretrios na navegao da visualizao em rvore em drive.google.com agora sempre informado pelo NVDA. (#11520)

segment.source: NVDA will auto detect the NLS eReader Humanware braille display via Bluetooth as its Bluetooth name is now "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)
segment.target: O NVDA detectar automaticamente a linha braille NLS eReader Humanware via Bluetooth, pois seu nome Bluetooth agora "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)

segment.source: Major performance improvements in Visual Studio Code. (#11533)
segment.target: Maiores aperfeioamentos de desempenho no Visual Studio Code. (#11533)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: The GUI Helper's BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons supports a new "separated" keyword argument, for adding a standard horizontal separator to dialogs (other than messages and single input dialogs). (#6468)
segment.target: O BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons do Helper da GUI suporta um novo argumento de palavra-chave "separated" separado , para adicionar um separador horizontal padro aos dilogos (diferente de mensagens e dilogos de entrada nica). (#6468)

segment.source: Additional properties were added to app modules, including path for the executable (appPath), is a Windows Store app (isWindowsStoreApp), and machine architecture for the app (appArchitecture). (#7894)
segment.target: Propriedades adicionais foram adicionadas aos app modules mdulos de aplicativo , incluindo caminho para o executvel (appPath), um aplicativo da Windows Store (isWindowsStoreApp) e arquitetura de mquina para o aplicativo (appArchitecture). (#7894)

segment.source: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosted inside wwahost.exe on Windows 8 and later. (#4569)
segment.target: Agora possvel criar app modules mdulos de aplicativos para aplicativos hospedados em wwahost.exe no Windows 8 e posteriores. (#4569)

segment.source: A fragment of the log can now be delimited and then copied to clipboard using NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)
segment.target: Um fragmento do log agora pode ser delimitado e ento copiado para a rea de transferncia usando NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)

segment.source: NVDA-specific objects that are found by Python's cyclic garbage collector are now logged when being deleted by the collector to aide in removing reference cycles from NVDA. (#11499)
segment.target: Objetos especficos do NVDA que so encontrados pelo coletor de lixo cclico do Python agora so registrados ao serem excludos pelo coletor para auxiliar na remoo dos ciclos de referncia do NVDA. (#11499)

segment.source: The majority of NVDA's classes are tracked including NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers, and TreeInterceptors.
segment.target: A maioria das classes do NVDA so monitoradas, incluindo NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers e TreeInterceptors.

segment.source: A class that needs to be tracked should inherit from garbageHandler.TrackedObject.
segment.target: Uma classe que precisa ser rastreada deve ser herdada de garbageHandler.TrackedObject.

segment.source: Significant debug logging for MSAA events can be now enabled in NVDA's Advanced settings. (#11521)
segment.target: O registro de depurao significativo para eventos MSAA agora pode ser ativado nas configuraes avanadas do NVDA. (#11521)

segment.source: MSAA winEvents for the currently focused object are no longer filtered out along with other events if the event count for a given thread is exceeded. (#11520)
segment.target: WinEvents MSAA para o objeto atualmente em foco no so mais filtrados junto com outros eventos se a contagem de eventos para um determinado segmento for excedida. (#11520)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for a new braille display from Nattiq, better support for ESET antivirus GUI and Windows Terminal, performance improvements in 1Password, and with Windows OneCore synthesizer. Plus many other important bug fixes and improvements.
segment.target: Os destaques desta verso incluem suporte para uma nova linha braille da Nattiq, melhor suporte GUI Interface Grfica do Usurio do antivrus ESET e ao Windows Terminal, aprimoramentos de desempenho no 1Password e com o sintetizador Windows OneCore. Alm de muitas outras importantes correes de falhas e melhorias.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: Support for new braille displays:
segment.target: Suporte para novas linhas braille:

segment.source: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)
segment.target: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)

segment.source: Added script to open NVDA configuration directory (no default gesture). (#2214)
segment.target: Adicionado script para abrir o diretrio de configurao do NVDA (sem comando gesto padro). (#2214)

segment.source: Better support for ESET antivirus GUI. (#10894)
segment.target: Melhor suporte para a GUI Interface Grfica do Usurio do antivrus ESET. (#10894)

segment.source: Added support for Windows Terminal. (#10305)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para o Windows Terminal. (#10305)

segment.source: Added a command to report the active configuration profile (no default gesture). (#9325)
segment.target: Adicionado um comando para informar o perfil de configurao ativo (sem combinao de teclas gesto padro). (#9325)

segment.source: Added a command to toggle reporting of subscripts and superscripts (no default gesture). (#10985)
segment.target: Adicionado um comando para alternar a informao de subscritos e sobrescritos (sem combinao de teclas gesto padro). (#10985)

segment.source: Web applications (E.G. Gmail) no longer speak outdated information when moving focus rapidly. (#10885)
segment.target: Os aplicativos Web (por exemplo, Gmail) no falam mais informaes desatualizadas ao mover o foco rapidamente. (#10885)

segment.source: This experimental fix must be manually enabled via the 'Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events' option in the advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Essa correo experimental deve ser habilitada manualmente atravs da opo 'Tentar cancelar a fala para eventos de foco expirados' no painel de configuraes avanadas.

segment.source: Many more symbols have been added to the default symbols dictionary. (#11105)
segment.target: Muitssimos smbolos foram adicionados ao dicionrio de smbolos padro. (#11105)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator from 3.12 to [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0). (#10832, #11221)
segment.target: Atualizado o transcritor braille liblouis de 3.12 para [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0). (#10832, #11221)

segment.source: The reporting of superscripts and subscripts is now controlled separately to the reporting of font attributes. (#10919)
segment.target: O anncio de sobrescritos e subscritos agora controlado separadamente do anncio de atributos de fonte. (#10919)

segment.source: Due to changes made in VS Code, NVDA no longer disables browse mode in Code by default. (#10888)
segment.target: Devido s alteraes feitas no VS Code, o NVDA no desabilita mais o modo de navegao no Code por padro. (#10888)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "top" and "bottom" messages when moving the review cursor directly to the first or last line of the current navigator object with the move to top and move to bottom review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: O NVDA no informa mais as mensagens "superior" e "inferior" ao mover o cursor de explorao diretamente para a primeira ou a ltima linha do objeto de navegao atual, movendo para o topo e movendo para base com os scripts do cursor de explorao, respectivamente. (#9551)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "left" and "right" messages when directly moving the review cursor to the first or last character of the line for the current navigator object with the move to beginning of line and move to end of line review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: O NVDA no informa mais mensagens "esquerda" e "direita" ao mover diretamente o cursor de reviso para o primeiro ou o ltimo caractere da linha para o objeto de navegao atual, movendo para o incio da linha e movendo para o final da linha com script de cursor de explorao, respectivamente. (#9551)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: NVDA now starts correctly when the log file cannot be created. (#6330)
segment.target: O NVDA agora inicia corretamente quando o arquivo de log no pode ser criado. (#6330)

segment.source: In recent releases of Microsoft Word 365, NVDA will no longer announce "delete back word" when Control+Backspace is pressed while editing a document. (#10851)
segment.target: Nas verses recentes do Microsoft Word 365, o NVDA no anuncia mais "excluir palavra anterior" ao pressionar Control+Backspace quando editando um documento. (#10851)

segment.source: In Winamp, NVDA will once again announce toggle status of shuffle and repeat. (#10945)
segment.target: No Winamp, o NVDA anunciar novamente o status de alternncia de reproduo aleatria e repetio. (#10945)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer extremely sluggish when moving within the list of items in 1Password. (#10508)
segment.target: O NVDA no mais extremamente lento ao se mover na lista de itens do 1Password. (#10508)

segment.source: The Windows OneCore speech synthesizer no longer lags between utterances. (#10721)
segment.target: O sintetizador de fala Windows OneCore no fica mais atrasado entre expresses. (#10721)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when you open the context menu for 1Password in the system notification area. (#11017)
segment.target: O NVDA no congela mais quando voc abre o menu de contexto do 1Password na rea de notificao do sistema. (#11017)

segment.source: In Office 2013 and older:
segment.target: No Office 2013 e verses anteriores:

segment.source: Ribbons are announced when focus moves to them for the first time. (#4207)
segment.target: As faixas de opes ribbons so anunciadas quando o foco se move para elas pela primeira vez. (#4207)

segment.source: Context menu items are once again reported properly. (#9252)
segment.target: Os itens do menu de contexto so novamente informados corretamente. (#9252)

segment.source: Ribbon sections are consistently announced when navigating with Control+arrows. (#7067)
segment.target: As sees da faixa de opes so anunciadas constantemente ao navegar com Control+setas. (#7067)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, text no longer incorrectly appears on a separate line when web content uses CSS display: inline-flex. (#11075)
segment.target: No modo de navegao no Mozilla Firefox e no Google Chrome, o texto no aparece mais incorretamente em uma linha separada quando o contedo da Web usa a exibio CSS: inline-flex. (#11075)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements that aren't focusable.
segment.target: No modo de navegao com Definir automaticamente o foco do sistema para elementos focalizveis desabilitado, agora possvel ativar elementos que no podem ser focalizados.

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements reached by pressing the tab key. (#8528)
segment.target: No modo de navegao com Definir automaticamente o foco do sistema para elementos focalizveis desabilitado, agora possvel ativar os elementos alcanados pressionando a tecla Tab. (#8528)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, activating certain elements no longer clicks in an incorrect location. (#9886)
segment.target: No modo de navegao com Definir automaticamente o foco do sistema para elementos focalizveis desabilitado, a ativao de certos elementos no clica mais em um local incorreto. (#9886)

segment.source: NVDA error sounds are no longer heard when accessing DevExpress text controls. (#10918)
segment.target: Os sons de erro do NVDA no so mais ouvidos ao acessar os controles de texto do DevExpress. (#10918)

segment.source: The tool-tips of the icons in the system tray are no longer reported upon keyboard navigation if their text is equal to the name of the icons, to avoid double announcing. (#6656)
segment.target: As dicas de ferramentas dos cones na bandeja do sistema no so mais informadas na navegao pelo teclado se o texto for igual ao nome dos cones, para evitar o anncio duplo. (#6656)

segment.source: In browse mode with 'Automatically set system focus to focusable elements' disabled, switching to focus mode with NVDA+space now focuses the element under the caret. (#11206)
segment.target: No modo de navegao com 'Definir automaticamente o foco do sistema para elementos focalizveis' desabilitado, a mudana para o modo de foco com NVDA+espao agora focaliza o elemento sob o cursor. (#11206)

segment.source: It is once again possible to check for NVDA updates on certain systems; e.g. clean Windows installs. (#11253)
segment.target: mais uma vez possvel verificar atualizaes do NVDA em certos sistemas; exemplo, instalaes limpas do Windows. (#11253)

segment.source: Focus is not moved in Java application when the selection is changed in an unfocused tree, table or list. (#5989)
segment.target: O foco no movido em aplicativo Java quando a seleo alterada numa rvore, tabela ou lista fora de foco. (#5989)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: execElevated and hasUiAccess have moved from config module to systemUtils module. Usage via config module is deprecated. (#10493)
segment.target: execElevated e hasUiAccess foram movidos do mdulo config configurao para o mdulo systemUtils. O uso via mdulo config est obsoleto. (#10493)

segment.source: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)
segment.target: Atualizado o configobj para 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)

segment.source: Automated testing of NVDA with Chrome and a HTML sample is now possible. (#10553)
segment.target: Teste automatizado do NVDA com Chrome e uma amostra de HTML agora possvel. (#10553)

segment.source: IAccessibleHandler has been converted into a package, OrderedWinEventLimiter has been extracted to a module and unit tests added (#10934)
segment.target: IAccessibleHandler foi convertido em um pacote, OrderedWinEventLimiter foi extrado para um mdulo e testes de unidade adicionados (#10934)

segment.source: Updated BrlApi to version 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)
segment.target: BrlApi atualizado para a verso 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)

segment.source: Status bar retrieval may now be customized by an AppModule. (#2125, #4640)
segment.target: A recuperao da barra de status agora pode ser personalizada por um AppModule Mdulo de Aplicativo. (#2125, #4640)

segment.source: NVDA no longer listens for IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)
segment.target: O NVDA no escuta mais o IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)

segment.source: A broken ScriptableObject (such as a GlobalPlugin missing a call to its base class' init method) no longer breaks NVDA's script handling. (#5446)
segment.target: Um ScriptableObject quebrado (como um GlobalPlugin sem uma chamada para o mtodo __init__ da classe base) no interrompe mais a manipulao de scripts do NVDA. (#5446)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for several new braille displays from HumanWare and APH, plus many other important bug fixes such as the ability to again read math in Microsoft Word using MathPlayer / MathType.
segment.target: Os destaques desta verso incluem suporte para vrias novas linhas braille da HumanWare e APH, alm de muitas outras importantes correes de falhas como a capacidade de ler novamente matemtica no Microsoft Word usando o MathPlayer / MathType.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: The currently selected item in listboxes is again presented in browse mode in Chrome, similar to NVDA 2019.1. (#10713)
segment.target: O item atualmente selecionado nas caixas de lista novamente apresentado no modo de navegao no Chrome, semelhante ao NVDA 2019.1. (#10713)

segment.source: You can now perform right mouse clicks on touch devices by doing a one finger tap and hold. (#3886)
segment.target: Agora voc pode executar cliques com o boto direito do mouse em dispositivos de toque, tocando e mantendo pressionado um dedo. (#3886)

segment.source: Support for New braille displays: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2, and NLS eReader. (#10830)
segment.target: Suporte para novas linhas braille: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2 e NLS eReader. (#10830)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes
