segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from locking or going to sleep when in say all. (#10643)
segment.target: O NVDA impedir que o sistema bloqueie ou entre no modo de suspenso quando estiver em leitura contnua. (#10643)

segment.source: Support for out-of-process iframes in Mozilla Firefox. (#10707)
segment.target: Suporte para iframes fora de processo out-of-process iframes no Mozilla Firefox. (#10707)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.12. (#10161)
segment.target: Atualizado o transcritor braille liblouis para a verso 3.12. (#10161)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Fixed NVDA not announcing Unicode minus symbol (U+2212). (#10633)
segment.target: Corrigido o NVDA no anunciar o smbolo de menos Unicode (U+2212). (#10633)

segment.source: When installing add-on from add-ons manager, names of files and folders in the browse window are no longer reported twice. (#10620, #2395)
segment.target: Ao instalar o complemento pelo gestor de complementos, os nomes de arquivos e pastas na janela de navegao no so mais informados duas vezes. (#10620, #2395)

segment.source: In Firefox, when loading Mastodon with the advanced web interface enabled, all timelines now render correctly in browse mode. (#10776)
segment.target: No Firefox, ao carregar o Mastodon com a interface avanada da web ativada, todas as linhas de tempo agora so renderizadas corretamente no modo de navegao. (#10776)

segment.source: In browse mode, NVDA now reports "not checked" for unchecked check boxes where it sometimes didn't previously. (#10781)
segment.target: No modo de navegao, o NVDA agora informa "no marcada" para caixas de seleo desmarcadas, onde s vezes no acontecia anteriormente. (#10781)

segment.source: ARIA switch controls no longer report confusing information such as "not pressed checked" or "pressed checked". (#9187)
segment.target: Os controles de chave switch ARIA no relatam mais informaes confusas, como "no pressionado marcado" ou "pressionado marcado". (#9187)

segment.source: SAPI4 voices should no longer refuse to speak certain text. (#10792)
segment.target: As vozes SAPI4 no devem mais se recusar a falar determinado texto. (#10792)

segment.source: NVDA can again read and interact with math equations in Microsoft Word. (#10803)
segment.target: O NVDA pode novamente ler e interagir com equaes matemticas no Microsoft Word. (#10803)

segment.source: NVDA will again announce text being unselected in browse mode if pressing an arrow key while text is selected. (#10731).
segment.target: NVDA anunciar novamente que o texto no est selecionado no modo de navegao se pressionar uma tecla de seta enquanto o texto estiver selecionado. (#10731).

segment.source: NVDA no longer exits if there is an error initializing eSpeak. (#10607)
segment.target: O NVDA no ser mais encerrado se houver um erro ao inicializar o eSpeak. (#10607)

segment.source: Errors caused by unicode in translations for shortcuts no longer stop the installer, mitigated by falling back to the English text. (#5166, #6326)
segment.target: Erros causados pelo unicode nas tradues dos atalhos no param mais o instalador, atenuados pelo retorno ao texto em ingls. (#5166, #6326)

segment.source: Arrowing out and away from lists and tables in sayAll with skim reading enabled no longer continuously announces exiting the list or table. (#10706)
segment.target: Chegar e sair de listas e tabelas na leitura contnua com a leitura dinmica habilitada no anuncia mais continuamente a sada de lista ou tabela. (#10706)

segment.source: Fix mouse tracking for some MSHTML elements in Internet Explorer. (#10736)
segment.target: Corrige o rastreamento do mouse para alguns elementos MSHTML no Internet Explorer. (#10736)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Developer documentation is now build using sphinx. (#9840)
segment.target: A documentao do desenvolvedor agora compilada usando o sphinx. (#9840)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been split into two. (#10593)
segment.target: Vrias funes de speech fala foram divididas em duas. (#10593)

segment.source: The speakX version remains, but now depends on a getXSpeech function which returns a speech sequence.
segment.target: A verso speakX permanece, mas agora depende de uma funo getXSpeech que retorna uma sequncia de fala.

segment.source: speakObjectProperties now relies on getObjectPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: speakObjectProperties agora conta com getObjectPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: speakObject now relies on getObjectSpeech
segment.target: speakObject agora conta com getObjectSpeech

segment.source: speakTextInfo now relies on getTextInfoSpeech
segment.target: speakTextInfo agora conta com getTextInfoSpeech

segment.source: speakWithoutPauses has been converted into a class, and refactored, but should not break compatibility.
segment.target: speakWithoutPauses foi convertido em uma classe e refatorado, mas no deve quebrar a compatibilidade.

segment.source: getSpeechForSpelling is deprecated (though still available) use getSpellingSpeech instead.
segment.target: getSpeechForSpelling est obsoleto (embora ainda disponvel) no lugar use getSpellingSpeech.

segment.source: Private changes that should not affect addon developers:
segment.target: Alteraes privadas que no devem afetar os desenvolvedores de complementos:

segment.source: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty is now _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty
segment.target: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty agora _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty

segment.source: _speakTextInfo_addMath is now _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo
segment.target: _speakTextInfo_addMath agora _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo

segment.source: Speech 'reason' has been converted to an Enum, see controlTypes.OutputReason class. (#10703)
segment.target: 'reason' motivo de Speech Fala foi convertido em um Enum, consulte a classe controlTypes.OutputReason. (#10703)

segment.source: Module level 'REASON_*' constants are deprecated.
segment.target: As constantes 'REASON_*' de nvel no mdulo esto obsoletas.

segment.source: Compiling NVDA dependencies now requires Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 or newer). (#10169)
segment.target: A compilao de dependncias do NVDA agora requer o Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 ou mais recente). (#10169)

segment.source: Updated SCons to version 3.1.1. (#10169)
segment.target: SCons atualizado para a verso 3.1.1. (#10169)

segment.source: Again allow behaviors._FakeTableCell to have no location defined (#10864)
segment.target: Novamente permite que behaviors._FakeTableCell no tenha um local definido (#10864)

segment.source: NVDA 2019.3 is a very significant release containing many under-the-hood changes including the upgrade of Python 2 to Python 3, and a major re-write of NVDA's speech subsystem.
segment.target: O NVDA 2019.3 uma verso muito significativa que contm muitas alteraes ocultas incluindo a atualizao do Python 2 para o Python 3, e uma importante reescrita do subsistema de fala do NVDA.

segment.source: Although these changes do break compatibility with older NVDA add-ons, the upgrade to Python 3 is necessary for security, and the changes to speech allow for some exciting innovations in the near future.
segment.target: Embora essas alteraes quebrem a compatibilidade com os complementos NVDA mais antigos, a atualizao para o Python 3 necessria para segurana, e as alteraes na fala permitem algumas inovaes interessantes no futuro prximo.

segment.source: Other highlights in this release include 64 bit support for Java VMs, Screen Curtain and Focus Highlight functionality, support for more braille displays and a new Braille viewer, and many many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Outros destaques desta verso incluem suporte a 64 bit para Java VMs Mquinas Virtuais Java , funcionalidade Cortina de Tela e Realce de Foco, suporte para mais linhas braille e um novo Visualizador de Braille, alm de muitas outras correes.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: The accuracy of the move mouse to navigator object command has been improved in text fields in Java applications. (#10157)
segment.target: A preciso do comando mover o mouse para o objeto de navegao foi aprimorada nos campos de texto nos aplicativos Java. (#10157)

segment.source: Added support for the following Handy Tech Braille displays (#8955):
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para as seguintes Linhas braille da Handy Tech (#8955):

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 40
segment.target: Basic Braille Plus 40

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 32
segment.target: Basic Braille Plus 32

segment.source: Connect Braille
segment.target: Connect Braille

segment.source: All user-defined gestures can now be removed via a new "Reset to factory defaults" button in the Input Gestures dialog. (#10293)
segment.target: Todos os comandos gestos definidos pelo usurio agora podem ser removidos atravs de um novo boto "Redefinir para os padres de fbrica" na caixa de dilogo Definir Comandos. (#10293)

segment.source: Font reporting in Microsoft Word now includes if text is marked as hidden. (#8713)
segment.target: O anncio de fontes no Microsoft Word agora inclue se o texto est marcado como oculto. (#8713)

segment.source: Added a command to move the review cursor to the position previously set as start marker for selection or copy: NVDA+shift+F9. (#1969)
segment.target: Adicionado um comando para mover o cursor de explorao para a posio previamente definida como marcador inicial para seleo ou cpia: NVDA+shift+F9. (#1969)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge and recent versions of Firefox and Chrome, landmarks are now reported in focus mode and object navigation. (#10101)
segment.target: No Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge e verses recentes do Firefox e Chrome, os marcos agora so informados no modo de foco e na navegao de objetos. (#10101)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, You can now navigate by article and grouping using quick navigation scripts. These scripts are unbound by default and can be assigned in the Input Gestures dialog when the dialog is opened from a browse mode document. (#9485, #9227)
segment.target: No Internet Explorer, Google Chrome e Mozilla Firefox, agora voc pode navegar por artigo e agrupamento usando scripts de navegao rpida. Esses scripts so independentes sem comandos por padro e podem ser atribudos no dilogo Definir Comandos quando a caixa de dilogo aberta em um documento no modo de navegao. (#9485, #9227)

segment.source: Figures are also reported. They are considered objects and therefore navigable with the o quick navigation key.
segment.target: Figuras tambm so informadas. Elas so consideradas objetos e, portanto, navegveis com tecla de navegao rpida o.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, article elements are now reported with object navigation, and optionally in browse mode if turned on in Document Formatting settings. (#10424)
segment.target: No Internet Explorer, Google Chrome e Mozilla Firefox, os elementos artigos agora so informados com a navegao de objetos e, opcionalmente, no modo de navegao, se ativado nas configuraes de Formatao de documentos. (#10424)

segment.source: Added screen curtain, which when enabled, makes the whole screen black on Windows 8 and later. (#7857)
segment.target: Adicionada cortina de tela, que quando ativada, torna a tela completamente preta no Windows 8 e posteriores. (#7857)

segment.source: Added a script to enable screen curtain (until next restart with one press, or always while NVDA is running with two presses), no default gesture is assigned.
segment.target: Adicionado um script para ativar a cortina de tela (at a prxima reinicializao com um pressionamento, ou sempre enquanto o NVDA estiver sendo executado com dois pressionamentos), nenhum comando gesto padro est atribudo.

segment.source: Can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Pode ser habilitado e configurado atravs da categoria 'viso' no dilogo de configuraes do NVDA.

segment.source: Added screen highlight functionality to NVDA. (#971, #9064)
segment.target: Adicionada funcionalidade de realce da tela ao NVDA. (#971, #9064)

segment.source: Highlighting of the focus, navigator object, and browse mode caret position can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: O realce do foco, objeto de navegao e posio do cursor do sistema do modo de navegao pode ser habilitado e configurado atravs da categoria 'viso' no dilogo de configuraes do NVDA.

segment.source: Note: This feature is incompatible with the focus highlight add-on, however, the add-on can still be used while the built-in highlighter is disabled.
segment.target: Nota: esse recurso incompatvel com o complemento realce do foco focus highlight , no entanto, o complemento ainda pode ser usado enquanto o realador embutido estiver desativado.

segment.source: Added Braille Viewer tool, allows viewing braille output via an on-screen window. (#7788)
segment.target: Adicionada ferramenta Visualizador Braille, permite visualizar a sada de braille atravs de uma janela na tela. (#7788)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: The user guide now describes how to use NVDA in the Windows Console. (#9957)
segment.target: O guia do usurio agora descreve como usar o NVDA no Console do Windows. (#9957)

segment.source: Running nvda.exe now defaults to replacing an already running copy of NVDA. The -r|--replace command line parameter is still accepted, but ignored. (#8320)
segment.target: A execuo do nvda.exe agora assume como padro substitui uma cpia do NVDA j em execuo. O parmetro de linha de comando -r|--replace ainda aceito, porm, ignorado. (#8320)

segment.source: On Windows 8 and later, NVDA will now report product name and version information for hosted apps such as apps downloaded from Microsoft Store using information provided by the app. (#4259, #10108)
segment.target: No Windows 8 e posteriores, o NVDA agora relatar informaes de nome e verso do produto para aplicativos hospedados, como aplicativos baixados da Microsoft Store, usando as informaes fornecidas pelo aplicativo. (#4259, #10108)

segment.source: When toggling track changes on and off with the keyboard in Microsoft Word, NVDA will announce the state of the setting. (#942)
segment.target: Ao ativar e desativar as alteraes de faixa com o teclado no Microsoft Word, o NVDA anunciar o estado da configurao. (#942)

segment.source: The NVDA version number is now logged as the first message in the log. This occurs even if logging has been disabled from the GUI. (#9803)
segment.target: O nmero da verso do NVDA agora est registrado como a primeira mensagem no log registro de eventos. Isso ocorre mesmo se o log estiver desabilitado na GUI Interface Grfica do Usurio. (#9803)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer allows for changing the configured log level if it has been overridden from the command line. (#10209)
segment.target: A caixa de dilogo de configuraes no permite mais alterar o nvel de log configurado se tiver sido substitudo na linha de comando. (#10209)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now announces the display state of non printable characters when pressing the toggle shortcut Ctrl+Shift+8 . (#10241)
segment.target: No Microsoft Word, o NVDA agora anuncia o estado de exibio dos caracteres no imprimveis ao pressionar o atalho de alternncia Ctrl+Shift+8. (#10241)

segment.source: Updated Liblouis braille translator to commit 58d67e63. (#10094)
segment.target: Atualizado o transcritor braille Liblouis para commit 58d67e63. (#10094)

segment.source: When CLDR characters (including emojis) reporting is enabled, they are announced at all punctuation levels. (#8826)
segment.target: Quando o anncio de caracteres CLDR Repositrio de Dados de Localidade Comum (incluindo emojis) ativado, eles so anunciados em todos os nveis de pontuao. (#8826)

segment.source: Third party python packages included in NVDA, such as comtypes, now log their warnings and errors to the NVDA log. (#10393)
segment.target: Pacotes python de terceiros includos no NVDA, como comtypes, agora registram seus alertas e erros no log do NVDA. (#10393)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository emoji annotations to version 36.0. (#10426)
segment.target: Anotaes emoji do Repositrio de Dados de Localidade Comum Unicode atualizadas para a verso 36.0. (#10426)

segment.source: When focussing a grouping in browse mode, the description is now also read. (#10095)
segment.target: Ao focalizar um agrupamento no modo de navegao, a descrio agora tambm lida. (#10095)

segment.source: The Java Access Bridge is now included with NVDA to enable access to Java applications, including for 64 bit Java VMs. (#7724)
segment.target: O Java Access Bridge agora est includo no NVDA para permitir o acesso a aplicativos Java, inclusive para VMs mquinas virtuais Java de 64 bit. (#7724)

segment.source: If the Java Access Bridge is not enabled for the user, NVDA automatically enables it at NVDA startup. (#7952)
segment.target: Se o Java Access Bridge no estiver ativado para o usurio, o NVDA o ativar automaticamente na inicializao do NVDA. (#7952)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)
segment.target: Atualizado o eSpeak-NG para 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: Emoji and other 32 bit unicode characters now take less space on a braille display when they are shown as hexadecimal values. (#6695)
segment.target: Emoji e outros caracteres unicode de 32 bit agora ocupam menos espao numa linha braille quando so mostrados como valores hexadecimais. (#6695)

segment.source: In Windows 10, NVDA will announce tooltips from universal apps if NVDA is configured to report tooltips in object presentation dialog. (#8118)
segment.target: No Windows 10, o NVDA anunciar dicas de ferramentas de aplicativos universais se o NVDA estiver configurado para informar dicas de ferramentas no dilogo de apresentao de objetos. (#8118)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, typed text is now reported in Mintty. (#1348)
segment.target: No Windows 10 Atualizao de Aniversrio e posteriores, o texto digitado agora informado no Mintty. (#1348)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, output in the Windows Console that appears close to the caret is no longer spelled out. (#513)
segment.target: No Windows 10 Atualizao de Aniversrio e posteriores, a sada no Console do Windows que aparece perto do cursor no mais soletrada. (#513)

segment.source: Controls in Audacitys compressor dialog are now announced when navigating the dialog. (#10103)
segment.target: Os controles no dilogo do compressor do Audacity agora so anunciados ao navegar na caixa de dilogo. (#10103)

segment.source: NVDA no longer treats spaces as words in object review in Scintilla based editors such as Notepad++. (#8295)
segment.target: O NVDA no trata mais os espaos como palavras na explorao de objetos em editores baseados no Scintilla, como o Notepad++. (#8295)

segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from entering sleep mode when scrolling through text with braille display gestures. (#9175)
segment.target: O NVDA impedir que o sistema entre no modo de suspenso ao rolar pelo texto com comandos em linha braille. (#9175)

segment.source: On Windows 10, braille will now follow when editing cell contents in Microsoft Excel and in other UIA text controls where it was lagging behind. (#9749)
segment.target: No Windows 10, o braille ser seguido ao editar o contedo da clula no Microsoft Excel e em outros controles de texto UIA Automao da Interface do Usurio onde estava atrasado. (#9749)

segment.source: NVDA will once again report suggestions in the Microsoft Edge address bar. (#7554)
segment.target: O NVDA informar novamente sugestes na barra de endereo do Microsoft Edge. (#7554)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer silent when focusing an HTML tab control header in Internet Explorer. (#8898)
segment.target: O NVDA no mais silencioso ao focalizar um cabealho de controle de guia em HTML no Internet Explorer. (#8898)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge based on EdgeHTML, NVDA will no longer play search suggestion sound when the window becomes maximized. (#9110, #10002)
segment.target: No Microsoft Edge baseado no EdgeHTML, o NVDA no reproduz mais o som de sugesto de pesquisa quando a janela maximizada. (#9110, #10002)

segment.source: ARIA 1.1 combo boxes are now supported in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. (#9616)
segment.target: As caixas de combinao ARIA 1.1 agora so suportadas no Mozilla Firefox e Google Chrome. (#9616)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer report content of visually hidden columns for list items in SysListView32 controls. (#8268)
segment.target: O NVDA no informar mais o contedo de colunas visualmente ocultas para itens de lista nos controles do SysListView32. (#8268)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer shows "info" as the current log level when in secure mode. (#10209)
segment.target: O dilogo de configuraes no mostra mais "informaes" como o nvel de log atual no modo seguro. (#10209)

segment.source: In Start menu for Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, NVDA will announce details of search results. (#10340)
segment.target: No menu Iniciar do Windows 10 Atualizao de Aniversrio e posteriores, o NVDA anunciar detalhes dos resultados da pesquisa. (#10340)

segment.source: In browse mode, if moving the cursor or using quick navigation causes the document to change, NVDA no longer speaks incorrect content in some cases. (#8831, #10343)
segment.target: No modo de navegao, se mover o cursor ou usar a navegao rpida faz com que o documento mude, o NVDA no mais fala contedo incorreto em alguns casos. (#8831, #10343)

segment.source: Some bullet names in Microsoft Word have been corrected. (#10399)
segment.target: Alguns nomes de marcadores no Microsoft Word foram corrigidos. (#10399)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA will once again announce first selected emoji or clipboard item when emoji panel and clipboard history opens, respectively. (#9204)
segment.target: Na atualizao do Windows 10 de maio de 2019 e posteriores, o NVDA anunciar novamente o primeiro item de emoji ou rea de transferncia selecionado quando o histrico do painel de emoji e da rea de transferncia for aberto, respectivamente. (#9204)

segment.source: In Poedit, it is once again possible to view some translations for right to left languages. (#9931)
segment.target: No Poedit, novamente possvel ver algumas tradues para os idiomas da direita para a esquerda. (#9931)

segment.source: In the Settings app in Windows 10 April 2018 Update and later, NVDA will no longer announce progress bar information for volume meters found in the System/Sound page. (#10412)
segment.target: No aplicativo Configuraes do Windows 10 Atualizao de Abril de 2018 e posteriores, o NVDA no anunciar mais as informaes da barra de progresso dos medidores de volume encontrados na pgina Sistema/Som. (#10412)

segment.source: Invalid regular expressions in speech dictionaries no longer completely break speech in NVDA. (#10334)
segment.target: Expresses regulares invlidas nos dicionrios de fala no quebram mais completamente a fala no NVDA. (#10334)

segment.source: When reading bulleted items in Microsoft Word with UIA enabled, the bullet from the next list item is no longer inappropriately announced. (#9613)
segment.target: Ao ler itens com marcadores no Microsoft Word com UIA ativado, o marcador do prximo item da lista no mais anunciado inadequadamente. (#9613)

segment.source: Some rare braille translation issues and errors with liblouis have been resolved. (#9982)
segment.target: Alguns problemas raros de transcrio braille e erros com o liblouis foram resolvidos. (#9982)

segment.source: Java applications started before NVDA are now accessible without the need to restart the Java app. (#10296)
segment.target: Os aplicativos Java iniciados antes do NVDA agora esto acessveis sem a necessidade de reiniciar o aplicativo Java. (#10296)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, when the focused element becomes marked as current (aria-current), this change is no longer spoken multiple times. (#8960)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox, quando o elemento focalizado fica marcado como atual (aria-current), essa alterao no mais falada vrias vezes. (#8960)

segment.source: NVDA will now treat certain composit unicode characters such as e-acute as one single character when moving through text. (#10550)
segment.target: O NVDA agora tratar certos caracteres unicode compostos, como e-agudo, como um nico caractere ao se mover pelo texto. (#10550)

segment.source: Spring Tool Suite Version 4 is now supported. (#10001)
segment.target: Spring Tool Suite Verso 4 agora suportado. (#10001)

segment.source: Don't double speak name when aria-labelledby relation target is an inner element. (#10552)
segment.target: No fala o nome duas vezes quando o destino da relao aria-labelledby for um elemento interno. (#10552)

segment.source: On Windows 10 version 1607 and later, typed characters from Braille keyboards are spoken in more situations. (#10569)
segment.target: No Windows 10 verso 1607 e posteriores, os caracteres digitados nos teclados Braille so falados em mais situaes. (#10569)

segment.source: When changing the audio output device, tones played by NVDA will now play through the newly selected device. (#2167)
segment.target: Ao alterar o dispositivo de sada de udio, os tons tocados pelo NVDA agora sero reproduzidos atravs do dispositivo recm-selecionado. (#2167)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving focus in browse mode is faster. This makes moving the cursor in browse mode more responsive in many cases. (#10584)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox, mover o foco no modo de navegao mais rpido. Isso torna o movimento do cursor no modo de navegao mais responsivo em muitos casos. (#10584)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: Updated Python to 3.7. (#7105)
segment.target: Python atualizado para verso 3.7. (#7105)

segment.source: Updated pySerial to version 3.4. (#8815)
segment.target: Atualizado pySerial para a verso 3.4. (#8815)

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3 to support Python 3.5 and later. (#9630)
segment.target: Atualizado wxPython para 4.0.3 para oferecer suporte ao Python 3.5 e posteriores. (#9630)

segment.source: Updated six to version 1.12.0. (#9630)
segment.target: Atualizado six para a verso 1.12.0. (#9630)

segment.source: Updated py2exe to version 0.9.3.2 (in development, commit b372a8e from albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)
segment.target: Atualizado py2exe para a verso 0.9.3.2 (em desenvolvimento, commit b372a8e de albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)

segment.source: Updated UIAutomationCore.dll comtypes module to version 10.0.18362. (#9829)
segment.target: Atualizado o mdulo comtypes UIAutomationCore.dll para a verso 10.0.18362. (#9829)

segment.source: The tab-completion in the Python console only suggests attributes starting with an underscore if the underscore is first typed. (#9918)
segment.target: O preenchimento completamento usando tab no Console Python sugere apenas atributos comeando com um sublinhado se a sublinha for digitada pela primeira vez. (#9918)

segment.source: Flake8 linting tool has been integrated with SCons reflecting code requirements for Pull Requests. (#5918)
segment.target: A ferramenta de linting retalho Flake8 foi integrada aos SCons, refletindo os requisitos de cdigo para Pull Requests Solicitaes de Recebimento. (#5918)

segment.source: As NVDA no longer depends on pyWin32, modules such as win32api and win32con are no longer available to add-ons. (#9639)
segment.target: Como o NVDA no depende mais do pyWin32, mdulos como o win32api e o win32con no esto mais disponveis para complementos. (#9639)

segment.source: win32api calls can be replaced with direct calls to win32 dll functions via ctypes.
segment.target: As chamadas win32api podem ser substitudas por chamadas diretas para funes dll win32 via ctypes.

segment.source: win32con constants should be defined in your files.
segment.target: Constantes win32con devem ser definidas em seus arquivos.

segment.source: The "async" argument in nvwave.playWaveFile has been renamed to "asynchronous". (#8607)
segment.target: O argumento "async" no nvwave.playWaveFile foi renomeado para "asynchronous" assncrono. (#8607)

segment.source: speakText and speakCharacter methods on synthDriver objects are no longer supported.
segment.target: Os mtodos speakText e speakCharacter nos objetos synthDriver no so mais suportados.

segment.source: This functionality is handled by SynthDriver.speak.
segment.target: Essa funcionalidade gerenciada pelo SynthDriver.speak.

segment.source: SynthSetting classes in synthDriverHandler have been removed. Now use driverHandler.DriverSetting classes instead.
segment.target: As classes SynthSetting no synthDriverHandler foram removidas. Agora use as classes driverHandler.DriverSetting.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes should no longer expose index via the lastIndex property.
segment.target: As classes SynthDriver no devem mais expor o ndice por meio da propriedade lastIndex.

segment.source: Instead, they should notify the synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached action with the index, once all previous audio has finished playing before that index.
segment.target: Em vez disso, devem notificar a ao synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached com o ndice, logo que todo o udio anterior terminar de ser reproduzido antes desse ndice.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must now notify the synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking action, once all audio from a SynthDriver.speak call has completed playing.
segment.target: As classes SynthDriver agora devem notificar a ao synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking, uma vez que todo o udio de uma chamada SynthDriver.speak concluiu a reproduo.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must support the speech.PitchCommand in their speak method, as changes in pitch for speak spelling now depends on this functionality.
segment.target: As classes SynthDriver devem suportar o speech.PitchCommand em seu mtodo de fala, pois as alteraes no tom da ortografia da fala agora dependem dessa funcionalidade.

segment.source: The speech function getSpeechTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)
segment.target: A funo de speech fala getSpeechTextForProperties foi renomeada para getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)

segment.source: The braille function getBrailleTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)
segment.target: A funo braille getBrailleTextForProperties foi renomeada para getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been changed to return speech sequences. (#10098)
segment.target: Vrias funes de speech fala foram alteradas para retornar sequncias de fala. (#10098)

segment.source: getControlFieldSpeech
segment.target: getControlFieldSpeech

segment.source: getFormatFieldSpeech
segment.target: getFormatFieldSpeech

segment.source: getSpeechTextForProperties now called getPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: getSpeechTextForProperties agora chamada getPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: getIndentationSpeech
segment.target: getIndentationSpeech

segment.source: getTableInfoSpeech
segment.target: getTableInfoSpeech

segment.source: Added a textUtils module to simplify string differences between Python 3 strings and Windows unicode strings. (#9545)
segment.target: Adicionado um mdulo textUtils para simplificar as diferenas entre as seqncias de caracteres Python 3 e unicode do Windows. (#9545)

segment.source: See the module documentation and textInfos.offsets module for example implementations.
segment.target: Consulte a documentao do mdulo e o mdulo textInfos.offsets para obter implementaes de exemplo.

segment.source: Deprecated functionality now removed. (#9548)
segment.target: Funcionalidade preterida agora removida. (#9548)

segment.source: AppModules removed:
segment.target: AppModules mdulos de aplicativos removidos:

segment.source: Windows XP sound recorder.
segment.target: Gravador de som do Windows XP.

segment.source: Klango Player, which is abandoned software.
segment.target: Klango Player, que um software abandonado.

segment.source: configobj.validate wrapper removed.
segment.target: wrapper envoltrio configobj.validate removido.

segment.source: New code should use from configobj import validate instead of import validate
segment.target: O novo cdigo deve ser usado a partir de configobj import validate em vez de import validate

segment.source: textInfos.Point and textInfos.Rect replaced by locationHelper.Point and locationHelper.RectLTRB respectively.
segment.target: textInfos.Point e textInfos.Rect substitudos por locationHelper.Point e locationHelper.RectLTRB, respectivamente.

segment.source: braille.BrailleHandler._get_tether and braille.BrailleHandler.set_tether have been removed.
segment.target: braille.BrailleHandler._get_tether e braille.BrailleHandler.set_tether foram removidos.

segment.source: config.getConfigDirs has been removed.
segment.target: config.getConfigDirs foi removido.

segment.source: config.ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter has been replaced by getConfigValidation
segment.target: config.ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter foi substitudo por getConfigValidation

segment.source: inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier property has been removed.
segment.target: a propriedade inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier foi removida.

segment.source: Use _get_identifiers in inputCore.InputGesture instead.
segment.target: Em vez disso, use _get_identifiers em inputCore.InputGesture.

segment.source: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter have been removed.
segment.target: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter foram removidos.

segment.source: Removed several synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting classes.
segment.target: Foram removidas vrias classes synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting.

segment.source: Previously kept for backwards compatibility (#8214), now considered obsolete.
segment.target: Mantido anteriormente para compatibilidade com verses anteriores (#8214), agora considerado obsoleto.

segment.source: Drivers that used the SynthSetting classes should be updated to use the DriverSetting classes.
segment.target: Os drivers que usaram as classes SynthSetting devem ser atualizados para usar as classes DriverSetting.

segment.source: Some legacy code has been removed, particularly:
segment.target: Algum cdigo legado foi removido, principalmente:

segment.source: Support for the Outlook pre 2003 message list.
segment.target: Suporte para a lista de mensagens do Outlook pr 2003.

segment.source: An overlay class for the classic start menu, only found in Windows Vista and earlier.
segment.target: Uma classe de sobreposio para o menu Iniciar clssico, encontrada apenas no Windows Vista e verses anteriores.

segment.source: Dropped support for Skype 7, as it is definitely not working any more.
segment.target: Suporte cancelado para o Skype 7, pois ele definitivamente no est mais funcionando.

segment.source: Added a framework to create vision enhancement providers; modules that can change screen contents, optionally based on input from NVDA about object locations. (#9064)
segment.target: Foi adicionada uma estrutura framework para criar provedores de aprimoramento da viso; mdulos que podem alterar o contedo da tela, opcionalmente com base na entrada do NVDA sobre a localizao dos objetos. (#9064)

segment.source: Add-ons can bundle their own providers in a visionEnhancementProviders folder.
segment.target: Os complementos podem agrupar seus prprios fornecedores em uma pasta visionEnhancementProviders.

segment.source: See the vision and visionEnhancementProviders modules for the implementation of the framework and examples, respectively.
segment.target: Consulte os mdulos vision e visionEnhancementProviders para a implementao da estrutura framework e exemplos, respectivamente.

segment.source: Vision enhancement providers are enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Os provedores de aprimoramento da viso so ativados e configurados atravs da categoria 'viso' no dilogo de configuraes do NVDA.

segment.source: Abstract class properties are now supported on objects that inherit from baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (e.g. NVDAObjects and TextInfos). (#10102)
segment.target: As propriedades de classe abstrata agora so suportadas em objetos herdados de baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (por exemplo, NVDAObjects e TextInfos). (#10102)

segment.source: Introduced displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK as a textInfos unit constant specific to DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)
segment.target: Introduzido displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK como uma constante da unidade textInfos especfica para DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)

segment.source: This new constant allows walking over the text in a DisplayModelTextInfo in a way that more closely resembles how the text chunks are saved in the underlying model.
segment.target: Essa nova constante permite percorrer o texto em um DisplayModelTextInfo de uma maneira que se assemelhe mais maneira como os blocos de texto so salvos no modelo subjacente.

segment.source: displayModel.getCaretRect now returns an instance of locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)
segment.target: displayModel.getCaretRect agora retorna uma instncia de locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)

segment.source: The UNIT_CONTROLFIELD and UNIT_FORMATFIELD constants have been moved from virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo to the textInfos package. (#10396)
segment.target: As constantes UNIT_CONTROLFIELD e UNIT_FORMATFIELD foram movidas de virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo para o pacote textInfos. (#10396)

segment.source: For every entry in the NVDA log, information about the originating thread is now included. (#10259)
segment.target: Para cada entrada no log registro de eventos do NVDA, agora so includas informaes sobre o encadeamento de origem. (#10259)

segment.source: UIA TextInfo objects can now be moved/expanded by the page, story and formatField text units. (#10396)
segment.target: Os objetos UIA TextInfo agora podem ser movidos/expandidos pelas unidades de texto de page, story e formatField. (#10396)

segment.source: External modules (appModules and globalPlugins) are now less likely to be able to break the creation of NVDAObjects.
segment.target: Mdulos externos (appModules e globalPlugins) agora tm menos chances de interromper a criao de NVDAObjects.

segment.source: Exceptions caused by the "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" and "event_NVDAObject_init" methods are now properly caught and logged.
segment.target: Excees causadas pelos mtodos "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" e "event_NVDAObject_init" agora so capturadas e registradas reportadas no log corretamente.

segment.source: The aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles dictionary has been renamed to aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. It now also contains roles that aren't landmarks.
segment.target: O dicionrio aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles foi renomeado para aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. Agora tambm contm funes que no so marcos landmarks.

segment.source: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript has been removed due to lack of use. There is no replacement. (#8677)
segment.target: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript foi removido devido falta de uso. No h substituio. (#8677)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several crashes present in 2019.2. Fixes include:
segment.target: Esta uma verso secundria para corrigir vrias falhas presentes em 2019.2. As correes incluem:

segment.source: Addressed several crashes in Gmail seen in both Firefox and Chrome when interacting with particular popup menus such as when creating filters or changing certain Gmail settings. (#10175, #9402, #8924)
segment.target: Foram corrigidas vrias falhas no Gmail percebidas no Firefox e no Chrome ao interagir com menus instantneos pop-up especficos, como ao criar filtros ou alterar determinadas configuraes do Gmail. (#10175, #9402, #8924)

segment.source: In Windows 7, NVDA no longer causes Windows Explorer to crash when the mouse is used in the start menu. (#9435)
segment.target: No Windows 7, o NVDA no causa mais falha no Windows Explorer quando o mouse usado no menu Iniciar. (#9435)

segment.source: Windows Explorer on Windows 7 no longer crashes when accessing metadata edit fields. (#5337)
segment.target: O Windows Explorer no Windows 7 no falha mais ao acessar os campos de edio de metadados. (#5337)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when interacting with images with a base64 URI in Mozilla Firefox or Google Chrome. (#10227)
segment.target: O NVDA no congela mais ao interagir com imagens com um URI identificador uniforme de recurso base64 no Mozilla Firefox ou Google Chrome. (#10227)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include auto detection of Freedom Scientific braille displays, an experimental setting in the Advanced panel to stop browse mode from automatically moving focus (which may provide performance improvements), a rate boost option for the Windows OneCore synthesizer to achieve very fast rates, and many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Os destaques desta verso incluem a deteco automtica de linhas braille da Freedom Scientific, uma configurao experimental no painel Avanado para impedir que o modo de navegao mova automaticamente o foco (que pode fornecer melhorias de desempenho), uma opo de aumento especial de velocidade para o sintetizador Windows OneCore atingir velocidades muito rpidas e muitas outras correes de falhas.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: NVDA's Miranda NG support works with newer versions of the client. (#9053)
segment.target: O suporte do NVDA ao Miranda NG funciona com verses mais recentes do cliente. (#9053)

segment.source: You can now disable browse mode by default by disabling the new "Enable browse mode on page load" option in NVDA's browse mode settings. (#8716)
segment.target: Voc pode desativar o modo de navegao por padro, desativando a nova opo "Ativar o modo de navegao no carregamento da pgina" nas configuraes do modo de navegao do NVDA. (#8716)

segment.source: Note that when this option is disabled, you can still enable browse mode manually by pressing NVDA+space.
segment.target: Observe que quando esta opo est desativada, voc ainda pode ativar o modo de navegao manualmente pressionando NVDA+espao.

segment.source: You can now filter symbols in the punctuation/symbol pronunciation dialog, similar to how filtering works in the elements list and input gestures dialog. (#5761)
segment.target: Agora voc pode filtrar smbolos na caixa de dilogo pronncia de pontuao/smbolos, semelhante a como a filtragem funciona na lista de elementos e no dilogo definir comandos. (#5761)

segment.source: A command has been added to change the mouse text unit resolution (how much text will be spoken when the mouse moves), it has not been assigned a default gesture. (#9056)
segment.target: Um comando foi adicionado para alterar a resoluo da unidade de texto do mouse (quanto texto ser falado quando o mouse se move), no foi atribudo um comando gesto padro. (#9056)

segment.source: The windows OneCore synthesizer now has a rate boost option, which allows for significantly faster speech. (#7498)
segment.target: O sintetizador OneCore do Windows agora tem uma opo de aumento especial de velocidade, que permite uma fala significativamente mais rpida. (#7498)

segment.source: The Rate Boost option is now configurable from the Synth Settings Ring for supported speech synthesizers. (Currently eSpeak-NG and Windows OneCore). (#8934)
segment.target: A opo de aumento especial de velocidade agora configurvel a partir do anel de configuraes do sintetizador para sintetizadores de voz suportados. (#8934)

segment.source: Configuration profiles can now be manually activated with gestures. (#4209)
segment.target: Perfis de configurao agora podem ser ativados manualmente com comandos gestos. (#4209)

segment.source: The gesture must be configured in the "Input gestures" dialog.
segment.target: O comando gesto deve ser configurado no dilogo "Definir comandos".

segment.source: In Eclipse, added support for autocompletion in code editor. (#5667)
segment.target: No Eclipse, adicionado suporte para autocompletar no editor de cdigo. (#5667)

segment.source: Additionally, Javadoc information can be read from the editor when it is present by using NVDA+d.
segment.target: Alm disso, as informaes de Javadoc documentao Java podem ser lidas no editor quando tal estiver presente usando NVDA+d.

segment.source: Added an experimental option to the Advanced Settings panel that allows you to stop the system focus from following the browse mode cursor (Automatically set system focus to focusable elements). (#2039) Although this may not be suitable to turn off for all websites, this may fix:
segment.target: Adicionado uma opo experimental para o painel de Configuraes avanadas que permite que voc pare o foco do sistema seguindo o cursor do modo de navegao (definir automaticamente o foco do sistema para elementos que podem ser focalizados). (#2039) Embora isso possa no ser adequado desativar para todos os websites, isso pode resolver:

segment.source: Rubber band effect: NVDA sporadically undoes the last browse mode keystroke by jumping to the previous location.
segment.target: Efeito elstico: o NVDA esporadicamente desfaz o ltimo pressionamento de tecla do modo de navegao ao pular para o local anterior.

segment.source: Edit boxes steal system focus when arrowing down through them on some websites.
segment.target: As caixas de edio roubam o foco do sistema quando so exibidas em alguns sites.

segment.source: Browse mode keystrokes are slow to respond.
segment.target: Teclas do modo de navegao demoram a responder.

segment.source: For braille display drivers that support it, driver settings can now be changed from the braille settings category in NVDA's settings dialog. (#7452)
segment.target: Para drivers de linha braille que o suportam, as configuraes do driver agora podem ser alteradas a partir da categoria de configuraes de braille no dilogo de configuraes do NVDA. (#7452)

segment.source: Freedom Scientific braille displays are now supported by braille display auto detection. (#7727)
segment.target: As linhas braille da Freedom Scientific agora so suportadas pela deteco automtica de linha braille. (#7727)

segment.source: Added a command to show the replacement for the symbol under the review cursor. (#9286)
segment.target: Adicionado um comando para mostrar a substituio do smbolo sob o cursor de explorao. (#9286)

segment.source: Added an experimental option to the Advanced Settings panel that allows you to try out a new, work-in-progress rewrite of NVDA's Windows Console support using the Microsoft UI Automation API. (#9614)
segment.target: Adicionada uma opo experimental ao painel Configuraes Avanadas que permite que voc experimente uma nova reescrita em andamento, do suporte do NVDA ao Console do Windows usando a API de Microsoft UI Automation API Interface de Programao de Aplicativos de Automao da Interface do Usurio da Microsoft. (#9614)

segment.source: In the Python Console, the input field now supports pasting multiple lines from the clipboard. (#9776)
segment.target: No Console Python, o campo de entrada agora suporta a colagem de vrias linhas da rea de transferncia. (#9776)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Synthesizer volume is now increased and decreased by 5 instead of 10 when using the settings ring. (#6754)
segment.target: O volume do sintetizador agora aumentado e diminudo em 5 em vez de 10 quando se usa o anel de configuraes. (#6754)

segment.source: Clarified the text in the add-on manager when NVDA is launched with the --disable-addons flag. (#9473)
segment.target: Esclarecido o texto no gerenciador de complementos quando o NVDA iniciado com o sinalizador flag --disable-addons. (#9473)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository emoji annotations to version 35.0. (#9445)
segment.target: Anotaes emoji atualizadas do Repositrio de Dados de Localidade Comum Unicode Common Locale Data Repository para a verso 35.0. (#9445)

segment.source: The hotkey for the filter field in the elements list in browse mode has changed to alt+y. (#8728)
segment.target: A tecla de atalho para o campo de filtro na lista de elementos no modo de navegao foi alterada para alt+y. (#8728)

segment.source: When an auto detected braille display is connected via Bluetooth, NVDA will keep searching for USB displays supported by the same driver and switch to a USB connection if it becomes available. (#8853)
segment.target: Quando uma linha braille detectada automaticamente conectada via Bluetooth, o NVDA continuar procurando por linhas USB suportadas pelo mesmo driver e alternar para uma conexo USB se disponvel. (#8853)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to commit 67324cc.
segment.target: eSpeak-NG atualizado para commit 67324cc.

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.10.0. (#9439, #9678)
segment.target: Atualizado o transcritor braille liblouis para a verso 3.10.0. (#9439, #9678)

segment.source: NVDA will now report the word 'selected' after reporting the text a user has just selected.(#9028, #9909)
segment.target: O NVDA agora informar a palavra 'selecionado' depois de relatar o texto que o usurio acabou de selecionar. (#9028, #9909)

segment.source: In Microsoft Visual Studio Code, NVDA is in focus mode by default. (#9828)
segment.target: No cdigo do Microsoft Visual Studio, o NVDA est no modo de foco por padro. (#9828)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when an add-on directory is empty. (#7686)
segment.target: O NVDA no trava mais quando um diretrio de complementos est vazio. (#7686)

segment.source: LTR and RTL marks are no longer reported in Braille or per-character speech when accessing the properties window. (#8361)
segment.target: As marcas LTR da esquerda para a direita e RTL da direita para a esquerda no so mais relatadas em braille ou fala por caractere ao acessar a janela de propriedades. (#8361)

segment.source: When jumping to form fields with Browse Mode quick navigation, the entire form field is now announced rather than just the first line. (#9388)
segment.target: Ao pular para campos de formulrio com navegao rpida no Modo de Navegao, o campo inteiro do formulrio agora anunciado, e no apenas a primeira linha. (#9388)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer become silent after exiting the Windows 10 Mail app. (#9341)
segment.target: O NVDA no ficar mais em silncio aps sair do aplicativo Email do Windows 10. (#9341)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start when the users regional settings are set to a locale unknown to NVDA, such as English (Netherlands). (#8726)
segment.target: O NVDA no falha mais ao iniciar quando as configuraes regionais dos usurios esto definidas para uma localidade desconhecida para o NVDA, como Ingls (Holanda). (#8726)

segment.source: When browse mode is enabled in Microsoft Excel and you switch to a browser in focus mode or vice versa, browse mode state is now reported appropriately. (#8846)
segment.target: Quando o modo de navegao est habilitado no Microsoft Excel e voc alterna para um navegador no modo de foco ou vice-versa, o estado do modo de navegao agora relatado apropriadamente. (#8846)

segment.source: NVDA now properly reports the line at the mouse cursor in Notepad++ and other Scintilla based editors. (#5450)
segment.target: O NVDA agora relata corretamente a linha no cursor do mouse no Notepad++ e outros editores baseados em Scintilla. (#5450)

segment.source: In Google Docs (and other web-based editors), braille no longer sometimes incorrectly shows "lst end" before the cursor in the middle of a list item. (#9477)
segment.target: No Google Docs (e outros editores web-baseados), o braille no mostra mais algumas vezes "fim de lst" antes do cursor no meio de um item de lista. (#9477)

segment.source: In the Windows 10 May 2019 Update, NVDA no longer speaks many volume notifications if changing the volume with hardware buttons when File Explorer has focus. (#9466)
segment.target: No Windows 10 Atualizao de Maio de 2019, o NVDA j no fala muitas notificaes de volume se estiver alterando o volume com botes de hardware quando o Gerenciador de Arquivos estiver em foco. (#9466)

segment.source: Loading the punctuation/symbol pronunciation dialog is now much faster when using symbol dictionaries containing over 1000 entries. (#8790)
segment.target: Agora muito mais rpido carregando o dilogo de pronncia de pontuao/smbolos quando usando dicionrios de smbolos contendo mais de 1000 entradas. (#8790)

segment.source: In Scintilla controls such as Notepad++, NVDA can read the correct line when wordwrap is enabled. (#9424)
segment.target: Nos controles Scintilla como em Notepad++, o NVDA pode ler a linha correta quando a quebra de linha estiver ativada. (#9424)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the cell location is announced after it changes due to the shift+enter or shift+numpadEnter gestures. (#9499)
segment.target: No Microsoft Excel, a localizao da clula anunciada aps a alterao conforme os comandos gestos shift+enter ou shift+numEnter. (#9499)

segment.source: In Visual Studio 2017 and up, in the Objects Explorer window, the selected item in objects tree or members tree with categories is now reported correctly. (#9311)
segment.target: No Visual Studio 2017 e superiores, na janela Explorador de Objetos, o item selecionado na rvore de objetos ou na rvore de membros com categorias agora relatado corretamente. (#9311)

segment.source: Add-ons with names that only differ in capitalization are no longer treated as separate add-ons. (#9334)
segment.target: Complementos com nomes que diferem apenas na maiusculizao no so mais tratados como complementos separados. (#9334)

segment.source: For Windows OneCore voices, the rate set in NVDA is no longer affected by the rate set in Windows 10 Speech Settings. (#7498)
segment.target: Para vozes Windows OneCore, a velocidade definida no NVDA no mais afetada pela velocidade definida em Configuraes de fala do Windows 10. (#7498)

segment.source: The log can now be opened with NVDA+F1 when there is no developer info for the current navigator object. (#8613)
segment.target: O log registro de eventos agora pode ser aberto com NVDA+F1 quando no houver informaes de desenvolvedor para o objeto atual de navegao. (#8613)

segment.source: It is again possible to use NVDA's table navigation commands in Google Docs, in Firefox and Chrome. (#9494)
segment.target: novamente possvel usar os comandos de navegao de tabelas do NVDA no Google Docs, no Firefox e no Chrome. (#9494)

segment.source: The bumper keys now work correctly on Freedom Scientific braille displays. (#8849)
segment.target: As teclas balanceadoras bumper agora funcionam corretamente nas linhas braille da Freedom Scientific. (#8849)

segment.source: When reading the first character of a document in Notepad++ 7.7 X64, NVDA no longer freezes for up to ten seconds. (#9609)
segment.target: Ao ler o primeiro caractere dum documento no Notepad++ 7.7 X64, o NVDA no congela mais por at dez segundos. (#9609)

segment.source: HTCom can now be used with a Handy Tech Braille display in combination with NVDA. (#9691)
segment.target: HTCom agora pode ser usado com uma Linha braille Handy Tech em combinao com o NVDA. (#9691)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, updates to a live region are no longer reported if the live region is in a background tab. (#1318)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox, as atualizaes em uma regio ativa contedo dinmico no sero mais informadas se a regio ativa estiver em uma guia em segundo plano. (#1318)

segment.source: NVDA's browse mode Find dialog no longer fails to function if NVDA's About dialog is currently open in the background. (#8566)
segment.target: Dilogo Modo de navegao do NVDA no deixa de funcionar se a caixa de dilogo Sobre do NVDA estiver atualmente aberta em segundo plano. (#8566)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Alteraes para Desenvolvedores

segment.source: You can now set the "disableBrowseModeByDefault" property on app modules to leave browse mode off by default. (#8846)
segment.target: Agora voc pode definir a propriedade "disableBrowseModeByDefault" nos mdulos de aplicativo app modules para deixar o modo de navegao desativado por padro. (#8846)

segment.source: The extended window style of a window is now exposed using the `extendedWindowStyle` property on Window objects and their derivatives. (#9136)
segment.target: O estilo janela estendida extended window style de uma janela agora exposto usando a propriedade `extendedWindowStyle` nos objetos Window Janela e seus derivados. (#9136)

segment.source: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.7. (#9440, #8522)
segment.target: Atualizado o pacote comtypes para a verso 1.1.7. (#9440, #8522)

segment.source: When using the report module info command, the order of information has changed to present the module first. (#7338)
segment.target: Ao usar o comando info do mdulo de relatrio report , a ordem das informaes foi alterada para apresentar o mdulo primeiro. (#7338)

segment.source: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from C#. (#9600)
segment.target: Adicionado um exemplo para demonstrar o uso de nvdaControllerClient.dll por C#. (#9600)

segment.source: Added a new isWin10 function to the winVersion module which returns whether or not this copy of NVDA is running on (at least) the supplied release version of Windows 10 (such as 1903). (#9761)
segment.target: Adicionado uma nova funo isWin10 ao mdulo winVersion que retorna se esta cpia do NVDA est sendo executada (pelo menos) na verso de lanamento fornecida do Windows 10 (como 1903). (#9761)

segment.source: The NVDA Python console now contains more useful modules in its namespace (such as appModules, globalPlugins, config and textInfos). (#9789)
segment.target: O console do Python NVDA agora contm mdulos mais teis em seu namespace (como appModules, globalPlugins, config e textInfos). (#9789)

segment.source: The result of the last executed command in the NVDA Python console is now accessible from the _ (line) variable. (#9782)
segment.target: O resultado do ltimo comando executado no console do Python NVDA agora est acessvel a partir da varivel _ (sublinha). (#9782)

segment.source: Note that this shadows the gettext translation function also called "_". To access the translation function: del _
segment.target: Observe que isso faz com que a funo de converso gettext tambm seja chamada por "_". Para acessar a funo de traduo: del _

segment.source: This point release fixes the following bugs:
segment.target: Esta verso pontual corrige os seguintes erros:

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes Excel 2007 to crash or refuses to report if a cell has a formula. (#9431)
segment.target: O NVDA no causa mais falhas no Excel 2007 ou recusa-se a relatar se uma clula tiver uma frmula. (#9431)

segment.source: Google Chrome no longer crashes when interacting with certain listboxes. (#9364)
segment.target: O Google Chrome no trava mais ao interagir com determinadas caixas de listagem. (#9364)

segment.source: An issue has been fixed which prevented copying a users configuration to the system configuration profile. (#9448)
segment.target: Foi corrigido um problema que impedia a cpia de uma configurao de usurios para o perfil de configurao do sistema. (#9448)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA again uses the localized message when reporting the location of merged cells. (#9471)
segment.target: No Microsoft Excel, o NVDA usa novamente a mensagem localizada traduzida ao relatar o local das clulas mescladas. (#9471)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include performance improvements when accessing both Microsoft word and Excel, stability and security improvements such as support for add-ons with version compatibility information, and many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Os destaques desta verso incluem melhorias de desempenho ao acessar o Microsoft Word e Excel, estabilidade e melhorias de segurana, como suporte para complementos com informaes de compatibilidade de verso e muitas outras correes de falhas.

segment.source: Please note that starting from this release of NVDA, custom appModules, globalPlugins, braille display drivers and synth drivers will no longer be automatically loaded from your NVDA user configuration directory.
segment.target: Por favor, note que a partir desta verso do NVDA, appModules mdulos de aplicativos personalizados, globalPlugins plug-ins globais , controladores drivers de linha braille e controladores drivers de sintetizador no sero mais automaticamente carregados a partir do diretrio de configurao do usurio do NVDA.

segment.source: Rather these should be installed as part of an NVDA add-on. For those developing code for an add-on, code for testing can be placed in a new developer scratchpad directory in the NVDA user configuration directory, if the Developer scratchpad option is turned on in NVDA's new Advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Em vez disso, eles devem ser instalados como parte de um complemento do NVDA. Para aqueles que desenvolvem cdigo para um complemento, o cdigo para teste pode ser colocado em um novo diretrio de rascunho/trabalho scratchpad do desenvolvedor no diretrio de configurao do usurio do NVDA, se a opo de Rascunho/Trabalho do Desenvolvedor estiver ativada no novo painel de configuraes Avanadas do NVDA.

segment.source: These changes are necessary to better ensure compatibility of custom code, so that NVDA does not break when this code becomes incompatible with newer releases.
segment.target: Essas alteraes so necessrias para garantir melhor compatibilidade do cdigo personalizado, para que o NVDA no quebre quando esse cdigo se tornar incompatvel com verses mais recentes.

segment.source: Please refer to the list of changes further down for more details on this and how add-ons are now better versioned.
segment.target: Por favor, consulte a lista de alteraes mais abaixo para obter mais detalhes sobre isso e como os complementos agora so melhor versionados.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Novas Caractersticas

segment.source: New braille tables: Afrikaans, Arabic 8 dot computer braille, Arabic grade 2, Spanish grade 2. (#4435, #9186)
segment.target: Novas tabelas braille: Africner, rabe braille informtico de 8 pontos, rabe grau 2, Espanhol grau 2. (#4435, #9186)

segment.source: Added an option to NVDA's mouse settings to make NVDA handle situations where the mouse is controlled by another application. (#8452)
segment.target: Adicionado uma opo configuraes do mouse do NVDA para fazer com que o NVDA lide com situaes em que o mouse controlado por outro aplicativo. (#8452)

segment.source: This will allow NVDA to track the mouse when a system is controlled remotely using TeamViewer or other remote control software.
segment.target: Isso permitir que o NVDA rastreie o mouse quando um sistema for controlado remotamente usando o TeamViewer ou outro software de controle remoto.

segment.source: Added the `--enable-start-on-logon` command line parameter to allow configuring whether silent installations of NVDA set NVDA to start at Windows logon or not. Specify true to start at logon or false to not start at logon. If the --enable-start-on-logon argument is not specified at all then NVDA will default to starting at logon, unless it was already configured not to by a previous installation. (#8574)
segment.target: Adicionado o parmetro de linha de comando `--enable-start-on-logon` para permitir a configurao se as instalaes silenciosas do NVDA configuram o NVDA para iniciar no logon do Windows ou no. Especifique true verdadeiro para iniciar no logon ou false falso para no iniciar no logon. Se o argumento --enable-start-on-logon no for especificado, o NVDA iniciar no logon, a menos que j tenha sido configurado para no fazer isso por uma instalao anterior. (#8574)

segment.source: It is possible to turn NVDA's logging features off by setting logging level to "disabled" from General settings panel. (#8516)
segment.target: possvel desativar os recursos de log do NVDA definindo o nvel de log como "desativado" no painel de configuraes gerais. (#8516)

segment.source: The presence of formulae in LibreOffice and Apache OpenOffice spreadsheets is now reported. (#860)
segment.target: A presena de frmulas nas planilhas do LibreOffice e do Apache OpenOffice agora relatada. (#860)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, browse mode now reports the selected item in list boxes and trees.
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox e no Google Chrome, o modo de navegao agora informa o item selecionado em caixas de listagem e rvores.

segment.source: This works in Firefox 66 and later.
segment.target: Isso funciona no Firefox 66 e posterior.

segment.source: This does not work for certain list boxes (HTML select controls) in Chrome.
segment.target: Isso no funciona para determinadas caixas de listagem (controles de seleo de HTML) no Chrome.

segment.source: Early support for apps such as Mozilla Firefox on computers with ARM64 (e.g. Qualcomm Snapdragon) processors. (#9216)
segment.target: Suporte antecipado para aplicativos como o Mozilla Firefox em computadores com processadores ARM64 (por exemplo, Qualcomm Snapdragon). (#9216)

segment.source: A new Advanced Settings category has been added to NVDA's Settings dialog, including an option to try out NVDA's new support for Microsoft Word via the Microsoft UI Automation API. (#9200)
segment.target: Uma nova categoria de Configuraes Avanadas foi adicionada ao dilogo Configuraes do NVDA, incluindo uma opo para testar o novo suporte do NVDA para o Microsoft Word via API UI Automation Automao da Interface do Usurio da Microsoft. (#9200)

segment.source: Added support for the graphical view in Windows Disk Management. (#1486)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para a visualizao grfica no Gerenciamento de Disco do Windows. (#1486)

segment.source: Added support for Handy Tech Connect Braille and Basic Braille 84. (#9249)
segment.target: Adicionado suporte para Handy Tech Connect Braille e Basic Braille 84. (#9249)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Alteraes

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.8.0. (#9013)
segment.target: Atualizado o transcritor braille liblouis para a verso 3.8.0. (#9013)

segment.source: Add-on authors now can enforce a minimum required NVDA version for their add-ons. NVDA will refuse to install or load an add-on whose minimum required NVDA version is higher than the current NVDA version. (#6275)
segment.target: Os autores de complementos agora podem impor uma verso mnima necessria do NVDA para seus complementos. O NVDA se recusar a instalar ou carregar um complemento cuja verso mnima exigida do NVDA seja superior verso atual do NVDA. (#6275)

segment.source: Add-on authors can now specify the last version of NVDA the add-on has been tested against. If an add-on has been only tested against a version of NVDA lower than the current version, then NVDA will refuse to install or load the add-on. (#6275)
segment.target: Os autores de complementos podem agora especificar a ltima verso do NVDA em que o complemento foi testado. Se um complemento foi testado apenas contra uma verso do NVDA inferior verso atual, o NVDA se recusar a instalar ou carregar o complemento. (#6275)

segment.source: This version of NVDA will allow installing and loading of add-ons that do not yet contain Minimum and Last Tested NVDA version information, but upgrading to future versions of NVDA (E.g. 2019.2) may automatically cause these older add-ons to be disabled.
segment.target: Esta verso do NVDA permitir a instalao e o carregamento de complementos que ainda no contm informaes sobre a verso mnima e ltima do NVDA, mas a atualizao para futuras verses do NVDA (por exemplo, 2019.2) pode fazer com que esses complementos mais antigos sejam desativados.

segment.source: The move mouse to navigator object command is now available in Microsoft Word as well as for UIA controls, particularly Microsoft Edge. (#7916, #8371)
segment.target: O comando Mover o mouse para o objeto do navegador est agora disponvel no Microsoft Word, bem como para os controles UIA, especialmente o Microsoft Edge. (#7916, #8371)

segment.source: Reporting of text under the mouse has been improved within Microsoft Edge and other UIA applications. (#8370)
segment.target: O relato de texto sob o mouse foi aprimorado no Microsoft Edge e em outros aplicativos UIA. (#8370)

segment.source: When NVDA is started with the `--portable-path` command line parameter, the provided path is automatically filled in when trying to create a portable copy of NVDA using the NVDA menu. (#8623)
segment.target: Quando o NVDA iniciado com o parmetro de linha de comando `--portable-path`, o caminho fornecido automaticamente preenchido ao tentar criar uma cpia porttil do NVDA usando o menu do NVDA. (#8623)

segment.source: Updated the path to the Norwegian braille table to reflect the standard from the year 2015. (#9170)
segment.target: Atualizado o caminho para a tabela braille norueguesa para refletir o padro a partir do ano de 2015. (#9170)

segment.source: When navigating by paragraph (control+up or down arrows) or navigating by table cell (control+alt+arrows), the existence of spelling errors will no longer be announced, even if NVDA is configured to announce these automatically. This is because paragraphs and table cells can be quite large, and detecting spelling errors in some applications can be very costly. (#9217)
segment.target: Ao navegar por pargrafo (control+setas para cima ou para baixo) ou navegar pela clula da tabela (control+alt+setas), a existncia de erros ortogrficos no ser mais anunciada, mesmo que o NVDA esteja configurado para anunci-los automaticamente. Isso ocorre porque os pargrafos e as clulas da tabela podem ser muito grandes, e detectar erros de ortografia em alguns aplicativos pode ser muito custoso. (#9217)

segment.source: NVDA no longer automatically loads custom appModules, globalPlugins and braille and synth drivers from the NVDA user configuration directory. This code should be instead packaged as an add-on with correct version information, ensuring that incompatible code is not run with current versions of NVDA. (#9238)
segment.target: O NVDA no carrega mais automaticamente os appModules mdulos de aplicativos personalizados, globalPlugins plug-ins globais e controladores drivers de braille e sintetizador do diretrio de configurao do usurio do NVDA. Esse cdigo deve ser empacotado como um complemento com informaes de verso corretas, garantindo que o cdigo incompatvel no seja executado com as verses atuais do NVDA. (#9238)

segment.source: For developers who need to test code as it is being developed, enable NVDA's developer scratchpad directory in the Advanced category of NVDA settings, and place your code in the 'scratchpad' directory found in the NVDA user configuration directory when this option is enabled.
segment.target: Para desenvolvedores que precisam testar o cdigo conforme est sendo desenvolvido, ative o diretrio de rascunho/trabalho scratchpad do desenvolvedor do NVDA na categoria Avanado das configuraes do NVDA e coloque seu cdigo no diretrio 'scratchpad' encontrado no diretrio de configurao do NVDA quando esta opo estiver habilitada.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Correo de Falhas

segment.source: When using OneCore speech synthesizer on Windows 10 April 2018 Update and later, large chunks of silence are no longer inserted between speech utterances. (#8985)
segment.target: Ao usar o sintetizador de fala OneCore na atualizao do Windows 10 de abril de 2018, os grandes pedaos de silncio no sero mais inseridos entre os enunciados de fala. (#8985)

segment.source: When moving by character in plain text controls (such as Notepad) or browse mode, 32 bit emoji characters consisting of two UTF-16 code points (such as ) will now read properly. (#8782)
segment.target: Ao mover por caractere em controles de texto sem formatao (como o Bloco de Notas) ou no modo de navegao, os caracteres emoji de 32 bit consistindo em dois pontos de cdigo UTF-16 (como ) agora sero lidos corretamente. (#8782)

segment.source: Improved restart confirmation dialog after changing NVDA's interface language. The text and the button labels are now more concise and less confusing. (#6416)
segment.target: Melhoria do dilogo de confirmao de reincio depois de alterar o idioma da interface do NVDA. O texto e os rtulos dos botes so agora mais concisos e menos confusos. (#6416)

segment.source: If a 3rd party speech synthesizer fails to load, NVDA will fall back to Windows OneCore speech synthesizer on Windows 10, rather than espeak. (#9025)
segment.target: Se um sintetizador de voz de terceiros no for carregado, o NVDA voltar ao sintetizador Vozes Windows OneCore no Windows 10, em vez de espeak. (#9025)

segment.source: Removed the "Welcome Dialog" entry in the NVDA menu while on secure screens. (#8520)
segment.target: Removida a entrada "Dilogo de Boas Vindas" no menu do NVDA durante as telas seguras. (#8520)

segment.source: When tabbing or using quick navigation in browse mode, legends on tab panels are now reported more consistently. (#709)
segment.target: Aps tab ou usar a navegao rpida no modo de navegao, as legendas nos painis de guias agora so relatadas de forma mais consistente. (#709)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce selection changes for certain time pickers such as in the Alarms and Clock app in Windows 10. (#5231)
segment.target: O NVDA agora anunciar alteraes de seleo para determinados selecionadores de tempo, como no aplicativo Alarmes e Relgio do Windows 10. (#5231)

segment.source: In Windows 10's Action Center, NVDA will announce status messages when toggling quick actions such as brightness and focus assist. (#8954)
segment.target: Na Central de Aes do Windows 10, o NVDA anunciar mensagens de status ao alternar aes rpidas, como brilho e assistente de foco. (#8954)

segment.source: In action Center in Windows 10 October 2018 Update and earlier, NVDA will recognize brightness quick action control as a button instead of a toggle button. (#8845)
segment.target: Na Central de aes no Windows 10 de outubro de 2018 e anteriores, o NVDA reconhecer o controle de ao rpida do brilho como um boto em vez de um boto de alternncia. (#8845)

segment.source: NVDA will again track cursor and announce deleted characters in the Microsoft Excel go to and find edit fields. (#9042)
segment.target: O NVDA novamente rastrear o cursor e anunciar os caracteres excludos nos campos de edio ir para e localizar do Microsoft Excel. (#9042)

segment.source: Fixed a rare browse mode crash in Firefox. (#9152)
segment.target: Corrigido uma falha rara no modo de navegao em Firefox. (#9152)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to report the focus for some controls in the Microsoft Office 2016 ribbon when collapsed.
segment.target: O NVDA no deixa de relatar o foco de alguns controles da faixa ribbon do Microsoft Office 2016 quando recolhido.

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to report the suggested contact when entering addresses in new messages in Outlook 2016. (#8502)
segment.target: O NVDA no deixa de relatar o contato sugerido ao inserir endereos em novas mensagens no Outlook 2016. (#8502)

segment.source: The last few cursor routing keys on 80 cell eurobraille displays no longer route the cursor to a position at or just after the start of the braille line. (#9160)
segment.target: As ltimas teclas de rolagem do cursor em linhas eurobraille de 80 celas no direcionam mais o cursor para uma posio logo aps o incio da linha em braille. (#9160)

segment.source: Fixed table navigation in threaded view in Mozilla Thunderbird. (#8396)
segment.target: Corrigido a navegao de tabela na viso segmentada no Mozilla Thunderbird. (#8396)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, switching to focus mode now works correctly for certain list boxes and trees (where the list box/tree is not itself focusable but its items are) . (#3573, #9157)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox e no Google Chrome, a mudana para o modo de foco agora funciona corretamente para determinadas caixas de lista e rvores (onde a caixa de lista/rvore no focvel, mas seus itens so). (#3573, #9157)

segment.source: Browse mode is now correctly turned on by default when reading messages in Outlook 2016/365 if using NVDA's experimental UI Automation support for Word Documents. (#9188)
segment.target: O modo de navegao agora est corretamente ativado por padro ao ler mensagens no Outlook 2016/365 se estiver usando o suporte experimental de UI Automation automao de interface do usurio do NVDA para documentos do Word. (#9188)

segment.source: NVDA is now less likely to freeze in such a way that the only way to escape is signing out from your current windows session. (#6291)
segment.target: Agora menos provvel que o NVDA congele de forma que a nica maneira de escapar seja sair da sesso atual do Windows. (#6291)

segment.source: In Windows 10 October 2018 Update and later, when opening cloud clipboard history with clipboard empty, NVDA will announce clipboard status. (#9103)
segment.target: No Windows 10 Atualizao de outubro de 2018 e posteriores, ao abrir o histrico da rea de transferncia na nuvem com a rea de transferncia vazia, o NVDA anunciar o status da rea de transferncia. (#9103)

segment.source: In Windows 10 October 2018 Update and later, when searching for emojis in emoji panel, NVDA will announce top search result. (#9105)
segment.target: No Windows 10 Atualizao de outubro de 2018 e posteriores, ao procurar por emojis no painel de emojis, o NVDA anunciar o resultado da pesquisa. (#9105)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in the main window of Oracle VirtualBox 5.2 and above. (#9202)
segment.target: O NVDA no congela mais na janela principal do Oracle VirtualBox 5.2 e superiores. (#9202)

segment.source: Responsiveness in Microsoft Word when navigating by line, paragraph or table cell may be significantly improved in some documents. A reminder that for best performance, set Microsoft Word to Draft view with alt+w,e after opening a document. (#9217)
segment.target: Capacidade de resposta no Microsoft Word ao navegar por linha, pargrafo ou clula de tabela pode ser significativamente melhorada em alguns documentos. Um lembrete de que, para um melhor desempenho, defina a exibio Microsoft Word para Rascunho com alt+w,e depois de abrir um documento. (#9217)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, empty alerts are no longer reported. (#5657)
segment.target: No Mozilla Firefox e no Google Chrome, os alertas vazios no so mais informados. (#5657)

segment.source: Significant performance improvements when navigating cells in Microsoft Excel, particularly when the spreadsheet contains comments and or validation dropdown lists. (#7348)
